Summary Heading: Hotel is in need of serious service
Summary: When I arrived I was given a room where the thermostat did not work. I was moved to a new room and when the storm came through I realized the sliding door latch wouldn’t close since it was rusted. As a diamond member I received a text message asking for any updates. When I responded with the complaints of the stay I received no response. Beware- great location next to the airport but it is run down and management won’t respond.
Manager Response: Dear joznphx,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so sorry for the challenges you experienced and  lack of response to the reporting of them. This is not the norm and we should have responded. I would be happy to discuss this offline and make the situation right for you. Kindly email your details to SNAOC_GM@hilton.com, we would be happy to look into this further. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: I would recommend this hotel to anyone! From the cleanliness to the pool and all amenities, we had a great time and all expectations were met! Thank you Hilton in Irvine! We most definitely will be back!
Manager Response: Aantuna2015,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your time with us and that you will visit us again in the future. We hope to see you soon!!

Summary Heading: Worn out rooms, outrageous parking fees
Summary: Was down in Irvine to drop off my son for a new job he was starting. Shame on me for not checking beforehand but it was a shock to the system when I found out the hotel charged $40 a night to park. You read that right...FORTY DOLLARS A NIGHT You would think for that price the rooms would be up to date, it would have amenities etc. Worn out rooms, no toiletries. very disappointing for a Hilton property right smack across from the SNA airport. Won't make the same mistake twice.
Manager Response: Dear dsequeira,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and congratulations on your son's new job. It is true that we charge $39 for self parking at the hotel as do all full service hotels in the market. Our hotel is priced in the middle of the full service hotels in the market as well. The hotel is going through a full renovation in the coming year and hope you'll join us again in the future.

Summary: I was here for a conference at the hotel. All staff at registration, bar, conference were helpful & friendly. The only small issue I had was the noise from the AC, but I was still able to sleep well & comfortably.  I like that the parking was easily accessible and not in some dark far away structure.  I would not hesitate to stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear cledds,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We were happy to host your group and thank you for the business. I am glad to see that you had a successful meeting and that you will come back and see us again in the future.  Regards,  Rob K GM

Summary Heading: Better options nearby I am sure
Summary: Popcorn ceilings. Lipstick on an old one. Outside the building is the ugliest I have ever seen. It's painted contemporary colors but it's horribly ugly. Wow. The elevators and hallways are small and old. The popcorn ceilings and old doors and small bathrooms are too much. They painted and put new wallpaper but it still is old. Parking is small, the gate doesn't work well,  the pool area is smaller than it appears. No room service. For $99 it's a good deal
Manager Response: Dear JohnnyVegas12,  Thanks for taking the time to review your recent stay and for your honest candor. We appreciate all feedback as it helps us raise our service levels for future guests. The hotel does have a renovation scheduled in the coming year and we are constantly updating things currently. Our bar was completely redone and our meeting space was remodeled late last year. We hope you will comeback when these changes are complete.

Summary Heading: Good location, food items too expensive for quality,  comfortable rooms
Summary: Nice hotel.  Clean, comfortable beds & room.  Breakfast way too expensive for quality received, especially breakfast items.  Buffet items I.e. potatoes, biscuits & gravy cold, not warm or hot.  Scrambled eggs not kept stocked, long wait to get.  Food item containers not kept heated which is in violation of standards. Pleasant personnel. Room had no refrigerator so staff sent one for cabinet.  Ice container had no lid so staff got one. Paper products & linen well stocked Did not observe any extra cleaning or wipe down of common areas while there for a while
Room tip: Poor quality food for price, minimal cleaning wipe downs of common areas & elevators
Manager Response: Dear 206CarolS,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate any and all feedback from our guests as it helps us raise our service levels for future stays. I will be sure to follow up with our culinary and restaurant staff regarding your breakfast comments. We do hope you will stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Check in great. Room fine. Total disaster from there. Room was above a courtyard and drunks screaming all night so had to call security. Drunks running down the hall trying to get in our room and banging on and swearing as it wouldn’t open. Then a little tapper dog started barking for hours in the early hours. Totally unacceptable especially at the rate we were at. No follow up from manager or supervisor, no apology. Then got charged $10 for a latte. Couldn’t make this up info tried. Back to the Hyatt I guess.
Manager Response: Dear Roubsfam2009,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am troubled by the post as we spoke earlier this week. In fact, I sent a follow up email with a promise to offer a complimentary room on your follow up visit in the future. As I mentioned in our conversation, it is difficult to control what other do during their stay, our security can react and handle the situation immediately. I have already spoken with the security team and other staff to ensure we are responding accordingly.  Regards,  Rob K

Summary: Parking fee was $40 a day! Thats right they charge you $40 a day to park your rental car. I was able to negotiate down to $20 a day but still especially because they have gate to keep others out. The food credit was a joke had to be used for breakfeast and since the bar area was closed you had to eat in the receptionist area. Not welcoming at all.
Manager Response: Dear Adventurer110376,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about any confusion regarding parking. It is true, we do charge $39 for parking. As a for profit business and a full service hotel, we model that price against other full service hotels in the market. We also appreciate your patience as we renovate our lobby and bar space. This should be done next week and will be completely open again to enjoy your food credit and restaurant/bar.  Regards,

Summary: Hotel staff was amazing, Restaurant Staff was amazing, valet staff was was amazing, I’ll stay here every time I’m in town. Super convenient location, across the street from John Wayne airport. Shuttles run on schedule. Our attendees just loved it! Those that stayed mentioned how nice and clean comfortable the room was, I agree, we got a great night sleep after a long night of holiday celebration. Conveniently located to many attractions we took in the sites at the local beaches in the morning. Can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear HbGarryG,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that your event was successful and your attendees enjoyed them selves. We hope to welcome you back again soon!!  Regards,

Summary: The location next to the airport is fabulous.  The downside is that to legally walk from the airport to the hotel it requires some navigation to get to a crosswalk because you are crossing a very, very busy and wide street with traffic zooming in both directions.    The hotel said they offered shuttle service, but after waiting an hour and a half at the airport we took a ride instead.  Of course, that's when the shuttle finally showed up.    The rooms are a little tired, but when I'm personally tired from traveling all day what I really care is that the room is clean and comfortable.  It was clean and comfortable.    I can't complain about the staff, as they were working their you-know-what off.
Manager Response: William,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. I am sorry for any miscommunication regarding our shuttle. We do run every half hour in the mornings and then upon request in the afternoon. The hotel is slated for a renovation in the coming year and we invite you to come back and stay with us again.  Regards,

Summary: The hotel charges its guess US$39 a night for self-parking. This is the same rate charged to non-guest parking. There is no discount for guess and no specially reserved parking spaces either. This is such a ripoff!
Manager Response: Dear Maps301623,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. It is true that we do charge for parking as ALL full service hotels in the market do. We are actually in the middle/lower scale compared to many hotels in the market. I am sorry if this charge prohibits you from staying with us in the future and we wish you the very best.

Summary Heading: This hotel should embrass the Hilton chain
Summary: This is the second time I stayed at this hotel and let me tell you this second time will be the last time! First of all, the hotel is very dated. Really one of the more ran down full-service Hilton hotels I have seen.  I stayed there four nights. From the on-set, the room had no alarm clock in it. Fine, I have my phone.  The first night was quiet and non-eventful . The next morning, however, I went to have breakfast in the coffee shop. The employee working the coffee shop, a heavy set female, was extremely rude and when I got my breakfast sandwich,  she literally threw it at me and said “here”. I had a very busy day planned and when I got to the hotel after it , to my surprise, they had no room serve. How can you he a full-service hilton and have no room service?! The next
Manager Response: Dear ArtisLee,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate the feedback and will use it to raise our service levels for future guests. I am sorry for the experience you had with us. The hotel had a renovation planned when Covid caused closures in the industry. We do plan on future renovations in the coming years. We hope to invite you back when those are completed.  Regards,

Summary Heading: Stay away if your a Hilton member
Summary: No executive lounge for members and the food credit will not cover ANY food items. The food selections were minimal and the shuttle only runs every 30 minutes but they are across the street from the airport. One shuttle in use only. We won’t be staying here again. I’ve experienced much better hotels in my years of travel.
Manager Response: Dear cds500,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about your experience with us. It is true that like most full service US Hilton, the Executive lounge has been eliminated. We are constantly reviewing our menu options and ensure we have items that cover the food and beverage credit given. Regarding our shuttle, we have never had a need to travel more than every half hour for our guests. As you stated, we are across the street and many of our guests choose to take the short walk if they can't wait the extra 30 minutes. We do hope you would stay with us again and wish you the best and safe travels.

Summary: This is one of the best Hilton properties in the Irvine area.  It is clean and has been updated.  There is a small restaurant and bar in the lobby.  Well run and they have a free airport shuttle.  The pool area looks nice, but I did not use it.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to review your recent stay Charlie. I am happy to see that you enjoyed your time. Hopefully you can come back and enjoy our patio/pool areas.

Summary: Everything and everyone was amazing specially Christina I’m the front desk.  The food and drinks from breakfast was perfect.   The room was very clean.  The pool was great. The only issue was the airport noise
Manager Response: Dear Vonmova,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are happy to see you enjoyed your stay and especially thankful for the Team Member recognition of Christina. We will be sure to share your comments and hope to welcome you back again soon!!

Summary Heading: Food at dining not great at all
Summary: At the front desk, staff was vacuuming, can’t hear co versatile well. Dining at dinner.service was fair and not great. Food was HORRIBLE. CHICKEN WAS OVERCOOK. Told staff. Ignore my response and hang me the bill to pay. Bad customer service
Manager Response: Betty,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about your experience. We thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will address this with the staff to ensure we elevate our service levels for future guests.

Summary: Room does not have a refrigerator! There is a big TV cabinet with an open space underneath designed for a small refrigerator but the refrigerator was missing. Front desk offered to bring a refrigerator for $20 more. I was told that because my room was paid with Southwest Airlines voucher, and therefore the hotel did not have to accommodate guest's request for a refrigerator. But the real point for debate here is: in the 21st Century, a HILTON hotel in the rich City of Irvine, Orange County CA have certain designated rooms where guests would have to pay $20 more for a refrigerator!   I just could not believe that a full service HILTON HOTEL in the middle of the rich city of IRVINE, Orange County CALIFORNIA does not have refrigerator in every room. I thought it might only be the
Manager Response: Dear Todad198,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear we were able to accommodate you when your Southwest flight was cancelled. As you mentioned, the room that was paid for by the airlines did not account for the premium upgrade. The hotel is in the process of supplying every room with refrigerators in the coming year. I am sorry you that the lack of refrigerator in your complimentary room caused such trouble and inconvenience. We wish you the best and hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Hilton has gone to the dogs
Summary: Too many dogs. It’s more of a kennel then a premier hotel. Hilton is now synonymous to a motel 6. No luxury here unless you’re a dog. The hotel even charges $40 a day for parking. So even though I asked for hotel shuttle to the airport, they still charged automatically parking. So double check your receipt before you leave.
Manager Response: Dear Nikkie7727,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. I am sorry to hear about your experience. We gladly welcome pets and will invite them to stay with our travelers at any time. We find that many times, our furry guests are better behaved than some human guests. It is true that we do charge for parking as all full service hotels in the area do. As a for profit company this close to the airport, we find our rates comparable to other hotels in the market.

Summary Heading: Parking fees $39 over price and should have inform us when check-in.
Summary: Overall it’s a Hilton class hotel, it’s close to the airport,  Clean room, friendly staff.  Only complain is the $39 parking fee which i didn’t know until I found the hotel keep trying to charge on my Apple Pay account with diff amount, $68, $18, $15, $18  finally I called and found out self parking cost $39 even I am Hilton honor member, if the staff inform me while check in , I’ll not park the car there at least I have a choice instead of feeling got ripped off.
Manager Response: Dear Luvtravel018,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. I’m sorry for any miscommunication regarding parking. It is true that we charge for parking as all full service hotels in the market do. We work hard to have the parking fees on all websites to inform our guests prior to booking. We will definitely double check to make sure it is listed. We hope you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: While the room was clean, we unfortunately had bad customer service.  We got charged for our service dog Evan after we told the girl at check in.  When speaking to the Manager Micheal he was going to check with the girl and get back to me.  I really feel I am being ignored now as I have not heard anything from Michael.  The parking is a bit pricy and good luck finding a spot to park.  self service $39
Manager Response: Dear Casualgirladventure,  As mentioned in our response to your google review, we apologize for the delay in communicating. Michael has taken needed time off. I’m checking with your account, you were not charged for any pet fee on your room. We do not charge for service animals or emotional support animals. We do however as owners to provide the ESA certificate upon check-In. It is true that we charge for parking as all full service hotels do in the market. I also see Michael discounted your parking for your stay. We hope you. Is it us again in the future.

Summary: The location is very convenient to airport with 24 hour shuttle service. The staff is very friendly and helpful. They have movie channels to choose from and the rooms are spacious and quiet. I give this place a 10. View isn't so bad either.
Manager Response: Dear hollyhU7689AO,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so happy to see you enjoyed your stay as well as our location and amenities. We hope to welcome you back again soon!!

Summary Heading: Shout out to a great employee
Summary: No fault here--these are difficult times to staff appropriately on so many levels. Checking in at night, I noticed that the front desk person was on her own. She was caring and poised as she shifted her attention from the person in front of her, the ringing phone, the walkie-talkie to change languages and converse with housekeeping, back to the person in front of her, to her left to hand out pool towels. She was doing the work of three people. The woman in front of me asked why she was alone, and she said her co-worker got sick and had to leave. Hilton Irvine, you have a treasure in Emirce and I hope she is valued for her abilities.
Manager Response: 28miriamw,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so grateful to see the comments regarding our team members. They are the heart and soul of our service and we cherish and appreciate them. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future!!

Summary: Ok. Full disclosure ... I read some of the reviews, and was a little apprehensive. A quick chat with the hotel personnel restored my faith in the property.  Our room was pleasant, reasonably clean to the eye, well stocked and well appointed. We had a late meal at the hotel restaurant, it was quite good. So, one of the areas where there seems to be a soft spot is staffing; the front facing positions are apparently filled. The front desk staff was very pleasant and accommodating.  The shuttle ran on time and the driver very affable.  Five stars, however, signifies perfection. Despite a brief, but enjoyable stay - there is still room for some behind the scenes staff. It SEEMED to us that only two of the three elevators were in service (in all honesty, that could have been
Manager Response: Dear Boeing767,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed our guestrooms, food and beverage options as well as our front of house staff. I appreciate your candor and honest review. I agree with your assessment 100%. There are areas that need to be constantly addressed and we will do so. I also agree that our elevators need some attention and we are scheduled to do a refurbishment later this year. Thanks again for the business and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!!

Summary: I am a big Hilton person, but this hotel joined my blacklist. It was a last-minute reservation. The staff was friendly, I will say that. The hotel? Well good luck with parking, you will likely end up paying the $50 a night valet fee because their lot is so small. My room? for the money, it's really outdated and the furniture is well used. I had to kill bugs in my room that were fairly large on the walls. The sliding glass door didn't close all the way so we can hear conversations outside in the parking lot. The curtain? OMG I think I lost a year of life when I went to check the door. The amount of dust and stuff that went into the air by touching those curtains. After looking them over, they were black and nasty. My headboard had dust like you wouldn't imagine. Honestly, I will
Manager Response: Dear Original_Mexcano,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so sorry to hear about your experience and can assure you, this is not the normal experience of our guests. It is true that we charge for parking, but have ample spaces for our guests, however, we do sometimes have large events that make the parking a bit of a challenge and appreciate everyone's patience on those days. We will definitely look into the cleanliness issues you brought up and fix for the future guests.

Summary: Great location with professional staff at your service. Nice meeting area, with pool and patio for leisure! A bite costly on food and drinks but the services make up the difference. Will stay there on the next trip...
Manager Response: Dear Stevesmurad,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to see that you enjoyed your stay and most importantly, our great staff. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future!!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Hilton. Great location and the value was right.  The staff was always available for questions and answered every one I had with precision and friendliness. Would definitely stay again. Thanks.
Manager Response: Dear Scottzigzag,  Thanks for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to see you enjoyed your time and more importantly, out wonderful staff. We were happy to welcome your group and hope to have you back again soon!!

Summary: Stayed two nights.  Grossly understaffed.  One poor girl working the front desk alone.  I think there was a limited menu. Didn’t find anything on it particular appealing so I skipped meals there.  My drink was $17!!!  Ouch.  I guess you pay for the airport convenience.
Manager Response: ljpaff,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to see you enjoyed our location and cleanliness. It has been difficult n certain days with staffing and appreciate everyone's patience as we continue to work through this time. Rest assured, we have a full service restaurant and Starbucks when staffing allows. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: It is always easy to stay at the Hilton Irvine in the beginning and at the end of a CA visit.  Additionally, being able to plan my Professional Dance Network's April event here makes it easy to meet others and plan the rooms, F & B, etc.
Manager Response: Dear Sheri2016,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate you coming back and staying with us. We hope to continue that trend in the near future!!

Summary: Two night stay. First night turned on the heat and the smell of skunks filled the room. Too late for me to switch after I had unpacked everything. Without the heat it was freezing.  Next day asked front desk to switch rooms but manager was not there. Gave my name and number but no one called to get me into a new room. Second night, smell of skunk in the hallway but not my room.  Heater worked without the smell.  Irritated I never heard from the Room Manager.  Maybe got 3 hours of sleep each night.  They have a snack shop with some refrigerated items that are overpriced but the selection was decent. No microwave in room.
Manager Response: Dear Prplxme,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly sorry for the lack of communication on our part. You should have received a call back at the very least. The smell you experienced is not typical and we will definitely look into immediately. We hope we can welcome you back again in the future. We also offer a select number of rooms with refrigerators and microwaves for reference.

Summary Heading: Make another selection of nearby options!
Summary: Dogs barking in rooms, pool noise well beyond 11pm, no open restaurant or food service beyond a Starbucks as if that will satisfy your food needs. Room wasn't stocked with coffee, cups or water. overall run down appearance.
Manager Response: Dear Jastader,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly sorry for your experience with your stay. While it is difficult for us to control what other guests do inside their rooms, we can accommodate you in to other (quieter) rooms. We also appreciate everyone's patience as we work through some challenging times with staffing and operations. We may have to shut down some services (restaurants Etc.) from time to time. Rest assured, this is not permanent and we do have full service amenities available.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel …too many things need to improve
Summary: Like I said nice hotel but some aspects of service and your billing errors need improvement… you can’t charge guests twice due to billing errors/ system and expect them to be perfectly happy … also windows need to open more than 4 inches … if someone wants to comit suicide they will anyways… fresh air is not overrated especially during Covid
Manager Response: Dear 675mkr,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about the billing challenges you experienced. This is not a normal experience we hear about and will use this as a training moment. We do hope to welcome you back again in the future.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Well, wish this could be a positive review.  Tried out the Hilton Irvine to see if it would be a good option for future visits.  Sadly, I doubt we'll return to this Hilton property.  The hotel is noisy every where you go.  Loud room A/C and some other noises we never identified that we heard in our room.  Bed too soft and saggy.  The worst part of the visit was the urine spot in our room's carpeting.  The hotel comped our parking, but that was it for having urine on the carpet in an Executive Floor room. I was told someone would talk to the manager and contact us. We haven't heard a thing.  People should leave their pets at home and the hotel needs to be up front about  which rooms have housed pets.  I'll assume someone's pet peed on the carpet and they didn't tell the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Greta_msg,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about your experience. We strive to offer clean and comfortable accommodations to every guest that stays with us and we have failed to do so in your case. I do hope you will give the hotel and staff another chance in the future. We do try and regulate mask usage throughout the hotel, however, you can imagine how difficult that is at times. We appreciate your understanding.  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Clean ,Convenient , comfortable ,easy to find  Helpful , considerate employees, nice room Good looking entrance , felt safe there .  Area very walkable . Nice bar. Pool area clean Specialty coffee bar. Good value for the money.
Manager Response: DearBlu5160,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and for the great comments. We are so pleased you enjoyed your time with us and hope we can welcome you back in the near future. Happy Holidays!!  Rob K GM

Summary: Pool was very very dirty and unsanitary. Their was all kinds of trash. Parking was bad. Our key card didn’t work to get in and out of the park lot so we were stuck. Room was pretty okay. Wish they had a microwave inside the room.
Manager Response: Dear Kellygomez025,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate your business and your feedback. I am sorry to hear about your experience as that is not typical of our hotel and the level of service. I do hope we can welcome you back again in the future to give you the level of service you deserve.

Summary: The location is perfectly placed near airport, places to eat and relax.  Staff is always pleasant, professional and the bartenders who also serve food, are top notch,  Fun to see them remember customers, pick up on conversations from previous visits
Manager Response: Dear JetBoatRich,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and WELCOME BACK!! I am glad to see you enjoyed the hotel and will definitely pass on your comments to our bartenders. We hope to welcome you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Great place to stay and have stayed there a number of times for business trips. Automated Parking tickets and pay machines were a pain for everyone. Get a ticket from the machine every time on your way in and use your room key to leave the lot. Otherwise 5 stars.
Manager Response: Jcharlton83,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed our hotel. I am sorry to hear about your parking experience. It is designed to take your room key )or digital key) on the entrance and exit alleviating the need to take a ticket. I will follow up with our parking company to investigate.  Thanks again,  Rob K General Manager

Summary Heading: An amazing swimming pool. Clean, heated
Summary: Location great, front desk great, bartender great.. pool amazing beautiful warm clean.  The only remarks I would add were some nonguests sleeping on the lounge chairs   They didn’t bother anyone but a reminder of the homeless problems in the area.  The lounge area had no gate to exclude non guests.
Manager Response: Kamaainanomo,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and the outdoor amenities we offer. Thank you for your comments and we will follow up with our security to ensure patrol is monitored.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: We were told that we were in the center of everything and we were not. Hotel rooms are not too clean and old. Refrigerator tray was full of old water and just on top of top shelf, just nasty. Not enough towels in bathroom and not enough toilet paper for 5 days. Just one little tube of shampoo that is not enough to wash your hair once much less to wash your hair twice. Just disappointed and very expensive for the facilities
Manager Response: Lauraprida,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly sorry to hear about your experience and will use your comments as a training tool for the hotel. We do hop you will give us another chance in the future.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary Heading: No room service upon request, front desk short staffed
Summary: Literally walking distance from the terminal.  No room service at all, even when requested. We stayed 4 days and requested room cleaning. We never had a maid come by until day of check out. Very courteous van driver, under staffed front desk.... which leads to long lines, no service.  The sticker on your mirror in the bathroom that says maid service is available upin request is not something that you should count on. They should take the stickers off or at least make them more honest. They should say : "Clean your own room and get your own amenities during your stay with us. We are understaffed."
Manager Response: Mike,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate your business as well as your comments. We also appreciate everyone's patience as we work through the new way of doing business throughout the current times. We are always reevaluating recruiting and hiring to ensure we are fully staffed. We hope to welcome you back again in the future.  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Coffee shop service was great. However, they didn’t provide the complimentary services they usually do for Hilton honors members such as providing daily water bottles up to 2, nor the clean seal on the door. The app was also not working and they couldn’t help me troubleshoot when I escalated the issue to them.
Manager Response: Dear Dlysandra17,  Thanks for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear you enjoyed our Starbucks coffee cart. I am sorry to hear about you not receiving your Hilton Honors benefits like bottled water at check-in. I will personally follow up with the front desk team to ensure all Hilton Honors members receive their benefits. Thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Lovely helpful friendly staff. Clean room, quite, worm, lovely outdoor sitting ing area. Your friendliness, kindness and welcoming nature made me feel right at home.    Thank you for everything! Mishari..
Manager Response: Dear Malgha835365,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and for the great comments. I am happy to see you enjoyed your time here and it was an honor to serve you. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future!!  Rob K General Manager

Summary: This hotel was fantastic. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for solid accommodations by the airport. Jerry at the lobby bar/restaurant is great. Made for a great dinner. The rooms were super clean.
Manager Response: Dear Lefty0237,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and for the great review!! I am happy to see that you enjoyed your time with us and were able to take advantage of our restaurant and bar. Jerry is a fantastic Team Member and we will surely pass on your comments. We hope to welcome you back soon!!  Rob

Summary: Nice but ir has a lot of opportunities to b better for being a Hilton, the lobby is super nice and clean , but rooms can be more up to date special restrooms and fixtures , the bed and pillow were not up to the quality I have experienced before at a Hilton hotel
Manager Response: Dear Mikemike14,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! We know you have many choices and appreciate that you chose us. We are looking forward to a guestroom renovation in the coming year so we hope you can visit again soon.

Summary: What can we do when we’re feeling low during quarantine, just wanted to get away nearby, good food nearby the hotel, was nice, clean and well organized, sometimes a little rest is all we need, thank you for the rest
Manager Response: Dear Quarantinegetaway,  Thanks for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to see that we were able to provide you with a little bit of a getaway. We all need that sometimes!! We hope to welcome you back again in the future!!

Summary: bed and bathroom was good. Carpet appeared worn and stained. The desk veneer was worn with no pen, paper, or the usual information, television kept loosing signal just didn’t seem to be up to Hilton level.
Manager Response: Dear Cdshous2n,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear that the hotel did not match your expectations. We appreciate all feedback as it helps us raise our service levels for future guests. Most hotels did remove all collateral from the workspace during Covid and are in the process of replacing them in the near future.

Summary: My booking was fully  paid through Hotwire and I got charged again through the hotel.   It Has  taken hours to sort out.   Let alone $30 for 3 hours of parking because it is part of the airport. We were not informed at time of check in.   Never again.
Manager Response: Dear CaliforniaBee,  Thanks for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about any confusion between the hotel and Hotwire. I do hope that it was cleared up. Regarding parking, yes we do charge for parking as do all full service hotels near the airport. We work hard to ensure these fees are listed on each third party site and will continue to monitor Hotwire in particular.

Summary: Amazing customer service , I would definitely come back again! Everyone was so nice and welcoming it felt like a min i vacay away from home . Everyone was great! Loved the pool and that it was open until 10pm and everything was clean
Manager Response: Dear Sabrinavargas96,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate your business and the kind words about the staff!! We hope to welcome you back again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Amazing Hotel in Just the right Place
Summary: Great place to stay when your visiting OC. Close to shopping, great staff, rooms clean, easy to get to! We enjoyed our stay thanks to Jose, Jerry, and Betty showing us amazing service.All a win in my book!
Manager Response: Dear dtalbert713,  Thanks so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear about our amazing staff treating you well!! I will be sure to pass your comments on to Jose, Jerry and Betty. We hope to welcome you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary Heading: Hair in the food, window in the room dirty Penis shaped repair on the ceiling
Summary: Terrible.  It was a hotel from the 70’s.  Looked like they put lipstick on a pig.  The popcorn ceiling had a repair on it that looked like a penis.  The inside of the windows had hand prints and other weird greasy prints on them.  When I asked the maids to change our sheets they came in while we were gone and put folded sheets on the tv stand.  REALLY!!  We had to change our own sheets. We also found a hair in my girlfriends dinner but didn’t realize until after we had finished.  Pool was not kept well.  Looked like a hurricane came through and turned all the chairs around.  Way overpriced for a Motel 6 experience.
Manager Response: MdubsRacing,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about your experience during your last stay. This is definitely not the level of service we normally provide, nor what you deserved. We will use your review as a learning experience and raise our service levels for future guests.   Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Location good. Didn’t care for the over priced food and drinks and lack of updates. Was a clean hotel with kind and professional staff. Outdoor space to relax was good for all times of the day. Would stay again but not my first choice.
Manager Response: Mopower69,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to see you enjoyed our clean rooms, staff and outdoor area. We are looking forward to many upgrades in the near future and hope to welcome you back to enjoy the additions.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Did not feel welcome at the hotel was treated with such disrespect I will not ever come back the clerks that checked us in lied to us about breakfast and also when asked about it the was no response and when I went to talk to them they kept passing the blame off to someone else I’d really like my money back honestly
Manager Response: Nightwing431,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. On behalf of the entire team, I apologize for any miscommunication or misinformation that was given to you by the staff. We try hard to ensure every guest experience is enjoyable, but we seem to have missed the opportunity during your stay. We will definitely use this experience as a learning moment and hope you will give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Really appreciated the willingness to go above and beyond.  Everyone was so helpful and friendly.  Super comfortable bed and great pillows!!  Right across the street from a small easy airport to get in and out of.  Clean and nice pool and work out room too. Overall great place to stay.
Manager Response: Ckirk963,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and for the awesome comments. We will definitely share this review with our staff and hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Very clean and comfortable room. But no microwave or refrigerator, which makes a families stay easier. Restaurant prices a little high. But outside options close by.  But $35.00 dollars a day for parking is a slap in the face.
Manager Response: Poipuallen42,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to see you enjoyed your stay overall. For future reference, we do offer 2 floors of guestrooms that have microwaves and refrigerators in them. They are listed as "Premium Rooms" on any website. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Hilton in Irvine! There breakfast variety is great! The pool, hot tub and gym are well maintained. The only inconvenience I had was that my key card didn’t work for the gate so every time I had leave I had to call for assistance so the gate would open. Yes, I did try to get it fixed, but they said it was a gate issue.
Manager Response: Beccaga05,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to see you enjoyed your time with us. I am so sorry to hear about your keycard and the parking gate.  We have had the company out and fixed our parking gate since your stay, so next time things should be seemless.  Thanks again.  Rob K General manager

Summary: Poor guest services  Everything was old, room is small, bed sheets smells Shower head old, toilet flash slow Not enough towels shampoo and soap  Out of toilet paper Was not inform that there’s no housekeeping
Manager Response: Sam,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate any and all feedback as it helps us raise our service levels for future guests. I am so sorry to hear about your experience with us. This level of service is not indicative of the service we usually provide. We hope to welcome you back again soon to give us another shot.

Summary: The fact that this hotel is directly across the street from the airport is a huge plus. The fact that the staff was so friendly and accommodating is why I give this hotel a five-star rating! Dora and José went out of their way ensuring my needs were accommodated.
Manager Response: Learicha,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed yourself and will definitely share your comments with Dora and Jose at the front desk. We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: A little Dated but very clean. Very professional staff and services provided quickly. Breakfast and lunch was better than expected but I didn't have dinner in the Hotel. Best of all is the location to airport and their shuttle service!
Manager Response: Stevesmurad,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and for the kind words. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed the property overall and the amenities we offer. We hope to invite you back again soon.

Summary: Jose at the front desk was nice just not helpful but when the general manager Rob came to assist me he fixed the issues immediately without any trouble! He definitely made my experience way better! Thank you!
Manager Response: Princessro12,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and for the very kind words. I am happy to hear about your experience and our interaction. We hope to welcome you back again soon!!

Summary: Great hotel across from the airport. Parking $35 and water $5 and ceiling are low if your tall. Place is really clean and great customer service. Won’t come back for those 3 thing but if that doesn't bother you then this is a great hotel.
Manager Response: Jimmy,  Thanks for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear that you liked the cleanliness and customer service during your stay. Those are the main areas we can control. You are correct that we charge $35 for parking and $5 for water and am sorry to hear that would be a reason to not come back. We hope you change your mind and we can welcome you back again soon.

Summary: Hotel was amazing definitely comfy but my account was charge 3 different times for different totals and I still do t have my money back. I told front desk of the first charge night of arrival and was pain in full they said they didn’t see anything on there end. So I was charge a second time and a third time also. Very frustrating I still don’t have my money back
Manager Response: Kelvin,  Thanks for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I'm sorry to hear about your charge experience. I am looking at your account and there was only a charge for Rm/Tx on your CC for the one night. You did book a Hilton Honors discounted rate, but there was no prepay on the reservation. We did however take an authorization for the amount that has been refunded after checkout. If you would be so kind as to reach out to our Finance department, we'd be happy to go through it with you

Summary: I would stay here again and the shuttle to and from the airport was great. I would advise anyone to stay here. Staff was great, location was great, everything about the hotel was great! I loved the place
Manager Response: mbuycks0511,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will be sure to share your comments with the staff. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Rooms needs good re-do. Especially the bathrooms and hallways. Add some modern carpet and window coverings too. I love the location and convenience to the airport but there are better Hilton Hotels nearby.
Manager Response: Dear JenniLTL,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I truly appreciate the honest feedback. The hotel was scheduled for a refresh prior to the pandemic and we hope to get back to this plan shortly. We do appreciate your business and hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: It was a fairly decent hotel that i picked because it was close to the airport. It was a little dated and could have used some touch ups but was fairly clean. Friendly service, but the 5am airport shuttle was late.
Manager Response: Tayty,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy you found the hotel to be clean and in close proximity to the airport. I apologize that the 5am shuttle did not depart on time on your departure date. We will continue to use feedback to increase our service levels.  Regards,

Summary: I’m a Hilton Diamond Member & needed a Hotel by John Wayne Airport.  TERRIFIC Staff who are so very friendly. Hilton’s “Clean Stay” in the midst of Covid is above & beyond.  Lysol Wipes throughout the Hotel & an exceptionally clean room.  There is a complementary Hotel Shuttle to the airport. VERY IMPRESSED with this property🥰👍🏻!
Manager Response: Dear Bev316,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am pleased to hear about your positive experience with the staff, cleanliness and shuttle service. This has been a difficult time for everyone and I am glad we could give you the piece of mind with Hilton Clean Stay.  We hope to have you back as our guest again soon!!  Regards,

Summary: My wife, dog, and I were suddenly evacuated from our home in nearby Irvine due to the fires. As you can imagine, packing the most essential things you have at the last second is nerve wracking. After waiting around all day at a nearby mall in the hopes that the fires would be dealt with quickly, we began to see that this was going to be a prolonged situation and began looking for a hotel. We are so glad we checked into this Hilton. From the moment we walked in the door, we were treated like family. The staff gave the long line of mostly evacuees like us waters as we waited to check in. The front desk staff assured us that all would be ok and that they would be flexible with us if we needed to extend our stay. The rooms were very clean and more than adequate for what we needed.
Manager Response: Dear Sced10,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We can imagine the stress you (and others) were under with the fires being so close to home!!! I am so happy to hear that we were here to help during these times. As many of our Team Members were affected as well, we understood and tried to be continuously flexible as things were changing rapidly. We love our community and want to help any way we can. I hope we can invite you back to stay with us when you have time to relax and truly enjoy the property!!  Thanks again for your review!!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General manager

Summary: Picked the place because it was close to the airport. Which is why I heard planes all night. Hallway smelled like smoke. Room was nice and clean. Had a early flight so the shuttle would take up over at 5am. We got to the lobby and checked out at 4:30 . Asked were the coffee was. Sorry no coffee, but you can you the Kuerig for $3.00.  WHAT . .no coffee. You goy to be kidding me. $175 for a room, and there’s no morning coffee in the lobby
Manager Response: Hi Sfeltner62, Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: I was in town for my annual birthday celebration and always stay on the Balboa Peninsula. Since I had an early flight I decided to stay my last night at the Hilton Irvine for convenience. The shuttle runs promptly every half hour. Will definitely stay here next trip.
Manager Response: Hi Tami32020, We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: This was my first stay here and overall it was a really good experiene.  THe staff was very friendly and even let me check in a few minutes early.  My room was very clean and quiet and  there was not a lot of plane noise.  THe mattress was comfortable but the pillows were very small.  It only took me 5 minutes to drive to the airport.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello kidflemingo, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. We're glad you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I had a great stay here. The room was clean, the bed was comfortable. The bar and grill was great. Fast service and good food. The staff are all kind and thoughtful. The airport shuttle was right on time and loaded my luggage for me.
Manager Response: Hello aprilsfox41, We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I always expect a Hilton to be a certain standard. This one did not quite meet the mark. Clean and comfortable seem pretty well maintained. Front desk just ok you did not feel welcome or did not seem to be the upscale a Hilton normally is. Breakfast was not as good as a Hampton other than you could get a made to order egg or omelet. Again not up to a Hilton standard.
Manager Response: Hello lmeK4771CT, Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Don't go to this property. Parking is insane and overly charged. No complementary breakfast, no microwave oven etc..Only advantage is the location. Very near to the airport. Rooms are bit old also. I won't recommend this hotel. Doubletree in santa ana is far better comparing to this hilton.
Manager Response: Dear Praveenkumar2020,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about your experience with us!! Being a Hilton hotel, we do offer complimentary breakfast for our Hilton Honors members and we do offer 2 floors of guestrooms that do have microwaves and refrigerators. You are correct that there is a charge for parking as with most hotels in the area and with our proximity to the airport, the price allows us to hold spot for our guests. I do hope you can give us another try in the future.  Thanks again  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Pros-location, appears to be recently remodeled, the rooms are spacious, close to airport, airport shuttle, rooms clean Cons-airport and road noisy, somewhat muffled by the double pane windows.  Beds were too soft.
Manager Response: Dear LK G,  Thank you do much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and our guestrooms. You are correct that our proximity to the airport, there may be a slight noise.  The good news is, the airport does close at 10:30pm, so hopefully that doesn't effect your sleep too much. By the way, we will be replacing the beds in 2020 so hopefully we can welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary Heading: If you want to get gouged on parking, and like noise stay here!!
Summary: Not at all happy about this place. Mediocre hotel. Pot heads (look like homeless people) smoking marijuana in the back patio. Patio needed to be swept. Expensive breakfast that didn't look appealing at all. Very noisy. Hallways full of dishes from room service.
Manager Response: Hello Coffeeman2000, We are sorry we were not able to provide you with the quality of services you deserve. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we are always looking for ways to improve our customer experience. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: Extremely noisy: I don't think the room is not sound- and smell-proof. I was able to hear every phone call/TV sounds and pizza smell from the adjacent room. I asked the front desk to come over my room and see how bad it was but nobody showed up.   Beware, Gold Members: the free breakfast benefit is very catchy here - I had two pieces of bacon and should pay $5 extra dollars because it's "hot" breakfast.   Check-out: it was the only great experience from the hotel. Tyler at the front desk was super helpful to handle check-out issues and I really appreciate it.
Manager Response: Hi Dreamer67332538439,  thank you for being a Gold Member and taking the time to share your review with us. We are very disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our entire management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Arrived 27 minutes early for the check in time.  Was charged an early arrival fee of $35.  Totally understand that if I was staying one night, but thought there'd be some consideration for a four night stay. Simply a small nuisance but bothered me.
Manager Response: Dear Johnpettinger,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate you staying with us. I am sorry to hear about the early check-in fee challenge. Being an airport hotel, we do have guests that try to check-in throughout the morning and to provide available rooms prior to check-in time, there is a fee associated. I do hope you choose us again in the future.  Thanks again  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Full Service Hiltons in general have gotten pretty bad this one is no exception. This place is old and tired, with the exception of the TV's nothing has been updated in quite a while. The internet stopped working early in the morning and was estimated to be out of service for at least 24 hours. We had to relocate to a different hotel due to that and numerous other issues including, broken entrance doors, lack of items on the (overpriced) breakfast buffet, etc...
Manager Response: Dear Joshua L, Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your candor as we look for reviews to provide insight and constructive feedback regarding our hotel’s service and amenities to better our guest experience. We welcome any additional comments or suggestions you would like to share. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary: I thoughly enjoyed the stay at Hilton Irvine.  It was close to the airport and offered good shuttle service to and from. The room was pretty clean, quiet, and a comfortable bed.  The hotel staff was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Judy,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am pleased to read your comments regarding your room and the staff. I do hope you will stay with us again in the near future.  Thanks again,  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Great value for a quality hotel. Check in was hassle free, room was top quality, and the price was very competitive.  Across the street from the airport.  I would certainly stay in this hotel again in the future.
Manager Response: Hello megchesney! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that everything was seamless! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Upon arrival I was not allowed to park in the front to check in, on a king bed they only had 3 small pillows, no information was provided that room service would not be offered and the list of disservice goes on. The cost was reasonable but the lack of service will have me going a few miles away to the Hampton Inn. Service at the Hampton Inn is better.
Manager Response: We are sorry we were not able to provide you with the quality of services you deserve. This is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we are always looking for ways to improve our customer experience. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: Room quality is under expectations. Sheets are bad quality. King size bed but pillows are too small. Drinking water wasn't provided. Parking rate is too high. Wi-Fi can not connected. A/C is too noisy.
Manager Response: Hi xuan v, Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your detailed feedback and will share your experiences with our team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: My stay at the Irvine Hilton was a lovely respite in a tough situation.  My flight was canceled on the tarmac due to engine trouble and I was unable to get another for 24 hrs.  Hilton gave me a harbor to chill and recover after a very long work week.
Manager Response: Hello heidistokke1, We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We're sorry to hear that your flight was canceled, glad we could be there for you when you needed a place to chill and recover. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon, on better circumstances we hope!

Summary: United lost my luggage and I had to rebook at this hotel. I was having issues with canceling at the double in Torrance but the lady at the front desk (ashlee) went out of her way to call and do everything for me. Both her and another gentleman made sure I got a room and rested. Next day I ate an awesome lunch accompanied with blue moons at the bar and the bartenders were super accommodating. The room was super clean and the overall hospitality was heartwarming.  Stay here when you're in town!
Manager Response: Hello Pioneer47494829014, thank you for taking the time to provide your review. We are thrilled that our team was able to take a bad situation and turn it around. We will pass along this review to our team so we can continue to provide the level of service you've come to expect from the Hilton Irvine OC Airport. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Not the time of my life
Summary: I would not stay here if you had the chance.  Move on to another location that would actually care and do the minimum of what is expected at a hotel.  It has a great location if you like to hear planes take off and land all day long though.
Manager Response: Dear Road212253,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at our hotel and are very sorry you had a disappointing experience with us. Exceptional guest service is the foundation of our hotel's promise, and we thank you once again for your comments.

Summary Heading: Great Property; Staff Lacking Situational Awareness
Summary: As a disabled Veteran on crutches, the valets failed to assist on arrival as well as the "bell team" on departure.  Other guests actually volunteered while the staff just "stood around". The front desk promised to have the GM call me...it never happened....
Manager Response: Hello LABVI. First, we'd like to say Thank You for your service.  Second, thank you for taking time to share your feedback with us. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations and are disappointed to hear we fell short of that expectation. We will indeed share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary: Great hotel in a great location. I had a company conference and this hotel was close to John Wayne Airport, and Newport Beach so it fit in well with our company conference.  Close proximity to Newport, Corona Del Mar.  I would recommend!
Manager Response: Hi Jon V! We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially our location to the beach and airport.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Having stayed at many of the Hilton Properties, this Hotel did not meet up to the standards experienced in other Hilton properties. I would certianly not stay at this property unless there were no other options.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Fabulous Hilton in Orange County!  Always look forward to staying at the Hilton it’s a great location and great staff! The pool and patio area are wonderful and they have great conference rooms to.  The staff is friendly and the rooms are clean and everything it’s nice to feel like you’re on a great vacation and it’s location is really good.
Manager Response: Hi joannwahabi, Thank you for taking the time to provide a review. We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Need lots of training for staff to effectively make guest welcome. I had to call twice for a lotion. None of the staff seems to be happy being there. Guest that are checking in are not greeted the same way. Depending on your ethnicity you will find who they want to be nice with.
Manager Response: Hello rachelnierras21, thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Very nice staff. The hall way too noise on the night that tornado was hit the area. Was woke up by the noise all night. Other night was fine. The parking fee too high and lots always full. Love the services. Definate will come back again.
Manager Response: Hi 768stephanie, thank you for taking the time to provide a review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We're sorry to hear the wind and rain were such an issue for you, luckily this was a rare occasion.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights.  Checking out today.  Upon an evening check-in, there was a plate of beans/bacon right next to our door.  Gross - so was that just left all day after the morning occupant left it in the hallway?  It is not a nice beginning to have dirty food plates waiting for you as you walk into your room.  Also, the cleaning staff just entered our room even though we have the Privacy Please sign hanging on the door.  One occupant had left the room, she must have seen this, and decided to come into the room but didn’t know two of us were still inside.  What was the staff playing at?  Anyway, this place is trash.
Manager Response: Hi Richard H, Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations and apologize for any misunderstanding.  We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary Heading: Regular Hilton, good location, some flaws, underwhelming elite perks
Summary: The location is across the street from the airport, so that's very convenient. Parking is easy, though a bit more expensive than similar properties.   The rooms are standard Hilton rooms, a little older, with smaller and outdated bathrooms (shower/tub combo and not walk-in showers like most renovated properties). Plenty of space. Bed is pretty comfortable, and partial runway views are interesting.  The TV was from an earlier era, with black lines on it and no functioning Guide channel.  Breakfast was a big letdown. As a top-tier Diamond elite, there was no executive lounge for morning or evening snacks. The complimentary breakfast for Diamond elite members consisted of self-serve cold items only - yogurt, hard bagels, half-frozen berries, toast. It turned out choosing items from
Manager Response: Hi Jacob, Thank you for being a loyal Diamond member and for taking the time to share your review. We are very disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback very much and will share your experience and notes with our senior management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Overall a good hotel that is convenient to SNA airport.  Like most hotels, the restaurant is overpriced and understaffed.  The breakfast is basic fare....nothing fancy.  The evening offerings are good but greatly overpriced.  The restaurant staff is far too small.  Lack of a newspaper in this hotel is my major complaint.  The Concord (Ca) Hilton has a great selection of papers.
Manager Response: Dear thawkins2019,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your honesty as we look for reviews to provide insight and constructive feedback regarding our hotel’s service and amenities to better our guest experience. We addressed the opportunities for improvement you detailed and welcome any additional comments or suggestions you’d like to share. If you return to our area, we hope you will give us another chance to demonstrate our typically outstanding hospitality.

Summary Heading: other area hotels are a notch above
Summary: Beware of the overnight parking fee $35 for self parking.  The bar and restaurant are mediocre and rooms are starting to show some wear and tear.  For being by the airport it was fairly quiet, and decent clientele of mostly business people at this time of year.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you had a disappointing experience during your stay with us. At Hilton, we always aim to ensure every guest feels cared for, valued and respected. Your feedback will help us deliver this brand promise. guest satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: I arrived in the early evening and waited and waited for the shuttle (while seeing shuttles for other hotels go by multiple times). Finally another guest called to be told that they send the shuttle only every hour! Note that the hotel on only a mile away! 30 mins later when the shuttle finally came, the driver thought he was entertaining by asking each passenger where they are from, how often they come here, what they will be doing while they are here, etc.
Manager Response: Hi Explorer18136054343. We apologize for any misunderstanding and inconvenience with the shuttle service. Our shuttle leaves the hotel and arrives at the airport every 30-60 minutes. The schedule is posted on our website and can be found by going here: https://www3.hilton.com/resources/media/hi/SNAOCHF/en_US/pdf/en_SNAOCHF_ShuttleService_September2019.pdf  If shuttle has not arrived during the schedule posted time, please do not hesitate to reach out to us directly so we can ensure one is there as soon as possible.   Thank you again for being a valued guest!

Summary: In spite of the key making machine not working and sometimes 10 minute delays for the elevator my stay was enjoyable.  I credit the staff with their friendly and professional attitude.  The room was warm and the bed was comfortable.
Manager Response: Hi Jack12062019. Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. There's nothing like a warm room and comfortable bed. We will pass along your comments regarding the elevator and keys so that we can continue to provide the best possible guest experience.

Summary: Poor check in service. Was not treated as a Hilton rewards member and had to wait a long time to get checked in because counter person was on the phone. Room was only cleaned once during 3 day stay. Front desk had to be called twice just to get more shampoo and conditioner. Room doors on other room slammed loudly during the night interrupting my sleep.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: AVOID.  Recommend the Hampton Inn next door!
Summary: Accidental booking turned into a horrible experience. Checked out within an hour, still got charged for two nights, parking, and internet, even though I booked WHILE talking to the manager, at the Hampton Inn next door.  Way better value, staff, and super clean and whole place is remodeled.  Cool loft style rooms, and SUPER quiet.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Midi core hotel in the heart of the OC
Summary: Not the best hotel in Orange County, but usually decent rooms and service.  Was disappointed on this trip especially at overnight parking at $35!  Double bed mattress's were lumpy and the pillows were horrible.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Business Hotel just opposite John Wayne Airport
Summary: I stayed here for one night while attending a conference at this hotel. The room is comfortable but breakfast isn't included (Hampton next door offers a free breakfast). They have a shuttle to John Wayne airport (just opposite the road) which leaves once in a few hours but I couldn't use it as I had just missed one shuttle and the next one was more than an hour later. There are many restaurants within a stone's throw of this hotel and the bar is quite lively throughout the day. In my opinion, this hotel is overpriced (parking especially) and very impersonal so I may not stay here in future.
Manager Response: Dear arjun_jayasimha,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your honesty as we look for reviews to provide insight and constructive feedback regarding our hotel’s service and amenities to better our guest experience. We addressed the opportunities for improvement you detailed and welcome any additional comments or suggestions you’d like to share. If you return to our area, we hope you will give us another chance to demonstrate our typically outstanding hospitality.

Summary Heading: Pay for Deluxe Room. Get a standard and no compensation
Summary: They put us in wrong room and wouldn’t move us. Toiletries weren’t restocked. Left over room services dishes sitting outside our door on arrival. Front end rude and accommodating. $30 per vehicle to park!
Manager Response: Hi  john5628373, thank you for taking time to share your review with us. We are so sorry to hear about these issues during your stay and that it did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary Heading: Will NOT stay in this place again
Summary: The only nice place in this hotel is the lobby. Even though our room was located in the HHonors Guests floor (supposedly better rooms and amenities), the rooms was old, and  1.Decorations were outdated,  2. The room carpet was stained,  3. The balcony door was stuck,  4. Tthe bathroom fixtures (which were probably from 1970s) leaked for a couple of minutes after you had shut off the shower, 5. When we arrived, the bed sheet had not been ironed or even tucked under the mattress. It looked like someone had just left that bed!, 6. There were no Body-wash, lotion, etc. in the bathroom, 7. Even though we asked for slippers, there were none available, 8. and so forth...  With all that awfulness, the hotel charges the guests between $35 and $39 per night for parking.  Altogether, I
Manager Response: Hello Behrooz M., thank you for taking time to share your review. We extremely disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We truly value your feedback and will share your experience with our senior management team so we can continue improve our guest service ensure each and every guest has a stay that truly reflects our commitment to a great guest experience.

Summary: I have 2 boys, 16 and 17, we had the 2 room suite and the only problem with the experience was who would get the pull out.  Price was lower than most 4 star hotels, while living space was at a maximum.  Enjoyed the stay
Manager Response: Hi Stan S., we are so thrilled to hear that you and your boys enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: I'm an Hilton Honors member who doesn't travel for business nearly as much as I used to, so I'm trying to book exclusively with Hilton to get my Honors credits, and to use the benefits as much and often as I can.  I was slightly perturbed to have digital check in and digital key unavailable to me, but not fatally so, because I'm used to just checking in via the front desk.  The room assigned to me was clean and appointed alright...wasn't spectacular, but it was fine.  I forgot my toothbrush, and was able to get one from guest services, so kudos on that. I went down to the lobby and decided to have dinner at the hotel.  The bar is directly adjacent to the restaurant, apparently.  No signage to tell one where the bar ended and the restaurant began, and there was no individual
Manager Response: Hello Kevin G., First of all, thank you for taking time to share your review. We appreciate you trying to book exclusively with Hilton, that means a lot to us. We're very sorry that Digital Key did not work during your stay. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary: Perhaps I've been spoiled by the Hilton Pasadena? This Hilton felt more like a Hampton Inn.... they do not deliver water to Diamond Customer Rooms, but you can go to the desk and as for it. Breakfast is $5 if you add anything that s/b hot (lukewarm eggs & Bacon.) My toiletries were not restocked. Blah
Manager Response: Hello cf0ley, thank you for taking time to share your review with us. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. Your stay is in no way indicative of the honors experience we hold ourselves and hotel to. We value your feedback and will be sure to share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Loved this place. Convenient and quiet. Check in was painless. Starbucks in the lobby for morning coffee. Check out was easy. Only complaint was parking. Someone’s it’s tight when coming back late. Will be back again.
Manager Response: HI Jesse756...we are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary Heading: Over priced bar and kitchen and rooms are mediocre at best
Summary: I'm a loyal hilton member for some time now but this place was mediocre and the bar and kitchen were way overpriced for average food you get for free at other hilton brand hotels.  I only stayed there for location but will go else were next time.
Manager Response: Hi wallyb836. Thank you for taking time to share your review with us. Needless to say, we are very disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Good breakfast.  Restful night.    Rooms are getting a bit long in the tooth.    Proximity to nothing except the airport.  Styrofoam cups I the room for coffee?? Try again guys.  Let’s get some real coffee mugs and paper to goes.
Manager Response: Hi P9753UG, thank you for taking time to share your review. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Nit-picky prices tacked on - not worth it
Summary: I chose this location because it seems nice and is cheaper compared to most in Irvine. What I didn't know was that there were several tacked on prices that make it just as expensive as way nicer hotels nearby. It was advertised as 99/night but came out to 150/night. Also, TV was broken, cleanliness so-so.
Manager Response: Hi chocopocky337. Thank you for taking time to share your review with us, we sincerely appreciate it.  We are very disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Had to make last minute trip to SoCal. I was able to secure a great, last minute rate at this Hilton.  Hotel is very conveniently located across the road from the airport. I actually walked over, instead of waiting for uber/lyft/taxi.  Check in was easy enough. Sadly, they were not able to upgrade my room.  Room was nice enough. Had to have someone come up and open the window - possibly stuck or I'm losing upper body strength.   One big disappointment: I went to the lounge/restaurant area to get something to eat.  I was only 1 of 2 people ordering food. I ordered a side of mashed potatoes & a slice of cheesecake.  It took roughly 30 mins to bring me my 'to go' order! I was told by one server that another forgot to get it to me. Brought food upstairs to room. It appeared to be 2
Manager Response: Hello  joanner8360, thank you for taking the time to write this review.
