We're glad you were able to walk over to the hotel, we also offer a free shuttle that you can use during your next visit. We are disappointed to hear that your meal did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Beta Delta Omega PTK The front desk “Iris” and the managers and all the staff made our experience fantastic. We showed up by the bus load and our reception and room experience was kept above par.     Thank you!
Manager Response: Hey ssanchez437, thanks for the awesome review. We loved having Beta Delta Omega at our hotel and look forward to your next reception.

Summary: Early meeting nextday  location and good accomodations required. Hilton products are preferred.  Not disappointed this trip Will do again when opportunity arises. Airports are our business so the air traffic noise was not an issue.
Manager Response: Hello Thomas M H, we are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: Stayed for 4 days and was well pleased.  Easy access from airport.  Staff were enjoyable and engaging.  They made you feel at home.  Room was very clean and cozy. If I had to stay here again I would not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Hello @547timothym, we're very glad to hear you enjoyed your 4 day stay with us. We always try our best to make sure our guest feel at home here at the Hilton Irvine. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Had a fantastic time at the Paradise Country & Swing Dance Festival at the Hilton Irvine/Orange Country Airport Hotel. The facility was ideal and the staff went out of their way to make sure everything was right.
Manager Response: Hi @Explore02589298223. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially our hotel and our staff, we look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary Heading: Hotel as Fly as the Airport
Summary: Had an amayzing time at this location. No complaints, they accommodated all of our needs. Great service and room was private.  And they honored my Hilton rewards .The staff was on point along with parking spot.
Manager Response: Hi oneofaryne, thanks for the FLY review. We're glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Hotel is adequate but service is bare bones. Staff inattentive and not caring. Parking gates never worked properly. Room wifi so slow that it is better to use your over-the-air phone connection. Hotel is  "adequate" but below the normal Hilton level of service.
Manager Response: Dear donradams,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at our hotel and are very sorry you had a disappointing experience with us. We’ve addressed the issues you described with our staff. Exceptional guest service is the foundation of our hotel's promise, and your feedback helps us improve. Thank you once again for your comments.

Summary Heading: Its an Okay hotel with small rooms and paid parking on site
Summary: We rented a car from EasyRentCars.com, a cost effective rental agency. Picked up the car from LA Airport and drove down to Hilton Irvine. Since we were 3 adults and 1 child, we had booked a family room with two twin beds. This may be a US thing, but we were surprised to see a $36 charge for overnight parking, even if you are staying at the hotel. This charge may be feasible for business travelers, but seems excessive for families travelling for leisure. Overall, the hotel stay was okay, rooms were smaller, and hotel did not have much amnesties like Jacuzzi etc.
Manager Response: Dear WaqasRehmat,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at our hotel. We understand that you were unhappy with cost of parking, and apologize if we were not clear when you booked the room and encourage you to contact our offices directly so we may work to make it right. We value your input as we strive to personalize each guest's experience and keep costs affordable in doing so. We hope you will return to stay with us the next time you visit the area so we may better demonstrate the quality value and hospitality you expect and deserve.

Summary: Outdated, cheap linens and bedding.  Windows are poorly insulated so you can hear EVERYTHING from traffic, to people talking in courtyard to airport noise of all things. You would think a hotel next to an airport would invest in better technology in sound suppression.    There are other options nearby.  Would not recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear csmith191,   Thank you for your review. We appreciate your honesty as we look for reviews to provide insight and constructive feedback regarding our hotel’s service and amenities to better our guest experience. We hope you accept our deepest apologies a more rewarding experience was not delivered, and we have addressed the opportunities for improvement. If you return to our area, we hope you will give us another chance to demonstrate our typically outstanding hospitality.

Summary: Great Hotel and Location.  Friendly Staff coupled with clean comfortable rooms made this a very nice stay.  Large pool/hot tub area with sitting all around outside for both morning and evening relaxation when you have your coffee or a beverage at night.
Manager Response: Hi michaeldana2019. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially the Location, Staff, and Pool area. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.

Summary: Rooms are old and tired, need renovation. Front office staff is polite and accommodating. House keeping staff non responsive to the guests needs. Location and Valet parking are very convenient. Beds and pillows are not comfortable.
Manager Response: Hi anilbZ1457JD. Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary: We had a room facing the courtyard and the noise from the evening event was a little bit unbearable.  We will request a room not facing the courtyard next time.  Great location!!!  Near the stopper and many great eateries.  But you do have to drive some.
Manager Response: Hi vinceandrada. Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: This hotel is older which is fine, but what isn’t fine is the prices they charge for the standard of this hotel. The carpets were stained and dirty. There was a smell in the elevators and hallways, not to mention no bathrooms fans at all. I also found a cockroach in my room that I had to kill and search for more. Way too expensive what is provided.
Manager Response: Hi velasquezdominic92. Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. Your experience is in no way reflective of our hotel and service and we value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest services. Please reach out to us directly at 949 254 3907 so that we can make this right.

Summary Heading: Expect fees with deposits and more fees
Summary: Paid 200 bucks more than what I signed for on priceline becaise of hidden fees and deposits for every day you stay. Be prepared to spend more at this hotel. If you're paying for parking, better hopw theres no wedding or an event during the time of your stay because, guest will not have to pay for parking so you are left with no parking spot that you paid for.
Manager Response: Hi Jvilla,   Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience about fees and parking with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service. If you would like to contact the hotel manager directly to discuss these fees and a possible resolution, please contact us directly at 949 254 3907.

Summary Heading: Weekend trip to visit friends and family
Summary: We picked the hotel because it was close to our friends house and the price was right. The overnight parking was $35 per night, but advertised at $33. So we decided to not rent a car and would take alternate transportation over to our friends house that was only 5 miles away. My niece came to pick us up and waited for us. She was there about an hour and was charged $25 for parking.
Manager Response: Hi 208Dawn, Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are glad you enjoyed your overall stay, we do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations.  We apologize for any misunderstanding with parking and will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service.

Summary: Convenient airport location, beautiful patio but terrible service and an otherwise outdated property. Was in town for 2 nights, got assigned an accessibility room with an awkward shower and view of the rooftop until asking to be moved to another room since my reserved room type wasn’t available outside of the accessibility room. Patio service is terrible...while we managed to eventually get served  outside, the plates and glasses were still out there 24 hours later!
Manager Response: Hi Medikeight, Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the location of the property and our beautiful newly renovated patio. However, we apologize for any misunderstanding with your room type and and are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Have stayed at this property many times. Service was horrible. We were charged for a tip for our group when we had absolutely no service. Extremely disappointing. Will look for other accommodations in the future.
Manager Response: Hi Debbie P., Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations, and that you were charged for a tip considering the poor service you received. We truly value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service. Should you like to contact us directly to speak about this issue, please reach us directly at 949 254 3907.

Summary: The hotel had some staffing shortages with the bell/concierge, other than that, the staff was fantastic.  The room was what you would expect, very nice, clean and ready on schedule.  I would've liked an additional pillow but I also didn't call to get one so that's on me.  I will stay here upon my next trip to Irvine.
Manager Response: Hi Robert, we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! W'll be ready with extra pillows upon your next trip to Irvine. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: As long as I am able to recover the jacket I accidentally left in my room prior to check-out, I rate my stay as excellent. If I do not recover the jacket, it will result in me never staying here again based on a lack of trust in the facility.
Manager Response: Hi cyndiegold, we're pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Our front desk team will be happy to look into this for you. Please contact the front desk at your convenience or the hotel manager at #949 254 3907

Summary: Booked a room with a rollaway bed over the phone and was promised one. When I showed up, they had plenty in storage but said it was not allowed in my room. Had to spend extra last minute on a separate room elsewhere. MISLEADING. Also $35 a day for parking!!
Manager Response: HI kdoggie721, we regret to learn that you stay did not meet your expectations. Our goal is to make it right. If you would like to discuss the particulars of your experience in more details, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at 949 812 3737. We look forward to hearing from you.

Summary Heading: Excellent for a trip to Irvine
Summary: Stayed here for a conference I was attending at UC Irvine. Hotel team was very nice, rooms were comfortable and clean. Breakfast buffet was fine. Liked the pool and outside patio with fire pits. Well-located to get to local restaurants. Would def stay there again.
Manager Response: Hi Adriana e, we are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially the rooms, buffet, pool, and our location.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: As a long time HiltonHonors member, I booked the Hilton Irvine for a two-night stay to attend a wedding.  The location and overall facilities are great, but we were disappointed by the following:  1) Self-parking rate of $35.  The hotel next door charges $20.  John Wayne Airport across the street charges $20.  We felt ripped off.  2) Our king bed only had 3 small pillows on it.  This did not match our usual Hilton experience.  3) The hallways were not vacuumed during our 2 day stay.  The same debris was on the floor the entire time.  4) The pool is very nice, but the towels are ready for the recycle bin.  They are rough and thin.  Definitely time for a refresh.  Also, the pool area was not looked after.  Towels were left on loungers after people left, so it was hard to know what
Manager Response: Hi Gary H., Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We understand the frustrations you experienced during your visit was less then ideal, especially with the pool mess and hallway debris. With that said, we value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for a couple of days recently.   This hotel needs a refresh pretty badly.  The carpeting in the hallways looks dates and the wall paper was bubbling in a few locations on our floor and the ceilingings still have that 70's popcorn look and feel.    The room was very clean but the bathrooms are very small by most standards.  (two people cannot fit in the bathroom at the same time.)    The outside was not very clean when we visited.  There were cigarette butts in the outdoor fire pits and left over food trays from the evening before when we sat outside for breakfast.    I'm  not sure I'd stay here again given options in the area.
Manager Response: Hi  jpm-indy. Thank you for taking time to share your review it means a lot to us. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We will share your feedback with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary Heading: Did not live up to our expectations
Summary: We were confirmed for two queen beds but at checkin we’re told they don’t even have that option at this location. When I asked for a king and a folding bed I was told that aunt available either. The room was suppose to be wheelchair compliant but it was hard to wheel over the threshold, wheel into the elevator and through the grounds into the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear 273glendaw,  Thank you for taking time to review your recent stay with us. I am so sorry to hear about your experience at the hotel. We do only have 2 bed types in the hotel, 2 double beds and 1 king bed in the rooms. Our hotel websites have the bed type descriptions and we do our best to ensure that all 3rd party websites have the correct information as well. I will definitely use your experience as a learning experience for the hotel and ensure proper service levels and expectations are met and exceeded.  Thanks again,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: The hotel is very conveniently located, a stone throw away from John Wayne Intl. airport. The staff was friendly, the room was clean but somewhat outdated.  There were no amenities like shampoo or soap in the room when I arrived, but was immediately brought to my room when I called guest services. Breakfast is basic, bar as well nice out door seating. Parking rates are outrages, $ 25.00 for a  two hour valet parking and $ 33.00 for overnight parking.  Overall, what one can expect form an airport hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Globetrotter1955,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I do appreciate your comments and do take each review to heart. I am happy to hear that the amenities were brought to your room quickly and that you enjoyed our new outdoor seating area. I realize it is difficult to understand paying for parking at some places, but parking is a premium in many areas surrounding an airport and we price ourselves along side other hotels in the market. I do hope we can have you back in the near future.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary Heading: AVOID THIS LOCATION, PARKING COSTS ARE ASTRONOMICAL.
Summary: Phones are outdated.  Radios did not work well and no replacement issued despite the request.  Room service is fabulous and quality of food exceptional and well prepared.  Pool was exceptional.  Great lobby.
Manager Response: Hi leem201713. Thank you for taking time to share your review. We do our best to ensure that each and every guest has a stay that exceeds their expectations. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed our food and had time to relax by the pool. We will share your feedback regarding our phones and radios with our management team so we can continue to work on ways of improving our guest service. Thank you again!

Summary: It's an airport adjacent hotel, so your standards are immediately a little lower than 5*. The lobby was shabby and worn. The service was atrocious!! Rude and surly, if they paid attention to you! The food was good. The hotel is older but clean.
Manager Response: Hi SarahU9199. Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that our lobby and service did not meet your expectations. We're happy to hear that you enjoyed the food. We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: Didn't follow through on commitment during reservation to book our rooms next to each other, despite us stressing how important this was.  Also, the patio service took so long (over 45 min) that we had to grab drinks at the bar and drink them in our room. So much for relaxing.
Manager Response: Hi bjcurriden. Thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. I can understand how frustrating it can be to wait that long for your food and drinks.  We value your feedback and will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest service.

Summary: How to even begin? First of all, the elevators are not reliable. My son and his teammates got stuck in one for an hour, it was over 100 degrees in the elevator, fire department was called. A dad from our team ended up getting them out because he worked for an elevator company. The hotel's response was so so bad. No security assistance when the firefighters were trying to keep the area clear. The elevator maintenance person the hotel called didn't show up for over an hour. And then when the boys finally got out not a word from the hotel - are they okay? What can we do to help? Not even a single apology. And looking back through the reviews their elevators have had problems for months! One of the moms had just reported that this elevator was not working correctly an hour before
Manager Response: Hi Chandra. Thank you for taking time to share your review. Clearly there were several missteps on our part and we are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. We truly value your feedback, and while I can not go back and rectify the situation,  I will share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest services. Should you chose to stay with us again, I can assure you that our team will go above and beyond to ensure your stay exceeds your expectations.

Summary: I have always enjoyed staying at the Irvine Hilton.  However, the $33 per night parking charge, even for Diamond Members is too expensive.  Also, there is a new charge of $5.00 extra to add eggs to your "free breakfast" for Diamond Members.  With a room rate of over $200 per night, it would be nice to offer frequent guests a little more.  What incentive is there to become a Diamond Member anymore.
Manager Response: Dear Ray W,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I appreciate the candid feedback regarding your experience. We do appreciate your loyalty to Hilton and know that it takes a lot of traveling to become a diamond member. I hope that you can enjoy the many other perks of being a diamond member at our hotel and that you visit us again in the future.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Very clean, friendly and great location.  Being right next to the airport, there was definately some noise from the planes and helicopters, but not too bad.  Room was clean.  Cleaning staff did a nice job each day.  Front desk staff was very helpful and friendly.  Great location.  A lot of restaurants and stores nearby.
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip647371,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed our hotel as well as the amenities and staff. It is true that our proximity to the airport can have some noise, we do offer rooms that face the other side of the airport and perhaps next time we can accommodate you there.  Thanks again for staying with us.  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary Heading: Take advantage of this great value and location at a quality hotel!
Summary: One of the best pet friendly hotels in Orange County. Location is convenient. Service and food were excellent in the restaurant and bar. The staff was very kind and attentive. Check in experience was very proficient.
Manager Response: Dear Global49728406606,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to hear about your experience!! We do love when guests travel with their pets and so happy that you were able to do so and enjoy. Thanks for the positive comments on the team members as well. We hope to welcome you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Right across from the airport makes this hotel convenient. A number of good options for dinner within the mile and few within walking distance. The food at the hotel was also pretty good. Easy to get on local highways and pretty close to Newport beach and very close UCI. Also about a 20 minute drive to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear SB-SJCA,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so glad that you enjoyed the conveniences of the hotel and proximity to several restaurants and attractions in the local area. I hope that we can welcome you back again in the near future.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed a wonderful stay at this hotel because of the friendly and helpful people, the gorgeous and conveniently-located facility, and the inviting atmosphere. I was worried about accessibility when I had to bring my disabled mother on a business trip, but from the moment we checked in to the moment we checked out, the staff was compassionate and accommodating and everyone went above and beyond to help us feel comfortable and taken care of. The breakfast is incredibly delicious and the on-site Starbucks is also a dream! The beds are wonderfully comfortable and the suites are spacious. We will absolutely be staying at this hotel for leisure in the future and can’t wait for our next Southern California adventure.
Manager Response: Dear Discover269386,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so pleased that you had such a good experience during your time at the hotel. I will be sure to pass on your kind words to the staff. We look forward to having you back as our guest again soon!!  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: I stayed one night while in town for business. I’ve stayed at this hotel several times. I agree with some others that the staff can tend to be rude; especially the front desk. The room was clean. The air conditioner was cold. The fitness center offered several cardio options, weights, and a cable machine. The breakfast was very good and offered several items to choose from. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear GT6,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am saddened to hear your comments about the front desk staff, but will definitely speak to each of our guest service agents to ensure they are providing great customer service. I am glad you were able to enjoy the other amenities in the hotel and hope to welcome you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary: Do not stay here. One night was enough to make my blood boil. I should have canceled my reservation after reading Yelp reviews. The front desk is rude and argumentative. It was so bad to the point where I will be contacting the Corporate Office. The room I paid for on the Executive level is equivalent to Motel 6 and was not as described when I booked my reservation online. Customer Service is worse than a fast food restaurant. I can’t even question them about the mystery charge on my credit card. I can’t believe this is a Hilton. There are better hotels nearby. Avoid this dump.
Manager Response: Dear Pajmar,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly sorry to hear about your recent experience at the hotel. The service you described is far from your (and our) expectation. The last thing I want is for you to leave our hotel with that type of experience. I will follow up with you via private message to ensure you are satisfied and your challenges are resolved.  Thanks again for your time.  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary: The hotel was dirty, there was live music playing outside my hotel room window  from 530pm - 9pm - sponsored by the hotel. I could hear planes taking off from my room. Just not restful. There were no water fountains or water jugs in the lobby
Manager Response: Dear Passport00835722140,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! We appreciate any and all feedback as it helps us increase our service levels. I will definitely follow up with our housekeeping staff regarding your cleanliness comments. We do offer live entertainment on our patio during the summer months and I apologize if you were inconvenienced by that or the proximity to the airport. I do hope that we can welcome you back again at some point.  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary: The hotel has a great staff and pleasant environment that made my business trip both relaxing and efficient. I especially appreciate the hardworking professional restaurant and maid service, who made me feel like a special guest.
Manager Response: Dear Compass25747917361,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that your time was both enjoyable and productive. Thank you for your kind words about the restaurant and housekeeping staff. I will be sure to pass on your praise. We hope to have you back as our guest again soon!!  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Nice hotel, good location but $33 a day self parking fee will keep me from staying here again!! I love Hilton hotels so much but I could have stayed another night for as much as I paid to park for 3 nights!! I've never stayed anywhere that charges this much to park!! Insane
Manager Response: Dear Climber36936936120,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased that you enjoyed the hotel and the location. I appreciate your loyalty to Hilton Hotels and hope that continues in the future. I do understand your comments regarding parking and it is true that self parking is $33 at our location. Parking is a premium in the market (especially being this close to the airport) and we price ourselves along side our competitor hotels in the area. I do hope this cost doesn't detour you from staying with us again in the future.  Thanks again,  Rob K General manager

Summary Heading: Only stay if you have no other choice
Summary: We stayed due to a flight cancellation at the end of a weekend getaway after staying elsewhere.  Bell service is horrible.  Waited for around 20 minutes at check in even though no other guests were in lobby.  Called for bellman upon check out- never showed up.  Had to store bags due to later flight.  Upon return bellman gave us 2 of our 5 bags and disappeared causing me to wait in line behind people checking in to talk to front desk to get remainder of bags.   Once we had bags, front desk person commented on items that where in a closed bag that was never opened in their presence- what kind of security does their storage area have????.  Used points as it was last minute due to flight cancellation and spent 50,000 points for a service quality that is well below motel level and
Manager Response: Dear Dantara2018,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so sorry to hear about your experience during your stay. This is not the type of service we normally provide and that you deserve. I can assure you that your security and top service levels are our top priority. I will be having a conversation with the team regarding your experience to ensure it is corrected immediately.  Thanks again for your comments and we hope to see you again in the future.  Rob K General Manager

Summary: This Hilton in Irvine they know how to treat Guest those employees are sweethearts and I had a great experience every time I go to this hotel the people that work there management and everyone is awesome!!!
Manager Response: De'Andre B,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay with us and for the kind words about the staff. I always love hearing about the positive impact our staff can have. I will be sure to share your words with the team!!  We look forward to having you back as our guest again in the future!!  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary Heading: Close to airport, Good Bar and outside sitting area
Summary: This is a very good hotel with the proximity of the airport as my main concern in booking.  Complimentary shuttle to airport.  We ordered drinks and food from the outdoor sitting area.  The area was nice and had heated lamps which made it comfortable.  Very good rate.  I would recommend you consider this location.
Manager Response: Walter11_22,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad you were able to enjoy our newly renovated patio area with fire pits and heat lamps. I hope you are able to return in the summer months when we will have live entertainment on the weekends.  Thanks again  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Convenient location, clean rooms, average service, good breakfast.  Walking distance to a couple local restaurants. Across the street from OC/John Wayne airport and near the hub of the Irvine area business center. Parking prices steep.
Manager Response: Trail64681725556,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate any and all feedback as a way to continue great service to all of our guests. I am glad you enjoyed our proximity to the airport and surrounding areas as well as our guestrooms and breakfast. I am sorry to hear that the service was average as we strive for exceptional. We hope to have you back to deliver great service in the future.  Thanks again,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Second time here - staff are so accommodating and "real"!  The fact that its an older hotel can only be seen from the outside and some of the rooms. Inside, its a great business hotel. They did a super job of updating the outside patio with posh loungers and the pool looks so much more welcoming.  Rooms are usual size and all mod cons. Nothing special yet nothing bad. Great location near airport and freeway plus out of the hussle n bussle of Newport beach tourism yet close enough for a quick Uber ride.  Used conference facilities and was very happy.
Manager Response: Dear Elisa F,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am truly happy that you enjoyed your time with us. I believe it is the Team members that can make or break and experience and I'm glad you experienced our true hospitality. I am also happy to hear you enjoyed our new outdoor patio. We are thrilled to have the new furniture and fire pits and look forward to having our live entertainment out there all summer. I do hope we can welcome you back again in the near future!!  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: We like to stay here when in Irvine as it is convenient and comfortable, and friendly.  It has good buffet breakfast.  The upper floors have good views including the airport and the city.  We like the nearby Gulliver's restaurant which has wonderful prime rib.
Manager Response: Dear Hbonvivant,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am so glad to hear that you enjoy your time with us and appreciate the kind words. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future!!  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Vincent was absolutely amazing. He was so busy and handled it like a pro with a smile and great attitude to go with it. Checking out was easy with Tracy and Michelle. thank you for a great time. We will definitely be back
Manager Response: Vincent,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay. As much as I'd like to take the credit for your experience, unfortunately, we do not have a Vincent, Tracy or Michelle at our front desk. This may be for a different hotel, however, I can assure you we have terrific Front Desk Agents and hope that we can welcome you to our hotel at some point to experience our front desk and service.  Hope to see you soon!!  Rob K General manager

Summary: This property was built in the 70’s but has been kept up to date.  I believe this might actually be a Hilton Corporate owned location and if that’s accurate, kudos to them for keep the property relevant.  It’s a great location across from John Wayne Airport and has easy access to the 405 freeway.  The staff at this property is exceptional.  Check out the new patio space for cocktails and conversation.  The pool area looked nice also.  I would totally stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear TheArtofBeer,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us!! You are correct that we are a Hilton Corporate Managed property and do try to keep everything up to date. I am so glad you enjoyed our newly renovated patio area. I hope you are able to stay with us during the summer months as we will have live music every weekend starting in June.  Thanks again and I hope to welcome you back again soon!!  Rob K General manager

Summary: Stayed here for my mother's funeral because it is the closest hotel to the John Wayne airport. My husband is disabled so I have to handle a wheelchair and suitcases by myself. Was shocked that they charge $33/day for parking for even the guests of the hotel. And there is no refrigerator in the room. There was a large wedding at the hotel with very limited parking so all the Disabled Parking was taken which the hotel did not enforce. So had to park at a far distance and push the wheelchair through drunk driving wedding attendees. With the high price for the room plus the high parking fee with no parking and no refrigerator made this stay extremely uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Dear afaraa,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so sorry to hear about the reason for your visit and the  challenges you had during your recent stay. We did have a large wedding during the time you were here and parking was a bit busy. We try our best to regulate the parking and always offer our valet services if the reserved parking options are being utilized. I truly appreciate your feedback as we strive to use all comments to better our service at the hotel. I hope we can welcome you back again in the near future

Summary: An excellent hotel for a conference, if you don’t have to stay there.  Nice meeting space pairs with excellent banquet food and beverage. Rooms are basic for Hilton.  The wicker club chair is surprisingly comfortable.  The bed is well below the comfort of other brands.   The closet is next to useless as it is filled with a raised computer safe making it impossible to hang trousers, long coats or dresses. Breakfast was extremely disappointing with slow service by servers who constantly complained about how overworked they were.  If traveling with children the hotel has a large attractive pool and pool deck.
Manager Response: Paul C,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us. I am so sorry to hear about your experience with the rooms, breakfast and the beds. I can assure you that I will have a conversation with the servers at breakfast to ensure it meets our expectations. We are purchasing new beds this year, so hopefully you can enjoy on your next visit. I hope you were able to enjoy our new patio/pool area during your stay.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary: Happy with how clean everything was, the service and having a fridge that I could use to store my milk since I am a nursing, traveling mom. I was very happy with the quality of the food offered in the lobby bar as well.
Manager Response: Amber D,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us as well as the amenities we offer. I will be sure to share your review with the staff.  We hope to welcome you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary Heading: very nice facilities and friendly staff
Summary: From the front desk to bar service to housekeepers, everyone here was very nice, accommodating, and helpful.  I was there for a two day conference with many delegates.  The hotel staff handled the care and feeding of over 200 people with professionalism.
Manager Response: Caltravelgal,  Thank you so much for your kind words about your experience during your recent stay with us. The hotel enjoyed hosting your conference and glad everything went well. I hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary Heading: Very comfortable stay once you park.
Summary: Parking is a nightmare. Just go straight to valet parking which at this location should be complimentary. But once you don't have to worry about parking, the hotel itself is very nice. Rooms are very comfortable, wi-fi is fast and reliable. Staff is extremely friendly and polite.
Manager Response: ElMagnificotechguy,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to read your comments regarding the staff and our accommodations. I am truly sorry to hear about the parking experience. I realize the parking was extremely busy these past weekends with several large groups in-house and appreciate your patience and understanding. Valet is always a good option and am glad you were able to take advantage of that service.  We hope to welcome you back again soon. Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: This hotel is literally across the street from the airport. You can walk if you want or pay $10 for an Uber. The staff are very friendly and focus on customer service. The rooms are clean and provide modern furniture with USB ports all over. Clean and well maintained facilities with outside space and indoor conference space. Plenty of breakout rooms and several large meeting rooms. The food catered was good and there was plenty of it.   The snack shop next to the check in desk was well stocked. I do wish they had Ice-cream!    Dr. M
Manager Response: Dear DrNkaizen,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your time and your conference was successful. I appreciate your kind words about the rooms, food and the staff, I will be sure to pass this along to the team. We have been working on changing some of the options at our gift shop and ice cream is definitely on the list!! We hope to welcome you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Decent if you're here for a quick stay, like staying loyal to Hilton brand, or just need to be near airport
Summary: Beds are tiny, hotel restaurant has good food. No mini fridge, nor microwave. Not much to do in area, but has a 24 hour IHOP near by. Bathrooms small, tub not worth getting excited about. Not a destination hotel by any means, but reliable enough if you want a Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear Freedom00342779571,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our proximity to the airport. I am sorry to hear your disappointment on the beds and the tubs, but agree that we are not necessarily a destination, however have all the extra amenities of a destination resort. I hope we can welcome you back to enjoy our lovely pool and our newly renovated patio with full service food and beverage, live music and fire pits.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: We really liked the room it was spacious and the bed very comfortable. We had the option of opening the window, which I always value, but you had to smell the fuel and ear the noise from the plaines across the street. So opening the window was not really an option. I didn’t use the breakfast but my hubby did and he was very happy with it. I had lunch and snacks there and they have an awesome French onion soup and shrimp salad. We had mostly very good service except for the last day, the waitress was out to lunch.  I really like the shuttle it will drop you off and pick you up anytime within a 3mile range...that was great! It allowed us to experience a coule restaurants in the area, we particularly enjoyed an Asian fusion one called Ten. I do recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear Gyhany C,  Thank you for taking the time to review you recent stay with us!! I truly appreciate the kind words about your experience. I am glad you had a chance to enjoy the rooms, shuttle and food and beverage. I am truly sorry to hear about the service on your last day. I will certainly follow up with our outlets team to ensure we are attentive at all times. On a side note, we do love Ten Asian Bistro and send many guests there to enjoy!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General manager

Summary Heading: Nice, clean hotel close to SNA
Summary: I chose this hotel based on its location literally across the street from SNA airport (Note: You can hear jet noise, but they stop operations around 9 or 10 pm so sleeping isn't really an issue). The price was reasonable for the quality of hotel. The rooms were clean with a comfortable bed and variety of pillow types, including memory foam. I really liked the Evelyn and Crabtree toiletries provided. My only sore spot is the cost of self parking, which was $33.
Manager Response: Dear 244henryy,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!! I am glad to hear that you were able to enjoy our hotel and the proximity to the airport. I do agree that although you can hear daytime airport traffic, the evening time has little disruptions to sleep. I do hope we can welcome you back as our guest in the near future.  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary Heading: Great bed for a good night sleep
Summary: A hotel stay should always have three things. A great mattress, great shower, and a good heating and air conditioning system. This hotel has all three! However it is a bit noisy, and an employee was vacuuming in the hallway about 9:30 pm. On a positive note, the New York strip from room service was tender and delicious. I believe I will come back for another visit.
Manager Response: Dear V4115EGjasonw,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We would have to agree that the 3 items you listed are VERY important for any stay. I do apologize for the disruption in the hallway. We try to keep the maintenance during business hours and will follow up with housekeeping to reiterate.  I am glad to hear you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary: Rooms are modern and comfortable. Staff members are superb. They are truly there to help. Very good breakfast. Convenient location to freeway access and SNA, not a charming neighbourhood for walking around. I would return without any hesitation.
Manager Response: Dear azzamary,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and thank you for your business. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed yourself and were able to experience our hospitality. We look forward to having you as our guest again soon!!  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary: I travel over 70 days per year, to some very exlusive destinations, and yet this was the best hotel experience I’ve ever had — given the friendliness and positive attitude of the staff. Never have I felt so welcomed!
Manager Response: Dear Ashley S,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and thank you for the business. I am very happy that you felt the positive attitude and service culture that our team members strive to give. I will be sure to share your thoughts with the team at the hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob k General Manager

Summary: Great stay, clean rooms and friendly staff. We stayed for a festival that brought a very large group of people . At no time did I feel like the quality of our stay was in jeaoparj because of the large amount of people.
Manager Response: Dear Dreamer22960923262,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us!! We enjoyed having your group in the hotel and look forward to having you back in the future.  Thanks again,  Rob K General manager

Summary: Hi   My name is Melene Morad I just want to let you guys know how nasty this hotel is. I stayed at Hilton Irvine orange county airport on 3/15/19 to 3/17/19 in room 626 ONLY because my daughter was part of the I Love Dance competition.  This hotel smells horrible like sewage issues I mean it’s disgusting.  All 3 elevators are broken so we are forced to wait for the service elevator and that takes forever. Then while in the nasty elevator I here employees talking about how the elevators have been broken for months . Super embarrassing for you has a Hilton hotel.   After getting to my room the glass sliding door  that says “for your safety this door only opens 4 inches “ opens alllll the way . This is probably a big liability for you guys maybe you should look into that as well.
Manager Response: Dear adventure49649703520,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly sorry to hear about your experience with your stay. I truly appreciate you bringing a few issues to my attention and rest assured, we will fix them (especially the sliding glass door). It is true that 2 of our elevators were inoperable during your stay, but I can also say that the service company was able to diagnose and fix them within the week. I am glad that the engineer was able to fix the plumbing issue, but apologize that you and your daughter had to deal with that in the first place. It is comments like this that allow us to get better and enhance future guest experiences with us.  Thanks again,  Rob K General manager

Summary Heading: The worst Hotel to stay in
Summary: I have stayed in this hotel for two days. This hotel is 2 min from airport so until 10pm forget about any rest. You will hear plane flying out and your room shaking of noise. then the street noise, cars and hunking of horns would prevent you from sleeping all night. You will hear loud visitors and slamming of doors all night and when you call front desk to stop them they will do nothing about this the hotel food is terrible. I returned the food back twice.  with the money you pay them you can get a very decent hotel room somewhere else
Manager Response: Dear homie5591,  First and foremost, thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I appreciate the business!! I am truly sorry for the experience you had during your recent stay with us. You are correct about the proximity to the airport and sometimes that does pose a challenge with outside noise. I am also sorry to hear about the food quality you experienced. I have met with the executive chef and the food and beverage team to ensure the quality is met for each and every guest. I do hope that this experience will not stop you from staying with us again in the future.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: I stay in at least 2-3 Hilton hotels every couple of weeks....our primary location (Hilton Garden Inn on Morse) was booked so we have this a try.  From check in, I was worried.  The line at 4PM was long .... the staff member was not helpful and had a slight “attitude issue” .... my room was not ready and they gave me a handicapped room (another mini rant about the room was no outlet/plug near my side of the bed...unacceptable)  Some of the elevators were out of service  As many places as the Irvine Company has scraped and rebuilt, I can’t figure out how this one missed out.  It needs it.  The bright side is I drove past a very nice appearing NEWER Hampton Inn which will be our alternative the next time I need one.
Manager Response: Dear Davefoshee,  First and foremost, thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I appreciate the feedback. Secondly, I am truly sorry that we dropped the ball on several areas during your time with us. We did have a large group in during your stay, but that should not have impacted your stay as it did. Unfortunately 2 of our elevators were non-operable for a period of time, but we were able to get them back up and running shortly after. Again, I apologize for the service you received and hope you can give us another chance in the future.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: We chose this hotel for its rate, not knowing we would have a $31 parking fee plus a ton of other taxes and fees added to our bill I could of stayed at the hotel line we like to stay at instead of finding out our bill was going to be more than expected.
Manager Response: Dear Experience174329,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate your business!! I apologize for the miscommunication on the parking rates. We try hard to communicate our rates with all 3rd party sites, but it appears this was missed. I appreciate you bringing this to our attention so we can continue to elevate our guest experience.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Poorly Maintained....Staff at front desk could be better trained
Summary: Two of the three passenger elevators were broken and unusable. This is not the first time there has been an elevator issue at this hotel. No minor gratuity offered for the significant inconvenience. Just acted like it's normal.
Manager Response: Dear Carl,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly sorry for the inconvenience of the elevators during your time with us. Unfortunately, we did have 2 of our elevators become unusable for an extended period of time. We worked around the clock with the elevator company to find a solution and am happy to say they are all operational at this time. During this time, we could have been more accommodating to our existing guests and have learned from this experience. I hope this has not deterred you from staying with us again in the future.  Thanks again,  Rob K General manager

Summary: The staff was very attentive and friendly. Excellent amenities from the restaurant to the fitness room. I had the luxury of an extended stay and it was very positive and consistent experience the entire time.
Manager Response: Dear bgalcor,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and you were able to enjoy the restaurant, fitness center and our staff. We hope to have you back as our guest again soon.  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary: Easy check in at the front desk.  Comfy bed and what felt like feather pillows for the win :) My bf was throwing up at night and I asked the front desk the morning of check out if we could check out 30 mins past 12pm and no problem there!  I like that check out is at 12pm, but the only downside I have to say is parking is $30. I stayed one night but even that seemed a lot to pay for parking. Other than that everything else was good. And the room and bathroom were very clean upon arrival.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so sorry to hear about the health concerns and hope everyone is feeling better!!! I am happy to hear that you found the hotel clean and enjoyed the bed and pillows. I do understand that paying for parking is sometimes shocking, but as with almost all of the hotels in the area, we do have a charge comparable to others in the area.  I do hope we can have you back as our guest in the near future  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Beautiful property, quiet rooms, excellent staff, not a thing I would change about this place.  Excellent breakfast, great location for orange county airport or to get to anything on the south side of Los Angeles
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your time here and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon.

Summary: nice place  easy to get to airport  the valet guys where awesome always ready to help out their food was very good also  the rooms where big and very clean  tv was good size some places have a very small tv ?  i was very happy with place
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time at the hotel. We look forward to having you as our guest again soon.  Regards,  Rob K

Summary: Unless you want food that taste like it was made for a prison inmate. It's $20 a plate for stale food and fake eggs. But everything else is great. The review has to be 200 characters so I'm just taking up space by typing this
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about your experience with the breakfast food. Our chef and culinary team work hard to make sure every guest enjoys there dining experience. I will personally follow up with the team to ensure proper quality is adhered to on a daily basis.  We hope to have you as our guests again soon!!  Regards,  Rob k

Summary Heading: More a Garden Inn than a Hilton
Summary: Why Hilton does not differentiate hotels anymore? This Hilton is really plain, with the minimum required. The pillows are awful. I asked to change them to stiffer one and they came back with 3 pillows of the same kind. The rooms are slightly run down. Breakfast looks like a Garden Inn’s one. On the positive side it is a 5-10 minutes walk from the terminal.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We continually strive to uphold the Hilton standards and make every experience enjoyable and memorable. I apologize that this stay was less than expected. I do hope that we can invite you back to experience our hotel and wonderful staff again soon.  Regards,  Rob K

Summary: Within minutes my wife noticed a pair of dirty men's underwear next to the bed. We called the front desk and they "were" going to send someone right up. We left in the morning and they were still in the bag I put them in before we went to bed for the night.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am terribly sorry for the experience you and your wife had at the hotel. That is not the level of service (or basic service) that you expect at a Hilton hotel. I have personally met with the Team members working that day to ensure they understand the importance of cleanliness and follow through in every situation.  I apologize again for the lack of service and hope that we can invite you back in the future.  Rob K General Manager

Summary: This hotel is across the street from the airport .  We stayed in a room facing the airport and our sliding glass door was old and did not seal so we could hear planes and people in the pool all night. It has not been upgraded and seemed old and dated.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I apologize that the sliding glass door did not properly seal causing the airport noise to permeate the room. I have instructed the engineering department to take a look and fix the door. I do hope that this event wouldn't deter you from coming back to the hotel in the near future.  Thank again for your time.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: Horrible experience, they checked me in with my corporate credit card and the next day i had meetings came back to my room and my key would not work (All my personal belongings were in my room).  Went down to Front desk and they purposefully locked me out of my room because their was a problem with my company card.  I asked why not just call me so I can give you a new card and they had no response.  Instead they locked me out of my room while I gave them my personal credit card and then they had to escort me up to my room to unlock the door.  Horrible service.
Manager Response: Lawrence,  Thank you for taking the time to submit your review of the hotel. I want to truly apologize for the inconvenience you encountered with the hotel. While there may be procedures in place to alleviate credit card challenges in the hotel, this is not the level of service that you deserve. I have held a meeting with the team members that worked that day and reiterated the procedures and how to recover from service challenges. I can assure you that we will do better in the future.  Thank you again for your time and I do apologize again for the lack of service you received.  Regards,  Rob K General Manager

Summary: I enjoy staying here.  Even though the food the options are slim I am a big fan of how the staff treats me.  This particular evening the restaurant was closed as I arrived late.  The person who checked me in offered me her wing dinner.  And other than the food options anything I ask for the staff is friendly and always finds a way to say yes. That makes me feel appreciated.  See you next time!!
Manager Response: Kelly,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the hotel. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that you experienced our wonderful staff. We strive to make every guest experience memorable and hope we can again for you in the near future.  Thanks again!!  Rob K General Manager

Summary: If you need a convenient and comfortable stay while on a business trip or pleasure, The Hilton across from John Wayne Airport is the place.  Aura Restaurant and Bar will easily compete with many boutique and specialty hotels for in house dining and what I would consider a Top Shelf Bar Experience.  I run the cooking club where I live in South Carolina and the selection of premium libations and a wide expanse of menu items will have you coming back even if you are a local.
Manager Response: Timr1953,  Thank you so much for your great review of your recent stay with us. I am so happy that you have enjoyed your time at the hotel, especially the Food and Beverage offerings. We look forward to having you as our guest again in the near future.  Cheers,  Rob k General Manager

Summary: Great location, you can walk from the airport if needed or so inclined even though there is a shuttle. Excellent rooms and staff and would highly recommend. The location is centrally located and extremely easy for travel for business.
Manager Response: Tom,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel, staff and proximity to the airport. I hope that we can welcome you back again very soon.  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary Heading: Very convenient to the airport but not too loud...
Summary: Stayed here one night on business.  We were able to walk to the facility from the airport.  Check-in was seamless and quick and the facility and rooms were clean and nicely appointed.  Breakfast was typical Hilton breakfast, which is to say... not bad.  My favorite part was having the ability to take a morning run into the nearby (approx. 1 mile) San Joaquin Marsh and Wildlife Sanctuary.  It made for a lovely start to the day!
Manager Response: Peters M,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, especially the run through the sanctuary. I have personally taken that route many times and can vouch for the beauty and serenity. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future.  Regards,  Rob k General manager

Summary Heading: Nice and Convenient to John Wayne Airport
Summary: I stayed here one night before departing on a flight out of the nearby John Wayne Airport.  Very nice hotel with a comfortable room and friendly staff that are all professional.  The airport is just across the street.  The hotel provides a free shuttle service to and from and you can park your car (fees associated) there while traveling.  I will be using this airport again.
Manager Response: Alan C,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed the hotel, staff and convenience of location to the airport. Our shuttles run every half hour to give our guests the convenience of getting to the airport quickly.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob K General manager

Summary: The hotel staff was great and friendly. The room itself was very clean. The shower is big and the bathroom was very clean. Tv had a lot of different channels to choose from and the room service looked like it had a lot of variety. Loved that the hotel is pretty much central to everything in LA. If you want to stay and explore Irvine, it’s convenient and if you want to travel more into LA it’s also close by.
Manager Response: Hi Fearless62624927160, we are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: if you want to experience inconvenience after inconvenience, then this is the hotel to stay in. This was the most irritating, frustrating hotel experience ever. They have a sign that says, "if you can't rate your stay a 10, let us know and we will make it right." This is a lie. We let them know repeatedly,but they made nothing right at all. When we checked in, the valet explained all of the ammenities, and specifically mentioned in room dining. We returned to our room late after a long day of baseball and attempted to call in room dining to place and order. They had a voice mail message that stated they were very busy and to leave a message, which we did. Nobody ever called back so we called the front desk where we were informed there wasn't any room service until the 4th of
Manager Response: Hi Sarah, thank you for taking time to share your review. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations, especially after repeated attempts. We have made significant changes since your stay.  We always value your feedback and will continue share your experience with our management team so we can continue improve our guest services.

Summary: The staff was very gracious. I would return to this property due to the friendly staff, comfortable rooms, and convenient location. The fitness room was very well equipped and the pool and hot tub were enjoyable as well.
Manager Response: Hi Jennifer. We are so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, especially that our staff, rooms, and fitness center were up to your standards. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We attended a New Years Eve party in one of the hotels banquet rooms.  Everything was very nice, clean and the staff was friendly and accommodating.  We very much enjoyed the evening and will be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad you enjoyed the New Years event as we truly appreciated your business!!! We hope to see you again very soon.  Regards, Rob K General Manager

Summary: After I checked in I went to front desk to ask about the restaurant closing time I met a woman named she said her name was GABBY she asked me to buy her food if o have time from the restaurant I was shocked so I asked her what did you say she said again if you go to the restaurant can you buy me some food to because thus job doesn't pay much I am still shocked at this hilton EMPLOYEE UNPROFESSIONAL not educated in service and demanding to customers what a crazy request..Hey management should know about this...
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to respond to your recent stay with us. I truly apologize for the interaction with our Team members. I have tried to connect with you via private message, but it doesn't appear to be working. If you could kindly respond with the date and time of the interaction to SNACM_GM@hilton.com, I would greatly appreciate it. This will assist us in the investigation into this matter.   Thank you again and I look forward to hearing from you soon!!

Summary: Newly renovated hotel adjacent to John Wayne airport- centrally located in Orange County. Large dog friendly (pet policy: 2 pets, 75lbs each). Friendly staff who were always willing to help with any and all of our needs throughout our 6 day stay. Since we were staying so many days, they even discounted the parking rate! Overall great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear you enjoyed your time here. We do love all pets and glad you were able share your stay with your dog.  Thanks again and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon.  Regards, Rob K General manager

Summary: The stay here was simple yet accommodating. I would stay here again if I visited the area. The bar was great in the evening and staff was helpful in recommending great places to visit in the city. The texting to ones cellphone was really neat.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking your time to share your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear you enjoyed your time and specifically the bar. We do love the technology connections we have with our guests and hope this new feature makes your stay and requests seamless.  Thanks again  Rob K General manager

Summary: The staff were great as always but this hotel is a little run down. I was having a business meeting with about 20 employees of one of my best clients and was less than impressed with the state of this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. As always we value you as a guest. We have read your response and our Executive Team is reviewing your comments to ensure they are used to improve our guest's experience.

Summary: It’s exactly what you’d expect from a Hilton. Conveniently located across the street from the airport, the hotel is clean, bright and comfortable. The rooms were large and the beds were wonderful.  Staff was friendly and check in is a breeze. Thanks for a good nights sleep!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback in regards to your stay.  As always, we value you as a guest. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Stay here regularly for work as it’s close to the office and to the airport. Always find that the restaurant is oddly setup since it’s basically an open area to one side of the bar. Rooms are clean and not old, but the air conditioning never works that well. And even the self parking is almost $40 a night.
Manager Response: We do thank you for choosing us as you do have several options while traveling. We look forward to having you once again in the future and we greatly appreciate your feedback and will address areas mentioned. Once again thank you and we hope you have a great day.

Summary: Good stay overall.  Typical expected level of service for Hilton.  Room was comfortable.  I did have breakfast which was reasonable.  Check in and check out process was seamless.  I would stay again next time.
Manager Response: Glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to having you in the future and hope that you have a great day.

Summary: This property was excellent and took superb care of my meetings! My room was very clean and my every need was taken care of.  Special requests were no problem. I would highly recommend this hotel anytime!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next stay in the future and hope that you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Staff re-training seems to be in order
Summary: Hotel staff do not have a good understanding of tax-exempt organizations and create unnecessary barriers to having tax removed when it is appropriate to do so.  Food service was lackluster; meals were served cold and tasted as if they had been prepared quite a bit in advance and were perhaps reheated prior to serving.  Front desk clerk was rude regarding tax-exempt status, and an accounts payable clerk simply refused to accept my certification and remove taxes.  There are several hotels near the John Wayne Airport, and you would do well to pick one other than this Hilton.
Manager Response: We do regret to hear that your stay was anything but exception. We do hope you allow us another opportunity to provide exception guest service. We hope to have you in the future and hope that you have a great day.

Summary: The Hotel's employees were fantastic, they offer me a great and exceptional service. The place is great, very clean and friendly environment. I really reccomend this Hotel to everyone who wants to experience a great stay and an exceptional service.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you once more in the future. We hope you have a great day.

Summary: We were in town for business and flew into John Wayne Airport. The hotel is virtually right across the street.  Location: Not sure how you can do any better on the location. Close to all the business locations in the Orange County area and right across the street from the airport!  Staff: The staff is well trained, polite and seem to really care that you have a nice stay. This is a bit refreshing these days. Check-in and check-out were really smooth and I have to mention that they had a nice glass of wine ready for us upon check-in. Nice touch!  Rooms: My room was really nice and the bedding and pillows were totally first-class! There is a noisy side of the hotel and a quiet side. If you don't like airplane noise, ask for the quiet side. I don't mind the sounds of jets taking
Manager Response: We couldn't be more pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next stay with us and hope you have a great day.

Summary: The parking fees for your guests are just outrageous!I stay there less due to that, I walk from the airport and to restaurants to avoid paying the parking fees.The rest of the facility is great walking distance to the airport and fantastic sushi at OotoroAAR
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and are thrilled that you enjoy your time with us. We do have parking options that we welcome you to take advantage of such as parking package that we offer upon availability. We hope to have you wit hus in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Older Hotel but still very nice Staff is outstanding and the location is great. Right across the street from John Wayne airport. Lots of excellent restaurants just a few minutes away via Uber or Lyft.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and our staff provided the service that you deserve while at our location. We look forward to having you in the future.

Summary: Enjoyed my stay had a nice room with a comfortable bed. Stayed here for a two day conference and it was very easy to just go downstairs to meeting rooms. Staff are awesome their customer service is superb they answered all my questions recommend local food & shopping destinations.
Manager Response: We are extremely honored to have met your expectations and glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our local outlets. We hope to have you once more in the near future.

Summary: Had an 8am flight via SNA this morning.  Knew I was going to be out/up late last night.  Needed hotel close to airport.  This was a very good choice! Check in was a breeze.  10th floor room had great views of both sunrise & sunset. Although I didn't have enough time to enjoy a full breakfast, what I did eat was quite tasty. Any staff member I came in contact with was friendly,  courteous and helpful.    Sadly, no executive lounge. Given stay was just 1 night, I got over it. $31 for overnight parking...  If I needed accommodations close to airport in the future, I wouldn't hesitate checking availability here.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We do look forward to having you with us in the future when you are in the area and hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Hotel is okay but bad experience with payment
Summary: I recently wrote a positive review for this hotel because I had a good experience staying there, but unfortunately I have to reduce my rating drastically based on my last stay.  When I arrived, the person at the front desk informed me the nightly charge for my room was twice as high as the rate that had shown up when I booked the room on the Hilton website.  Unfortunately I did not take a screenshot at the time so I don't have a record to prove this, but a colleague who was traveling with me booked at the same rate so I know it was not a mistake on my part.   The woman at the front desk simply told me I must have seen the amount wrong when I made my booking. Even though I am a Hilton Honors member they did not even try to give me the benefit of the doubt or investigate what
Manager Response: We do thank you for your feedback and regret to hear that your experience was anything but enjoyable. We do value you being an honors member and a frequent guest with us and do hope that you allow us another opportunity to provide you with the exceptional service that you deserve. Once more we do apologize and hope to see you in the future.

Summary: No worth the money and customer service attitude. Could have stayed somewhere much nicer with free parking for the amount of money we had to spend in extra fees and parking. Save you’re money and go somewhere else
Manager Response: We regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us. Here at the Hilton Irvine we thrive on all of our guest not only enjoying their stay with us but providing them with the service that they deserve. We do hope that you allow us anther opportunity to provide the exceptional service you deserve and once more we do apologize.

Summary: Room was quiet. Mattress was uncomfortable. Price of food and convenience items was outrageous and there's not a store close by to go to. ($4 for a maxi pad, $3.50 for a coke, $20 for breakfast, etc) Free shuttle to and from airport.
Manager Response: We do thank you for your feedback and regret to hear that you did not completely enjoy your stay. We hope that you allow us another opportunity to provide you with exception service. Once more thank you for your feedback and have a great day.

Summary: Had a one night layover at SNA. Stayed at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport. The staff was very welcoming to me and my service animal. The room was large, clean and well equipped. The night was surprisingly very quiet in spite of being right next to the airport.  Highly recommended and I'll stay here again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your unplanned stay with us and are glad to hear that you and your guest enjoyed your time with us as well. We look forward to having you with us again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: My room was ready even though I arrived a little early.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The food was good and tasty and the servers helpful.  Checkout was easy and they supply a shuttle to the airport.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you again in the future. Thank you so much for your feedback, we hope you have a great day.

Summary: I cannot speak to the quality of the rooms as I have only attended events at this hotel but I had such a wonderful experience with the staff/concierge/bar etc; this past Sunday I felt like I should share about it. The location is easy, convenient, very close to major freeways(55 - 405 & 73) and directly across from the Orange County airport. Not to mention about 10 minutes from the famed Fashion Island Shopping Center.   I needed a cord, a clean towel to tend to a cut, a band-aid and a photo copy. I dealt with 4 different staff members for each one of these individual requests and each one of them was friendly, professional and swiftly got me what I had asked for. A++++  I ordered the salmon with broccolini and tomatoes from the bar, while my husband had a bourbon and it was
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and glad to hear that you were able to utilize our food options within the hotel. We look forward to you staying with us in the future and hope that you have a great day.

Summary: This was one of the best hotel service I recieved! The staff   was welcoming and assisted me with my luggage. You can tell they cared. Also, this was my first pageant and it was well organized. The staff was helpful and respectful and the girls were so sweet. I had a lot of fun and learned a lot. I recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a hotel in Irvine.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to having you with us as a guest in the future. Once mor thank you for your feedback and we hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Hilton hotel at Macarthur Blvd Irvine
Summary: We recently stayed at Hilton hotel at MAC Arthur Irvine and I will give them 5 stars because the place was  clean, friendly people good customer service and convenient location. I will recommend this hotel to all my friends relatives whoever wants to stay at Irvine.  The food and service was great.
