My  favorite Area in this hotel was the swimming pool it’s was clean and nice to hang out. Hotel room nice and clean..
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are also glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our outdoor pool and we are looking forward to having yourself and loved ones with us in the future.

Summary: I had attended the Miss Orange County Regional Pageant and had such an amazing experience due to the hotel staff and pageant director. The hotel staff were nothing but welcoming and kind from the whole time my family and I had stayed. Giselle Boone, the pageant director, held an excellent and successful event. I truly recommend this hotel and this pageant.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. We do look forward to having you once again in the future, once again that you for your feedback and we hope you have a great day.

Summary: I had the best Experiance visiting the Hilton in Irvine for a beauty competition my friend was competeing in!! The Hilton’s staff was incredibly helpful in directing me to where I needed to find the ballroom the pageant was being held in! I arrived with plenty of time before the pageant started and my whole group got to sit with each other because we all had arrived early with our pre-paid tickets, it was amazing to see everyone who had come to see the pageant! Not only did I have an amazing  experience watching the pageant but also with the Hilton hotel concierge and employees!!  Thank you Hilton for your amazing services!
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your feedback and are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and we hope to have you as a guest in the future. Once more thank you for your feedback and we hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Attended the Miss Orange County Regional Pageant
Summary: The Hilton Irvine staff were very accommodating and attentive to our needs. We were rushing to get to the pageant and our food came right away.  The pageant was very successful. Lots of talented young people. The pageant staff did an excellent job of keeping a lot of people comforrable, content and safe. It was the best pageant I had seen in quite a long time. Ms. Giselle Boone did an excellent job. I look forward to attending more of her pageants.  p.s. If you have any extra program book I would love a copy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we are thrilled to that you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to having you as a guest in the future. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: A True Sample of Excellent Hospitality!
Summary: This is a very centrally located hotel, directly across the street from the Orange County Airport and minutes to both South Coast Plaza and Fashion Island. The staff are absolutely excellent.  All the employees I came in contact with were friendly and helpful. The room was clean, comfortable and had an excellent bed/pillows.  We stayed at the hotel for the Miss Orange County pageant and had a fabulous stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you once more in the future.

Summary: I attended a teen beauty pageant hosted by Giselle Boone in the function room at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport on Sunday, September 2018.  I pre-paid for tickets, but when our party entered the room, it was overcrowded with people including young children.  There were no seats for us so we stood the entire time.  I am sure it was against fire code and it was a safety violation.  Neither the pageant organizer or hotel staff did anything to help when I brought up safety concerns.  Other people were openly questioning why the pageant would sell more tickets than they had seats for.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy your time while you were here. We have spoken to the proper departments about your concern again thank you for your feedback and we hope you have a great day.

Summary: Staff and service was amazing. Hotel lobby was spacious, clean and accommodating. Beds were very comfortable and housekeeping was done every day.  The location of the hotel was awesome. The airport was literally across the street. I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you with us the future. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope you have a great day.

Summary: We were looking for a public speaking class for my teen to take and found this woman online who was local and claimed to teach public speaking.  She lured us to the Irvine Hilton.  I thought it was a strange place to hold a class, but I thought maybe this was a workshop in a hotel meeting room.  Instead, she told us to meet her outside the hotel in their public space where it was windy and said this is where she teaches public speaking and walking with improved poster.  This hotel has pay parking and this woman said that as long as we are training with her, she can get our parking validated.  So we started the weekly lesson.  But things did not seem quite right as she kept moving us around from location to location within the hotel as if she was hiding from the hotel staff and
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and we do apologize for the inconvenience that you endured. We do not host any type of public speaking classes at our hotel so we do apologize that you were informed otherwise. We will make sure to look into this immediately to assure that no other guest goes through this. Once more thank you for your feedback and we hope to have you as a guest in the future.

Summary: The hotel was beautiful and convenient. the service was fantstic and the attitude of the staff was excellent. This was my first stay here but I'd recommend it to anyone and it is right across from the OC Airport.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We do look forward to having you in the future to continue to provide exceptional service,. have a great day.

Summary: As always, customer service was Hilton gold standard!  The property itself, is a little dated and antiquated.  Please keep in mind the beds are full size and NOT queen size if you do not opt for King room.
Manager Response: Dear Leslie D,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your honesty as we look for reviews to provide insight and constructive feedback regarding our hotel’s service and amenities to better our guest experience. We welcome any additional comments or suggestions you would like to share. We are very happy that you received great service from our team and if you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary: Stayed here for a couple of days with work, greeted by lovely staff...after staying at the Hilton in Newark this was a welcome relief from that place :)  Really attentive staff, even given the fact that there was no hot water!   Really super comfy beds too!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to have you in the future. Once more thank you for your feedback and we hope that you have a great day.

Summary: This was a nice place to come back to after moving our daughter into housing at ICU.  Clean and comfortable.  The service was top notch.  We would have like to take advantage of the pool and the restaurant had we been staying longer.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and that your daughter moved in successfully. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Stayed one night after a business trip to catch an early flight. Front desk staff was very nice- Allowed me to check in early and was very helpful! I ordered room service that came rather quickly and was correct temperature. It tasted great! This is an older building but has been renovated and overall was clean. Was thankful for the quick shuttle that runs to/ from the airport every 30 minutes.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we do appreciate your feedback. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: The outside of hotel looks like it is very old. When you walk in, staff is excellent and renovations are noted. The pool area, needs a lot of work. The spa had lots of leaves, old band aid left and soda bottle. Never seen anyone come around to clean the pool or spa, compared to other hotels where you staff cleaning and keeping area tidy.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that our staff provided you with the service you deserve and you enjoyed your stay. We do thank you for your feedback and we will address the areas you mentioned. Thank you for your feedback once more and have a great day.

Summary: Nice hotel for the Business traveler, Parking is a little bit of an issue as they seem to want you to Valet park, but ask and they have free parking if you ask. They have a nice bar and breakfast restaurant.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and we hope that you join us again in the future. Due to our location we do have a fee for our parking area. Again we do hope that your joy us in the future and thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Very convenient, it’s purpose served in Hilton format
Summary: Stayed one night prior to an early morning departure. Premises are clean and up to date, large patio area for lounging in the sun, decent pool as well. Rooms from what I experienced, were clean and tidy. No fridge nor microwave in the suite I had.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Okay stay for an overnight trip
Summary: My fiance and I had a music event and decided to book this property one night to avoid driving home tired. We picked this place for proximity to the event venue and their dog friendly policies. We asked if there was a way to get early check in and they asked us to call at 9am the day we were scheduled to arrive. We also requested a refrigerator in our room for an additional $10. The morning of arrival we called to see if early check in was available. We were told to call back at noon. We called again and were given the run around. We ended up arriving at the property at 3:30pm to check in. We were then told our room was not ready. Ummm... no. We then demanded to be given a room because our event started at 2pm. They gave us our key cards and told us they would send up someone
Manager Response: We thank you for the time taken to provide us with feedback about your stay. We do regret to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations and we can assure you that this is not the norm for our establishment. We do hope that you allow us another opportunity to provide you with exemplary service that you deserve. Once more we do apologize and hope to see you in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: Overpriced. Poor breakfast and $30 for overnight parking. What a scam and disappointment from Hilton. Save your money by staying elsewhere. This was one of the biggest flops. The only satisfaction was the service from the gentleman at breakfast. Very poor choice though
Manager Response: We do thank you for your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay while with us. We do hope that you allow us another opportunity to provide you with exceptional guest service that you deserve. Once more we do thank you for your feedback and hope to have you in the future.

Summary: Recently stayed here for a birthday getaway and was blown away by the level of service from the staff here.  Was first greeted and checked in by the Front Desk supervisor who was able to get me an early check-in, which really helped.  The following day I was moving a little slowly and called the Front Desk to request a late check-out. Iris not only surpassed my request of an extra hour by extending my check-out until 3 pm, but she also offered complimentary breakfast for my birthday.  Having worked in this industry for numerous years, this was above and beyond my expectations. More employees need to be like Iris. She made my birthday extra special before I even got out of bed. WOW!!! Just WOW!!!
Manager Response: We are very thrilled to hear that Iris along with the rest of our team were able to help you celebrate your birthday the best way possible. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: My sister had a senior ceremony held in the main ballroom and it was absolutely beautiful. The dinner was catered by the restaurant of the hotel, on the menu was fish, chicken or steak, I had a bite of each one and they were all very good. There were over 250 people and the event too so it was a very impressive organization of sound, video, catering, dancing and all of the fun in between. A great space to hold an event and a beautiful hotel.
Manager Response: First and foremost congratulations to your sister. We are very pleased to hear that you were able to enjoy your time while with us and hope to have you as a guest in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: We attended the Newport Beach Jazz Festival which was held at the Newport Beach Hyatt. We also took in some sites and did some shopping and ate at the popular Three-Thirty-Three restaurant in Newport.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your time and hope that you have a chance to enjoy our amenities the next time you're in the area. Have a great day.

Summary: We usually stay either here or the Doubletree Club when we come to Irvine, which is quite often as our son lives here.  This Hilton is in front of the airport, and is close to a nice restaurant- Gulliver's.  The  hotel staff is very professional and friendly, and the rooms are quite nice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your feedback. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that our staff was able to provide you with the service that you deserve. We hope to have you once more in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: My company uses this hotel often for meetings and trainings. I appreciate the staff, accommodations, and the meals prepared for our group. I've been here 5-7 times and am always pleased with the service and the food.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you again in the future. We hope you have a great day.

Summary: Great service, speedy checkin process.  Allowed early check in without delay on a moments notice.  Parking fee was a little high.  Would definitely recommend and visit again.  Overall excellent experience.
Manager Response: We do thank you for your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Stayed here in Feb for a business trip. The hotel is very nice and clean. My only complaint is the chare for parking every night is a joke. $27 a day to park after I already pay $187 to stay at the hotel is ridiculous.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and thank you for staying with us. We do apologize for the rate of parking but due to our location that is the fee associated with parking. We do have packages online that include parking that may be a cheaper rate with the room and parking included as an option. We hope that you join us again in the future and again thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Chose this hotel for the location due to an early morning flight.  Was expecting it to be good because Hilton's usually are.  However, I was more than a little impressed with the staff and the rooms.  The staff was exceptionally professional and attentive.  Customer service is a dying practice but not at this hotel.  Good value for an excellent stay.
Manager Response: We do thank you for your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to having you with us in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Hotel Pushed Aggressively to have me submit this
Summary: Hotel Pushed Aggressively to have me submit this, several texts, embeded in post stay survey.  Negative impact on an otherwise nice stay for a professional meeting. Good food, hotel itself a touch tired like many Hilton properties
Manager Response: We do thank you for your feedback and we do apologize for the inconvenience. We do hope that you provide us with another opportunity to provide with exceptional service that you deserve.

Summary Heading: Handicap Room not Acceptable for FULL PRICE
Summary: Terrible room. Shower, lights etc. not intended for adult. I will not stay with HILTON again. As an honors member, booking a deluxe room, I expected some sort of decent accommodation.  Totally unacceptable.  My RV has a better shower.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay. You were in our deluxe king bed that is handicapped accessible. We do have other room types we can move you to upon availability and we hope that you provide us another opportunity to provide you with exceptional service that you deserve. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have you in the future.

Summary Heading: Very nice place to stay and conveniently located.
Summary: I was in town for business and flew into John Wayne.  This hotel is directly across the street from the airport.  There is also a service station almost next door which was convenient to fill up rental before returning.  I had dinner and breakfast in the restaurant and both meals were very good.  You do unfortunately hear airplanes coming and going at times, but other than that the hotel was quiet.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again in the future. Again thank you for your feedback and have a great day.

Summary: This hotel is very understaffed which affects the service.  It is fine if you can self-park without a lot of luggage.  But, if you need bell assistance, you will wait a long time.  And, don't try to eat in the restaurant unless you have over and hour.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay. We do all we can to make sure our guest receive an exception experience while here so we do hope you allow us another opportunity to provide the exemplary service that you deserve. Once more thank you for your feedback and we hope to have you in the future.

Summary: Really need an update at this hotel badly.  Rooms are old and tired. AC/Heat is ancient and hard to get a constant temperature and it's loud!  The TV's have preset max volume's set so when the AC is running you can't make the TV loud enough to hear. Pool area is also old and tired.  Breakfast buffet was average at best - quality of food was comparable to Embassy Suites without the omelette bar but at a cost of $20! Not worth it at all. Service was spotty. Would not stay here again - this is not a nice Hilton property.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. We have reached out to the proper departments regarding this issue and hope that you allow us another opportunity to provide you the exemplary service that you deserve as a guest in our hotel. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have you again in the future.

Summary Heading: A gem of a hotel in Irvine!
Summary: The Irvine Hilton is a beautifully appointed hotel with a friendly and helpful staff.  The breakfast options are convenient and delicious.  Our family had a blast relaxing by the pool.  We enjoyed our stay and will be sure to return in the future.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to take advantages of some of our amenities while here. We hope to have yo again the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Nice hotel. Duck was amusing. Good landscaping. Shuttle was good. Good food with nice selection. Drinks and food were very expensive and the hotel rates are high. Very good pool and workout area. Very convenient to airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and were paid a visit from one of our guest in the pool. We hope to have you in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: excellent place only is necessary some refrigeration in the room for water o something more...and more information when guess is thee first time special in the area...like night club etc 91 characters (200 minimum)
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and we are very glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: Worst hotel experience ever the least enjoyable part of my business trip. Snotty front desk agents with dismissive attitude who literally had no idea what they were doing or talking about. Zero care from all staff from the guest service representatives to the valets. Not to mention there is no fridge or microwave in standard rooms. Misleading website descriptions on top of it all. The only good part came out of this was the housekeeping service and toiletries offered.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and deeply apologize for the inconveniences that you endured while you were here. We assure you that level of service is not the norm what so ever and we ask that you allow us another opportunity to provide the exemplary service that you deserve while here. Again we thank you for your feedback and we hope to have you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Stay if your like strong cologne
Summary: From the moment I entered the lobby, I was inundated with a strong, unpleasant cologne scent. It was better in the room... but not enough to stay here again. Migraine prone individuals beware, this will not be a quick fix.
Manager Response: We do apologize for the inconvenience and we are addressing the issue currently. We do appreciate your feedback and hope you allow us another opportunity to have you with us.

Summary: Fish tacos were expensive - 2 for $14. But they were overfilled with mahi mahi (grilled) and the salsa was freshly made and flavorful. I would eat there again before a flight instead of a $14 hot dog in airport (yes, that expensive!).   Sergio the bartender was friendly and made sure I was out in time to catch my flight.     - 1 star because the scent in the lobby was so perfumed it was noxious.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your time with us and hope to have you again in the future. We have addressed the proper departments about your concern. Once again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have you again soon.

Summary: Checked into what we thought was a full service Hilton. We were surprised when we were told the bar was closed at 4pm, no room service or restaurant available during our stay. Went out to an open covered area to let the kids run around to only find a stash of used hypodermic needles. When staff was advised, they seem uninterested and we were to.d it was a common area to avoid. The rooms were dated and worn. Sliding glass doors would not close and heavy outside noise with a draft. Hotel in need of overhaul! Reported some concerns to staff and again didn’t really seem to care. Crossed this one off as a no go. We are frequent Hilton hotel guests.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and we deeply regret to hear this happened while you were here. We are addressing with all of our staff and hope you allow us another opportunity to provide you with the exceptional service that you deserve will being here at our establishment. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have you in the future.

Summary: Great hotel! Bar and food were wonderful. Bartenders were friendly. $30 overnight parking is a bit much. Overall I give it 4 stars. Gas station near is always nice for a early morning start. I would stay again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with and we look forward to having you in the future.

Summary: I am so impressed with the quality of the hotel right across the street from Orange County Airport. The team was efficient, friendly, and kind. The restaurant, Aura, has excellent food, and the ambiance is pretty fun when there are events in the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much fro your feedback. We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to have you again in the future. Again thank you for your feedback and have a great day.

Summary Heading: We had an early morning flight, and it is convenient to SNA
Summary: Room was OK.  Employees were competent.  We had a light lunch like dinner - the restaurant is connected to the bar in the main lobby.  Prices were OK and the service was very good.  Not a relaxing meal just because of the hard floors with no wall between the restaurant and the bar area.  They have an "executive floor", but no lounge or separate business center.  Rooms were clean but spartan.  If you don't know John Wayne Airport no flights leave before 7 a.m., but airlines frequently load and back up by 6:30.  The first shuttle is 5:00 a.m. and because of how John Wayne operates the shuttle was rather over loaded, but it is a short ride and the driver was very nice. As an airport hotel it is utilitarian.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and are pleased to hear the areas that you enjoyed our property, as for the others we do apologize and will have these looked into. Once more thank you for your feedback and we do hope to have you in the future.

Summary: We had a King size bed with view.  The room was very basic, but clean.  The view of Irvine was lovely!  The hotel is right across the street from JW Airport.  Several close restaurants and 405 Freeway.  The parking was a couple dollars cheaper than Valet...if it is packed, go Valet.  CONS: Totally Old School hotel in that there is NO mini fridge, NO hit movies (only Directv HBO/Cinemax), and, the WORST, Directv signal, ever!  TV was totally old school from the days of antennae.  If you want expensive basic, this place is for you.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and regret to hear that your did not enjoy the television option that we have. We are thrilled to hear that you did enjoy our other amenities and will have this looked into right away.

Summary: Solid hotel in a good location.  Clean, friendly staff, good restaurants nearby.  The rooms could use a little touch-up, but were clean and comfortable.  The only complaint was that the heater/AC was on the noisy side.  Nice selection in the pantry next to the lobby desk.  Breakfast was very good.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and got a chance to enjoy some of our amenities as well. We look forward to having you in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Loved this hotel. Flew from Vancouver BC to run the Surf City Half in Huntington Beach. Far more affordable than the rooms in the HB area and the rooms were great for the money.   The hotel is a little dated, but it's clean and tidy.  Would certainly stay there again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your next stay with us. Have a great day!

Summary: As always the Hilton delivered in room cleanliness, location and adequate amenities such as bar, dining, pool, and fitness area. Parking fees were double of what they were next door at another hotel. Parking fees should be re-evaluated.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We shall pass on your suggestions to the proper departs for review as well. We hope you have a great day and hope to have you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Bad experience with room but nice staff
Summary: Website did not mention that hotel charges guests $28/day to park and that fitness center was under construction. No fridge or microwave in the room. Room service and snack bar prices were really high.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and we shall look into this with the given departments. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have you again in the future.

Summary: We stay here or the Doubletree Club when we come to Irvine.  This hotel is conveniently located and has valet parking.  Excellent service. The buffet breakfast was just OK. Some rooms have a view of the airport which may be fun.  Overall satisfactory.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you decide us for your stay when in the area. We hope to have you with us again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: The Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport is a very nice and clean hotel.  The staff was very helpful and friendly.  My room was nice and clean - no issues.  Great location - right across form the John Wayne airport.  I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to have you again in the future. We hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: One of the better airport hotels I have visited.  Large, clean comfortable rooms.
Summary: Across the street from the Santa Ana/John Wayne airport this hotel is super convenient for late arrivals or early departures.  Clean and comfortable rooms as well as a nice list of amenities (WiFi, TV, dining nearby) make it a good choice.  Parking is gated and not free, but is easy in and out.  Staff was very helpful and attentive.  App check in, digit key, and text message communication make it more tech friendly than many.  Recommend.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your next visit. We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope you have a great day,

Summary Heading: Best choice nearest airport - excellent location
Summary: Stayed here during business gathering with company. Rooms were comfortable, clean, fresh.  I love the open Lobby concept that leads you right in to dining area.  Meeting spaces were spacious with efficient locations near lobby. Business center is in lobby, no need to mess with guest room key.  Printer and equipment worked perfectly.  The Front Desk agent offered assistance with a special project i needed to finish- extremely grateful  as he went above and beyond the call of duty.  Will return! I don't believe there was an option for free parking but there is self parking available with fee; although, Valet was reliable and quick!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you again the future. Again that you for your feedback and have a great day.

Summary: Beautiful Property in a great location.  The Staff are friendly and all professional.  Across the street ( Walking Distance )from the John Wayne Airport.  Easy access to the 405 Freeway.  Close to shopping the coastal cities and UC Irvine.   Comfortable roomy rooms.  No small refrigerators.  Beautiful swimming pool and warm spa. Parking your vehicle will cost you $28.00 for overnight stay.  My only negative about this property.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: The stay was great, the hotel was beyond expectations and the restaurant and bar staff were great! Dora from the front desk was super nice and helpful!  We had a little trouble with our room keys not working and the digital key not working properly and she made it right! My youngest left her favorite little doggy toy by the pool and Dora was able to track it down and hang on to it for us, I can't thank her enough, it would have ruined the entire trip if she hadn't been so helpful! Definitely going to be our hotel of choice going forward when we visit family in the area! Already had our cousins book a stay there for early February, beautiful hotel!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that Dora made your stay worth remembering and we are so glad to have you back again in the future. We hope you have a Happy New Year and look forward to your upcoming stay.

Summary Heading: Thoughts on Hilton, John Wayne Airport in Orange County, CA.
Summary: Hotel room was comfortable and clean.  Staff was very friendly.  On-Premises parking fee does not seem competitive, does not contribute to overall value and is somewhat of a detractor.  The open bar and restaurant area was inviting and was a good change in scenery for Sunday Lunch and work.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and we are glad that you selected us as your choice hotel while in Irvine. We hope to have you again in the future and wish you a Happy New Year.

Summary: It is a pretty old hotel and you can tell the minute you step a foot inside.  the noise from John Wayne's airport is very loud- No double pane windows.  This hotel needs renovation.  Not a very good value compared to other hotels in the area.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and hope you allow us another opportunity to be your choice hotel when in the area. We hope you have a Happy New Year.

Summary: Good for a one or two night (MAX) stay. But not good for a long term stay since it is next to the airport the noise for me, just was no good. However, everyone there was super kind. Valet was not able to accommodate us but they were still very kind and applogetic. Loved the pool and jacuzzi too. Very clean when we went for a swim.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to have you again in the future. We hope you have a Happy New Year.

Summary: The property was clean. My most recent stay was 18-21 Dec., and I was told that room service was not available due to the holiday season. Staff members were polite and courteous; however, I feel as if patrons should be told in advance if room service would not be available during their stay. This service is quite important to the business traveler that returns to the hotel after a 12-13 hr day.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and value your service as a guest. We do apologize for not being informed sooner about the holiday hours of our food and beverage area. We do look forward to having you in the future and hope that you provide us another opportunity to provide you with exceptional service. Happy Holidays to you and yours.

Summary: Love the Staff at this hotel.  Bar and Restaurant staff are fantastic.  Highly recommend this hotel because of the staff.  Food quality is good.  Rooms are clean and well kept.  The staff at this hotel exceed all expectations.  Highly recommended!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to have you again in the future. Happy Holidays to you and yours.

Summary: Accommodating,clean,comfortable hotel with good service. Nice pool, good breakfast! Would stay again. King bedrooms most comfortable. Close to airport & some good restaurants in area of Irvine, & Costa Mesa.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you in the future and hope you have a Happy Holidays.

Summary: This is a nice hotel - lobby, grounds, room - etc.   It is a dated in the room though - and other areas of the hotel - needs a remodel badly.    The ROOM service is too late in the morning to begin - the room was clean and nice for the most part - comfy bed and pillows -
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your feedback about the room condition. We are looking into this and hope to have you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: Great location across the street from SNA airport.  Staff were terrific from shuttle driver, front desk, room service and restaurant.  Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because my bed was a bit uncomfortable.  Bedding and pillows were good.  Comfort of the bed was adequate.  Mattress felt tired and a bit old.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate your feedback. We will take a look into the bedding as stated. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope you have a Happy Holidays.

Summary: Wonderful stay, room was extremely clean, staff was helpful, Hotel shuttle was timely and very accommodating. A late night candy bar was a little pricey, but my overall experience they definitely earned their Stars.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with and look forward to having you in the future. Happy Holidays

Summary: Parking was not complimentary and cost $28/day. I had a perishable item. The room did not include a refrigerator. I was told I would have to rent one for an extra $10. I consider these extra costs poor value for a Hilton hotel.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and are displeased to hear you did not enjoy your stay. Due to being an airport hotel we do have a charge for parking. We do hope that you provide us with another opportunity to provide you with exceptional service.

Summary: Hotel is nice and location is great, you do hear lots of airplanes as it is right across the street from the airport. Our garbage was not emptied the 3 days we were there and the maids only cleaned once while we were there after I tipped one and then didn't leave clean towels. We traveled with our dogs and paid the extra fees but were not greeted with bones and hotel didn't have doggie pick-up bags available for our walks. It is a nice hotel but I think they cater to guests who stay the night and fly out rather than those actually on vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We do apologize for the inconveniences that you endured while here. We do hope that you allow us to provide exemplary guest service to yourself and your family during your next visit. Again we do thank you for your feedback and hope that you have a Happy Holidays.

Summary: What a great place at the end of a long day!! Location for airport could not have been better. Check in was a breeze, bar was great, family enjoyed the pool and hot tub. Everyone was warm and welcoming. Will stay there again for sue.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your next visit with us and wish you and your family a Happy Holidays.

Summary: Don't be discouraged by the outside of the hotel.  inside is beautiful,. super clean. rooms lovely and super clean. Staff if amazing attend to all of your needs. Food is Great.Staff went above and beyond to make sure my stay way pleasant.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to you joining us again in the future. Have a great day and Happy Holidays to you.

Summary: Great visit with a great staff. Everything from room service to the conference area was great. The staff went above and beyond to assist with our needs and everything was within a 15 minute drive from the hotel.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to have you again in the future. Happy Holidays from all of us here.

Summary: I stayed at this Hilton for a conference.  I am from Wisconsin, and the weather was perfect.  I sat out in the courtyard one warm night, poolside, surrounded by palm trees.  Everything was great.  I ate a meal in the hotel.  I did take the complimentary shuttle to the hotel but walked to the airport when I had to leave.  It is right across the street, and there were crosswalks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us while in California. We hope to have you again in the future and Happy Holidays from all of us.

Summary Heading: Too much noise from the airport.  No parking near the hotel doors.
Summary: No parking near the hotel doors.  Hotel guests share the parking with airport parking.  There is no accommodation or priority parking for guests staying at the hotel.  The patio door did not have glass thick enough to eliminate the noise from the airport.  Walking at night was not pleasant due to the poor air quality from the airport.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback but regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay. We do apologize that you experienced that with parking. We do our best to accommodate all of our guest with vehicles and assure every option is looked into. We hope to have you in the future and again apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel twice. It's proximity to the airport and the 405 is excellent (across the street), and noise is not a concern. Orange County airport suspends flights overnight. The breakfast staff is very friendly and accommodating. They have a wide variety of choices. This hotel is an older property, but all rooms are very nice and clean with windows that open. There are no suites available, nor an executive lounge, but there is a nice bar in the lobby and there is a pool. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Overall good hotel, some minor issues.
Summary: First of all, it is a Hilton. So it has the quality associated with that brand. The bed was extremely comfortable!! It resulted in a very restful night of sleep.  Here are the issues that I did encounter:  -The balconies are an excellent idea. But they are very narrow. I would say the balcony is perhaps ten inches wide; ten inches away from the door.   -it is not clear how to lock the sliding glass door  -there is a sticker on the door indicating that it only opens four inches, but it opens all the way. I feel that if there is to be a balcony, it should be constructed such that one can safely walk out and stand on it.  -the rooms are smaller than some other Hiltons, notably the Hilton at LAX. The upgraded room where I stayed -- on the the 10th floor -- was large, but lacked the
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We also thank you for your suggestions and we shall do our best to look into this for future guest. We look forward to having you in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: This team truly cares about thier guests and go above the call of duty to make guests feel welcome!
Summary: My wife and I needed a hotel for about a week after being displaced by a flood. Paul, William, Dora and the whole crew made it feel like home for those stressful days. The operations director Dena treated us like family and truly cared about our situation. We weren't the easiest guests to accommodate but this Hilton hotel really impressed us. Today it is rare to find people who are so good at what they do and this team seems to really enjoy making guests like my wife and I feel welcome. We would give them 6 stars if we could!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to assist you and your family during your time with us. We look forward to having you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Great Hilton property directly across the street from John Wayne Airport.  The front desk staff was very accomodating and the bartenders were super friendly and helpful.  The rooms are upgraded and the bathrooms are very clean.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that all of our staff allowed you to make your stay enjoyable as well. We look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: We are members of Hilton Honors and have stayed at numerous Hilton's across the US. With all of the hotels considered, my wife and I have never run into problems at this caliber with any Hilton. The reason for the rating is the staff. I hold customer service to the utmost importance when it comes to the hotel industry. Majority of the staff failed to listen to the issues we were having and made assumptions as to why were are even talking to them. We found out through other customers that it was due to the fact that we were not "business class." Nothing was resolved other than getting a headache and souring the end of our trip.   I plan to call corporate and let them know the specifics of our issues with this particular Hilton.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us. We assure you that we do not classify our guest in anyway. We wish to show all of our guest exemplary service that each person that comes through our doors deserves. We hope you allow us the opportunity to make it right for you with your next stay. We hope to see you in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: The hotel itself was very good, it was well kept and clean. The pool was quite nice in the heat. However we did have a number of issues with the staff and their very low standard of customer service which made the level of convenience expected from a Hilton hotel very hard to find. Offset that with the price of the stay and we left with a bit of a sour taste in our mouths. Had the staff been more concerned with doing their jobs to the fullest and brought a smile to work instead of an attitude our stay would have been vastly improved
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you had while here and hope that you allow us another opportunity to provide you with exceptional service. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you in the future.

Summary: Very clean hotel.  Great locations across the street from the airport.  Rooms looked updated.  Staff was very nice during the check in process.  You can hear the planes fly over head during the day.  Very quite at night.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: Hotel front desk staff were fantastic!  Paul was my go to guy, just because he was there all the time and always with a smile.  Room was clean, bed just right, noise level from hallway was not bad.  Servers was the only negative with this stay.  They treated us like we were bothering them.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We assure you that you are not a bother and apologize that you felt that way. We look forward to your next stay and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Thank you for hosting my church's 25th women's conference.  It was a great experience.  Lots of unique food options within walking distance. Great food in the hotel as well. Your staff was very warm and helpful. Much appreciated!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for allowing to host your event. We look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: I will be coming back and or staying at other Hilton Hotels!! The service is amazing, leisure or business. Everyone is so kind and very helpful. Food is good and environment is nice. I like that it’s close to the airport and not much of a drive to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to having you in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: This is a convenient hotel. Airport is across the street with a free shuttle. The rooms are average in condition and cleanliness. They aren't the best. Expect some stains and such. The parking is limited for the size of the hotel, you may not find a spot, so it's best to stay here if you do not have a car. The lobby bar is convenient as well as the lobby restaurant however it's very loud and not good for a meeting spot. They have a grilled artichoke appetizer that is the best I've had. Front desk evening staff is very experienced and accommodating, the morning staff I found to not be very polished in thier service levels, so I recommend bringing any requests to the second or third shift staff.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. However, we do wish to be informed if you run into any issues such as stains because that is not a norm at our location and we do apologize if you endured this. We also encourage to please come to any of our staff with any questions or concerns you have as everyone is well trained to assist you with any and all needs. We do look forward to having you in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: This hotel is conveniently located across the street from John Wayne airport. Shuttles running all day.. courteous staff.. Clean well equipped rooms .. Highly Recommended.  Bar on site outdoor pool is well maintained. Breakfast is efficient and well placed.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to have you again in the near future.

Summary: Was at Hilton for business but arrived early.  Enjoyed the pool, hot tub.  Rooms and bar service were excellent!  Meeting space was also very nice.  Shuttle was also very convenient both ways.  No problems whatsoever.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: When I got to my room, there was a giant roach in the bathroom.  Came back to the desk and was told someone would be up shortly to clean the room.  Was offered a drink coupon while I waited which was nice.  Had a drink and went back up to my room 20 minutes later, only to find the person responsible for finding the roach was just getting there.  We looked together and could not find it.  I stayed fro another 10 minutes and could not feel comfortable with a roach in the room somewhere.  Went to the desk and was made to feel like I was just bothering the front desk person.  He finally offered another room, after I asked and he scoffed.  Nothing additional was done to satisfy me as a hilton honors member, and I left feeling like I had inconvenienced him.  I got my own bags out of
Manager Response: We do apologize for the inconvenience you had to insure while here and we wish to do all we can in order to make sure your next visit exceeds all expectations. We wish nothing but a speedy recovery for your loved one as well.

Summary: Had a great time. Everything was taken care of perfectly. Staff was most helpful. Crystal, banquet coordinator did a fabulous job. Room coordination worked out well and everyone was very pleased.  Hope to return again for another reunion.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and our amazing Sales team did a great job. We look forward to having you again in the near future.

Summary: Solo business trip over my wedding anniversary. My husband called the hotel and they arranged (at no charge) to have some fruit and chocolate covered strawberries sent to the room. Limited lunch/dinner menu selection but the food quality was excellent.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was able to make your stay memorable as well. We look forward to having you in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: This was my second stay in the last four months. Staff is super nice and helpful. Check-in /out was very easy. Free shuttle to the airport is very nice too. Quite a few really good places near by to eat. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you choose us as your choice hotel when in the area and hope to have you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Extraordinary Staff makes it a Hilton
Summary: This is a long term favorite for my wife and I as we like to end our stay in Orange County with our 2 daughters and 5 grandsons at this hotel. It can't get any closer to John Wayne Airport, and the shuttle service in the morning starts early enough for the first flight out in the morning. John Wayne / Orange County shuts down around 11:00 pm so no noise after that, and 1st flight is not until after 6:00am. Bar is large and the scene is good down stairs and the various folks around the place is amazing. The morning breakfast bar or off the menu is as expected for a Hilton and is always hot, and the services is normally very attentive. This last stay was exceptional due to the fact that staff lead at the Front Desk CHARLES, made every effort to correct our tardiness for the
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you and your family continue to choose our property when in the area and we look forward to continue to provide yourself and your family with the highest level of guest service. We hope you have a great day.

Summary: Excellent hotel!  Heather, at the front desk, and Luis, in the bar, really stood out as exceptional employees.  The rooms are clean and updated.  Overall a great experience and we would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that to hear that enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: A perfect hotel for a convention, great accommodations, a large room, a smaller room and a banquet room convieniently located. Close together.  Hotel rooms, minutes away, complementary coffee in am near the elevators and a reasonable priced snack area near.by. Wonderful staff!
Manager Response: We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us during your time in the Irvine area and hope that you decide to visit us again in the future if you are in the area.

Summary: This is my 2nd time here on business. Great staff and the rooms are very clean. They are small with no separate room for just sitting around but that is fine. Check in was easy and plenty of parking. The gym is open 24 hours a day and is kept clean.
Manager Response: We are very glad to hear that you have chosen us for your second time and are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: This is my 2nd time staying at this Hilton. Very clean, staff is great and lots of parking. Close to everything. Price was also very good. My worse complaint is the front lobby couch which is not very comfortable. Pretty tiny complaint.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and are thrilled to have you back once more while you were in Irvine. We look forward to your next visit and hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Drop off your rental car a day earlier
Summary: Besides relatively high room rates (>200) you pay for parking ($28 per day self park but you wont find a spot late at night so splurge $3 more for valet) (parking rates are disclosed in advance, so adjust your car rental accordingly). Breakfast buffet is good. The wine at checkin is nice but a plastic cup gives it a cheap feel which you would not expect given the average daily rates here. Noise insulation could be better so close to airport. Property is kept up well but room is showing it's time for a refresh. 'Balcony ' door only opens 4"
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and pleased to hear that enjoyed a few of our amenities provided. We will definitely be looking into the other items you listed. Again we do thank you for your feedback and hope to have you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Our Lady of Advocates Conference (Fatima Center)
Summary: Over-all a very good Hotel, with minor problems? Outrageous charges for parking and breakfast. Parking should be "FREE" for all guests! The bathtub was clogged with hair and didn't drain, at all. Very strong odor of Marijuana in the hallway (7th floor). All issues reported to the front desk.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are in the process of looking into the matters you addressed. We do have a few options for the breakfast such as the buffet, continental, or al a carte as well. We do hope to have you again in the future in order to provide you with exceptional guest service. We hope you have a great day.

Summary: We selected this place as a team and we were very happy to stay here as we felt at home. Good service good food and great back yard by the pool. I would recommend this place to families, friends and my fellow piers. The location was very convenient close to main road and freeway. Room was cozy and clean very comfortable.
Manager Response: We are very glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and greatly appreciate your feedback. We hope to have you in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Our stay was very short (just one night) because we just wanted to stay near the airport for a morning flight. Everything was to our liking - especially the free glass of wine we were offered when we arrived.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your short stay with us and look forward to having you again in the future. Thank you for your review and have a great day.

Summary: I was happy with my stay at this Hilton. We just stayed one quick night while passing through. The hotel was clean, checkin was quick, breakfast was good, etc... parking isn't free which is true with most hiltons but there are free parking hotels in the area. Overall I would stay again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you in the future. Thank you for your feedback and have a great day.

Summary: I had the opportunity to stay one night and the location was perfect. I gave the valet my bags and went to return my rental car. It was so close, I chose to walk back to the hotel. My bags arrived at my room within 10 minutes of checking in. I was disappointed in the quality of concierge room food options in the evening of my arrival and left early and didn't experience their morning selections. The airport shuttle was so convenient.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you in the future. We would love for you to enjoy our updated menu of items that we have as well, again thank you for your feedback and have a great day.

Summary Heading: Hilton Irvine, CA recent business stay August 14, 2017
Summary: Enjoyed my stay and no problems encountered. Staff was friendly, rooms clean, bed comfortable, and breakfast selections were fresh. Close to John Wayne Airport and has shuttle. Pool area was very nice and clean we well and plenty of meeting rooms available for rent.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: We stayed for 5 days and other than the convenient location to John Wayne Airport we would not stay there again...ever. The valet staff was rude, front desk staff seemed indifferent to our being there, and the bed was uncomfortable. Found it difficult to adjust the the heating the cooling and keep the room at a comfortable level. The hallway and elevators were hot and smelled moldy. The room was clean, the restaurant staff for breakfast was very good, prompt, and nice. The breakfast was good. I'm glad we had Hilton Gold so we could get breakfast vouchers since it was expensive.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay. We will definitely reach out to the departments you listed and assure that your next stay with us is nothing short of exceptional. Again we greatly appreciate your feedback and hope to have you again in the future.

Summary: I had a conference at a local Marriott. Being a loyal Hilton customer I decided to stay here instead.  I ended up being very disappointed and probably won't do that again. I spent $20 a day in Uber back and forth and didn't have a great stay. Here is a breakdown:  Pros: -Nice pool and hot tub -Free airport shuttle -AC worked very well  Cons: -Wifi was excruciatingly slow -While I received free breakfast for being a Gold member, it normally costs $19 for a very sad buffet.  It was the same quality as a free Hampton Inn breakfast.  Do not pay for this breakfast.  -No refrigerator. -Bathroom is poorly designed.  I am relatively short and my head was only a few inches from shower head.  Not sure how somebody 6 feet tall would shower.  -TV cable service was so outdated.  Scrolling
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us. In an effort to make sure all of our guest enjoy their stay we will definitely look into all areas addressed to insure guest satisfaction. We hope that you allow us another opportunity to provide you with exceptional guest service. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you in the future.

Summary: This review is not particularly for this hotel, but Hilton in general.  Originally, my reservation was for the Hilton Garden Inn, yet after being refused my stay there, I was downgraded to this hotel.  The customer service was much better, yet the carpets are filthy!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and we do apologize for the condition of the carpet and look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: I was only in-house for 8 hours, so my overnight stay was more than I expected for rest, convenience, personal service and such an extension of grace by Matt, Heather and William at front desk.  Quality bath amenities [Peter Roth Thomas] Yay!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your short time with us. We hope to have you again for a longer stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff, & weak wifi
Summary: Great location, if you wanted you can walk to the airport SNA-John Wayne/Orange County or hotel provides a shuttle.  All Employees especially at check in/out were friendly & helpful. Friday night hotel entertainment was great including food for purchase outside.  Only concern was the weak Wi-Fi and some people mentioned weak or no cell phone service. No problems with Verizon! This hotel was located central to all, including the beautiful beach! I would stay again.
Manager Response: We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you again in the future. Once again thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We booked two rooms and it turns out the only thing they offer for free is the cup of wine they give you when you check in.  Have to pay for parking, have to pay for wifi, no mini fridge in the rooms, no microwaves and breakfast is not free.   For the price I'm paying I'd expect all of the accommodations to be free. I've stayed at other hotels that were lower in price and offered everything for free.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and do apologize that you did not enjoy your stay. In an effort to provide exceptional service we urge you to enroll into our Hilton Honors rewards program in order to receive complimentary wifi at all of our Hilton properties. We also have packages that could save you money when booking such as bed and breakfast package that would offer you complimentary breakfast with your stay. We do hope that we have you again in the future and please reach out to us for further information if needed. We hope you have a great day.

Summary: Overall I liked this hotel.  The property is very nice.  They have an expansive area outside with nice seating, a great pool and an average bar/restaurant.  Do not pay extra for an Executive Floor.  There are no executive floor privileges like a lounge, etc.  Even with that problem, this is a nice hotel with a great pool.  The rooms were very clean, most of the time parking was not a problem.  One afternoon we were directed to off-site parking because the lot was full.  Our room on the 2nd floor was very small, half bathroom and half room and had a refrigerator.  This room may work for some.  I did go into a larger room on the 5th floor, but there was no refrigerator.  I would stay at the hotel again, but I would not pay to stay on the non-existent Executive Floor.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: Totally dissatisfied with the entire trip.  Food and internet service was terrible for a hotel chain of this caliber.  Being a member of the Hilton Honors loyalty program for many years did not get ANY upgrades for me or my wife.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us. We definitely hope that you can have you again in the future in order to make right the service that you did not receive while here on your previous stay. We wish to provide nothing but exceptional service that you deserve. Again we do apologize an hope to have you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: Super Convenient to Airport - Very nice Stay
Summary: We needed a hotel convenient to Airport and also nice. This hotel fit to a Tee. Right across the street - literally walking distance to the terminal and has a great Lounge and Pool area. Very clean nice rooms, Staff friendly. Comfortable. I would definitely stay here again given the same situation.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your next visit. We hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: It may not be a luxury hotel, it is perfect as a mid range for business travelers
Summary: Hilton never fails for any overnight stay in anywhere after a long day of work.  It is an excellent choice for business travelers.    The Hilton Irvine is no exception.   This Hotel appears to be a bit older, but it is extremely well kept.  Bed is comfortable, not too firm but it has sufficient support that i did not get up with a backache.  The bathroom is small, but it is well maintained and super clean.  The coffee machine is new which works well.  The wifi is fast.    The best part i like is the coffee in front of the escalator in the lobby; one can conveniently help oneself with the readily made beverage without the need of making any coffee in the room.  To me, most importantly, McDonald's is right around the corner (about a mile away), i could grab a fast bite after a
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to have you in the future. On your next visit please feel free to visit our restaurant to have breakfast so you don't have to stop at local restaurants outside of the property and you can start your day off right all in one place. Again thank you for your feedback and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Nice hotel located close to the airport.  Very good for a good price in the area.  We were there for water polo tournament so we needed a reasonably priced location close to the pools.  The hotel provided a free breakfast to the teams as well as the parents which was a nice bonus.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay while in town for the Water Polo Tournament. We wish all the best to those in your family competing and hope to have you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Ok hotel, could be much better
Summary: This is one of those properties that really should have a higher rating, if they would just invest a bit into it. It isn't a bad place to stay and the price is right, but there are just so many little things that keep it from being a four or five star location. One big drawback is the paid parking, $28/day is fairly steep.  The hotel itself is unremarkable. It has a nice enough lobby, but with massive pillars in the line area for registration that makes it seem claustrophobic. The staff uniforms are really plain, to the point that our first thought was: "why is housekeeping staffing the front desk?" The staff themselves are inconsistent - we had some interactions that were wonderful and some that made me wonder why someone with that attitude would be working in a hospitality
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and regret to hear that you were not satisfied with certain areas of our establishment. We are aware of the internet and are currently undergoing an update to resolve this issue. We appreciate your feedback and hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Hilton Irvine - Terrible WiFi and Rude Staff
Summary: Came into the Hilton Irvine for a work conference. This hotel's WiFi is horrible. The front desk staff on check in was also super rude and gave me push back on checking for my companies corp rate. Unreal...! Also, their customer service is no service...ie., didn't even offer me a water.
Manager Response: We truly apologize that you did not experience the type of service that you deserve while with us. We will reach out to our staff immediately and we are in the process of updating our wifi connectivity and hope to have you in the future in order to make it right. We hope you have a great day.

Summary: Fantastic service. Excellent rooms -- comfortable, spacious and spotless. Very well priced. I can't write that much. 200 characters! Who has that much to say? I will try to think of more things to write. Did it!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and the time it took to write it. He look forward to having you again in the future and hope you have an amazing day.

Summary Heading: Great Hilton property right across from John Wayne Airport
Summary: This hotel was excellent from the moment of check in!  They actually offered me a glass of wine before I even finished checking in to the hotel.  It has a very airy feel about it. The rooms are very well appointed and comfy.  The bar/restaurant area has an open feel to it and the outside patio is quite spacious with a nice size pool.  So far, I have enjoyed every aspect of it.  Someone before me did leave something behind, but I don't know if housekeeping would have seen something black on a black chair seat unless they wiped it down,  so I wont make an issue of that.  Also, they do have a free shuttle from the airport to hotel and back, but one could actually walk to the airport if need be.
Manager Response: We are extremely pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: 5 stars for Hilton! Left my Apple AirPod earphones in my room. Thank you honest housekeeping for finding them and turning them in to lost and found. Being shipped to me today! Rodrigo in housekeeping and Corrie in customer service are top notch! Thank you!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that your items were found and returned to you. We look forward to having you in the future.

Summary Heading: Visiting for Water Polo Junior Olympics
Summary: Excellent stay of 4 nights for our family as our boys competed in the Junior Olympics - Water Polo. Family friendly, clean, lovely pool and customer service. Booked room as part of a block reservation, which helped our budget. Breakfast was early enough that we could eat most mornings before heading to the pools. Within walking distance to restaurants.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us and wish all the luck to your sons in the Junior Olympics. We hope to have you and your family with us in the future.

Summary: Nothing about this hotel lived up to what was expected.  Average rooms, tiny bathrooms.  Hotels needs major facelift.  Restaurant food was very disappointing, except for the swordfish sandwich.  Staff interactions were inconsistent - some were good, some were poor.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay and hope to have you in the future in order to provide you with the exemplary guest service that you deserve while with us. Again we do apologize and hope to have you in the future.

Summary: Start to finish. Other than my stay being accompanied by a water polo tournament..hotel stay was by far one of best and the number 1 for customer service. They even call and check on you during the stay. 1st ever.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to have you again in the future.

Summary: It is walking distance from SNA airport and has spacious room. They have airport shuttle. The rooms are quite even though it is close to the airport.  Breakfast is free for only elite status with Hilton.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: This is one of the Hilton hotels we use in Irvine the other being the Doubletree Club.  This hotel has valet/parking and has overall nice rooms with a view.  Convenient location for almost anywhere in Irvine as well as the airport right across the street. Has decent breakfast (bacon, sausage, eggs, fruits, cereal, etc).  Rooms are usually very clean, but our last stay must have been an off day as some floor areas could have used more mopping. There is a bar/restaurant but we usually go to Gulliver's which is about four blocks away (everybody drives in Irvine except on UC campus).
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you decide us when in the area and greatly appreciate your loyalty to our location. We do apologize for the mopping and will definitely look into this right away. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Stayed only one night thank god !  Room was tired, A/C noisy and didn't work very well. Poor Room Soundproofing. Lunch took forever as it was 1 barman. Left some clothes behind and called as soon as we realized but no response even after calling 3 days in a row. No Honours benefits of any kind. Disinterested staff.
Manager Response: We are terribly sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your stay. We hope to have you in the future in order to provide nothing but the exceptional service that you deserve.

Summary: Very convenient as it was across from John Wayne, which closes at 10 pm and reopens at 6 pm so no problem with any airport noise. Very close to the freeway - so quick access to anywhere in OC.  Breakfast was not included in the room cost; and was your standard travel fare. But, the wait staff was quick and friendly. I was in Room 705 which is away from elevator. No view, but good shower water pressure. Nice room. Bed was very comfortable. As I like white noise while sleeping, i appreciated that the a/c had a feature to keep fan always on rather than turning off/on - very peaceful.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you in the future.

Summary: Conveniently located near the OC airport. Free shuttle service available. Rooms are as expected for a property of this type. There is a charge for self parking. Valet parking also available. Very limited room service/restaurant menu. There were insufficient tables for breakfast. Many tables that were available lacked place settings, salt/pepper, sugar, etc. Service was very poor at breakfast my first day there; better on the following day. I expect better from Hilton.
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback as it will help us improve on the areas mentioned. We do hope to have you again in the future and are glad to hear that we were able to resolve the issue throughout your stay. Again we hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Close to airport and convenient to Orange County. Use of hotel shuttle was a plus. Near high-end malls and restaurants. Newport Beach is not far by cab. Rooms were comfortable and clean. Great for layover flight.
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you in the future to enjoy the other local attractions in the area. Have a great day.

Summary: We selected this hotel because of their pet policy.  My sister was with us and brought her Westie.  I am a HHonors member and try to stay in Hilton properties when possible.  The room at this hotel was a bit small.  Maybe it was because I needed an accessible room.  There is no built-in closet, instead there was a narrow stand-alone cupboard, not a lot of room.  It was, however, well equipped as an accessible room. The parking can be a problem, air travelers take advantage of the "park & fly" offered which fills the parking to the maximum and then some.  There is a charge for parking, and it's only a couple dollars more to use valet, so my advise it valet park.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope you enjoyed your stay. We hope to have you again in the future in order to better meet your preferences.

Summary: Our biggest concern is alway the beds and cleanliness of the room.   Our room was very clean, roomy and the bed was comfortable so we were very happy.  The breakfast had lots of fruit which we like and an assortment of other items.  We are big egg eaters but the scrambled eggs did not taste real.  I think they were powered so that was disappointing.  Everything else was good.  The front desk staff was excellent especially Matt.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: Overall a great hotel if you need to be close to the airport. Rooms are clean, staff is friendly. I'm baffled though as to why there isn't any kind of closet or space to hang a sundress! The pool and hot tub are nice and the breakfast is good, though a little pricey for what you get for $20.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We do apologize that you were not able to locate the closet in the room. On your next visit we will be more then happy to assist you with that. We hope you have a great day

Summary Heading: Great hotel and location for value!!
Summary: For a last minute decision, the hotel location and price were great! I wanted to be close to Newport Beach and near the John Wayne airport.  Other hotels were a couple of hundred dollars but given the location and a last minute decision the Hilton was perfect!!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that we could be of service to you while in the area and hope to have you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: We reserved two rooms and were able to get the adjoining rooms.  As a gold hilton honors member, we received free breakfast buffet tickets.  We weren't too happy about the self park fee of $28 for overnight.  They should just include it in the hotel rate.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that we were able to meet your request for adjoining rooms and we hope that helped improve your stay with us. We do apologize for the parking rate as we are located across from the airport. However, we do wish to have you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: The staff was very welcoming and helpful during our entire stay.The rooms were nice and we never heard noise from the airport. The pool is nice.  As HIlton Gold members we received complimentary breakfast, but otherwise it is $20pp, which would have been expensive for what we received. Internet was also complimentary but very slow.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that our staff along with our amenities were able to help you enjoy your stay while with us. We hope to have you in the future and hope you have a great day.
