Summary: I met friends out there for a weekend and this hotel is so cute and clean!   I valet parked my car--not crazy about the $29 nightly fee--but that's what it is in the city--any city! If not more! The valet was helpful and efficient!  The lobby was intimate and welcoming! I was checked in immediately! Offered a glass of wine--all in 5 minutes!  We were on the 6th floor--same as my friends that arrived earlier that day! The rooms phones and lamps were a bit dated--but the room was extra clean--the carpet was new I think....the bathroom was spotless--on the small size though.  They had a small bar in the lobby--no chance to try it.   I will stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We greatly appreciate your words and are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your next stay. Have a great day.

Summary: Though the hotel is across from John Wayne Airport, it is very quiet and accessible. The customer service representative were courteous and helpful.  They listened to me and tried to resolve my problem.  Though I did not used the amenities, I did notice the quality of the food and drinks. They were reasonably priced.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate your feedback and are so glad to hear that our staff listened to your needs and did all they could to assist you. We hope to have you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: The hotel staff at checkin were above average on the friendly scale. I had a nice meal at their restaurant. Not the best view but it is located close to the airport and the hotel is very clean.  The breakfast buffet was okay and not as nice as I have had at other Hiltons.
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you enjoyed you stay with us and are very glad to hear you received the service you deserve while at our location. We hope to have you in the future and hope you have a lovely day.

Summary: 15 minutes from New Port Beach and directly across the street from JW Airport!! The staff is outstanding, the rooms and very clean and hotel is pleasebt to stay in! Great gym and fabulous pool! Easy access to the 405! Only issue is you can not sleep in past 7am because planes start taking off right at 7am sharp!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to have you again in the future. We can look into placing you in a quieter area so you are not affected by the planes as much.

Summary: Beautiful hotel and lovely rooms.  Everything was very clean.   We had a room at the opposite end of the hotel from the airport and had zero noise... but not very good wifi.  Great location at an very reasonable price.  Lots of businesspeople.
Manager Response: We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and hope to have you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: Good Loction , Nice and clean , good hotel .Staff are ok , but do charge a lot for parking . Rooms are clean and comfortable . parking can be a problem , and alot of time you have to park way back in the parking lot and have to walk quite a distance back to the hotel .
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your feedback and we greatly appreciate it. The next time we have you please let us know if you have trouble parking and we will be more then happy to assist you in order to assure you have an enjoyable stay and have as less of a hassle as possible with parking. We hope to have you again soon.

Summary: We stayed at the Hilton Orange County Airport when we had meetings in the Newport Beach area.  This property was very well located for those meetings-only 10-15 minute drive to where we needed to be.  Staff was friendly.  Be warned, it is literally across the street from the airport!  Ask for a room on the opposite of the hotel when you make your reservation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your day to provide us with your feedback. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and hope to have you in the future.

Summary: great place with convenient location and good amenities. check in was smooth and so was the check out. I was here for a meeting and it all went well. would recommend to there and will consider staying again
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Heather at the front desk was so friendly and helpful. I wish it had been my hotel for my entire CA biz trip. A very nice Hilton property and airport noise was not a problem at all.  Shuttle bus driver in the morning was super friendly and helpful which was a great start to the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time out of your day to provide your feedback. We are thrilled to hear that our staff was able to show you the hospitality you deserve and hope to have you again in the future. Thank you once more and have a great day.

Summary: I was very disappointed with the mobility accessible room. The room was so small and we couldn't even roll the wheelchair into the bedroom. Our dad used the walker instead but that also didn't fit so we had to shift around the table and chair. That was very inconvenient for us and our dad the first night. Addionally the beds were so soft and there was no support or rail on the side for him to support himself. He tried to use the stand but it had the wheel so it didn't support him. Overall the experience was very bad for a disabled person to stay at your place. We were very unhappy.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and we wish to express our sincerest apology to your father and him not enjoying his stay as he should. We will definitely reach out the the proper departments to have this looked into immediately. We hope in the future to have you and have this issues addressed so your stay is much more than satisfactory. Again we do apologize for the inconvenience and hope to have you in the future.

Summary: Great location because it is right across the street from the hotel. There is not much close by though. The staff were wonderful but the hotel overall needs an update. If this hotel offers you the best price, then I would take it. Otherwise I might suggest looking somewhere else.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope to have you again in the future. We are glad to hear that the location was best for your traveling needs and would love for you take advantage of our property and all we have to offer. Once again thank you for your feedback and have a great day.

Summary: Checkin was quick and easy, all the staff I can across was friendly and welcoming, my room was clean and  complimentary breakfast was great (lots of options-healthy too!). My only gripe was the vending machine on my floor (10th) did not take credit card and I didn't have any cash. Lucky my colleague on floor 8 knew her vending machine took credit card.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast selection. We will have the vending machine looked at as soon as we can. We hope to have you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: I only stayed one night, but the room and the bed were out-of-this-world comfortable!  Dinner at the restaurant downstairs was delicious, and our server was very attentive to our needs. The room was spacious and very clean. I would definitely stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you again in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary Heading: Trip to see our new grandson Austin in Irvin,CA
Summary: Excellent trip in and saw some incredible sights. Hotel was very welcoming, neat and up to date. WI FI service was a little vague in how to connect but once realized went thru fine. King bed was GREAT, need some firm pillows though but all in all a good bed to sleep in. Need more sports channels for late at night, just so many movies you can watch for a half hour and be content. Grandson Austin was healthy and 3 weeks old, a great looking boy who has a great area to grow up in and live, Newport Beach/ Irvin is a great clean place to stay and to visit. Catalina is only 1 1/2 hours away including parking and boat travel once started. Beautiful place to stay and visit. Coming back was great to have a HOT shower and a good meal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are very glad that you were able to spend time with loved ones and be introduced to the newest member of your family. We look forward to having you and your family in the future and we hope day.

Summary: The staff is friendly, pillows and linens are comfortable, the bathtub is a little too high, the problem is the noise from airplanes. The area is nice and well located, you can go for a good walk. The swimming pool is heated. The whole staff is very kind and helpful.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback during your recent stay. Being close to the airport does cause our guest to hear the plans but during your next visit we can do our best to place you on the side that is not as loud and the airport closes no later then 11pm. Again we appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Price was on point, location was just right, staff is always friendly & the bedding ALWAYS helps you forget you're NOT in your own bed cuz it's SOOOO comfy! We never regret staying @ any of the Hilton Hotels & neither will you.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having again the the future. Have a great day.

Summary: This was a good airport very near the airport. Clean lobby and rooms, with friendly staff. Bar served real drinks and there was coffee in the room.  HBO too! I really don't have anything else to say. An airport hotel is an airport hotel.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to you returning the next time you're in the Irvine area. Once more thank you for your feedback and have a great day.

Summary: forced here because of work- the entrance/main area smells like a bomb of axe body spray went off- it triggered a migraine for me. the room above mine had the popcorn ceiling being removed so it was incredibly loud for about 3-4 hours, the guests in the room next to us had a knock down drag out fight on the hour.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and regret to hear that your stay was not as expected. We look forward to another opportunity to allow us to provide you with the type of service you deserve. We hope to see you in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: This location is central for my trip.  It allowed for easy access to Fashion Island, the beach area and Southcoast Plaza as well as the Segrestrom theater and near by excellent restaurants.  The staff were extremely helpful with all requests and the hotel was comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are extremely pleased that you enjoyed our location and extremely glad to hear that you received the service you deserve. We hope to see you again in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: Very pleased with this hotel. From the reservation through to checking out, the service was fantastic. Great location - close to our tournament, with plenty of restaurant choices too. We arrived fairly late on Saturday evening and wanted some food - the restaurant inside the lobby area was surprisingly delicious and Salvador's service impeccable. Delicious, crispy wings, with pickled veggies, and the steak and arugula flatbread was perfectly sized and also delicious. We split the Caesar salad and enjoyed the house Chardonnay. Breakfast buffet the next day was also fresh and tasty with many items.The rooms were clean, comfortable bed, and the bathroom was also clean and modern. We will definitely be coming back for another stay when we are in the area.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are also glad that you were able to enjoy our food in the Aura restaurant here on site. We look forward to having you in the future.

Summary: Did not meet my expectations, I have stayed at better Hilton hotels. I was very disappointed with the rooms, no fridge, no slippers, beds looked very old , but it did have a nice swimming pool, I do not think that I will stay there again.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and are disappointed that you did not enjoy your stay. Only a few of our rooms on the executive floor have slippers and robs. Upon request we can have a refrigerator sent to you. Again we apologize that you did not enjoy your stay but we hope to see you in the future to allow us to provide exceptional service.

Summary: No mini fridge. no free breakfast. No free parking. Ugh! I hate wasting time and money when I travel for work, so paying a lot of money for a hotel room and in addition having to pay for parking+breakfast is just ridiculous. That said, the room was adequate and I was happy that the thermostat was not controlled (like many hotels in Cali where they don't go below 71 degrees). This hotel simply did not fit my needs as a business traveler.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and regret to hear that your stay was not as you planned. We hope that you provide us another opportunity to provide you with exceptional service. Again thank you for your feedback and have a great day.

Summary: Nothing impressive about the facility. Staff was rude and less than helpful. Internet connectivity was poor. Breakfast was overpriced and tasted only average. Alarms sounded in the middle of the night twice & had to evacuate the building because of a faulty sprinkler. No communication from the staff to the patrons.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and we are aware of the mater presented. Once again we do apologize for any and all inconveniences you had to endure while here and hope that you provide us with another opportunity to provide you with the exceptional service that you not only deserve but that we can provide. Once more we do apologize and hope to have you in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: Clean hotel with excellent staff. Every time I go to visit my daughter at UCI, I stay here and completely enjoy my visit. This hotel is conveniently located across from the John Wayne airport. I usually come to the airport and walk across the street to the hotel. The hotel is also 5 to 10 minutes away from great shopping malls and restaurants. The beach is no more than 15 minutes away.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and couldn't be prouder to have you with us when visiting your daughter at UCI. We greatly appreciate your feedback and your kind words and look forward to seeing you again. Have a great day.

Summary: Our stay was perfect aside from the false fire alarm that woke us up twice after midnight. We were expecting to be compensated but that did not happen. Other than this, the service and food were very good.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay but would like to apologize for the fire alarms. We hope you provide us another opportunity when you return. We hope you have a great day.

Summary: Stay here every time I travel into Orange County. Staff is awesome very friendly and helpful. I have stayed on this property eight or nine times now and service is always consistent. I recommend it to all my friends.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled that you continue to choose us as your hotel destination and we look forward to seeing you soon. Have a great day.

Summary: This hotel was minutes from airport and a short drive to beaches.  The convenience made it well worth it!  Didn't try the in-house restaurant but there were plenty of other nice places to eat within walking distance.  The fitness center and pool areas were great after-work stress relievers!
Manager Response: We truly thank you for your feedback and hope that you stay with us again to take advantage of our Aura restaurant which has a variety of options to choose from. Again thank you for your time and we hope you have a great day.

Summary: This was a beautiful hotel and I recommend it for any quick layover or one or two night stay. The hotel is located across from John Wayne Airport in Orange County and is surrounded by a business park and apartments. There are some nearby restaurants and a mall about 2 or 3 miles away. Easy access to the 405 freeway - north to Los Angeles and south to San Diego.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you were able to take advantage of our nearby amenities. We look forward to having you in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: This property was not what I expected as a Hilton.  The staff was good but the bed was hard and the bathroom was not as clean as I like. Dusty behind toilet.  Food was good,  breakfast was delivered outside of the requested timeframe.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and regret to hear that your stay was not what you expected. Here at the Hilton Irvine we look forward to providing exceptional service to all of our guest and nothing less. On your next stay we hope to show you just that. Once again thank you for your feedback.

Summary: This hotel is consistently good all the time.  I travel all over the country and World and try to stay at Hilton properties.  We first stayed at this location because its close to the Airport.  Now its for the service.  Great dinning room, great breakfast, and great rooms.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and continue to choose us as your hotel destination each time you're in the area. We look forward to your next stay to continue providing exceptional service.

Summary: Convenient location, with a quick shuttle ride to the airport terminal building. Prospective guests should be advised that the shuttle only runs twice an hour. (although you can walk to the airport terminal from the hotel)    The hotel has been remodeled and has a nice updated lobby and modern rooms. We found the hotel to be clean. The quality of the breakfast buffet food was good.  Hotel staff were very pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay with us. Once more thank you for your kind words. Have a great day.

Summary: Only stayed one night. This time, I walked from the airport to the hotel, which is just across the street - very convenient.  I was also able to get my rental car the next morning.  Free WiFi.  Still have very comfortable beds and plenty of power and USB outlets.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your next stay with us. Have a great day.

Summary: The hotel is centrally located and the staff go out of their way to make sure your stay is to you liking.  A booking error was fixed quickly after I pointed it out and appropriate accommodations were made.  Stay on the side of the hotel away from the airport to avoid the noise.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope that we are your hotel destination the next time you're in the area. Have a great day.

Summary: I will not be staying here again nor at any Hilton in the Irvine or Anaheim area. As soon as I was about to check in, the valet attending named Amanda was having a really bad day because as soon as I parked I told her I was about to check in and she told me I couldn't park in the front because I would be blocking traffic. There were no cars anywhere in site. I checked in for myself and for my mom.  When I gave my mom her key card to get into the parking lot (which by the way is $26 a NIGHT), she didn't know that she had to slide it against the sensor. It was new to me too but here comes Amanda from the front door of the hotel yelling at her that she was holding up the line. I don't know about you but no one yells at your parent especially if she doesn't know how to use something
Manager Response: We deeply regret to hear that your experience with our parking wasn't not up to par. We assure you that we will address this with our employees so this does not happen i the future. We value you and the time it took to travel to our location. We truly hope that you give us another opportunity to provide you with exemplary service. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have you in the future.

Summary: I loved to stay in this well located, clean, modern and full of space hotel. If I could only say one thing negative is the price you need to pay for parking. Besides that, you will find great rooms, with everything new, great TV, nice sheets and pillows, friendly staff and a great location. Looking foward to coming back!!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you in the future. Again thank you an have a great day.

Summary: Was made to feel not very valued as a Hilton guest. Too parking issues, to having to walk through the parking lot to the Jacuzzi/pool to avoid a huge party, but ended up being way to close to the party any ways....
Manager Response: We value your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay. We make it a point here to assure all of our guest feel valued and appreciated. We will present this issue to our staff  and make it a point that on your next stay you feel as valued as you should. Again thank you for your feedback and hope to have you in the near future.

Summary Heading: A Hilton that's good in a pinch (if the rates are good)
Summary: We've stayed at this location a few times now. It's an older building, probably from the 60s or 70s but has been updated.   They did some improvements around the pool, adding some clear glass fencing which is nice and modern. The lobby is attractive, bar is minimalist and offers enough seating.   The parking lot during our most recent stay was awful. So many cars and that $26/night parking fee is ridiculously too high. If I'm paying that much a night to park my vehicle, I better have a spot.   Bed was comfy, maid service was prompt. Internet was too slow to support Youtube streaming but we brought our own portable BluRay player so that helped for entertainment.   Aiport noise is moderate but nice to know flights stop at 9 or 10pm. I would ask for a room facing the opposite of
Manager Response: We do thank you for your feedback and regret to hear that a few things were not to your liking. We do have a number of groups often but make it a point to provide parking to our guest. We look forward to your next stay and hope that you take advantage of our shuttle that can transport you to and from local restaurants upon availability. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Mattress very soft for Hilton.  You could hear springs when sitting on side of the bed.  On the good side, hotel located in great area directly across from John Wayne airport.  Good shuttle service. Hotel also very clean.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and we will look into the issue that you presented. Again thank you for your feedback and have a great day.

Summary: This property is perfectly located for the airport and the surrounding area. I'm true, quality Hilton spirit, it is perfect. Things are modern, yet quaint. Service is impeccable. Visit Juan in the bar...he is on point and his customer service is perfection.   I will come back here again.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you in the future and hope that you have a great day.

Summary: When we visit Irvine, we usually stay here or at the Doubletree Club.  This hotel is closer to the airport, and has recently renovated rooms.  Gulliver's restaurant nearby is also an attraction.  There is paid valet or self-parking. Very friendly staff and good breakfast.  Recommend it highly, especially for Hilton Honors members.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled that you continue to choose us as your hotel destination when in the area. We look forward to having you in the future and hope you have a great day.

Summary: Before I go into my review.  I was preface this with telling you that I have worked in the hotel industry for quite a while and worked as a Front Desk Manager for a Hilton hotel.  I know the standards that Hilton and what hotels should have.  Additionally I was paying standard rate and did not get any sort of employee discount  First, I was staying there because my GF and I did not want to drink and drive for this gala event we were going to on 3/18.  The hotel was close, and from working in Hiltons, I knew this would be a clean and easy stay.  We arrived and while I was getting ready I realized I forgot a razor to shave with.  Not thinking too much of it and not needing it in a hurry I tried to call Housekeeping (usually Housekeeping delivers toiletries if needed).  There line
Manager Response: I would like to first apologize for the inconveniences that you endured while here. We in no way wish to discomfort any guest that walks through our doors whatsoever. I also wish to apologize for the shortage of staffing. We truly wish that you allow us the opportunity to provide you with the exception service that you deserve. Thank you for your feedback and we wish to see you in the future.

Summary: The Hilton brand to me means "you have arrived, now relax". From the greeting by the valets to the front desk it is easy and helpful. I was greeted with a smile and directions to the front desk where I was greeted by my name. Check-in took less then 5 minutes and I was in my impeccable room in less than 10. The facility is wonderful and the location to UCI and the freeway is great. I also dined for lunch and a dinner and I was very pleased with the food and overall service.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and we are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay from the check in process to our food services. We hope to be your hotel destination the next time you're in the area. Have a great day!

Summary: Very clean hotel with friendly staff! Location is great to the hotel and a few restaurants near by. Parking is a bit expensive with few parking spots near by. hotel does not disappoint with all of its fine amenities.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and the time it took to provide it. We also glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our amenities as well. We look forward to having you in the future. Have a great day

Summary Heading: Best location in front of the airport
Summary: Great location right at the airport; forget about the rest.  -Noisy rooms due to the airport -Poor breakfast quality and limited choice -Low quality dinner options -Outdated rooms -Room for improvement with regards to cleaning; only superficial
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay. We hope that you provide us with another opportunity to provide exceptional service. Again thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Very pleased with parking, accommodations, cleanliness, proximity to the airport.
Summary: I was very pleased with this airport hotel. The room was clean and comfortable and the staff were very friendly.  Most of all the parking and drive to John Wayne Airport was easy.  I will be staying here again for sure.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We hope to have you in the future and hope that you have a great day.

Summary: This hotel always delivers timely service, great front desk staff and well kept hotel.  Easy access to all areas of Orange County including Angel Stadium, Disneyland, Convention Center and Honda Center.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback. We look forward to delivering exemplary service to each guest that stays with us. On your next visit to the area we look forward to being your choice hotel.

Summary: We stayed for four nights at the Hilton in Irvine.  Being a Diamond Club member I was extremely shocked at the way I was treated by the Manager of the hotel.  For the last night of our stay I used points for the room.  We had to cancel our credit card as it was lost and was unable to put up the $50 incidental charge for the hotel.  When the position was explained to the Manager I was totally embarrassed by the way I was talked to by her in the lobby with other people around.  We were locked out of our room and it took close to two hours for me to have a friend put up his card.  I asked if we could have one of their free drink coupons and her response was a flat "no".  She committed that Diamond Club members receive a free breakfast and that is it.  The hotel does not buy them
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and the time you took out of your day to provide it. We regret to hear that you did not enjoy your stay. We look forward to providing exceptional service to all guest with or without a reservation that enter our establishment. We can assure you that on your next visit we will provide just that. Again we apologize for any inconvenience you received while here.

Summary: Situated just across from the John Wayne Airport, it is an excellent place to stay when visiting Disney with kids. Very nice big , attractive, comfortable rooms. Very good service and friendly staff. They had a very nice breakfast spread. Tasty food.  We had breakfast included rooms, so it was a treat . It's way better than some of the other Hiltons we have stayed in.  Would definitely go there again .  Highly recommend it.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your review and are very pleased to hear that you and your family had such a great stay. We hope that we are your hotel destination the next time you're in the area and hope that you and your family enjoyed Disneyland. Have a great day and hope to see you again.

Summary: Can always count on a consistent, comfortable, clean stay. All Hilton hotels provide good value for the spaciousness and ambiance. Wish parking was a bit cheaper or even free - $26/night is a bit rich.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you in the future.

Summary: It's been several months since I stayed here but I can't remember anything significant about this hotel.  The room was average, the service was average and the pool was average.  I do remember having a service person come out to fix our door lock when we arrive and he was quick and very friendly.  But there is nothing that is significant enough to make me want to come back to this hotel.  Unless you are here because of it's proximity to the airport (right across the street), the location is not near any major attractions.  We stayed here because we wanted to visit Newport Beach which was still a semi-far drive due to traffic.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and value the time you took to provide it. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and hopefully the next time in the area you are able to take advantage of The Square which is a local outdoor shopping area which has a few different restaurants to take advantage of. We also have the South Coast Plaza that is approximately 11 minutes away which has a number of shops, restaurants, and stores for our guest to take advantage of. Our shuttle is more then welcome to assist you with transportation if available within a 3 mile ratios. Again we greatly appreciate your feedback and we look forward to having you again.

Summary: Such a cozy bed, helpful employees.  Win/win. The TV menu was a little confusing but I figured it out.  Great location close to the airport...pretty sure all the flight crew stayed here as well.  Wonderful!!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. In the future if you ever need assistance with anything pertaining with the room please do not hesitate to contact us. Again thank you for your feedback and we look forward to having you again.

Summary: Staying at the Irvine Hilton is always fun and relaxing. The staff is very accommodating.  The rooms are clean and very comfortable. The Irvine Spectrum is close by, so grabbing a quick bite, lunch or dinner is always easy and fun. If you are looking for a relaxing place to stay, this is a good hotel to stay at.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay and continue to choose us as your hotel destination when you're in the area. We look forward to your next stay with us. Have a great day.

Summary: The good thing about this hotel is that it sits right across from the airport. I had an early flight and wanted the convenience. I got a good rate through trip advisor but once I arrived at the hotel I was checked in by "Moula". She advised that there is a $26 fee per day to park my vehicle in their own parking lot, even if you don't use the valet.   The hotel itself was clean and comfortable for my four hour stay.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback. We do charge all of our guest for parking due to being an airport property. However, we do look forward to having you with us in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: I have been here more than once. The staff was wonderful, again. The rooms are delightful. It is convenient to the SNA airport and there are other restaurants and coffee shops nearby. The freeway is nearby and good shopping is a few minutes from the hotel, if that is what you want or need.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and thank you for your kind words and review. We thank you for choosing us while in the area and look forward to your upcoming stay in the future.

Summary: Staff were great....smiling and more than helpful.  I even traded my warm Diet Coke in for a cold one.  Asked for an extra blanket..it arrived within minutes.  Not fancy but more than reasonable comfort service and food.  Noisy being so close to the airport but never prevented a very nice sleep.  Loveeeed the pillows!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next stay with us and look forward to your next stay in the future.

Summary: Very disappointed during my recent stay. Parking was impossible for guests as they use the lot for passengers flying out of SNA. Wake up feature not working on phone. Called front desk but I never got the call.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback. At times we do have large groups in house but we do all we can to assure that all of our guest do have a parking spot upon checking in. We also apologize for not receiving your wake up call and will make a better attempt to prevent this on your next stay. Once again thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Staff is very friendly.  Great accommodations.  I joined the Hilton Honors program because of my experience at this property.  You can walk to the airport.  It is about a 1/2 mile walk to the baggage claim area.  The shuttle will take you anywhere in a 3 mile radius.  I was surprised that I didn't hear any planes taking off.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time out to provide us with your feedback. It was our pleasure to assist you with your stay and look forward to your return in the future. Have a great day.

Summary: If you want to stay near the airpot, the Hilton is a great choice. I agree with other reviewers that the Front Desk personnel needs a big overhaul. When I checked in, I asked if I could get an Executive Club room and was interrupted each time I asked the question. I then told her that the self parking lot was full and again she didn’t care. The woman was very irritated, sour, and did not smile. On the positive side, the bartender, Luis, was wonderful. I needed a drink after checking in !  The breakfast buffet is decent and there is also a pool that I did not use. Overall, a good economical choice near the airport.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your stay and your feedback. In an effort to assure the best possible experience we will do all we can to assure that your next stay exceeds expectations. We look forward to your next stay. Have a great day.

Summary: The hotel is nice and a great location but the service level is not what I had hoped. The front desk agent was a guy & pretty rude. Upon check-in I did not feel welcome at all. I did not have the room type that I wanted and when I politely asked the agent if there was any way I could change to my desired room type, he rudely replied, sorry we're sold out there's nothing I can do. I didn't feel like he was genuinely sorry at all or that he was telling the truth. Service is so important in a hotel and makes all the difference in the world.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback. We apologize the room type was not available upon checking in to your reservation. Guest satisfaction is extremely important to each of our front desk staff and we will make sure of that upon your next visit. Again we greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to assisting you in the future.

Summary: Loved staying overnight to park and fly. We were able to travel to Orange County during non-commute traffic. Nice way to catch an early morning flight and save on parking. The bar/restaurant had a decent menu to grab a drink and appetizers.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay. We are glad that you enjoyed yourself at the restaurant as well. Once again thank you for your feedback.

Summary: I stay in many hotels throughout the year  and my overall experience was not very good. It wasn't just any one thing it was just everything combined. I will never stay here again unless it's the only thing available
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback and regret to hear that your stay was anything but exceptional. The next time you're in the area we hope that you allow us another opportunity to exhibit the quality of service you not only expect but deserve. Once again thank you for your feedback and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Good location directly across from SNA airport, good freeway access. The staff is very attentive and friendly. Digital check in makes it easy in without the need to stop at the front desk. Restaurant is a bit slow but the bar is well tended.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback. In an effort to help make the check in process easier and faster for our guest digital check in is a great tool to be utilized by our honors members. We thank you for choosing us while in the area and hope to have you again soon.

Summary: Awful internet and room service. When i checked out i asked for my receipt and staff said she is busy with her work. I had the call back few days later for my receipt to be emailed to me. Too bad the location is nice, i would have stayed again if they improve their services.
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback. We regret to hear that your stay was anything but exceptional and look forward to having you back so we can provide you with such service. Once again thank you for your feedback and we hope to have you again soon.

Summary: I was very pleasantly surprised by this hotel.  It seems to be very well priced for the area.  It is also convenient to the airport.  I actually walked to the hotel from the airport because of how nice the weather was.  There is a mini market nearby.  Everything was reasonably well done if a bit aged.  They could use an upgrade of the windows to soundproof them better.  My only complaint is the iron had some gunk on it and stained my shirt, but I could have avoided it had I looked first.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and thank you for your review. We hope to have you in the near future. We shall look into the subjects you listed as well. Again thank you for your feedback.

Summary: This trip started out as a disaster with no pickup at the airport and no response from the hotel.  Service in the restaurant was terrible.  Food was good but Maybe it was because I had to wait so long to get a menu
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the service not being anything less then exceptional. We will speak to each department and look forward to your stay in the future. Again we apologize and thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Great Location -poor wifi makes it not a great place to work
Summary: Stayed for business in January- staff are very pleasant and the service overall is excellent.  The rooms have been kept up to date and beds are in good shape.  Big issue is the wifi- very unreliable and very slow- I was in the middle of the floor and close to the elevators mid level so no excuse not being able to get a good signal.  Pool looked inviting but it was not open until 6 AM and I am an early riser so could not take advantage of it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the internet speeds not being as fast as expected. On your next visit we can definitely do our best to have you in a better area if possible. We look forward to having you in the near future and appreciate your feedback.

Summary: The front desk staff is excellent, and the text messages asking how my stay was going, and their assistance with choices for local restauarnts was very helpful.  I was at the property for a totoal of 7 nights over a 10 day period.  Very accessable and friendly.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Close to SNA. Perhaps a bit too close.
Summary: Proximity to John Wayne Airport can't be beat, but it should be noted that unlike many airport hotels, this Hilton is not soundproofed. The planes are landing and taking off until 11:00 pm, as you are well aware from the confines of your room. Nonetheless, the room is comfortable with some considerate touches: the bedside lamp has electric outlets and a USB connector for charging devices. The check-in and check-out was efficient if somewhat brusque. The hotel has been updated and the common lobby areas are bright and fresh. The rooms are sllightly less so. And for heaven's sake, what continues to be the apparent lingering affection for popcorn ceilings at Hilton?
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are glad to hear that you enjoyed your room. Unfortunately being so close to the airport you may hear the plans a little and for that we do apologize. We hope to have you again in the future and hope that you enjoy your day.

Summary: Really good airport hotel, with very comfortable beds and all the amenities you would expect from a Hilton Airport Hotel. Check-in was fast and efficient, however the bar/restaurant  closed early and there was an attitude of indifference on the part of the staff on an evening when there were lots of people coming in from delayed flights due to weather complications. Breakfast buffet in the morning was quite satisfying and courtesy airport transportation was most satisfactory. Recommended.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to having you in the future. We shall reach out to that department in order to assure a better outcome in the future as well. Once again we greatly appreciate the feedback.

Summary: I spent the weekend for a workshop. When I checked in the receptionist noticed I was using a cane and asked if I would like a room closer to the elevator and would I like a bell hop to help with my luggage.  When I checked out the bellman, an older Asian man, was willing to get my car for me even though I had self parked and it was pouring rain. This was a big help for me because I had lost my umbrella, I walk slow because of painful foot problems and I would have been soaked by the time I got to my car. He was very kind. The room was nice and comfortable, the only downside was the table and end table  we're damaged looking, like someone had left wet towels on them and damaged the finish.
Manager Response: We are very to hear that our staff was so helpful throughout your stay and we look forward to having you in the near future. We will make sure that we look into our rooms do assure our items are in the rooms are up to date. Thank you once more for your feedback.

Summary: great if you want to stay by the airport. Not too loud, great staff, fun times. It's an airport hotel so what can you say? Really close and convenient when you need to fly out. the planes stop flying around 11pm- just in time to get a good nightsl sleep. may not want to stay there if you have small children because the noise will keep them awake.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope you have you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Across the street from John Wayne Airport
Summary: When traveling in or out of John Wayne Airport in Orange, CA and you need a close by night, this airport hotel works fine. The decor in the lobby is light and white with a large open area for seating and eating. Lobby restaurant is open until 11pm and bar until midnight. Room service is packed with apps, pizzas, salads, sandwich, entre, and beverages.  There is noise from the airport until the curfew of no flying hits. Due to that you may want to ask for a room on the opposite side. Shuttle runs 2/hour to airport beginning 5:00AM. Uber and cabs get very annoyed with the short trip to/from this hotel to airport and vice versa but the shuttle works well.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to having you on your next visit to the area.

Summary Heading: Great stay at the Hilton Orange County Airport
Summary: I really enjoyed my stay; I was picked up from the airport; the driver was pleasant; I was greeted warmly at the hotel reception. The hotel was clean and organized; I had room service which I really enjoyed.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and hope that we are your travel destination on your next visit to Irvine.

Summary: We stayed at the hilton the night before our move. With 4 kid and 2 dogs we had a lot of luggage. The staff was so helpful getting everything to and from our rooms. I will definitely be returning in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We can only imagine how hard it must have been and we are more then pleased to have been able to assist you and make your stay with us relaxing and enjoyable. We look forward to having you and your family visit us again in the near future on your next visit to the area.

Summary: This hotel is across the street from Orange County airport and is extremely loud as a result.  You must run the fan in your room at all times to minimize the noise from the jets taking off across the street at all hours of the day and night.  Room service is ridiculous..  when you call they do not answer the phone.. you have to call multiple times and let it ring forever before they pick up.  A sandwich delivered to your room is $30 and usually not hot.  I would not recommend this hotel at all as there are so many other places that give you more for your money.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback but regret to hear that you didn't enjoy your stay. On your next visit we can do the best we can to place you away from noise. With the airport closing at 11:00pm you must have been in house during a busy time perhaps. For the room service we definitely apologize for the wait and amount. We have several options to choose from that may be less expensive and we will do our best to have it brought up to you in a timely fashion. Again we thank you for your review and hope you allow us another opportunity to provide you with exemplary guest service.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, service, food and amenities!
Summary: I love this hotel and stay almost every week.  Great parking all around hotel.  Great valet if you want it.  Check in is very fast, efficient, and friendly.  Rooms are very nice, quit, CLEAN, and beds are very comfortable.  Juan in room service is outstanding and quick with very good food.  Breakfast is huge buffet and is so good with fresh, pancakes, French toast, eggs, continental items, all kinds of fruit and healthy options, and much more.  Jorge and Ruben servers are the best I have ever had as they really make me feel as a VIP.  Plenty of choices for everyone.  Pool and jacuzzi are large, clean, and fun.  I love this hotel!!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback and loyalty to our property. We look forward to your next stay with us and look forward to providing exemplary guest service.

Summary: À ok hôtel. Room is clean though a little outdated. Adding a small fridge would be expected for a 4 star.  My main pushback regards the breakfast: for 25 dollars one would expect a very significantly better offer, both in quality and diversity of the offer.  They really have something to upgrade regarding breakfast!
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and regret to hear that you did not enjoy the selection for our breakfast. The full buffet that includes: Eggs, sausage, toast, bagels, muffins, cereal(s), juice, and french toast to name a few items. We also have an al la carte option you can order from as well. Again we appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: My flight got cancelled and I had to stay overnight.  The rate was great, hotel great, food and drink were very good.  Excellent value for my 10 hours.  I would stay here again.  I would like to experience and leverage other services as well.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and would love for you to take advantage of our amenities such as our outdoor pool and jacuzzi, bar, and on site restaurant to name a few. Again thank you for your feedback and we look forward to having you back soon.

Summary: I stayed in this hotel a few times on business trip, it has not disappointed me. Although it is located near the airport, it is still quiet. The breakfast buffet (with fee) is nice in the hall area. The parking is in the back of the facility, with a short/nice walk around the tennis court.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to you returning in the near future. Also feel free to join us for lunch and dinner. We have several great dishes that are served at our Aura restaurant. Again thank you for your feedback.

Summary: We stay at the Hilton Orange County Airport hotel often because we visit our family several times a year.  We always select the Hilton Orange County Airport because it is not only convenient but they staff is great and we have always had a great experience staying there.  For anyone staying in the Orange County area, you should look at Hilton Orange County Airport first.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you took to provide such positive feedback about our staff. We look forward to your next visit with us and thank you again for you feedback.

Summary Heading: Very weak wifi even we were on 3rd floor. Room is so small and washroom so tiny.
Summary: Very weak wifi even we were on 3rd floor. Room is so small and washroom so tiny. Staff is nice, helping with smile. Location is good. few minutes you can be in high way. Parking fee is too expensive for $24 US / day.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback. We apologize for the signal strength not being as strong as you'd like during your stay. During your next visit we can have you closer to the router on the floor that you are on which may provide a different outcome. Our parking charges are based on the fact that we are a airport property unfortunately. We look forward to your next visit so we can provide you with exceptional service.

Summary: Terrific top-name brand location. Much better value than many other area choices. Convenient to freeways and many other Orange County destinations. Only complaint is that the parking lot always seems full (maybe the hotel offers discount parking for airport travelers?)
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We do have a number of events and groups that usually visit our hotel on a regular basis which may occupy a number of our parking spots but we definitely make it a point to make sure our guest have a place to park. During your next visit we will definitely do all we can to get a better parking spot then what you may have had if it is possible. Again thank you for your feedback and review.

Summary: Only had issues with the price of parking and the dirty linens and sheets in the room. We didn't ask for new linens as it was only a couple towels and we were able to work around them. The bed we didn't notice until the last day as we only had the room cleaned once. Again we were able to just remove that particular sheet and sleep without it and it wasn't a big deal
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that the linen in your room was not tended to accordingly. On your next stay with us please feel free to notify the front desk for another set of towels and we will be more then happy to bring you more. Due to the fact that we are a airport hotel we do unfortunately have to charge for parking due to space being high demand for those traveling. Again thank you for your feedback and we look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Excellent hotel. Staff very friendly and helpful. Convenient location for airport arrival and departure. Room very clean and comfortable. Breakfast was buffet with hot items and various selections for hot and cold cereal.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback. We hope that you had a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year, and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Everything was good , just the sliding doors couldn't open all the way , and internet wasn't working in our room , everything else was perfect I would recommend this hotel to another family memeber or friend
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. For guest safety our sliding doors open a few inches. On your next stay we look forward to placing you in an area that may be closer to the router in order to give you a strong strength. Again thank you for your review.

Summary: Comfortable and clean rooms. Very close to airport. Must pay for parking. Decent bar and food. Not too crowded.  Lots of good restaurants close by.  Good spot for meetings. Not really a great area for families.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay with us. Due to the fact that we are an airport property we due unfortunately charge for parking. Again we thank your for your feedback and look forward to having you again.

Summary Heading: So much more than one would expect at an airport hotel
Summary: We were stranded due to flight cancelations from a bad winter storm crossing the country, so needed a place to stay overnight. We chose this Hilton not only for the location, but also for the reasonable price! We would have been happy with only fair accommodations, but were pleasantly surprised to have a lovely, enjoyable, comfortable night's stay! Next time, we will PLAN on staying at this location because it was so convenient and comfortable!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate the time you took for writing such a kind review. We apologize to hear that your plans were abruptly changed due to weather conditions. However, we look forward to having you on your next planned visit to the area and we will be happy to have you once again. Thank you once more and have a great day.

Summary: Needed a place to say close to the airport and had a wonderful restful evening before my flight back home the following day.  Clean, welcoming and nice staff.  Great pic at a fair price.  If ever near the John Wayne airport dont hesitate to chase this hotel
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your review and are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Well appointed upscale economy accommodations.  I was only there one night prior to a day of work.  In spite of my room location near the elevator, and the ice machine... and across the parkway from the airport... I had a surprisingly quiet and restful night.  Friendly and professional front desk staff made the check-in and check-out a breeze.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are extremely pleased that nothing stopped you from enjoying your stay with us and that our staff helped assure that. We look forward to you next stay and again thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Just checked in a few hours ago and upon arrival, Heather and Corrie took great care of me~ they welcomed me with a positive attitude and happily upgraded me upon request. Thank you so much ladies. From Sir. Navarro~
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we are extremely pleased to hear our front desk staff is going above and beyond to exceed your expectations. We look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: It's an airport hotel, and that's the only reason to stay.  Rooms are not memorable for being either great or bad.   Decent breakfast buffet but fairly limited menu beyond that and nothing close if you wanted to walk to eat.     Staff was friendly and price was reasonable
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. On your next visit please feel free to stop by the front desk where we can provide you with a listing of local food options. We are hear to assist you in anyway possible and look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: my room was never cleaned threw out my stay, i was barely able to get more towels to take a shower sunday morning, also speaking of the shower i have even taken a photo of the shower it was absolutely disgusting how dirty it was, i had to call the lobby 4 times before a maintenance guy came up and replaced the shower head ( that only made it look clean but the water pressure still sucked...). my credit card has also been way overcharged for my stay so i will be calling my bank this week to fill a dispute.
Manager Response: I definitely wish to apologize for the inconvenience of you not receiving towels and for having your shower in the condition that it was in. I can assure you that this is definitely not standard and we would greatly appreciate allowing us another opportunity to show you that. Again, we hope that we can see you in the future and we truly hope you have a Happy Holiday's.  All the best, William J

Summary Heading: A very nice place for the price
Summary: We stayed here because it was central to the places that we would be visiting.  It was clean, and the staff was great.  We also had our dog, which we brought along and it was a great place to bring him.  The staff was accommodating and we enjoyed the stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was clean and the staff friendly and helpful. Daily Breakfast looked good but we ate off property. Airport operates from 7 am until 11pm so no problem with noise while sleeping. Parking was a bit challenging with a lot of spaces used for airport parking
Manager Response: none

Summary: Located directly across from John Wayne Airport, returning to this Hilton has made every business trip to Orange County a relaxed and comfortable stay. The complimentary airport shuttle makes things even easier when staying at this location for family trips and spacious self-parking for those on "staycations" or with business rentals. Outside and inside, the facility is always well-maintained, clean, and well lit. Staff is always courteous and helpful, from check-in to checkout. The rooms, beds, and bathrooms are clean, offering abundant space and comfort for a restful sleep. The noise restrictions from the airport is also a big plus. Overall, this Hilton is in prime location: staff are always of the utmost help during every stay we have had. We look forward to using the Hilton
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at this Hilton property for three years in a row at Thanksgiving (usually 5-6 days).  Always a breeze.  Staff is awesome, rooms are nice, large and clean.  John Wayne airport is right across the street but they have noise restrictions (10PM-7AM I think) so sleep is not a problem. Will always stay here in Orange County.
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and look forward to your future stay with us. Wish you all the best.

Summary: Everyone Was So Accomodating & Helpful! We Were Able To Check In Early To Be With Our Families Longer On Thanksgiving! Miguel Checked Us In & Explained Everything To Us About The Check In Deposits & Parking Charges!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I use this hotel on a regular basis when I fly down to John Wayne for business. It is very conveniently located for the airport. Staff are excellent, rooms are clean and comfortable. The noise restrictions at John Wayne mean it is quiet at night. The internet service works well. However, the bar/restaurant area are clinical at best and have zero ambience. The tap beer is expensive ($11!). The location has its drawbacks as any good place to eat is an UBER or Taxi ride. Overall it is a good bet for a mid-priced hotel - but I'm not tempted to eat there so cannot comment on the quality (or lack thereof) of the food.
Manager Response: none

Summary: So close to the airport yet so quiet. As a runner, found it to be only 2 miles to the San Diego Creek Bikeway, a truly nice place to run. Not a shopper, so this is a nice break from the mall hotels. Breakfast was healthy as a buffet, nice fruit and yogurt as well as various proteins.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a very clean, friendly hotel.  The price was right with the group discount.  My only concern was that their were small gnats in the conference room.  The staff was great, the bartenders excellent the room very clean and comfortable.  And I especially loved their texting program.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I liked the fact that this place was across from John Wayne airport. -that's about it.  I reserved my stay for 16 nights.  As I checked in, I was told that there was a charge deposit of $350.00, and that self parking was $26.00 PER DAY. And that WiFi was $10.00 PER DAY! (Who the heck charges guests for WiFi??) That's $576.00 a surcharge! So deal was, if canceled, I had to stay there for one night ($146.00). I agreed. Oh Lordy... The lobby is welcoming, and the staff is cordial. But the rooms (I had a king size bed) are just disgusting. The beds are just a mattress wrapped with sheets on top of a metal box, which is hastily wrapped in some kind of giant sleeve. So much for esthetics... Like the Bates Motel. See pictures.  I checked the sheets and mattress. They were clean, but
Manager Response: Dear 1wellfedman,  We are sorry that you had a disappointing experience during your stay with us. At Hilton, we always aim to ensure every guest feels cared for, valued and respected. Your feedback will help us deliver this brand promise. guest satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.  Thank you, Dena T

Summary: Hotel is extremely close to airport and looks out into runway & parking garage. Popular breakfast chain restaurant and bank within walking distance. Easy access to freeway. Parking is expensive and valet staff rude but otherwise okay experience
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here for a conference recently. The bed was very comfortable (which is almost all you need). It was quite warm (around 100) and the aircon did its best but struggled nestled into the corner of the room.   The room itself was larger than you tend to find in hotel rooms these days. The bathrooom was clean although the vents obviously needed a good dusting.   The location is excellent if you need to be going to the airport.   Staff were attentive most of the time, although on arrival I was mostly ignored by the bell  boys and took my own stuff up to my room.   There's no much around to eat in the area except a Carls Jr and an iHop, and no bars close enough so you need to depend on the bar in the foyer. This was busy most nights but the bar staff were pretty inattentive and
Manager Response: none

Summary: They allow anyone to park in the lot. I assume airport travelers who are not hotel guests. The result is that there are no available parking spots for the hotel guests. We were forced to use valet parking at  $29 per day. After complaining, they did comp the parking.   If you get a room with 2 beds, the size of the beds are Double. That is not big enough for 2 normal sized adults to sleep comfortably in.   No refrigerator. No ice bucket. No microwave oven.
Manager Response: We would like o thank you for your feedback, it troubles us to hear that you were unable to find parking and sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Our parking is exclusively for our paying guest. Also to hear that you were not pleased with your sleeping accommodations is something we would change if we have the availability to do so. We hope that you provide us with another opportunity to provide you with exceptional service.  Again we apologize for the inconvenience and wish you Happy Holidays.

Summary: I just needed a place to crash before my 6:40am flight out in the morning.  I upgraded to an executive room so I could get a mini-fridge; however, the room did not have one.    Parking here was atrocious.  The lot is also available to the general public for parking at the airport - this led to the lot being 100% full when I arrived at 8:30 pm.  I had to cruise the lot for 30 to 45 mins and wait for someone to leave before I could park.  Needed that time for sleep, but ended up hunting for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we definitely wish to apologize for inconvenience of not having a refrigerator in your room upon check in and for having a hard time finding parking in our provided parking area. Generally our parking is only for our guest and paid airport guest from the John Wayne Airport. We truly hope that you allow us another opportunity to provide exemplary service to you in a future stay.   All the best, William J.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for 1 night while in Orange County.  It's smack across the street from SNA (John Wayne Airport) and amongst a business district.  It met our needs but the restaurant in house is not recommended.  I felt the staff went out of their way to treat us well and we had a nice visit.  It's very clean which is a big issue with me.  Buffet breakfast isn't great and special order omelet was horrible so I would stay away from their food service.  However, otherwise it is excellent!
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled you enjoyed your stay along with the service that was provided at the front desk. We wish to apologize for the food not being as satisfying as you hoped. On your next visit we hope to find something on our menu that not only meets but exceeds your expectations. Again thank you for your feedback and from all of us here at the Hilton Irvine we wish you and yours a very Happy Holiday.  All the best, William J.

Summary: I'm stuck at this horrid hotel right now.  It's a slow Sunday night, and I called for room service 60 minutes ago.  After waiting that long, I called room service to check on the status of my order, and no one answered.  I next called the front desk, who said they would have someone from room service call me.  Several minutes later, I received a call from room service saying they "were very behind" and it would be another 20 minutes.  Another 5 minutes later, I received a second call from room service, from a different person, asking to take my order - as if they had no idea I had already placed an order nearly an hour ago and just talked to someone else from room service.  The person set the phone down to have a muffled conversation on the other end, then returned to place the
Manager Response: We greatly appreciate your review. Unfortunately we are troubled to hear that your stay was not satisfactory nor did it meet our standard of service. Due to the multiple orders and high occupancy that evening we were extremely busy. However, that does not justify the service you received. We hope that you would provide us another opportunity to show you our high level of service that we usually provide. Again thank your for your feedback and we hope you have a wonderful day.   All the best, William J.

Summary: You don't get much closer to the airport! Shuttle runs every half hour from the airport which was great for arrival and departure. Central to beach or anaheim but not much nearby. Helpful staff and great breakfast!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review. We greatly appreciate the time you took out of your day and look forward to having you again in the future. Happy Holidays

Summary: I will start with the positives. The grounds are very nice. The lobby area has two bars with plenty of TV's that seemed to be on at all times with national news and plenty of sports. Well stocked Cafe/Market open 24/7. Starbucks on site. Ok restaurant called Eats with indoor/outdoor seating. Outside has a beautiful pool with plenty of things for kids to do. 4' chest sets, ping pong, foosball, etc. The room price was extremely reasonable. We paid $119 for a double-bed room.   Now the not so good. I must preface this by saying we were a fairly large wedding party with many family members staying at the hotel. Beds uncomfortable, in room safe didn't work. A little Mold in the shower. Very small bathroom. Sliding bathroom door (not very private).  Housekeeping tried to come in our
Manager Response: none

Summary: It's a business trip, so there's not much to say.  My only negative, really, is the cost of parking.  The location is not high-charisma (a beautiful view of John Wayne Airport, but no airplane noise inside!) but is very well located for business travelers.  I'd unquestionably recommend it for business or for airport stayovers, and for leisure as well if for some reason you wind up going to Irvine, CA for a vacation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is extremely close to the airport and yet i hardly heard the planes.  My room was very clean and pristine.  The value of this hotel is  worth the money.  The staff are very professional and welcoming.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good location for business meetings, very easy to get to from the airport.  There are plenty of safe places to walk in the evening, with some restaurants nearby.  The catering for business meetings was excellent, with dining either in the basic conference rooms or outside by the pool which was very nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed one night for business. Didn't receive an upgrade as a Diamond member but staff was courteous. Breakfast is pretty meager even if you upgrade to the hot items. Parking is expensive. All in all a decent property if staying for the short term.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I only stayed one night, but the hotel staff was excellent. The location is extremely convenient to the airport and nearby businesses, the hotel and rooms are clean and modern, and it is very comfortable. The breakfast buffet is over-priced, but other than that I highly recommend the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great clean rooms, and affordable rate. Parking is not reasonable. Suggest taxi or Uber in... Prompt shuttle to the airport every half hour.. I'll be back.... Upscale bar and restaurant area opening out to the pool.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Couldn't have had a better stay!
Summary: The property is beautiful and well maintained.  Rooms and amenities are as you would expect from Hilton.  BUT, the staff is the most best reason to stay here.  Worth it even if you have to pay a few more $.  Everyone was friendly and helpful.  They wanted to make everyone's staff as perfect as possible.  Will be staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Do not stay here!!! I repeat DO NOT STAY HERE!
Summary: If I could give this place ZERO stars I would. I am a Hilton Honors member and I did not feel that way at all. The staff at the front desk always seem to have an attitude when it comes to helping the guests. At most Hiltons I have been thanked for being a loyal member, but not at this one. I've stayed here multiple times and have noticed that the staff may be unhappy with their jobs, but that is not a good feeling for a guest to have upon check-in.  This hotel charges you $24 dollars for parking and not only that...I paid cash when I checked out for my stay and came home to find that they charged me a $250 smoking fee and I didn't even smoke in the room! I immediately called to tell them they have made a mistake and to check the room again. I spoke to the "Director of
Manager Response: none

Summary: After being on road for 7 hrs get to hotel and the hit me with extra expenses. I told them what rate my group was paying and they said mine was different.  Get room and sinks clogged.  Try to sleep and bunch of noise outside. Staff seemed concerned but never made adjustments to bill. No recommendation here.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a very convenient location.
Summary: Very friendly hotel staff.  Our room was nice, clean with view of the John Wayne airport.  Remarkably quiet given the proximity to the runways where you could see the planes landing.  The breakfast buffet was quite good as well.  I will echo other comments that the WIFI connection on our 7th floor was virtually zero.  But for the rate we paid, it more than met expectations and we would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel staff was friendly.  Hotel stay was okay. I was on the end hallway, which only received about a quarter Wifi signal. It would keep dropping out.  The rooms are slightly dated, in need of a remodel.   Parking was expensive, at $24 per day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was clean, and the service was good.  The hotel appeared to be hosting a wedding party.  The halls were very noisy.  The noise disturbed my sleep.  I did' not complain to hotel management, though.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I would not recommend this hotel. On a few occasions, we were treated rudely by staff members when trying to resolve issues with the checkout process. They also did not disclose the absurd amount charged for overnight parking upon reservations being made.There is no breakfast provided as part of your room booking/reservation. Our overall experience was very disappointing
Manager Response: none

Summary: other than handicap parking and the cost to park ($24.00 per night seems a bit much and will affect my decision the next time) but other then that it was ok. Over all the hotel was enjoyable and the staff was both accommodating and friendly which made our stay enjoyable. But with the cost to park our car on the property I would probably go to a different location that doe's not charge to park. It cost an additional $48.00 to stay there for the weekend and I personally think if I am going to pay the rate for staying at the hotel I shoule not be charged to park my car, I should only be chearged if I valet it instead but they still wanted 429.00 a night for that. With me a Hilton Honors menmber parking should be part of the package,
Manager Response: none

Summary: The good thing is that this hotel is literally across the street from SNA airport terminal. From the arrivals hall, you can access MacArthur boulevard by walking through the parking hall. There's also a free shuttle every 30 min.  The bad thing is that this hotel is so close to the airport. You will hear quite a bit of noise from the arriving and departing planes.  Rooms are clean and well equipped. Hotel breakfast has limited selection of food, nothing too exciting about. Wifi connection was a bit edgy and slow, could be better.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Basic nice hotel except for bathroom tub. I turned on shower and immediately noticed tub was not draining.   I looked at drain and it was clogged with a MASSIVE clot of long black hair. Most disgusting I have ever seen.  I was amazed that maids could not have seen it when cleaning. Had to wait 20 minutes for Maintenace to come and pull it out using pliers! He was even shocked at it. I was late for my dinner meeting waiting for the shower fix. Front desk took one day parking off my bill for the inconvenience .
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you are flying in or out of Orange County Airport (SNA) this is a convenient and nice place to stay. You can walk to/from hotel/airport within 5-10 minutes. The hotel is nicely designed with a good breakfast selection and dining/bar area. Rooms are large with comfortable beds. Very clean. You can request a bathrobe! No concierge lounge at this property. The breakfast staff were very helpful and courteous. I had breakfast there two mornings in a row and the second morning the wait person was at my table with coffee black. There are a few restaurants within walking distance if you want to eat somewhere other than the hotel. Room service selection was varied and reasonably priced. Internet worked great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you self park in Irvine and they are having an event, good luck parking that night. You have no protection for what you purchased. The hotel doesn't care what you think either. I tried to get some help and was completely ignored.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good hotel for quick in/out 1-day conference
Summary: No issues. Staff was courteous. No problems with "double" reservation (first one through airline was never confirmed).  Room was clean and quiet, even with a wedding in the lobby area. Convenience store nearby. Can walk to John Wayne Airport. Personally used Uber transportation, but they do have a (local) shuttle.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Hilton property is very convenient since it is right next to the Orange County airport.  The staff was very friendly and the rooms are very clean. The only draw back is the price of parking per night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Internet doesnt work. Parking is $24 for 5 minutes and i could keep going but ... Ok it wants more. The front desk staff is uneducated and or untrained. The support is horrific. The parking will end up costing you more than your room
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel.  Sunny pool area.  Very quiet considering proximity to airport.  Attractive lobby area.  Immaculate room.  Friendly, helpful staff.  Overall quite a nice stay. The complementary internet was not fast; seemed kind of silly to be required to purchase an upgrade.
Manager Response: none
