Summary: very good , pool and new patio for breakfast a with lighting .  Need more tree round pool plus table and chairs and privet resting area. speaker with music would be very nice also.  bell man was big problem and I advise use part of your valet parking to help for bell department.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is relatively nice and clean. You can hear room doors close and some hall noise. However the guest service is horrible. We left our room in the morning and didn't return until late in the evening. Our room was never cleaned. It was still as we left it. It was obvious that no one from housekeeping had stepped foot in our room. When I called the front desk to tell them of this problem, the clerk immediately questioned me about whether I had left the "Do Not Disturb" sign up (which I had not). When I said no, I was told that there was nothing they could do because it was too late. (Still didn't receive any acknowledgment or apology for our inconvenience.) I asked about towels and was told they could them up. I then asked for clean glasses, coffee mugs and coffee supplies.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We utilized the "park and fly" and had an excellent experience.  The hotel is well maintained with lots of parking and great access to restaurant, as well as the airport.  Rooms are nicely appointed and clean.  We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay at a great price.
Summary: Great stay at a great price.  Staff was welcoming and courteous.  Bar service was available.  The room was clean and staff was accommodating. Great location with easy access to the airport as well as Newport Beach without paying an arm and a leg.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Right across MacArthur Blvd from Orange County Airport. If you want to walk to the airport, it's about 11 minutes away. If not, there's complimentary shuttle.  Rooms are nice and the housekeepers are wonderful. Food at the hotel is pricey (and tasty) , but you can find less expensive fare close by if you're not on the company's dime. We booked the hotel as a package through SW airlines, so I'm not sure of cost per night, but the convenient location is worth a few extra dollars. We rented a car for a day, and it was an easy walk to pick up and drop off said vehicle. I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The service provided was okay. Could have been better. I would have loved if received a room with a view. But the only view we got was the parking lot. Parking was expensive. However, room was clean. I liked it. The weather here is amazing btw.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel, very clean and close to airport, beach, restaurants, and Orange County activities. Great hotel for the money. Would stay here again, and would recommend this hotel to friends and family. Also, plenty of shopping close by with South Coast Plaza, Irvine Spectrum, and Fashion Island providing a multitude of options.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is mainly for business stay and not for leisure ,, We stayed at room 731 and 733 with a pool view,, they don't have a mini fridge or a microwave in all rooms (just 2 shared microwaves in the lobby !!) ,, parking is for $26 a night...they do a lot of business party's on the pool which didn't give enough space for other guests
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I bet this place used to be awesome!
Summary: The staff was friendly and the proximity to SNA was perfect.  However the rooms were small and had definitely received a sub-par renovation. Putting lipstick on a pig is how I would describe it.  There is a ton of potential at this place, but it definitely hasn't been realized. $175 before tax should have been $100 max!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We didn't spend much time at the hotel during the day.  Front desk people were friendly, and helpful.
Summary: The room was clean, but you could hear traffic, and noise in the hallway was loud.  When we checked out, I noticed that I had forgotten some close in the wardrobe. I called the front desk, and I was told nothing was turned in.  My advice is to make sure that nothing is left in the room, since it will be taken.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The valet workers where the most nicest people
Summary: Can't complain about the valet. They were very helpful especially the lady that was working, the towels In the bathroom were dirty looked like they never came to pick it up and blankets looked like they haven't been washed! No laundry room to wash our clothes sucked!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our room was very clean and tidy. The employees were exceptionally accommodating, and in-room dining met all expectations. Lovely outdoor pool/hot tub area. Very convenient to John Wayne/Orange County Airport, with complimentary transportation. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is one of the better Hilton properties which offers terrific service and well-appointed rooms.  At the time of reservation, I was able to secure a room with only a king-sized bed (executive room), so what a fabulous surprise when upon check-in, the friendly agent was able to upgrade us to a room with two beds.  She also proceeded to forward the rest of my requested (free) amenities to our new room which I think was no longer in the executive floor as the room did not contain upgraded amenities such as the mini fridge, plush bathrobes and slippers.  But no matter----it was great to be in a comfortable and very clean room in an excellent location.  We were there for a campus tour of nearby UC Irvine.  This hotel is also within 5 miles of the gorgeous Fashion Island mall in
Manager Response: Dear luxetrip,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am always happy to hear about positive experiences, especially with our team members. I am glad that the Guest Service Agent was able to take care of your needs and you enjoyed the hotel and surrounding area.  Thanks again and I look forward to welcoming you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Good place across John Wayne Airport
Summary: Good place to stay.  Parking is expensive (24/29).  Some restaurant choices nearby.  Rooms are very clean and staff is friendly and try to be helpful.  Room amenities are just okay, nothing to brag about.
Manager Response: Dear edgarinct,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the location of our hotel, clean rooms and friendly staff. Yes, we do charge for parking as it is managed by a separate company, as is most in the area. I do hope that we can welcome you back again soon.  Thanks again  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Stayed here three nights for a business trip:  Pros: -Across the street from the airport -Very clean -Very friendly staff -Nice pool and fitness center -Very cold AC  Cons: -No refrigerator (despite the fact that there was a place for it, and it almost appeared that a refrigerator used to be there) -Shower water pressure was disappointing
Manager Response: Dear Rick P,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel, staff and amenities that we offer. I do think we are ideal for business and leisure guests. I am sorry to hear about the refrigerator in your room. Many of our rooms do have refrigerators in them and we do have a few additional that can be delivered in the future. I will forward this to housekeeping to ensure one is placed in the room for the next guest.  Thanks again and we look forward to having you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Not up to typical Hilton standards
Summary: Very disappointed, not a good experience! Staff was not friendly, helpful or knowledgeable. The hotel was dirty. I would not recommend this hotel or stay here again. You expect good things when you stay at a Hilton.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: One of the best deals in the OC
Summary: I don't know why I always get such a great price at this hotel but I find it to be a terrific value for a Hilton property that is so well kept and has so many amenities. It can add up if you have to park a car but that's true nearly anywhere in the area.    The hotel bar has good service and food and the pool operates a poolside bar and grill (hot dogs, hamburgers, beer, and wine) on Friday and Saturday evenings.  Great pool area, immaculate rooms, and excellent service at every stay!
Manager Response: Dear Susie1473,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I love reading reviews of our guests that have enjoyed our hotel, staff and amenities. I am so glad that you did just that!! We have just started the BBQ by the pool recently and it has been a great success for both the hotel and our guests.  Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Staff was rude, non of the rooms we reserved were ready until an hour or more after check in time. The shower didn't work, the sink didn't drain in one room and one room had ants everywhere even in the bed
Manager Response: none

Summary: We checked in via mobile phone, but we're not notified of our room number. When we arrived at 11 pm, we had to check in at the desk. The customer in front of us had the same problem. Charles, at the check in desk, was very helpful and gracious. He apologized several times for the inconvenience.  He was also quite thorough in getting us all the info we needed to be comfortable during our short stay.  We had a king room. It was very comfortable. I love it when there are outlets on the lamp base to charge phones etc. They even had USB charging receptacles.  We checked out at 7:30 am. Super short stay, but we got the rest we needed.  16 mins. To Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear suzimini,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear that the E-Checking and digital key did not work for you. That is a very handy piece of technology and our guests do seem to enjoy using it. I am glad however that Charles took the time to ensure you had what you needed for your stay. I will be sure to pass this along to him.  Thanks again and I look forward to welcoming you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Poor quality of mattresses in this hotel, bad experience.  Shower was broken but was taken care of, but its a bad experience for the family.  nICE POOL, NICE RESTAURANT, but they charge for self parking.  Convenient location though.
Manager Response: Smit C,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sad to hear that it didn't meet your expectations, but I thank you for bringing this to my attention. I will have both housekeeping and engineering address the issues right away.  Thanks again and I hope to welcome you back in the future.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: This hotel was located by the airport.  The airport and surrounding businesses, restaurants and activities were very accessible.  The staff was professional, friendly, and accommodating.  The hotels decor and outside grounds and pool area were beautiful.  The rooms were spacious, clean, and the beds were comfortable.  This was my second stay here and I plan on booking it again in the near future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My nephew and I orginally were going to NYC for the weekend but due to the storms in Chicago as well as the East (and after him sitting in the airport for almost NINE hours... one of the major downsides to standby travel) we decided to make a change and come West instead... one of the advantages of my job: a change on the fly isn't a problem.  We arrived just as the noise curfew took effect (if you don't arrive before 23:00/11:00 p.m. you get diverted and sent to LAX) and, since we hadn't planned to come here, had to track down a place to stay. Luckily, the Hilton had space... and for a last minute, we need a room NOW reservation on a Friday night, the price wasn't overly horrible.  We had room 533, which overlooks the pool... normal bed checks done... nothing there but us and
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Hilton Orange County is definitely a Hotel that charges a premium and provides Motel 6 service. I have stayed at this hotel multiple times, yet always treated as if it were my first visit. This speaks to the hotel staff ability to notice what their check-in screen is telling them. Their greeting is programed and never have they ever provided any room upgrade. I had a problem with a reservation and they were rude and when I asked to speak with the manager I was dropped durning the transfer process...what a surprise. I then went online and looked up the hotel phone number and called back and left a voice message asking for a return call with the operations manager...Surprise I have never received a call back  If you have a choice exercise it! Pick another hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There are insufficient staff at weekends to provide the level of service I expect at a business hotel of this grade and price. Expect long wait times when checking-in, or having your questions answered, or ordering food at the bar.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Date Night-Great clean and welll maintained hotel
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a date night.  The staff was good at check in and our room was really clean and nicely maintained.  You can tell that they take pride in the maintenance of their hotel.  The bed was also very clean and comfortable.  We went to the bar and it was very busy.  There was some sort of event in the hotel (water polo and it also looked like a formal event as well)  The bartender was quite busy and there was only one bartender but I do see how the group may have been unexpected therefore hard to plan for.  There was a bar set up by the pool that had guests waiting but we assumed that was for the event.  The only thing I would suggest is for maybe management to direct some of the event people to that bar or maybe pull a bartender inside to help the one
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pretty average for what we received.  The hotel is not full service for diamond members.  There is no real reason to be here unless you need to catch a flight. Breakfast was decent, service was not prepared for a full restaurant. There was only one waiter no coffee no silverware no clean tables. There's definitely work to be done on the food and beverage experience for this particular hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: After a long day at a wedding and reception all we wanted to do is fall down in the room we booked two months before, and pass out. We arrived and were told that it was apparent that we had booked the room, but OOPS they over booked...kind of like musical chairs, but I guess we didn't hear the music stop. The staff were not sympathetic and although we were promised a reduced rate, did not receive it. I spoke to the day staff the next day and got the same attitude; take it or leave it. Expected more of a Hilton.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked a room on a Friday night through Priceline. No problems at check-in, but when I got to my first room, it smelled like an old cigar ashtray. The front desk switched my room without an issue, but the next room they gave me was a handicap accessible room. There were ants all over the wet bar area which I cleaned up. The front desk offered to switch me again or clean the ants, but I decided I didn't want the hassle again.  Not switching was a mistake. The ants returned, and the shower situation in the room was bizarre. The accessible shower allows water to run all over the floor making it a pain when your wife is showering and you are trying to brush your teeth with dry feet (I really don't get the accessible shower. If you are in a wheelchair, there is no seat to sit on to
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice hotel mainly serving the traveling public
Summary: My only reason for not rating it higher is the lack of a formal dining room.  There is a bar and tables where you can order drinks and food, including breakfast.  Room service is also available, so for business travelers leaving early or arriving late, there is a resource.  We were there on business, for which it is a very convenient location. Easy access to the OC airport, and to the 405 freeway. Even if flying into another LA area airport, the location is arrived at through major Freeways.  But then, there is LA/ Orange county/ San Diego traffic. I lived many years in this area--years ago, there used to be "rush hour traffic".  Today this lasts all day it seems!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice rooms, convenient to John Wayne Airport
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a week long training.  The food was excellent and the service was also exemplary.  Even though there was a set buffet, if I asked for something else, it was gotten without hesitation.  The way service should be.  My room was very comfortable and always cleaned when I returned from my meetings.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My company choose to host our two day conference at the Hilton in Irvine. Our employees needing lodging usually stay there. This time, I was able to experience the conference and catering services. I was especially impressed how the front desk attendant made a concerted effort to call me by name and inquire to my needs and satisfaction during my visit. It made me feel valued and glad to be a Hilton Honors member.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Double beds are always inferior to having two queens in a room. Other than that, all was pretty typical with this Hilton. It's an old hotel but no complaints about its condition. Breakfast is not included, FYI. They allow pets on the 2nd floor - that's why we were there. Wi-fi, although limited by # of devices, was included with our level of Hilton Honors.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hotel is fine. 2 star is for Horrible internet speed!
Summary: Called front desk each day of my stay regarding painfully slow wifi. Asked twice for them to reboot router. They said it could be because I was streaming. I was just checking email! Now taking me forever to sent this review. Hotel is fine, but if you are trying to work, the wifi in your room is terrible! Plus got back to room at 4:30 and hadn't been cleaned.  Won't be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good for business, less for family
Summary: Stayed at the hotel for one night and it was really good.  The room is modern, clean, with a TV and more than 40 channels to choose from. The bathroom is big and comfortable. The staff is friendly and helpful. There is nothing to complain about.  But… This is not a “romantic getaway” hotel. Nor this is a place for a family stay. The location is comfortable if you need to stay close to the JWA Airport (5 min) but for anything else? Not so much. Breakfast is served in the main entrance hall, so you sit, and people are walking around you to get to the parking lot. If you’d like to enjoy the pool – It’s pretty small and few steps away from the parking lot, so it’s not fun, the feeling is that you are swimming between cars, almost. One great thing, though – They have special chairs
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Poor Service forced us to check out early
Summary: This hotel is a great location across from SNA. Unfortunately the service in the restaurant and bar was notably awful. The staff literally ignored our table and we were forced to get our own drinks and had to find a manager to get our food ordered and then delivered. The fresh fruit and yogurt at breakfast were both great, however the rest of the buffet was inedible. We left a day early after 3 separate subpar experiences with the bar and dining facilities. Not my typical Hilton experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you are looking for a good option around the John Wayne airport this place is a nice option.  Rooms were clean and quiet and bed was very comfortable.  Self parking was expensive so just drop your car off at the rental car location across the street and save yourself a bit of $$.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I am a very loyal Hilton Hhonors customer and stay at Hiltons nationwide.  I stayed at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County on June 11, and was very disappointed.  The service was nonexistent, the facilities were in need of a serious update, the food was horrible. This stay causes me to question whether I should continue to stay at Hilton hotels.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I travel for work and am a frequent guest of this hotel because of it's cleanliness, polite team members,  overall great experience during each stay and location. The room service menu has a nice broad selection and also offers consistent customer service with delicious food! I have not used the hotel amenities, but they appear to be well maintained.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I informed the receptionist that I had a pet but she failed to mention the pet cleaning fee. I even asked if there was a pet fee and she said no. I had a baby and two small dogs so when I arrived and they threw the $75.00 pet fee onto the room expense I had no choice but to pay it. Definitely poor service to not inform you of hidden cost. Especially when I asked when booking the room!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good hotel for the area. We have stayed at different hotels in area before. Front desk should have told us of parking fee at check-in. Front desk gave us a list of restaurants for the area. We have been to area many times and wanted a new seafood restaurant
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The place to stay during a getaway or business
Summary: This hotel is the best. Had the best stay and comfortable hotel. This hotel is very clean, beautiful and everyone is very accommodating. Close to the airport and feels like a 5 star hotel. It's a nice hotel for business, couples, family, friends or alone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just a heads up if paying cash for incidentals it is $100 , compared to $50 if paying by card. Rooms are a good size, with a comfortable  bed and clean. Combined bath/shower , bathroom spotless. Staff very helpful and welcoming.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good place for a single or couple travel stay but too tight for a family of four
Summary: I would definitely host a day or evening function at this hotel because it has good staff and three clean, gorgeous bathroom areas in the lobby. I was up working in the lobby very early every morning and was able to use their complimentary coffee bar and witness how skillfully the night clerk managed every unusual situation that came through those front doors. They also had a reliable security guard on patrol during that time so I was impressed.   When we first checked into the hotel the young male day clerk was lacking customer service savvy and was cold, but soon a more seasoned woman took over our account and streamlined our arrival into our room and we were grateful for it had been a very long drive and day to get to Irvine.  Our room was cleaned daily and we were able to
Manager Response: none

Summary: Pros: Good location, good dinner, friendly bar, pool / spa and gym.  Cons: Outdated rooms, room has very poor noise isolation, hall way smells dirty, room a/c system is loud, broken electrical outlet by coffee machine.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room and pool area very clean. Bed was comfortable. Room service, the food was decent. (Not overpriced) Valet was on top of things but a little pricey. Called for towels and they never came. No towels in pool area either. Called for help with my luggage and they never came. They advertise with balcony but the door only opens 4 inches so you can't use it. No central air AC the unit in the room was noisy. Walls were thin , I could hear conversations and toilets flushing.  The shower didn't have a door, it's wide open, water pressure was weak. Location convenient to the airport. I would stay here again but it wasn't my favorite. I wouldn't say it was worth the $300 for one night
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lousy service, lousy bar food, no refrigerator in the unit, ordered one for $10/day, but it never arrived.  Not even small complimentary 12 oz. water bottles in Executive rooms, extremely long waits for bell person at check out.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel - great service, convenient location
Summary: Used this hotel for a business trip.  Clean, well maintained and comfortable room.  Good bed.  Effective air conditioner.  Very helpful staff.  Good food.  Very convenient location for the airport. Will use when I visit again next year.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great stay at the Hilton convenient location to South Coast Shopping Mall and the John Wayne Airport. Friendly staff and spacious, clean rooms . Would definitely stay there again! Lovely bar, pool and restaurant, plus great value!  epicureangal2015
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was clean. We did not have any issues with staff EXCEPT WITH CHARLES (Night Front Desk) he has a sassy mouth and I didn't appreciate it. Don't buy the internet from Hilton because if you close your laptop the connection will stop and you will not have access again. Per the front dest it is supposed to last 24 hrs from the time you purchase the internet. The rooms were kept clean fresh towels. The pools and jacuzzi was also kept clean. We really enjoyed our stay. The bummer of this hotel is even if you stay here and self park it is $20-22 a night for parking which is crazy. The location of this hotel is awesome.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Stay Right by the Airport
Summary: If you are flying into John Wayne airport, I would recommend this hotel. It is reasonably priced and has complimentary shuttle service to the airport. The digit check-in is great, and you can use your smartphone to unlock your door. The rooms were nice, and the hotel was walking distance from a number of restaurants. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Decent Business Hotel, just across the airport
Summary: as expected for a business trip. Nothing bad, nothing outstanding. Small bugbear: 3 or 4 coffee servings vs 1 single English Breakfast Tea bag.... i dont drink coffee, and shop in lobby does not carry tea... :(
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Easy, Accommodating Orange County Airport Hotel
Summary: I travel to Irvine California for business 2-3 times per year. I stay at this Hilton because I don't have to hire a car. My appointments are within the 3-5 mile range that the hotel offers a free shuttle from hotel to my office buildings and back to the hotel...meaning I don't have to drive in the insanely crowded California traffic. The hotel is also across the street from the airport (literally) which is very nice as I walk to it to stretch my legs after a long flight and enjoy the almost always sunny day. The hotel is an older Hilton but the staff is very professional and the restaurant is more than adequate for food needs on a quick trip. This Hilton makes the trip so easy and allows me to focus on my business without the logistical headaches of dealing with Southern
Manager Response: Dear WATraveler13,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and thank you for choosing us for your travels. I am glad that you are able to take advantage of our location to the airport as well as your office. I too wish I could avoid this crazy California traffic and walk to the office some days. We hope to welcome you back as our guest in the near future.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel again on June 19, 2016 for 1 night. Lobby & pool renovations are complete & it looks very nice. Checked in at 2:30 & room I wanted wasn't ready so took another one. Room was nice & clean so I didn't mind except that it didn't have a mini fridge. Beds are comfortable and rooms are quiet. Can't hear airport or street noise which is great.
Manager Response: Dear 319elap,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. As you could imagine, we are VERY excited that the renovations are complete as well. I am glad you enjoyed the updates and amenities within the hotel. For future stays, we would be happy to deliver a mini refrigerator to your room (when available) as we have a select few. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: It would be hard to get much closer to an airport unless you were actually on the airport grounds.  This Hilton is right across the street from the Orange County/Santa Ana/John Wayne (SNA) airport.  Convenient is an understatement!  The shuttle ride is a couple of minutes.  It is in easy walking distance, especially with the wonderful southern California weather, but I did not see any easy way to walk from the hotel to the airport, so I recommend the shuttle.  The hotel is a little dated.  The chair at the desk in my room would not adjust any higher.  The pantry was out of almost everything when I arrived, though they did restock it later.  I had a nice line of ants invade the room, though I admit, I was too tired to complain about this and the staff was mortified when I told
Manager Response: Dear Jay W,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad that you took advantage of our proximity to the airport. I agree that MacArthur Blvd can be a bit busy. For future reference, the walking path is just north of the hotel and using the crosswalk at airport way. Many of our guests do enjoy walking in the sunny weather. I am so sorry to hear about your in-room experience and will make sure the exterminating company double checks the room.  Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: One of the few hotels near John Wayne Airport that have a parking package. Make sure to ask for the parking pass to get through the parking gate after your trip. The parking attendant was very accommodating, but confirmed I should have been given a parking pass. I did ask two different people at the front desk if I needed one and was told no. Over all the hotel was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was a bit on the pricey side for  a buffet, but the waiters were great. Shuttle was on time. Oh, parking can be a challenge. It's hard to find a space that's not towards the very back. It's a bit of a walk from the back to the hotel entrance.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie M,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of our close location to the airport. I'm sorry for any miscommunication on our part and appreciate you bringing it to our attention.  Thanks again and we hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I selected this hotel because Hilton brands can always be trusted to provide an outstanding  level of service and comfort. Except for a little airport noise, this location achieves the Hilton standard of excellence.
Manager Response: Dear Joseph M,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and thank you for your loyalty to Hilton Worldwide. We are proud to be associated with Hilton and strive to maintain and exceed those standards. We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: My family booked 2 rooms for us on the last weekend of May to attend a family wedding in the area. The rooms were clean, comfy beds, large bathroom with tub shower. We haven't use their pool but it looks clean when we passed by. They have a huge parking area (+parking fee/night) on the side and back of the hotel. We have not used their wi fi because it has additional fees.
Manager Response: Dear Wildorchid99,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent weekend stay with us. I am happy to hear that you and your family were able to enjoy your time with us and more importantly the family wedding. I do hope we can welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Last night in California I chose the Hilton Irvine due to the proximity of the airport.  Man, was I impressed.  Daniel at check-in was fabulous.  He was so kind and helpful.  Nice, clean, updated rooms.  You could not hear any airplanes!   The bar was nice and had decent appetizers.   I had no real meal here.  I would definitely stay again on business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear Inkwife57,  Yes really :). I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that we can shatter the reputation of some "Airport Hotels". I always enjoy reading our team member names on these reviews and will be sure to share your comments with Daniel. I do hope we can welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Had a flight cancellation and airline put us up at the Hilton across the street.  It was a much nicer hotel than I expected.  The hotel and rooms were clean and up to date. It was a pleasant surprise and would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear BarnScott,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad that you enjoyed your time with us, even though it was because of a flight cancellation. We are proud of our recent renovations and hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I found the Hilton Irvine/Orange County-Airport to be incredibly clean and modern, in an exceptional location within Orange County. The staff were friendly and helpful.  As this was just a very short overnight stay, I did not have an opportunity to take advantage of the hotel's amenities.  Nevertheless, I strongly recommend this hotel if you are staying in the area.
Manager Response: Dear James A,  What a great review to open up and read. I truly appreciate you taking the time to review your recent stay. I know the staff will be happy to read your comments and hope you can come back again soon and stay a little longer to enjoy the amenities.  Thanks again!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this property last week on business. It is a nice hotel close to John Wayne Airport. The place is clean and the rooms are nice expect for a dangerous shower floor in my room. During a shower I slipped and fell out of the tub with the shower curtain ( lucky for me ) breaking my fall. The internet in my room also was poor
Manager Response: Dear LABill75225,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so truly sorry for the experience you had in the shower and I appreciate you bringin it to our attention. We do offer shower mats in each room and I will follow up with housekeeping to ensure they are being distributed. Outside of that incident, I am glad you enjoyed our hotel and hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: No coffee maker and a hassle with shipping a package
Summary: I arrived on the evening before my departure from John Wayne Airport which is conveniently located across the street. I had been in CA for 8 days at 55 years old and managed many reservations and trips by myself.  I had stayed at the Hampton Inn, Temecula, CA (top-notch), the Doubletree, Charlottesville, VA (top-notch), and at MarBrisa Resort, Carlsbad, CA (I am an HGVClub member times two).  I knew the Hilton was at the top of the HHonors program and knew my experience would be satisfactory.  It was not!!  I had a package (via USPS) to ship to Florida and I have done this at Waikoloa, HI, and several other Hilton properties with no problem.  So - I get there and check in, present the package and tell them they can put it on my credit card.  So - they say that the USPS comes
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I have traveled to Newport and Irvine for the Lido Boat show and we usually stayed at another chain. It was nice and clean and expensive, but the Hilton topped them with self parking, nice accommodations and great customer service from the time of arrival to the room service, dinning and bar staff and front desk staff. Our stay was nice, relaxing and very enjoyable due to location of hotel and close to Fashion Island, Rogers Nursery and Lido Boat show. The hotel is quiet and in walking distance to Gullivers' restaurant, IHop, Starbucks and the Bagel shop.
Manager Response: Dear Larry B,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and the proximity to the local area attractions and restaurants. I am very pleased to hear about your experience with our staff. I do feel that they make the difference and will be sharing your comments with them.  Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I flew in for business meetings. They made my trip not feel like a business trip which I appreciate after a long day of meetings. Everyone is so friendly and nice. Shuttle was on-time, greeted by everyone, check-in was quick and the room was nice. Thanks Guys!!
Manager Response: Dear Tiarelei W,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and hope your meetings were successful. I will be sure to share your experience with the staff.  We hope to welcome you back again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: A good option for SNA airport travelers
Summary: We stayed just one night prior to our early morning flight out of Orange County/John Wayne (SNA) airport.  The hotel is very nice - we were in a recently updated room and it was clean and nicely laid out, with a small coffee maker.  We inquired about a room with a fridge to keep a few items we had brought with us cold, and were told it was an additional $10 per night, which we didn't feel was worth it.  The major ding I had was that there was an intermittent (several times and hour) high pitched squealing sound (maybe water pipes???) that woke me up numerous time during the night.  Thus the "poor" rating for sleep quality.  Parking is easy and although we took the hotel shuttle over to the airport the next morning, it is an easy walk and very do-able, provided you're not loaded
Manager Response: Dear Dogma13,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear that you took advantage of the proximity to the John Wayne Airport and that you enjoyed the updated rooms. I am truly sorry to hear about the noise you experienced as that is not a normal challenge that guests experience. I have the Engineering team looking into what that could be and resolve it. Thank you for bringing that to our attention.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Attended a conference here and enjoyed the great service.  The rooms are very clean and comfortable.  The restaurant has great food offerings at a fair price.  Staff are very gracious, helpful and accommodating.  Lovely experience overall.
Manager Response: Dear Deborah H,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to hear about your overall experience. I will be sure to pass on your comments to the staff and I hope to welcome you back in the very near future.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: While the hotel was fine, the hotel parking (gated) was a disaster.  Simply put, I paid for parking on my bill (as did many others) and the gate wouldn't allow anyone to leave the parking lot for literally an hour (happened on 4/27)! It took that long to finally get someone to let people out and then we all had to pay cash (on top of what's been charged on my bill).  Honestly that was unacceptable.  Client meeting was missed and no one at the hotel cared to resolve the problem.  Line to leave the hotel was at least 100 cars deep by the time I got out, and refund was never provided on bill for parking after I had to pay addition cash just to exit the hotel lot.
Manager Response: Dear Josh K,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so sorry to hear about your experience with the parking gate. We did have 2 large groups leaving at the exact same time and it was difficult to coordinate the exit for our parking company. I truly apologize that no one communicated or followed up with you regarding this. I do see you stayed and I have already refunded the parking charge that was on your room folio.  I do hope we can welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: medium hotel, clean room, limited amenities
Summary: just a place to sleep not a hotel that I would call comfortable. convenient airport location bit clumsy access expensive to park minimal facilities towels and coffee supply. close to freeway and to the airport and shopping mall
Manager Response: none

Summary: Due to plane issue in Cabo,I missed the flight to Vegas.  I  was put up here.  What a nice place. The check in was easy,the staff was friendly and helpful.  The room was spotless 3 pillows on the bed. A Hilton trademark.  Big points for having tea in the room. Great bathroom amenities.  The hotel bar /restaurant staff was attentive and the French onion soup was delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Michelaay,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear that your flight was delayed and your travel was disrupted. I am happy however that this gave you the opportunity to experience our hotel. I will be sure to share your experience with the team and I do agree that the soup is delicious!!  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I went for a business trip which also involved kids (a dance convention/competition).  Very comfortable and clean.  Staff very friendly.  Food service a little slow.  It was very close to the John Wayne Airport which was very convenient.  Starbucks and a little bagel/sandwich shop was in walking distance.  Pool was nice, with lots of chairs and space.
Manager Response: Dear Jolene J,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the hotel and the amenities we offer. We hear about our pool quite frequently and look at it as a big asset to the overall experience.  We hope to welcome you back soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I was here for a quick stay. The property was very nice and the staff was kind. The property seemed to be filled to capacity and their weren't enough employees to go around.   A quick tip...stay in rooms facing the back of the hotel and not the front.
Manager Response: Dear ChadNYC212,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to read your comments about the property and the staff. I will be sure to pass on your comments to the team. You are correct that we were sold out and very busy during the dates of your stay and I'm glad you were still able to enjoy.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: No clean sheets or towels. Hilton honors members get nothing, no upgrade, nothing.  Bar is the restaurant, restaurant is in the lobby very bizarre set up.  Surprised this is a Hilton as it doesn't meet their standards.
Manager Response: Dear David H,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly sorry that your experience did not live up to your expectations. We do take customer service and amenities seriously and I will definitely follow up with the staff and housekeeping. I do appreciate your Hilton Hhonors membership and hope we can welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I had a company outing in Irvine which required my boyfriend and I to stay overnight in the area. I found the room to be very clean,tidy and spacious. My only complaints would be the lack of refrigerator in the room so we had no way of keeping any water/drinks cold or perishable items good. The only other thing would be when booking the room we thought we were getting a great deal but it didn't make you aware anywhere that you would be paying an additional $22 for overnight parking. Other than that it was pleasant for a one night stay.
Manager Response: Dear Chicklet2016,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am happy to hear that you found the rooms clean and spacious. I do apologize for the lack of refrigerator and the parking charges. We do have refrigerators available upon request if available. We do also charge for parking as it is operated by a third party company.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: The staff here are EXCELLENT- better than almost any hotel I have ever visited.  The rooms seemed a bit dated and generic for a Hilton, but the hotel is literally right across the street from the John Wayne Airport/Orange County airport, so it was super convenient.  Price was typical, but actually pretty good for this expensive area- most other hotels nearby were higher.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kenyon K,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to read your comments about the staff in the hotel. We work hard to ensure all of our team members are engaged and willing to assist. I will be sure to share your comments with the team.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Our stay at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport was exceptional. The room was spotless, beautifully decorated, and quiet. We had a nice view of the pool area from the 5th floor. Breakfast buffet was delicious and the all day menu was filled with amazing options. Wait staff was superb, check in was fast and courteous, and parking attendants were so helpful. We enjoyed every moment of our stay.
Manager Response: Dear KrisandDan,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I love reading these types of positive reviews and will be sure to share your experience with the team at the hotel.   We hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Great price, clean hotel, but you get what you pay for with the service. Front desk not extremely helpful.  Needed a box of tissue that turned into 2 phone calls to housekeeping and a trip to the front desk... but never received a box of tissue. Don't have central air, still have wall units in each room.  Also, 2 adults in a double bed is not good.  Need to upgrade to queen beds at some point.
Manager Response: Dear Adrian W,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly sorry about the lack of communication and delivery of the requested items. We do strive to complete all requests in a timely manner and failed to do so this time. I will be sure to share your experience with the staff for future interactions. We have also just implemented a texting service with our guests to better ensure proper and timely delivery of requests.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Hilton airport with modern decor and great convenient location next to SNA
Summary: I have recently spent two nights here at Hilton Irvine, as I have to attend an event in UC Irvine, as well as flying out from SNA.    Despite the rather dated exterior of the hotel, the interior looks very modern and there is a convenient business center with free printing, as well as lots of comfortable sofa areas.  The bar and hotel restaurant are located towards the back of the lobby.    Check-in agent, Matthew, was very friendly and my room, 830, was very pleasant.  The bed was comfortable and I enjoyed my view over the landing path of SNA.  Despite being closed to the airport, the noise was not bad, especially SNA has a noise curfew.  But during the daytime, it was really okay too.   The high speed Internet was fine, but it went down after midnight during my second night in
Manager Response: Dear Adrian L,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and thank you for your loyalty to Hilton Hotels. As a Diamond member, I know how many nights you spend in hotels during the year and appreciate you continuing to do so. I am glad that you had a pleasant experience with the service staff at the hotel and that your room was nice. I apologize for the breakfast experience and can assure you, we are making big changes in the food and beverage areas of our hotel in the coming months.   I do hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the hotel again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Nothing was right at this hotel. I always stay at Hilton hotels but this one was just off. Staff was rude, requests made weren't fulfilled properly, keys didn't work. I will stay at Hiltons in the future but I will never stay at this hotel again. What a waste - I could have stayed at a WAY nicer hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Erica P,  We are sorry that you had a disappointing experience during your stay with us. At Hilton, we always aim to ensure every guest feels cared for, valued and respected. Your feedback will help us deliver this brand promise. guest satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Great stay.  Literally across from the SNA Airport Lots of shops in walking distance Great Pool Hot Tub was hot But no towels near the pool Wifi Access is good I would stay here again if parking was not as expensive.
Manager Response: Dear Ellanora W,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed the amenities and your stay with us. I am sorry to hear about the towels and will make sure they are constantly replenished. In the future we also offer many different packages on our website that include parking.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I write this as a Hilton Honours Diamond member - We were kindly greeted upon arrival, the room was dated, but comfy beds. Internet was slow and the issue i had was the next morning trying to eat breakfast when hundreds of kids were checking out. I did not know the Hilton took in teams so trying to enjoy a quiet breakfast was impossible as all teams used the big doors behind us and they went through the restaurant to exit that morning. Not impress.
Manager Response: Dear Joe J,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. First and foremost I want to thank you for your Diamond Loyalty. To maintain that level, you put in a lot of time in our hotels and we appreciate it. I am sorry to hear about your experience at breakfast. We do have many different groups in-house throughout the year, but we should have contained the group better at check out for you to enjoy breakfast.  Thank you again and we hope to welcome you back again soon  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Excellent location across from the airport. Beautifully updated with almost every detail taken care of. Giant room we received on floor 6. Newly carpeted so soft and bouncy. Age still shows with beat up elevator doors inside and service doors, popcorn ceilings (probably too expensive to remove since pre-'79 it contained asbestos. Original windows so no sound muffling - there is airport noise and backing up truck beeping most of the night for our stay.  Overall very nice! No vending machine contained water (didn't want the $3 Evian in the room, so had to go to commissary). Staff very friendly. Sign up for Hilton Honor club for free to avoid having to pay for Wi-Fi!  Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for reviewing your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed the upgrades we completed on the hotel. We have received very positive feedback. We are still working on the elevator cabs and should have those completed in the coming month. I am glad that you signed up for the Hilton HHonors program and hope you will continue to enjoy the perks.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: If you are in search of a clean comfortable room that is as close to SNA airport as possible, then this is the place for you.  Service is good and air conditioner in the room functions well.  Be aware that since it is right across the street from the airport, you can hear every plane that takes off.  This can be more noticeable at night if you are a light sleeper.  Also, self parking and wifi are 22 and 10 dollars per day respectively, which is quite expensive.  Finally, be aware that pets are allowed, and unfortunately, we were placed in a room next to a guest room containing a dog which barked non stop all night.  Earplugs were needed to drown out the noise.  We didn't complain or report this because we did not want to seem like The Grinch.  Otherwise, a decent quality room at
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I appreciate the comments on the location, room and service. I am very sorry that the neighboring dog barked throughout the night. We do love our pets, but also respect the peace and quiet of all guests. We have and will continue to monitor those situations and make the owners aware when this arises.  I do hope we can welcome you back in the future.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Hotel is in a perfect location. Staff was friendly. Room was clean and cold. Two of my priorities.   Try and stay in the east side of hotel where it's quieter. Never heard a single plane land or take off.   But again OC airport may have time restrictions.   As a diamond Member I was given a free drink and snack coupon thanking me for my loyalty.   Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear DDBEJ5,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and thank you for your Diamond loyalty. I know how much Diamond guests travel during the year and I am pleased that we met your expectations and hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik  General Manager

Summary: This was my second visit to the hotel.  Last time they were in the process of renovating the hotel and this time they had completed the renovation.  The room was very nice and the internet speeds were good.  The internet is free for Honors members.  The breakfast area was nice and the service was good.  My first room was a handicap room which I do not like the sinks, etc.  I went down to the desk and they immediately gave me another room.  If you are looking for a short term stay and want an efficient hotel with clean rooms that have been recently renovated then I would recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear South_Pacific_Seas,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so pleased that you were able to experience the hotel prior and after the renovation. We are very excited to be complete and welcome new and repeat guests to the hotel. I hope that this is the first of many repeat visits with us!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Dealt with horrible, disrespectful greeters.  Argumentative, non supported or helpful.  RUDE!  The food was ok, but not even worth the cost.  As a Hilton Honors person I couldn't believe it was actually happening when it was.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly J,  We are sorry that you had a disappointing experience during your stay with us. At Hilton, we always aim to ensure every guest feels cared for, valued and respected. Your feedback will help us deliver this brand promise. guest satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary Heading: Overal Very Good, But Some Problems
Summary: Very good common areas, well-designed, clean, and well kept.  Very good business hotel food/restaurant.  Room also clean w/ very comfortable beds and blankets/sheets.  So far, so good....  But, internet connection was weak (Room 727), you have to pay for the Wall Street Journal (should be free), and they didn't have water available or headphones in the gym.  Asked front desk for headphones, but was done w/ 30 minute workout before anyone brought them.  Worse, probably to save energy, the TV monitors on the treadmills/ellipticals don't work unless a headphone is plug, so I couldn't even watch the headlines or market ticker while I worked out.  Also, there was some garbage in the hallway on my floor when I checked in at 4 pm one day and it was still there at 8 am the next morning.
Manager Response: Dear Bob S,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. Thank you for the kind words about the Lobby, Restaurant and Rooms. I am sorry to hear about the internet issues in your room as well as the fitness center amenities. We are planning to upgrade our internet services this year and will follow up with housekeeping on the replenishment of the amenities.  Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you again soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: While the location was great to getting to the airport, the hotel shuttle was very slow.  The walls were paper thin and the airport noise was extremely loud, I have not had that much noise in years.  I could hear every cough and words from my next door neighbor as well as feeling like I was on the runway. So not good on this front.    On the plus side, I liked the morning staff, and the front desk people seemed friendly. The beer prices were outrageous, clearly taking advantage of a captive audience, but they did have some good local beers, and the bar tv got many sports channels. The tv in the room got many movie channels. The pool area was nice as was the outdoor seating.  The noise is what is bringing the rating down to average.
Manager Response: Dear Djrrossi,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear that you experienced noise from the airport and neighboring guests. In the future, we would be happy to relocate you if needed during your stay. I appreciate the kind words regarding the morning staff and will be sure to pass that along to them.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Good place to sleep before catching an early flight
Summary: We stayed here because of the proximity and shuttle to SNA airport. We booked a double room for 2 adults and 2 kids. The hotel was clean, although they were doing some renovation while were there. The room was typical, and no issues. Shuttle service was on time, and the breakfast in the restaurant was good (free as an HHonors member). Staff was friendly, and the beds were comfortable. Everything we needed on this particular stay. Good job Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear Alongftrip,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and that everything was satisfactory. I am also VERY happy to inform you that the renovation is now complete. We appreciate your patience and your loyalty as we improved our product. We hope that you will come back and visit us again.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Good location near airport.  Eat & drink elsewhere.
Summary: Bar and restaurant should be skipped, as service is poor.   I tried asking the bartender how to log into the hotel wifi.  When I did, without speaking, he turned and walked away to another customer.  My next request would have been for dinner and a drink.  Instead I went to a nearby competitor.  From the emptiness in the bar and restaurant, my guess is that this isn't an isolated incident.
Manager Response: Daniel M,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so sorry to hear about your experience in the bar/restaurant. This is not the level of service that we normally provide. We have made some significant changes in the food and beverage areas in the recent past and hope that we can welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Have stayed here on several occasions and have had good service, good food from their restaurant and easy access to the airport.  You can walk to it!  The pool is large and has ample seating around it.  Tennis court is under renovation.  Clean rooms and have never had a problem with ally check in.
Manager Response: Valady7,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased that you enjoyed the amenities and location to the airport. I hope we can welcome you back to enjoy the large tent area that is going in place of the tennis court.  Thanks again!!  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: the outside noise is very loud from the airport. Very hard to get a good night sleep. The room is small. No complementary parking. charge for daily parking is 20 dollars/day. Good shuttle service though.
Manager Response: Dear 553kimchit,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear about the noise from the airport. Some rooms are closer to the airport than others and perhaps we can accommodate you in a room further away. I appreciate the comment on the shuttle service as it is a great amenity for those traveling.  Thanks again and we look forward to your return.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for two nights for a Disneyland trip (yes I knew it was a 20 minute drive without traffic). After reading the reviews I was a bit hesitant. It is an older hotel, the low ceilings show that. It has been redone to be a bit modern. The room was comfortable and had what we needed. My daughters walked in and commented on how nice the hotel was. George and the front desk was very nice. There wasn't any airport noise as John Wayne has noise restrictions. The only down side was the expensive parking. I paid more here than I did at Disneyland.   If you are here on business or flying in or out of John Wayne, it's not a bad place. It's even better if you don't have to park a car.
Manager Response: Fragel82,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad that you chose to stay with us while enjoying Disneyland. I am glad that you and your family enjoyed your stay and you noticed the new renovation items. Like many hotels in the area, we do charge for parking as it is run by a third party company.  I hope that we can welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Excellent Staff from Sales, Catering, Banquet, Engineering, AV, Bar/Restaurant, Front Desk.  We conduct seminars all over he U.S. and NEVER had such EXCELLENT and PROFESSIONAL Service!!!!  I would HIGHLY recommend this hotel BAR NONE!!!!!!
Manager Response: Robert L,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. I am thrilled to hear that your meetings were a success!! I will be happy to share your experience with the entire team.  We hope to have you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Location is great but the rest is average. Hotel is quite nice but did not get the staff support I was expecting upon notifying staff on messy hallways. Twice asked but no action was taken...business trip & conference
Manager Response: Robert B,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I appreciate the feedback and want to apologize that the hallways were not cleared even after you notified the team members. I can assure you that I have addressed these issues in hopes that this doesn't happen again.  We look forward to your return soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Service at its best: how Dora and Miguel saved the day!
Summary: I travel the world for business and my hotel choice is critical. My recent stay of three nights at this hotel was excellent. Well located and well run, this hotel delivers high standards of service and cleanliness. At all times, the staff were attentive and friendly, without being intrusive. Special mention to Dora and Miguel (Saucedo) for willingly and instantly fixing a booking glitch that could have forced me to pay a 'no show' penalty. Thank you! I highly recommend this hotel and will stay there when next I am in town. Well done Hilton Irvine!
Manager Response: Robin D,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear about your experience with Miguel and Dora. They are a true asset to our team and I will be sure to pass along your kind words.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I always select Hilton Hotels when traveling for business or pleasure. This last trip I had internet issues, which was very frustrating when you need your computer when on the road. I will continue to select Hilton as this was an isolated insulated incident, but frustrating.
Manager Response: Myrna G,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and thank you for your continued loyalty to Hilton. I am sorry to hear about your frustration with the internet in the hotel. We are planning to upgrade the entire infrastructure in 2016.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Just across the street from OC airport great location but average service/amenities
Summary: Stayed for two nights and you could literally walk across the street and stay in this hotel. Lobby is nice (service from the front desk is ok - not good and not bad); Rooms were ok except for the air conditioning unit that squeaks every time it goes off and on (just showing its age is all - not broken). Had an opportunity to use the gym which has 3 treadmills and a weight area (again not bad) but nothing special. My only real complaint was the service in the restaurant. Had breakfast two days and it was quite busy (not a smile on a single server and you need to flag them down for coffee); if you need silverware, you get it but with a scowl (I'm not sure why the servers are so unhappy but it shows). They have two prices for the buffet breakfast and was charged incorrectly both
Manager Response: Dear Nav531,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad you were able to take advantage of the location near the airport. I am sorry to hear about your experiences in the guestroom and the restaurant. Although the restaurant may be busy, it is our job to maintain a positive attitude and service with a smile. I will definitely speak to the restaurant staff about your experience in hope of raising our service levels moving forward.  Thanks again and I look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I had a horrible experience here: the hotel is under renovation; not only did they not disclose this online when I made my reservation, but they didn't disclose it at check-in.  I was given a room in a serious construction zone, where drywall dust, spackle, paint fumes, and construction debris line the floors. Watch out for nails! Or broken glass! Don't breathe in the toxic fumes! Be careful with the cancerous dust!  Bright and early on the morning of my 1-night stay, I was woken to loud Spanish music  and banging on my door. Apparently the crews were working on my door and the trim around it in the hallway. While I was in the bathroom, I could hear a drill out in the hallway penetrate the bathroom wall. Guess they were making peep-holes for the workers!  I complained in the
Manager Response: Michael_K_SNJ,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. First and foremost I would like to apologize for the miscommunication regarding the renovation both during the booking and check-in process. We definitely missed the opportunity to inform you of the work being done. Secondly, I also want to apologize for your room placement and the construction going on around it. That was not planned nor communicated properly by both the construction company and the hotel. I am happy to say that the renovations were complete about a month ago and hope that we could welcome you back in the future to experience what you should have on your first visit.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Comfy bed, small room, front desk people should improve
Summary: Hotel website describes rooms on "Executive" floor as having a small fridge. I made my choice based on this information.  However, there was NO small fridge in the room when we checked in.  Since it was already late into the night when we arrived, it was a nuisance to have to call the front desk to ask and wait for it.  Front desk people a hit & miss, overall sub-par for the price I paid to stay at this hotel.  It seems that since the hotel went from corporate owned to private franchise a couple of years ago, customer service has deteriorated.
Manager Response: Dear thepamperedtraveler,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am truly disappointed that the level of service you were provided did not meet your expectations. We strive to deliver great guest experiences and we seem to have missed the ball during your stay. I will surely follow up with the front desk staff and ensure they understand the importance of good customer service.  We hope to welcome you back in the future  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: This hotel is in a great location, but is in serious need of updating. The thermostat still controls a wall mounted old time Amana heater/AC unit that is loud all night long, the shower heads merely trickle water, and the printer in the business center was broken with no fax machine backup at the front desk. On the plus side, the buffet was delicious and reasonable, and the restaurant staff was very prompt. I suspect you can do better, but if you need the Hilton points, don't plan on working at the business center.
Manager Response: Dear Warm Weather Traveler,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am sorry to hear that the AC unit and shower and business center did not meet your expectations. I apologize that these items weren't in proper working order nor fixed immediately. I am glad that you enjoyed the breakfast options and thank you for your Hilton Loyalty.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: We needed a place to stay close to the airport and were very pleased with the accommodations.    I would stay there again.   We enjoyed our room, it was clean and comfortable.   We ate in the restaurant at the Hotel, service was a little slow to start, but food was prepared well and my family enjoyed it.  We would stay there again if we needed to be close to airport for early flight.  The shuttle took us right to the airport, and that was great!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Typical perfect Hilton Stay.  Good food in the restaurant, relaxing bar and great staff combine to make this a pleasant business trip.  I was pleasantly surprised at how good the food was in the restaurant, good quality and well plated.  Service was a bit slower than I would have liked but that was due to a packed service (usually a good sign).  Staff was very pleasant (even when dealing with the boorish lady ahead of me at check-out!
Manager Response: Dear Tim P,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. I will be sure to pass along your accolades to our Executive Chef and the Culinary staff.   Thanks again and we look forward to having you as our guest again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: The staff is all very professional and friendly but the room had wet carpet as it had just been shampooed when I arrived at 6pm.  There was no coffee maker in the room and when I called to have one brought up, I found out the next morning that it was the wrong type of maker for the type of filter I had in my room.  I went downstairs to get coffee and was charged for it.  The hallway was loud all night with drunk guys wandering back and forth from their hotel rooms.  If this hotel room was half the price, I would have no complaints, but I expect much more for the cost I paid.
Manager Response: Dear Brenna H,   I am very sorry that you had a disappointing experience during your stay with us. At Hilton, we always aim to ensure every guest feels cared for, valued and respected. Your feedback will help us deliver this brand promise. Guest satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Orange County
Summary: I've stayed at the Irvine Hilton three times now and all three experiences were very good. The hotel is convenient, clean and well maintained. The staff are helpful and well-trained. I'll definitely stay there again the next time I'm in Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca M,  Thank you for the review of your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear about your positive experience. Thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary Heading: Hilton Orange County Airport - Cosmetic Changes but Nothing to Write Home About
Summary: I have been staying at this property for the past 20+ years and appreciate its proximity to the airport and the wonderful people who work there.  I was hopeful when they went through "upgrades" to the property, that they would resolve some of the issues that pre-existed the change.  They did not.  At best, it is cosmetic, but non-functional changes in the room.  They need to equip the desks for business people. There are not enough plugs.  This is a business hotel.  They removed the ottoman from the sitting chairs..... only place to now comfortably sit and read is on the bed or at the desk.  The air conditioning units, while softened in their noise (barely) still blow on the desk, so when you are working there you are either in a wind tunnel or in a sauna (turning off the air
Manager Response: Dear Jim F,  First and foremost, thank you for your loyalty to the property. The staff does enjoy welcoming you back each time you visit. I truly apologize that the recent upgrades did not address many of the issues you seem to have experienced while staying with us. I do hope you will still enjoy our hotel on your future business trips.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Obviously an older hotel that's been nicely renovated.  For being so close to the airport, it is really quiet.  We stayed on a busy weekend, so the elevators were a bit on the slow side.  Parking costs are out-of-sight at $22 a day!  Guess that's because of the proximity to the airport.  No free breakfast which would be included at most similar properties.
Manager Response: Dear JVBuff,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I'm glad you enjoyed the upgrades throughout the property. For future reservations, we do offer many different "inclusive" packages on our website that do include breakfast and parking.  Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: Hotel had small rooms. Could hear people in rooms above. Hotel under construction, hard to do business. Wifi was intermittent. Lights flickered when walking across the room. Pillow were flat and caused allergenic reaction; swelling my left eye completely shut. Construction outside was loud. Management didn’t care about my problems; too busy attending to a full house. Food was good. Pool, tennis court, and outside grounds was nice. Will not stay another night at the Hilton in Orange County CA.
Manager Response: Dear Chris M,  We are sorry that you had a disappointing experience during your stay with us. At Hilton, we always aim to ensure every guest feels cared for, valued and respected. Your feedback will help us deliver this brand promise. Guest satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.   Thank you, Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: I wish I could give zero stars. I booked two queen bedrooms for two nights.   1. When I arrived, the desk clerk asked me, " You already checked in." They said they gave the room to someone who has the same last name (so, that means they didn't check the ID.) We were walked to the hotel nearby and told we won't be charged for TWO nights.  2. We checked in for the second night. I talked to the manager about two free nights. He said their policy is just for the first night. I told him I was told two nights. He said he would check with the lady who had walked us to Atrium. Never heard from the manager.  When I walked into the room I found there are two single beds not two queen beds. I was tired already waiting at the front desk. So just slept there.  3. In the morning, I received
Manager Response: Dear Helen C,   We are sorry that you had a disappointing experience during your stay with us. At Hilton, we always aim to ensure every guest feels cared for, valued and respected. Your feedback will help us deliver this brand promise. guest satisfaction is very important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again.   Thank you,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: This is a really nice, really quiet hotel, despite the fact it's right across the street from an airport.  For me, though, the highlight was the pool   It was perfect.  The temperature was just right.  It either has a salt water system or the chemicals were also balanced just right.  No burning eyes or bad taste.  A truly lovely experience.
Manager Response: Dear Linda W,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time with us. We do love hearing about our pool and glad you were able to utilize it.  Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you soon!!  Regards,  Rob Koscelnik General Manager

Summary: This hotel is very convenient to the airport and the entry and lobby area is very nice. The lobby bar/ restaurant is bright and lively. My room as a diamond member of HH was very disappointing. I was told that I was upgraded to a better room. The room was on the 2nd floor with NO view of anything but the porta coach roof. Then the room turns out to be a handicapped room.  I called downstairs to the desk  and was told the hotel is sold out and nothing they can do.  But I can......... Next time in town will be at another property.  So long hilton of orange county!
