They recognize me as a valued customer and it is also convenient if you are traveling with a pet - they allow for them to stay.   I have not personally brought my pet along yet, but have comfort knowing if I need to bring my dog along - it is not a problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued business and for the fantastic review.  Our team sincerely appreciates your recognition. We look forward to continuing to be your home away from home.  Thank you!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: One of my worst travel experiences
Summary: A group took over 3 floors and all the common areas including the hallways and made noise 18 hours a day for three days.  Manager said there was nothing he could do and simply allowed it.  Poor leadership also showed up in highly inconsistent competencies and service attitude among staff.  A handful were very good and many aspects of the hotel are otherwise excellent but my direct experience due to poor leadership and staff inconsistencies was horrific.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide such a candid review of your experience at our hotel over Thanksgiving weekend.  Please accept my apologies for our failure to provide the experience and service you had come to expect from our hotel.  I know that our Director of Operations has contacted you directly regarding your experience.  Your feedback is incredibly valuable and will certainly play a part in our decision on whether or not to re-book the group that was in house over the weekend as well as how we manage the group if they were to return.  Again, our sincere thanks to you for allowing us the opportunity to address the matter with you directly.    Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager  Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: You can't go wrong with this hotel.  Great location next door to Orange Co. Airport.  Quiet, comfortable rooms with excellent views especially on the north side of the hotel.  Excellent bar and restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will be sure to share your comments with our Food & Beverage team. They will appreciate the recognition.  We look forward to welcoming back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Two-night stay. The hotel was remodeled about nine years ago (per bartender) and is still in good shape.    Pros Room was very spacious with added chair/ottoman and desk chair for seating Bed was wonderful - very comfortable  Room was well kept/clean with nice granite counters in living and bathroom spaces Great bartender Convenient location   Cons Airplane noise – starts at 7 am and stops at 11 pm –red-eye flights were going off one right after the other the first evening Air conditioning is exceptionally loud  Warning Many hotels of this caliber have replaced the old tubs with beautiful, safe showers.  Not here.  It was common practice for years to include a rubber bathmat for these old tubs.  Not here.  They did install a hand rail but unfortunately that’s not helpful if you
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about you recent stay with us.  We appreciate your candid comments as it allows us the opportunity to improve.  I sincerely appreciate your feedback on the incident with the tub to include our failure to appropriately respond to your notification.  I certainly wish I had been advised of the incident so that I could speak with you directly before your departure.  I apologize for this incident and our poor response.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Great way to get ready for important meetings around town. I found the hotel lived up to my expectations and considering it is near the airport it was surprisingly quiet! Newport is a pretty small area so if you have meetings in client offices this is a great stop-off place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  I am glad that our hotel's location worked to your advantage while on business in the area. We hope to continue to be your hotel of choice.  Thank you for your business.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I am a Marriott Platinum member and recently started using Hilton and was concerned with all of the following:  late checkouts, room location and the amenities offered to a brand new member.  This hotel exceeded my expectations.  The beds were great and the location of the room was quiet.  Since we arrived late in the evening, I was glad the bar remained open late for food (dinner) and the pizza was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review!  We are delighted to have you as our guest. We look forward to continuing to be your hotel of choice when you are in the Orange County area.  Thank you for your business!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: Too many missteps with my stay
Summary: Arrived and was checked in and sent to a room that was occupied.  Not a pleasant situation, walking into,an occupied room.  Went back to front desk only to have the hotel blame their system and fail to offer any verbal apology.  The room walls were very thin and I could hear the guests above me as well.  The air conditioned was so loud, it was difficult to sleep.    Lastly, the room was prepaid and my credit card for incidentals was charged.  When I called the front desk, they addressed me as another guest and said they might be able to fix the double charge.  Overall, I am a pretty easy guest but these issues will keep me out of this hilton hotel forever.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel.   There is no excuse for the shortcomings which you experienced.  Although we failed to demonstrate differently, your experience does not, in any way, represent the level of performance of which we are capable and that we provide on a daily basis to our guests.  Please accept my sincere apologies for our failure to not only meet your expectations but exceed them.  I hope that should your travels bring you back to Orange County, you will allow us the opportunity to provide you with an experience more typical of the Hilton Irvine.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: Hotel or Serority house, not sure
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several time since an event that we attend is conveniently arranged with it. This is the first time we are very dissatisfied.  At check in the desk clerk was very indifferent and my impression was that he simply did not want to be there.  The room we were assigned to had a broken air conditioner and the window would not close once opened.  Upon reassignment the room was nice.  Our biggest dissatisfaction was with the hallway noise, apparently there was a large event booked with a fraternity/sorority. As a result we were unable to get any sleep till 3 am and the hotel did nothing to make sure the kids behaved. It felt as if we lived in a sorority house. It felt very much that since they were a large group they just got the run of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback on your experience with us.  Please accept my sincere apologies for our failure to provide the experience that you have come to rightly expect from us.   Your initial room assignment was simply not acceptable and I am terribly sorry that we inconvenienced you in such a way.    Furthermore, I am terribly sorry that we failed to appropriately confer with the group in house and avoid the unnecessary noise disruptions.  We know you have a choice when you travel.  I hope that you will give us another opportunity to be of service and demonstrate the level of service I know we are capable of providing.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Check-in was excellent. Shuttle driver was excellent. Room was very good. Daily parking fee is poor. No price break for hotel guest, Hilton Honor members, etc. The parking shows up on "airport parking" searches. The parking fee is $1 dollar less for "guests" than for some random guy that wants to park a vehicle there for the day. I don't have a problem with paying to park, but a 15% increase on what the room rate was seems a bit much. This does make the room rate "appear" more competitive.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us.  I appreciate your candor regarding the parking rates.  Given our location and proximity to John Wayne Airport, we are priced very competitively within the market. From time to time, we do offer packages that include parking and many of our guests find this to be the best option.  We do hope to be of service to you again.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I very much enjoyed my stay.  The Hotel was conveniently located- the outdoor staff (valet, Bellmen etc)- were tremendous, courteous and very attentive to the guests.  Jerry is a wonderful asset to the property - friendly and helpful  Front Desk - also very good-   The only suggestion - is that there should be an area for hotel guests to get coffee in the morning without having to find a server or the morning "bartender" in order to get it.  I also think $3.00 for a cup of coffee for a hotel guest is a bit on the high side- Just a thought.  Thanks- Happy to be a part of the Hilton Hotel "fans" - I really liked it- (and normally I would choose Marriott - so Hilton Honors and this past experience will make me pause from now on if there is a Hilton in the same area)-
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience during your stay.  I sincerely appreciate your taking the time to recognize our associates and highlighting your service experience.  We are very fortunate to have such a fantastic team.  Jerry is one of the best.  Thank you for recognizing him.    Thank you for the feedback on the coffee.  We are working on a number of Food & Beverage related items and your comments will certainly assist us in ensuring we are targeting the right areas.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I have checked into a number of hotels this year and I will tell you that Miguel (front desk) is one of the top people with whom I have met.  I found him gracious, warm, helpful and an all around sincere guy.  My assigned room (Hilton Honors) wasn't ready yet, but he offered me another comparable room immediately.  I had an opportunity to learn a bit more about him during the check-in process and he is a stand-up guy.  I normally find nice folks at the front desk, but he stands out from the crowd.  I am sure the Hilton pays all the people at the front desk the same, but he is "earning" his wage in my opinion.  So far, the room is nice, the electrical sockets all work (sad that some places can't boast this) and the bathroom is clean.  People are a reflection of the property, so
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us.  I sincerely appreciate you recognizing Miguel. He is an exceptional ambassador for our hotel. He works diligently to assist every guest he encounters. He genuinely appreciates being recognized for his efforts.  We look forward to continuing to be your hotel choice in Orange County.  Thank you!  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: great restaurant,  the chef did a great job, staff was attentive, the drinks were great and atmosphere was very comfortable. I am not writing anymore this place all around was a nice place to stay, relax, watch a little tv, have a little dinner a few drinks and be fresh for tomorrows flight.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review!  I am glad we were able to provide you a relaxing experience. We look forward to being of service to you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I enjoyed my stay. The staff was on point and very intuned to the needs of our group. Will visit again on a leisure basis. The hotel was directly across from the Airport and there were other restaurants in walking distance. My child enjoyes the pool and spa. The restaurant price and food quality was good.
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review!  We are delighted that you enjoyed your visit. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Excellent staff; convenient to Orange County (John Wayne Airport).  Great restaurants within walking distance (Gulliver's); also, convenient access to freeway system. Rooms are quiet and clean. Skip valet parking; room parking and valet occupy the same lot and parking is immediately outside of the front door.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  I am delighted that you found our location to be convenient to all your needs. We hope to be your hotel of choice when traveling to the Orange County area.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: I expected more for a HH
Summary: I enjoyed the food we had there but was really thrown off by a lot of details that the hotel overlooks. First thing that threw me off was that WIFI isn't free. Then, that all the curtains in our room looked like they were washed, dried, forgotten in the drier, taken straight out of there to be hung. They were wrinkled beyond belief and full of snags that made them look rather trashy. It made me feel like I was in some little motel somewhere NOT in a Hilton and not at the famous OC. Then, the hallways are way outdated. The decor completely clashes with the fresh, modern first-impression you get when you first walk into the lobby. Another thing, parking is not always free; you gotta make sure it's included with your reservation, apparently. We didn't have an issue with that but I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay.  I am terribly sorry that the guest room you were assigned was not presented to our standard. Your detailed feedback has highlighted some gaps in our inspection process, thank you!  I am delighted you enjoyed your food and beverage experience. Thank you for mentioning the service you received from the Front Desk. The Front Desk team absolutely appreciates it.  We know you have a choice when you travel and we hope to be of service to you again in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Booked via Hilton's website w my HHonors gold card and made sure to request a king bed and let them know that we would be checking in early. When we got to the hotel, the front desk agent (who was extremely friendly and knowledgeable about the area) told me that they had me as having requested two queen beds on a low floor near the elevator.... quite incorrect. He was smart enough to offer me an early check in and accommodate my king bed request, but couldn't place me on an honors floor - I didn't mind at all. After all, it wasn't the hotel's fault that their online booking system input my requests wrong.  When we got to the room it was very spacious and clean. The bed was comfortable and I was able to get a good night's sleep. We went to the pool and hot tub for a bit - the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us.  I am happy that you enjoyed your visit with us.  I appreciate the detail you provided regarding your reservation requests and I thank you for your understanding.  This is something that we will monitor as we want to ensure we are properly accommodating our Hilton Honors members.  We look forward to being of service to you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Not the greatest hotel, lots of noise, paper thin walls.  Hotel staff was unhelpful towards me.  Never get a room over the pool area.  They had a few conventions going on, I called for noise issues in the pool at MIDNIGHT and they told me they were doing the best I can do.  Had to call 3 times and over a hour to resolve the gathering.  Had people coming up and down the stairwell all night.  Religious convention and many girls coming in through the stairs???
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent experience at our hotel.  I apologize for the numerous noise issues you encountered during your stay and our failure to effectively and efficiently handle the situation.  I am sorry that we were not proactive in managing the group in house.    I have reviewed your comments with the appropriate managers to ensure such an incident is not repeated.  I do hope that should your travels bring you back to Orange County you will allow us another opportunity to demonstrate our true level of hospitality and interest in serving you properly.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I stayed overnight at this hotel for a business trip.  First off, the staff were very friendly and helpful.  Second, the rooms are nice, clean and comfortable.  I appreciated the fact that there was plenty of space for me as someone traveling alone.  The only complaint I have is that the closet door was locked, which houses the iron (I'm assuming) but I didn't bother to get anyone to open it since I didn't really need anything in there.  Otherwise, it was a great stay.  The area is a business area so not much to go to in the way of restaurants that's walking distance.  But I'm glad that they had a restaurant on site.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  I appreciate your comments about the service you received. I am delighted that you found your accommodations to be both clean and comfortable.  I apologize for our failure to ensure that  your closet door was in working order. I thank you for your understanding.  We hope that when your travels bring you back to Orange County, we will be your hotel of choice.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I stayed in a basic one bedroom with a king bed and it was a pleasant experience. Spacious room, clean, all the basic amenities that one would expect and need. I even took advantage of the free shuttle service that was one of its selling points for me but the thing that I will remember the most was the great customer service by the front desk the day I arrived that helped me organize my activities and gave great and honest recommendations. Thank you Paulina.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  Thank you for recognizing Paulina.   She is a terrific associate.  I am glad that you were able to meet her.  We are happy you enjoyed your visit and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I only had the opportunity to stay one night on this trip.  The hotel exceeded every expectation I had for a Hilton Brand.  I have stayed in many different hotels in different countries, and this hotel staff, food, amenities, and overall impression, and delivery of service was at least, and exceeded in most areas, my expectations.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We appreciate your comments and hope to be your hotel of choice in Orange County!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I continue to return to this hotel when doing business in the area.  Rooms are really nice.  Staff is friendly and efficient.  Hotel restaurant has good food.  Try the fresh fish or the short rib which is amazing yet not low in calories.  Valet is quick and offers great service.  This is a great property.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experiences at our Hotel. We are very happy that you continue to choose to stay with us. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I was happily surprised by the Hilton Orange County Airport hotel, particularly 3 things, at this hotel.  Coming to the hotel I was skeptical of how the cleanliness and quality of the building with be since it's a Airport hotel. Safe to say -- there was nothing to worry about.  My 3 takeaways were:  (FYI: My background: I stay in over 150 nights/year in hotels; mainly for business, but some personal travel).   1) I was really pleased and surprised when a Front Desk lady, Dora, went above and beyond to resolve an issue I was facing.  Dora listened to my personal needs and did what was necessary to resolve my issue.  I was so impressed, I felt the need to share it here.  Therefore, I chalk this up to great customer service. As a side note, I interacted with other hotel personnel
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  I am very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. Dora is a fantastic associate who takes great pride in her work. Thank you for recognizing her.  Thank you for recognizing the cleanliness of our Hotel. The Housekeeping team is amazing.  They, too, take great pride in their work.  I'm glad you enjoyed the TV line-up.  Many of our guests enjoy our offerings as it is consistent with what they have at home.  Again - thank you for your comments and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Nice Stay everything was fine.. Nice quiet hotel. Enjoyed the pool and hot tub which is very nice and relaxing. The rooms are clean and modern. I would go back and the price we got was excellent.. Best stay at a Hilton
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. I am happy that you were able to relax and enjoy the hotel.  We look forward to being your hotel of choice in Orange County.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Great job by all - especially Miguel Saucedo upon check-out - very helpful  Great hotel - easy access to all shops, beaches, and airport.  Great spot if you are doing business in Orange county area.  I would definitely return
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay.  I am happy that you were able to enjoy the benefits of our location. Thank you for recognizing Miguel at the Front Desk.  He loves to see his name in print!  We look forward to being of service to you soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I needed help with a bunch of things - laundry, ride to the pharmacy, extra soap - and the staff could not have been more helpful or more pleasant. At first, I felt awkward because I kept having to come back with another request, but the people behind the desk and the bellman were so easy-going about and were so genuinely interested in making sure I received the service I needed, that it put me at ease. In particular, Paulina, Miguel, and Dora behind the desk as well as Jesus the bellman (who drove me to the pharmacy and waited for me) stood out for their service, but really, everybody was great. The hotel could not be more convenient to the airport - I literally walked across the street from the terminal and was there. Finally, the room and hotel in general were clean and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time write a review about your stay earlier this month.  Thank you for recognizing the associates who assisted your during your visit. I appreciate the feedback on Fitness Center - great recommendation.  We will look at getting the d-clasps ASAP.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: At any Hilton like this you get good but not great at a fair price, and with a decent frequent traveler program and lots of locations. But in this instance, was well below par. Messed up parking lot system to greet you. Room had a sort of gym locker room type smell to it. Power cord spaghetti everywhere! Coffee mug had bright pink lipstick residue on it. Power plug on desk did not work at all. Toilet backed up. Shower drain did not drain (yuck!). Cordless phone by the bedside worked but not fully functional so I did not rely on it for a wake up call. You get the picture. I rate a lot of places because I stay at a lot of places so I have a broad perspective and give very few low ratings. Only when truly deserved - like here. I am sure I will get a snarky post from the local GM
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  Your candor is much appreciated and certainly highlights many areas that require our immediate attention.  I apologize for our failure to ensure that we provided you with a product and service level that not only met your expectations, but exceeded them.  I'm disappointed that I did not have a chance to speak to you personally and reassure you that your business is important to us.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: We loved the hotel.  It is beautiful from the moment you walk in the doors to the amenities in your room.  The beds were luxurious and comfortable, but perhaps a bit soft for those with back conditions.  The staffing was very helpful with our questions.  We were at a conference so didn't get to enjoy the pool and amenities.  Would return for sure if in the area.  Great convenient location to the airport without too much noise from the airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  Thank you for recognizing our associates for the service they provided. We hope that the next time you stay with us, you have more time to relax and enjoy all that the hotel has to offer.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: Outstanding Service & Convenience, Wish The Property Was Not So Tired
Summary: The service at this hotel rivals that at a $1K/night resort.  The positive, friendly, professional attitude begins with the people at the door, followed up by the people at the front desk, and reinforced by the rest of the staff (the waitstaff in the bar, driving shuttles, and those in housekeeping).  Many of the staff have been working at this Hilton hotel location for 20+ years and their commitment to excellent service is evident (see more on this below).  The rooms are a bit worn and tired but housekeeping seems to be doing an able job of keeping them clean.  The beds are comfortable and the hotel is quiet for the area allowing for comfortable sleep.    Of note are the following convenient aspects of this hotel.  It is across the road (road, not street) from the airport and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the fabulous review!  I am so thankful that you took the time to recognize our dedicated team members. I assure you they absolutely appreciate the acknowledgement.    We hope that should your travels bring you back to Orange County, you allow us to be of service to you once again.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Treated like royalty. Made to feel like we were the most important guests in the hotel. Everything was done to make my whole visit from when I arrived to when I left as if there was not another guest in the hotel and the whole staff was there just to serve me. I did not have one staff member who did not say "Hello Good Morning or Evening" and ask if they could be of service.  Was Wonderful.  Want to go back. Hope ALL Hiltons are like this now.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of your stay with us. We sincerely appreciate your feedback.  We were delighted to be selected as the venue for your reunion. I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Stayed only one night and chose the location because it is right across the street from the airport and I could walk over to catch my early morning flight.  Service was excellent, the room was clean and well appointed and the temperature was nice and cool after a long day of standing in line at Disneyland!  Will definitely stay here again if the opportunity presents itself.
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review!  We are happy that you enjoyed your visit with us. I am glad that you were able to relax after a long day at "The Happiest Place on Earth".  Thank you for your business and we hope to see you soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Overall this is a nice hotel to stay at. Rooms are clean, quiet and comfy. Nice coffee set up in room. Bathroom decent size and current.  Food at restaurant needs a little work but the bartenders are great.  Close to John Wayne airport, great shopping mall and excellent restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay.  Thank you for recognizing our Bartending team. They are a great group!  I have shared your comments regarding the restaurant food with our Chef. He is in the process of making some seasonal adjustments to the menu. I'm hopeful that you will give us another try on your next visit.  We know you have a choice when you travel. We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: This is an average hotel. The rooms are nothing to write home about, but they are adequate. The location is good, but there are no restaurants within walking distance. The internet service was subpar.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay.  I am terribly sorry that the internet did not meet your needs. I have reviewed your comments with our Chief Engineer to ensure that any issues are addressed.  Many of our guests enjoy our central location with several restaurants within a mile of the Hotel to include Bosscat Kitchen and Libations, Bistango and Ten Asian Bistro.  Our Front Desk team is more than happy to provide additional recommendations and our Shuttle will provide transportation to any spot within three miles of the Hotel.  We know you have a choice when you travel and hope that you will give us another opportunity to be of service.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I stayed at this hotel recently on a business trip.  Typically I stay at the Fairmont down the street.  The Fairmont was booked so this was a second choice.  I was pleasantly surprised.  The staff is very friendly and the service was good.  I was on the 2nd floor, newly redecorated king room and the furnishings were nice.   The bed was comfortable and there were ample pillows.  I enjoyed my stay, I would definitely consider this property for my next OC visit.  You can't beat the closeness to the airport, and there are flight restrictions enforced locally.  So in a nut shell, no flights after 11pm or before 7am.  So don't worry about plane noise.   Breakfast was good and I enjoyed a cocktail in the lounge.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on your recent stay.  I am happy that you selected to stay with us and hope that you will continue to do so. We appreciate your business and hope to be your hotel of choice moving forward.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Right across from John Wayne airport, so if you can fly into this airport it is really convenient.  Regardless, this is a nice little Hilton.  Hotel is conveniently located and staff is excellent.  Room is fairly large, although it doesn't have a fridge, which cost it one star.  Has a fitness center, but the hotel is also very close to an Ultra Sport 24-Hour Fitness.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay.  Thank you for recognizing our associates.  We really appreciate your comments.  I am happy that our hotel met your needs and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: Close to the airport with nice rooms
Summary: Nice hotel very close to John Wayne airport. The staff was nice and the rooms were spacious. The breakfast was also nice. If you want a simple hotel that is ideal for airport access, then this is great. The pool area is nice, too.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay.  I am happy that you enjoyed your visit. Our associates appreciate your comments.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: We stayed here overnight after arriving in OC late night. We walked over from the airport and rented our car the next day before moving on to our destination in Newport Beach. The hotel is right across the street and was very comfortable and clean. We even used the pool for a couple hours in the morning before checking out. Pool area was clean, water seemed heated and was awesome. Had the pool to ourselves.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay.  Although a brief visit, I am happy that you were able to enjoy it and even squeeze in some pool time.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: This hotel is right across the street from the Orange County airport and two blocks away from my office so it's my go to hotel when in Irvine.  The staff is efficient and the rooms are fine. As a resort/vacation hotel this wouldn't be on my list but for convenience as a business traveler it can't be beat. I'm not sure if the wifi is free for everyone but as a loyalty member it is for me.  The bar is open late enough to grab an evening meal if you arrive late but isn't the kind of place I'm excited to eat. Parking is not included in the rate which is no surprise
Manager Response: Thank you for the review.  We appreciate being your hotel of choice when traveling to the area and for your loyalty to Hilton Hotels and Resorts.  We appreciate your business and look forward to being of continued service to you.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: This hotel is located in Costa Mesa across the road from John Wayne airport. You can get off the plane and walk to the hotel, that's  right, you can avoid taxi hassles all together. The staff is friendly and consistently deliver good service. I would highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. I happy that you enjoyed your visit with us.  We are centrally located in Irvine with easy access to and from John Wayne Airport. In addition, we are less than five miles from fantastic shopping at South Coast Plaza in Costa Mesa and less than ten miles to the Newport Beach waterfront.    We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: Excellent Hilton, Always a Great Place to stay!
Summary: Perfect location, helpful staff, high end hotel with top notch accommodations. Wonderfully comfortable room. They have running routes to provide for distances between 2 and 6 miles if you want to get in a good run. (Idid the 6 and 4 mile route for a good 10!) Very safe part of town and you can walk to the airport or drive 15 minutes to spend time at Newport Beach or Balboa Island. The restaurant and drinks are overpriced but that is to be expected for a hotel. But there are good restaurants within walking distance.  Ask the concierge about the Mexican food place a few blocks down with good happy hour.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and had the chance to go explore the surrounding area.  We hope to be your hotel of choice whenever your travels bring you to Orange County.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Really friendly, helpful staff who assisted me with my ALS Ice Bucket Challenge! So much fun. Also, the room was clean and quiet and the breakfast parfait was yummy. Only thing I would have wanted was HBO.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay.  I really appreciate your kind comments regarding our staff. Your accolades mean a great deal to them.  We were honored to play a part in your ALS Ice Bucket Challenge.  We look forward to welcoming  you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: If you likre being nickeld and dimed, please go to this hotel. You pay 18.00 a day for parking and wifi is 10.00 a day. In the morning, you can pay 14.00 for a continental breakfast or 19.00 for the full breakfast. I have stayed at hotels where the hotel is just as comparable to this hilton for less money, parking and wifi were free. The breakfast that was offered was also free and was as good or even better than what was offered at this hotel. The only reason I stayed here was because my daughter needed to be close for an interview for an internship. Down right sad.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on your stay with us.  We do offer several packages that include the items you highlighted to include parking, breakfast and internet access.  Many of our guests find that reserving a package is the best option and meets their needs.  I hope that should your travels bring you back to Orange County, you will allow us another opportunity to be of service.  Sincerely,  Regina M . Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: The hotel itself is very nice, the location is great, 10' from the airport terminals by walking (they have a shuttle service but it starts at 5am and our flight was too early, besides -not sure- but I think it was 10$ for a 5' ride) The swimming pool is  awesome, unlike any US pools, it's deeper than 3 feet so you can swim ! And there's also a (slightly too hot) jacuzzi which is very pleasant. The maid I got to see was great and very helpful,  the lady at the check-in was far from being friendly or amiable though. Hotel is non-s non-smoker but has a great  patio for us smokers. The room is big and clean, so is the bed ! Very pleasant and quiet airport hotel for a night or two, even though you can hear what's happening in the corridors.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us.  I am glad that you were able to take advantage of our location and easy access to John Wayne Airport.  As you mentioned, we do have a shuttle service to and from John Wayne which is complimentary for our Hotel guests.    I am delighted that the weather was such that you were able to enjoy the pool. It is a nice little oasis.  I appreciate your feedback regarding the staff you encountered and will be sure to review your comments with the appropriate team members.  Should your travels bring you back to Orange County, we hope to be your hotel of choice.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: The beds were so cushy and comfy! We just melted into them....... HEAVEN! Room service was so quick. I could not believe it. The room service was GRADE A and the staff were so friendly. Love this Hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the fantastic review! We appreciate your comments and are so happy that you enjoyed your stay.  In July we replaced all the mattresses in the hotel with the latest Hilton bed. We are delighted that you were able to relax and enjoy.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: This Hilton is located almost on top of the John Wayne/Orange County airport in Southern California.  Check in was swift; the room clean and comfortable; the amenities as advertised.  It's also a short drive from South Coast Plaza -- one of the best malls anywhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your July stay with us. We are delighted that you enjoyed your visit and were able to experience the benefits of our location.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: Close to the airport, updated decor, clean and comfy
Summary: A quick trip and late arrival to Orange County meant I needed a place to stay near the airport.  What better than across the street.  The room was nicely appointed, the internet worked well, and the hot breakfast was just what I needed after a long night of travel and short night of sleep.  I had hoped to use the pool but arrived to late and left too early.  Shuttle service was prompt and courteous (I could have walked,) and the desk staff was friendly and quick.   I will stay here again and recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for great review. Although a quick visit, I am happy that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for highlighting the service you received from our Shuttle and Front Desk teams. They appreciate the recognition.    We look forward to being of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Overall well kept facility. excellent location for business travel. Typical Hilton hotel; Good thing since it is predicatable. Bathrooms are clean, but I wish the floors were washed, not just vacuumed. Rooms were of modern emenities. Like with most hotels, there are not enough plugs near the bed for your electronics (ie. phone charge, etc) unless you disconnect the clock or light.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  Your feedback is very valuable as it directs us to the items that matter most our guests. We appreciate it.    We appreciate your loyalty to Hilton and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,   Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Excellent location, great service and high quality of rooms. The hotel offers a great location close to the Orange County Airport and main business area in Irvine, CA.  Personnel is very friendly and helpful. Quality of rooms is very good, clean and functional. TV channels options are excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review about your recent stay with us.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your visit. Our team was very appreciative of your comments.  We hope to be of service to you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: The hotel is very clean & modern. The staff was very welcoming, the dinning experience was very pleasant & the food was excellent. My kids really enjoyed the relaxing pool area. I will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review! We are so happy that you and your family enjoyed your visit.  We hope to be your hotel of choice whenever your travels bring you to Orange County.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Stayed here recently for a youth sports tournament nearby.  The positives: Nicely redone property - sleek and modern, West Elm looking decor.  (Still has the popcorn ceilings though!) Food at the hotel was very good, better than your standard hotel fare, with healthy and interesting options. Good pool for kids  The negatives: As noted previously, the property is right next to the airport so it should be no surprise that there was a fair amount of air traffic noise in the evenings and mornings.  I am a light sleeper and found this extremely annoying, but it did not seem to bother my kids in the least. We upgraded to the "Executive Level" for $40 more per night, but really there were no perks in this upgrade.  No club room with snacks, not a bigger room, etc.  I asked at the front
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  Please accept my sincere apologies for our failure to appropriately address the lost and found item and for our apparent indifference to your situation.  I appreciate your comments as it certainly highlighted some opportunities in our processes.  Your feedback will help us to improve.  We know you have a choice when you travel and certainly hope that should your travels bring you back to Irvine, you will allow us to demonstrate the service I know we are capable of providing.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: As a loyal Hilton guest, I expect certain things at the different Hilton brand hotels.  On my last stay at this property, I was somewhat disappointed with 3 things.  The breakfast buffet, the parking and the water pressure in the room. The breakfast buffet was one of the worse I have come across in a long time. They had some of the strangest fruits for the morning I have ever seen. They had one type of melon, cherries, plums and nectarines.  The hot food was the same each morning with limited choices.  The menu was about the same with the choices.  For a full service Hilton, this was a surprise. The parking, now that was a joke. I paid $18.00 dollars for parking which is highway robbery, since it is there lot and doesn't even have a attendant.  The last thing was the water
Manager Response: Thank you for the detailed feedback regarding your stay with us.  I apologize for our failure to meet some very basic expectations. I appreciate your comments on your breakfast experience.    Our fresh fruit offerings are consistent with what is in season in Southern California this time of year.  I am sorry if this did not meet your needs.  Your comments have been shared with our Chef.  We are focused on continuous improvement and comments such as yours are invaluable.  I am terribly sorry that the water pressure was not functioning as expected. Such incidents are certainly not the norm and I have reviewed your comments with our Chief Engineer to ensure this is not repeated.  Finally, I appreciate your comments regarding our parking fees. Given our proximity to John Wayne Airport, we are very competitively priced. We do offer both a self parking and valet parking option.  Thank you for the invaluable feedback.    Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: We stayed here for a week for our daughter's national softball tournament. The location is very convenient to the 405 (not close enough to hear traffic), but it's not difficult to get to the Pacific Coast Hwy/Newport Beach, even during rush hour. Irvine itself (or the part we saw, at least) is a clean, safe area, with a number of newer apartment and office buildings and convenient shopping. While not a vacation hotspot, it's a decent base location for exploring.  General The hotel itself is nice--in fact, it's a step above what we require for these trips. For example, there are no refrigerators in the rooms and no laundry on premises--important features for families with teenagers participating in sporting events. It really caters to business travelers with expense accounts and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. Our staff appreciates your kind comments.  They really enjoy having all the teams on property.  Thank you for the for the details on how we could better meet the needs of the teams. It is a big help to us as we prepare for next season.  We hope to be of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I feel that charging $18.00 per day for parking in the hotel parking lot is exorbitant and unwarranted.   The rest of the hotel and amenities were very good to excellent.   The room we had was very quiet even though the hotel is next to the John Wayne  Airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay.  While I understand your frustration with the parking fees, given our location and proximity to John Wayne Airport, we are priced very competitively within the market. From time to time, we do offer packages that include parking and many of our guests find this to be the best option.  We do hope to be of service to you again in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: Hilton Irvine was a great value!
Summary: This hotel has recent refurbished and the staff very friendly.  My first impression was with Dora at the front desk, who was very welcoming and accommodating.  The bed was comfortable and the room restful.  In spite of being directly, and conveniently, across the street form the airport, the rooms and property in general were surprisingly quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  Thank you for your kind comments about the service you received from Dora. She has been with us for a number of years and is a delight.  We hope to be of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: Perfect if you have an early flight
Summary: Modern, clean and comfortable with good service.  Great atmosphere in the lobby/bar area, and my room was very nice and quiet.  Right next to the airport, the shuttle was on-time and the ride was very short.  It's a great SNA airport option.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  I'm glad you found our Hotel to be a terrific option when traveling in and out of John Wayne Airport.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Just stayed here for 3 nights on business. Every single employee I came in contact with was wonderful, from the front desk to the shuttle drivers, to room service to housekeeping. Wonderful, wonderful service! Their free shuttle will bring you to and from the airport, but also anywhere else you need to go within 3 miles (if they are not busy with airport travelers). As usual, the bed was super comfortable - that's the best part about staying at the Hilton. I am a Gold Hhonors member. The room and bathroom were clean, as was the pool. The check in desk and elevators are off to the side of the entrance, but restaurant and pool straight ahead. Pool entrance and exit to and from hotel is awkward, as you have to walk right thru the restaurant and bar where everyone is eating. Only
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us.  Thank you for recognizing our staff.  We are so lucky to have such a dedicated team. They will appreciate your comments.  In July of this year, we installed new Hilton beds in all our guest rooms. I am happy that you found them to be so comfortable.  Whether traveling for business or pleasure - we hope to be of service to you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Perfectly located hotel with top notch service and cleanliness. I felt I was always in First Class Service whether I was asking for taxi or ordering my dinner. The restaurant/bar is classy yet casual. The bed was comfortable, the room well appointed and very clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review! We sincerely appreciate your comments.  We have a fantastic team and they take a great deal of pride in their work. Thank you for recognizing them.  We can't wait to welcome you back!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Even though this hotel is across the street from the airport it was very quiet and served our need for a quick trip to our family in HB.  It was also close to good shopping areas with lots of restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. I am glad that our location met your needs.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: This is a clean and well-maintained hotel right across the street from the airport. The lobby is obviously recently renovated, has a nice bar and a good breakfast. The rooms are a bit dated but are spacious and have all your usual amenities.  It was wall-to-wall business travelers on a Monday morning. Staff are friendly and courteous.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review about your recent stay with us. I appreciate your comments.  I am very happy that you enjoyed your visit. Thank you for recognizing our associates for the service they provided. We have a fantastic team!  We look forward to being of service to you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: We just wanted a place for an overnight getaway.  It was conveniently located off the 405.  Although its location is directly across from the airport, we did not hear any airplanes.  It appears to be a great location for meetings and conferences.  We just wanted to rest and that's what we did.  It was very quiet and comfortable.  Parking rates a bit pricey, but we got a great rate on the room which included a hot american buffet breakfast.  The breakfast itself was average and didn't stay hot/warm very long.  But it sufficed.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  I am glad that we were able to provide a relaxing experience for you. Hopefully you left feeling rejuvenated.  Thank you for the feedback on your breakfast experience.  I apologize that the temperature didn't hold as expected.  I reviewed your comments with our Chef and he is working with his team to ensure the temperature issue isn't repeated.    We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Good location near the 405 freeway Mc Arthur to Newport Beach and Costa Mesa shopping mall & restaurants. Room was comfortable and quiet despite proximity to OC airport. Booked 1 night and stayed 2 as place was convenient. Staff at the desk was kind and very helpful (ask Miguel S.).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. I was very happy to read that you liked it so much you extended your stay! We appreciate it.  Thank you for kind comments regarding our Front Desk team and for mentioning Miguel. You made his day.    We look forward to being of service to you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: This hotel doesn't deserve a 4 star rate…  There are spider webs on the patio furniture  The balcony door doesn't work it seems like it was off the rail   The gap between the door and the floor is huge I think that is one of the reasons that you can even hear  the elevator open from your room…explain my frustration to a manager he didn't even seem to care I had received better service at a holiday inn  IS  THE WORST Hilton property  I had visit
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. I appreciate your comments and am terribly sorry we failed to meet some very basic expectations to include a clean hotel and a quiet stay.  I apologize for our failure to effectively respond to  you when you gave us the opportunity to address your concerns.    We know you have a choice when you travel.  I hope that should your travels bring you back to Orange County, you will give us the opportunity to demonstrate the high level of service we typically provide.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange Airport

Summary Heading: Second stay not much better than the first...won't be back
Summary: The Hilton is in a great location if you want to stay close to the John Wayne airport. The hotel rooms are a good size and have average furniture. The one issue with my room was that the sliding glass door's lock was broken. I called the front desk when I checked the door before leaving my room to report the problem. They assured me that the door would be fixed when I returned to my room. When I returned later that evening I checked the door and it had not been fixed. At that point I felt it was too late to call the front desk again and jimmy rigged furniture to "lock" the door. At check out I told the front desk about the issue and it was not really acknowledged. As a safety issue I feel that they should have working locks on their doors (it even says the door will only open 4
Manager Response: Thank you for writing a review about your recent stay.  I apologize for the issue with the sliding glass door in your room. I am disappointed that the door lock was not working properly upon your arrival.   I am frustrated and embarrassed by our failure to ensure that the issue was corrected once we were notified of the problem.  Your comfort and safety is of the utmost importance to us.  Our Chef was very appreciative of your comments regarding the grilled salmon. He will be sure to share your comments with our culinary team.  If you return to our area, I hope you will consider staying with us again.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: Extremely satisfied with every aspect of our stay!
Summary: Close to everything, very professional and courteous service from entire staff.   We stayed on the 14th floor and was very happy with all the "extras" that we were provided with. This will be the hotel we come back to any time we are in the area.   If you have are looking for group rates, then call and speak with the sales manager Yalda. She was absolutely amazing to work with and took care of all our needs.   I would highly encourage anyone and everyone to check out the Wyndham in Irvine for your travel needs.  Paul
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! We appreciate it!  We look forward to being of service to you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Really nice hotel, in very good condition. It is located right across from the airport, but you can not hear any noises inside the hotel.   Very nice check in staff, Donna was wonderful getting us into a great room. There were 3 of us, so we got a large king room with a flat boarded roll-a-way single bed. It had a narrow balcony with the cleanest sliding glass door I have ever seen.   As a Hilton Hhonors Gold member, they were very generous with the breakfast coupons (there were 3 in our party). Breakfast is expensive at $19, but the buffet is wonderful. 2 types of fresh hot scrambled eggs, lots of pastries, amazing assortment of wonderful fresh fruits. Hot coffee served at the table with an amazing thermos carafe that really keeps the coffee hot.    The hidden secret is the
Manager Response: Thank you for the terrific review! I am so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us to include enjoying our breakfast buffet and even a little pool time.  I am delighted you had a chance to meet Donna at the Front Desk. She is a fantastic associate and will be so appreciative of your comments.  Thank you for your continued loyalty to Hilton. We can't wait to welcome you back to Orange County!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I am an 'experienced' international traveller so I am used to arriving tired so my routine at check-in is to confirm the room is non-smoking, away from the lift, away from the ice machine, so far so good until I hear the yapping  and howling noise start around 8pm (local time just as I am nodding off having arrived from UK so body clock = 4am). Try ear plugs  which are no use and as I have already moved room once (due to interconnecting door-  remember to add to list of must-haves!) and I am unpacked and in my PJ's I endure until the owner comes back around midnight. Folllowing morning I see the owner/next door room leaving carrying TWO dog cages down the hall! So beware  - this hotel allows pets!  I had a dinner & breakfast in the small lobby restaurant- surprisingly good (but
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent experience at our Hotel.  We are pet friendly and typically receive only positive comments about this accommodation. We rarely receive negative feedback regarding pets in the building not behaving properly. I apologize for the inconvenience that this caused you.    I am glad that you enjoyed your experience in our restaurant and appreciate your note regarding the disposition of the pool area.  I have reviewed your comments with our Director of Housekeeping.  Again - thank you for review and we hope to be of service to you in the future.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County

Summary: This hotel is right across from the airport (literally) - you can watch the planes take off if you want. Hotel is very nice and modern, as you might expect from Hilton, and the rooms are quiet. You can easily walk to several nice restaurants. The other nice thing about the hotel is if you have an early flight out, you can sleep longer because you are practically there - no travel time.  I think I'll probably stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit and even got in a little extra sleep!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I spent 3 nights at the Hilton attending a corporate meeting and must say it's one of the best smaller conference hotels I've experienced.  My room was very clean and well appointed.  Our meeting room was excellent, perfect size for our group of 27 and set up perfectly for a very interactive meeting.  The food was excellent.  Found great running routes up Campus Drive to UCI.  Best of all, was able to walk to and from the airport in less than 10 minutes.  Finally, the staff was extremely helpful.  Miguel (Savredo) helped me with some billing issues at checkout and was very pleasant to work with.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. I am thrilled that you had such a fantastic experience with us.  Thank you for highlighting your meeting experience with us. We have a fantastic Catering and Event team and hope to be of service to you in the future.  Miguel is going to be very excited when he sees that you highlighted the service he provided. He is a great associate and we are very fortunate to have him on our team. Our Housekeeping team is going to really enjoy your comments regarding the cleanliness of your room.  Thank you!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: We would select this hotel next time we are in Irvine, they accept pets for a small fee. The rooms are spacious, beds are small but everything was clean. The pool area is nice with outdoor seating close to the pool area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We are delighted that you enjoyed your visit with us.  We look forward to being of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Our conference was very successful thanks to the cooperative and friendly staff. They rearranged rooms quickly and efficiently between meetings and banquets.  The meeting spaces were perfect for our needs. The sleeping rooms were quite nice and spacious. The entire staff was outstanding during our three night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your conference with us. We really appreciate your feedback.  We are fortunate to have an exceptional Banquet and Event team. Thank you for recognizing their efforts.  We look forward to being of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: I've stayed here a number of times, mainly because I am a Hilton Honors member and this hotel was conveniently located for me.  Overall, I'd say the desk staff is not overly friendly or courteous, and have had a few negative experiences.  The wait staff in the restaurant is always pleasant, polite and courteous.  Here's the problem with this place....watch out if there is a group event going on. One time there was a well[-behaved high school education conference going on. The second time it was a two-day event for a large group of hip-hop dancer/teachers.  Both times, the group took over the lobby and breakfast area.  Because these areas are relatively small, all these people in too small a space makes it VERY, VERY noisy and VERY VERY crowded.  PROS: super convenient location
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stays with us while in Orange County.  I appreciate your candor regarding your experience. It certainly helps us focus our efforts on the items that matter most or our guests.  I hope that should your travels bring you back to Orange County, you will continue to allow us to be of service to you.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: This hotel is in a great location if you are flying out of John Wayne Airport. Moreover, the price is very reasonable making it a great value.  My colleague and I decided to stay at this hotel due to early flights and it turned out to be a great choice. As full disclosure, I am a Hilton Diamond member which influences my choice of hotels. However, this full Hilton property was so reasonable in price and so convenient that the choice was obvious at the time of booking irrespective of my frequent stay status.  We were checked in very quickly and efficiently upon arrival. My room was very spacious and clean. The décor was nothing special but it was adequate and not distracting. The amenities including the WiFi worked well during my entire stay. My bed was quite comfortable allowing
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review!  Our team appreciated your comments.  Thank you for your continued loyalty to Hilton Hotels & Resorts.  We look forward to being of service to you soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Traveled to Santa Ana for business - flew into John Wayne airport and right across the street is this hotel.  Very nice decor and the rooms are nicely furnished. The staff was accommodating from the valet to the front desk to the waiters - excellent hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We appreciate your comments and look forward to being of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Great hotel with very good rooms and facilities. The pool is ideal to relax, you also have the bar that is nearby. The free shuttle to John Wayne Airport is also very convenient. Wonderful staff that is really accommodating, they'll treat you as a well vaulted customer. Would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic review. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and look forward to being of service to you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Hotel is old. Especially for a Hilton. The tub is stained from wear and tear. Carpet is retro days of the 90s. I'm fine with the 9$ wiskeys . staff need new clothes, guy had a over sized blazer jacket. Unless this place is running in a 90s theme or you like the 90s style, go to the Hilton in costamesa .
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry you were unhappy with your guest room. Guest feedback is incredibly important to us and we are taking your comments into consideration as we improve our on-property experience. We hope to have another opportunity to serve you, if your travels bring you back to our area.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: overall the hotel service was excellent unfortunatelly breakfast was not included so we have to buy it.  coffee runs out by 7:00am and food was very expensive. Also, the gym was very small and no ventilations
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay.  We do have coffee service available throughout the day via the bar or restaurant. In addition, we do have several room packages available that include breakfast. Perhaps one of the packages would provide a better value.  Thank you for the feedback on the Fitness Center ventilation. Our Chief Engineer is looking into the issue and we are hopeful that it was an isolated incident.  Again - thank you for your comments and we look forward to being of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: 1) No proper air conditioning in the fitness center 2) Restaurant and bar prices way to high relative to other options within walking distance 3) Lack of privacy to get to the pool area without a lot of walking through the hotel 4) No free coffee available in the main floor of the hotel 5) Internet speed quite slow 6) Buffet way too limited in choice relative to price. Since Express style, I would recommend that it be free to guests
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We appreciate your feedback and we’re very sorry you were unhappy with your overall experience.   Your comments are incredibly important to us as they assist us in improving our on-property experience. We hope to have another opportunity to serve you, if your travels bring you back to our area.  Sincerely,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary: Stayed for just one night. Everything was clean and the lobby has a very nice atmosphere. It is also literally right across from the terminal. They have a shuttle that will take you to any restaurant within 3 miles which is great.  My shuttle driver was super nice and the front desk staff was great. The only annoying thing is the Internet. It was free, however, every time I set my iPad down it would log you off so you would have to reconnect and enter the password.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay.  The Bell team and the Front Desk team really appreciated your comments. I apologize for the issues you encountered with the internet. We have forwarded the details you noted to our Provider for further inquiry.  We look forward to being of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport

Summary Heading: great stay, extremely convenient to airport
Summary: The shuttle service to the airport was prompt. The on-site restaurant had great service and food. The entire property was very clean. This is a very accessible hotel and above average for airport hotels. You can tell when a place is run well and that was definitely the case with this property. I would stay here on future trips to Orange County.
Manager Response: Brian -  Thank you for the fantastic review. Our team really appreciates your comments. Thank you for recognizing their efforts.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Irvine for 3 nights and enjoyed the hotel. The Staff is very friendly. The Gym could be a little larger but I worked out just fine, and I really enjoyed the pool (used only one day). My only issue was the hotel was full on Saturday night with a bunch of young boys and they must have consumed a whole bunch of sugar as they were running up and down the halls screaming and throwing ice. The hotel should have kept them together and not placed others around the kids. Luckily the noise only lasted until about 10pm...but went on for about two hours.  This is a pet friendly hotel, and was nice to be provided a bowel and treat (the dog didn't like the treat)
Manager Response: Robert -  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent experience at our Hotel.  I apologize for the noise you encountered from the sports group we had in house during your visit.  The group did make up the majority of our occupancy and therefore it was challenging to ensure that they were assigned their own floors.  I appreciate your feedback and we will be more cognizant of such things in the future.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated as it assists us in improving our operation. I do hope that should your travels bring you back to Orange County, you will allow us to be of service to you again.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: Very nice staff, location, and facilities! second visit at this hotel and will continue to stay here. Highly recommended to family and friends. Yes, I'm a Hilton enthusiast! thank you for your hospitality and use!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review!  We look forward to continuing to be your hotel of choice in Orange County.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: I needed to stay for a night and, as always, the Hilton did not disappoint!  Wonderful service and amenities. Some people worry that it is not close to anything, but with a car Fashion Island and other places of interest are very close!  *If you plan on using your car though, opt for self parking; once you valet you need to keep your car inside.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and the additional insight you provided about our location. We are centrally located in the heart of Orange County and within just a few minutes of great shopping and restaurants at Fashion Island, South Coast Plaza and the Irvine Spectrum.    We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary Heading: Definitely a cut above the average airport hotel
Summary: I typically don't expect much from airport-adjacent hotels, but this place is nicer than most.  You wouldn't really know it from the outside--pulling up to this place, the appearance screams "generic, dated hotel probably built sometime between the late 1960s and late 1970s."  But once I checked in, I was quite satisfied.  The rooms are large and super-clean, the furnishings are quite decent for this class of hotel, and the mattress and bedding are very, very comfortable. (I was given an "Executive Level" room, whatever that might mean, so I can't swear that the "standard" rooms are the same, but I would suspect that any differences are relatively minor.)  The room's HVAC system worked very well and was easy and efficient to operate and control.  The bathroom, while nothing
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a thorough review about your recent stay with us. I am delighted that you enjoyed your visit and that you found our rooms to be clean and comfortable.  We have a fantastic Housekeeping team and they were very pleased to read your review.    I appreciate the detailed feedback, especially on the wireless service.  We are investing the issue you experienced further to ensure that it does not repeat.    Again – thank you for your review and we hope to be of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this Hilton previously as it is within walking distance of the main office of my company.  There was a car and audio show going on that Sunday night.  I was very tired due to the time change and tried to go to sleep around 11:00 PM.  My room was on the fifth floor and the intermittent noise in the parking lot kept me up to almost 1:00.  I am a very sound sleeper yet I was woken up at 4:00AM by a group noisily loading a rental truck beneath my room.  I called room service and the response was to send up earplugs and say sorry instead of telling the people to stop loading the truck.  A number of my coworkers also staying at the Hilton complained of the noise, one of whom had to insist on having his room changed at 4:00 in the morning.  We were told we would get a
Manager Response: Please accept my sincere apologies for our failure to provide you with a more comfortable experience during your recent stay. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we appreciate your feedback about the noise. I apologize that you didn’t get the sleep you deserved.    Your experience certainly does not represent the level of comfort and tranquility we customarily provide.  I do hope that should your travels bring you back to Irvine, you will allow us another opportunity to be of service to you.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager
