Summary: Great location, directly across from the John Wayne airport in Orange County. The hotel shuttle allows me to not rent a car, which is appreciated. In addition to the hotel's, there are several good restaurants within walking distance. Very friendly, accommodating staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are happy that you found our hotel to be conveniently and centrally located.  We look forward to being of service to you again in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: For the price, this hotel is very average.  The staff is relatively friendly and efficient, but the valet parking attendant was unfriendly and unwelcoming.  Breakfast was okay but not worth the high price.  Room was clean and acceptable but not reflective of the price.
Manager Response: Darren,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us earlier this month. I apologize for the manner in which our Valet Parking Attendant conducted himself.   Ours is a people business and there is simply no excuse for rudeness of any kind.  Thank you for the feedback on your breakfast experience. Your candor is very helpful as we focus our efforts on enhancing our breakfast offerings.  We know you have a choice when you travel and I hope that should your travels bring you back to Orange County, you will allow us another opportunity to be of service.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here when I flew into California to begin our roadtrip from Cali to Michigan. He got us a suite so the room was very nice and it felt very clean. They had an excellent bar that had later hours which was nice because I got in to Irvine after 10pm. They had excellent bar food. We got lettuce wraps and a flat bread pizza. Every employee we interacted with was wonderful there. It is VERY close to the airport as well, not even a 2 minute drive. I probably could have walked from the airport instead of getting picked up. They did not have a continental breakfast so we did not eat there.
Manager Response: Jenna,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your visit to our hotel in May and thanks for making us the starting point on your California to Michigan road trip.    I am happy that you enjoyed your visit. Our Food & Beverage team loved reading your comments.  Our evening culinary team was very excited by your feedback – thank you.  We do offer a full breakfast which is served in our main restaurant on the lobby level daily. I’m sorry that you missed the chance to enjoy it.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: This hotel was nice.  It was your standard Hilton.  Lobby was nice with a bar and eating area.  The room was clean.  We stayed in the 2 double room.  No compliants with the room.  Room service was good.  The only issue I had was the lack of communication.  I was not aware that there was a breakfast that was offerred and my family and I ended up at IHOP down the street when we could have had free breakfast.  it would have been nice if we were told that was an option.  Other than that, great location to the airport...literally right across the street.  And there was no outside noise from the airport either which was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us.  I appreciate your feedback on the communication regarding breakfast options. Your comments are a great help to us.  Thank you.  I am glad that your overall stay met your expectations and that you were able to get a good nights rest.    We hope to be of service to you in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: The Orange County Hilton is a wonderful place to stay.  The service and food are excellent.  The room is nice, clean, and amazingly quiet.  And it is under 5 minutes from the airport which is very convenient if you are arriving on an late evening flight.
Manager Response: Linda,  Thank you for the great review. I shared your comments with our team and you absolutely made their day. They all work very hard to provide the experience you detailed.  Thank you and we look forward to being of service to you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: A must, even for a Disneyland Vacation! The location is perfect for and perfect place for a family to come and enjoy a close but far enough away from the conguestion of the theme parks. They have a great tennis court and a pool to calm down after a day a long lines and shoulder to shoulder journey.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. I am happy that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us and your visit to Disneyland.  We hope to be of service to you on your next visit.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker-Guthrie | General Manager

Summary: We spent five days at the hotel. The front desk staff was excellent. They were very helpful on knowing which restraunts to eat in the area.  They were always curtious The rooms were clean and spacious. I enjoyed the pool area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. I appreciate your comments and enjoyed sharing them with our team.  We look forward to being of service to you again in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Hilton Irvine, clean and efficient. Arrived at 10am and even tough official checkin at 3pm they gave us a room at 10.30am to use as we had just arrived from Asia. We had all 5 rooms by 11.45am. Breakfast buffet was adequate. Staff in dinning room first rate, very attentive. Top points go to the checkin staff who have us rooms as soon as they could. Yes I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  We sincerely appreciate your feedback and look forward to being of service to you in future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: I have had the opportunity to stay here about 6 times over the past year, primarily due to business. The attentive service by everybody involved is what has been top of my mind. From the housekeeping, to the front desk, to the restaurant staff and the bell man and the parking staff all have provided exceptional service.  D On the out side the hotel looks dated - primarily a function of its design from the time it was built. However on the interior - it is updated and immaculate for its class...  Definitely - five stars with my highest recommendation.  About the parking - it is standard for most hotels of its class...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experiences at our Hotel. I sincerely appreciate the feedback.  I know that our team will be encouraged by your comments.  We look forward to continuing to be your home away from home when you visit Orange County.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Excellent staff, good food.  But hotel rooms can be noise because they haven't invested in the building to replace the aging sliding glass doors that won't close all the way.  And the pillows had a rather unpleasant "locker room" odor (or perhaps the room did).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience with us. I am terribly sorry that the sliding door did not work properly and that the pillows had an unpleasant odor.    I appreciate your feedback as it allows us the opportunity to address specific shortcomings. Again, sincere apologies for our failure to provide you with an exceptional experience.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: As Hiltons go I recommend this one for it's walkable location from the airport terminal.  Make sure you map out your walking route as there are few places to cross the 8 lane road between the airport and hotel.  The lobby is big and welcoming.  The bar is the center of this hotel and a nice place to relax. Rooms are updated and large. My stay was very quiet.  Service was pleasant and efficient.
Manager Response: Marc,  Thank you for your commets on your recent visit to our Hotel. I'm glad you found your visit convenient and relaxing.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Parking charge is unfortunate.  This unnecessary charge diminishes an otherwise favorable experience.  It is one thing to charge for a precious resource, but parking at this hotel is not precious.  There is ample space to allow for self-parking for guests.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide a review about your recent stay with us.  I appreciate your feedback regarding the price to park.  We are comparable to similar properties in the John Wayne Airport corridor.  We provide a good value given our location and proximity to the airport.  I regret that this was not your impression and offer my apologies.  We know you have a choice when you travel and we do hope that you allow us to be of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Kudos to hotel for posting well in advance the parking lots were to be resurfaced and for notfying regular guests that if it was a challenge, to contact hotel and they would make other arrangements. No problem as resurfacing schedule did not interfere with hotel guests having parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with feedback on your recent experience at our Hotel.  I appreciate your comments regarding our parking lot project notification. While not the most exciting project, it was long overdue.  I am happy that it did not cause too much of an inconvenience.  We appreciate your continued business and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Everything was wonderful!  I like that the wireless is free.  Using my computer or tablet, access in the lobby was fast, but access was slow in my room.  The outdoor pool and hot tub were delightful.  There was even a small lift to allow persons with disabilities to enjoy the pool.  I really liked that amenity.  Other than that, everything was pleasant and enjoyable.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments! We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: I had a great experience at Hilton Hotel in Irvine. Thanks to Dora and Miguel thank you guys so much and the rest of the staff. Very professional and caring; Anyone going to the Orange County area go here, they make you feel at home and go out of their way. Thanks and see you soon
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us.  You absolutely made Dora and Miguel's day. They are both so dedicated to the Hotel.  It means a great deal to them to be recognized.  We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: This was my first visit to the Hilton in Orange County Airport, California, U.S.A.,]  This hotel is blessed with an excellent welcoming staff whose pride in their work shows in the services that they render, the attention to detail and cleanliness in accommodations and the maintenance of the hotel facilities.  May God bless all of you staff and your families, as well as, all of the good work that you do in serving the families who visit this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the fantastic review!  I am delighted that you were able to experience the outstanding service we strive to provide on a daily basis.  Your comments mean a great deal to our team and I appreciate your taking the time to share them.  We hope to be of service to you in the future.  Warm Regards,  Regina M. Stryker | General Manager

Summary: Service was good and attentive Rooms were noisy and while it is a hotel airport this was louder than expected. Good news tho' airport has a curfew from 9pm - 7am Ask for a room overlooking the airport if you enjoy watching airport operations and take off and landings No club but the complimentary breakfast was all inclusive which is unusual and was great The gym woefully undersized. There were 5 people in the morning and we could not find space to work out
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The rooms were great and very comfortable.  Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay. It is right cross the street from the airport and even with that, it was quiet.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My Check-in was delayed and unsatisfying. I did not feel very special at that time. After Check-in, the Hotel Staff went out their way to be very friendly and went out of their way to provide any service requested. It was a great job done by the entire Hotel Staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wonderful scenery and staff. Newly remodeled hotel and parking lot. I got to check in 5 hours early which was greatly appreciated after long flights. Staff went above and beyond during entire 3 day stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: During a brief business stay, I encountered great service.    Specifically, Miquel Saucedo, gave me a wonderful greeting at 5:30 am on my way to the gym, and then a few hours later assisted me with some administrative needs at the computer.   The hotel is very nice, great breakfast, a workout room better than most. good products in the room, and a truly helpful staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very bad - Would not recommend this hotel
Summary: Bad Service, rude Stuff, smelling rooms, noise in the rooms, noisy air condition, smelling lobby, bad quality of food. The bread in the breakfast is not fresh at all. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. I had a good experience with Hilton earlier when I stayed in Delaware and booked my stay in Hilton at this location (MacArthur Blvd, Irvine, CA)
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have been staying at this location every week for the past three years.it's a very clean hotel right by orange County airport with great customer service.I almost know everyone that works there and they are all nice and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel needs to send their employees back to training.  It is unreal how bad the employees are at this hotel.  If you need to be next to an Airport, pick the hotel next door.   The rooms are stuck in the 80s and the floor I was on smelled like smoke.  There is no fresh air except for the sliding door that opens 4 inches.  The room temp was always hot eventough I ran the AC the entire time.  Again, the staff needs to go back to training ASAP, or go to a different type of training.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Easy and helpful check-in experience.  Very friendly staff. Clean rooms.  24-hour gym.  Would definitely stay again. Close to highways.  Easy access to everything.  Would take advantage of the pool next time!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was my 1st time to this Hotel. I live in LA but my aunt and I just wanted to get away for the weekend and I love the area. Hotel was clean and rooms ok size but bathroom is a bit small for my taste. Everything I asked for was granted with no problems. Even got my room cleaned at 5pm when I finally left it for the day. $18/night for parking is a bit much for me also especially when I had to park in the very back of the hotel every night. With that being said also the parking was full the hotel did not feel crowed. Lobby nice and quiet. BTW this hotel is across the street from the Airport and I only heard 2 planes the entire time. Great noise reduction plan.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are very pleased you found our location and services the ideal getaway. Our location is convenient to many Orange County attractions and we hope you and your Aunt fully enjoyed yourselves.    We hope the next time you think of taking another getaway, that you think of  us once again.   We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I picked this hotel based upon location. The hotel is very easy to find and there are a lot of things to do in the area {South Coast Plaza Mall is great!!}.  Parking is $18/day and I had no trouble finding a close spot at night.  The room was a pretty nice size, clean and the bed was extremely comfortable.  The bathroom was pretty basic, but had lots of counter space {which I appreciated}.  Overall I was happy with my stay.  I feel the hotel could use some updating.  I'd likely stay here again, though.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for the great feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are so pleased you found our amenities and our location to your complete satisfaction.  South Coast Plaza can be a dangerous place but confident you thoroughly enjoyed yourself.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Solid Airport Hotel, Close to OC Amenities
Summary: This was my third visit to this Hilton property. The rooms are clean, modern and spacious. The staff was very friendly. My only negative comment relates to parking. Several hotel events occurring during our stay made parking tight and inconvenient.
Manager Response: Dear RoadWarrior519,  First and foremost thank you for your continued patronage.  It appears that during each of your stays you have been met with friendly faces and services you have come to expect from a member of the Hilton family.  That brings many smiles to our faces.  Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience you experienced with regards to parking.  We do try to minimize such occurrences when we have multiple events at our hotel.  We greatly appreciate the feedback an always look towards improving.  We hope the next time your are in Irvine, CA you will come back to see us. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I was forced to lay over due to the terrible service of US Airways.  They had to put me up for the night so they sent me to the Hilton.  Nice place.  Nice atmosphere and bar in lobby.  Food was okay. Exercise room was good.  Pool was okay. Grounds are very nice.  They do have a shuttle to the South Coast Plaza. Walking to other restaurants. Rooms were very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear CsquaredColorado,  We are sorry to hear about the circumstances surrounding your stay with us but you were in good hands the moment they selected our hotel for you.  We're glad you enjoyed our services and amenities and hope that if you have a choice in accommodations when in Irvine, CA again, that you will choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County at the Airport.  Many thanks again.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This was a great place to stay that was close to the freeway for traveling and the hotel had great service.  The hotel was clean and the rooms were well made up.  We used amenities like the gym and pool.  They seemed to work well for our family.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jennie  L,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.   We are so pleased you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel, in particular the pool which is always nice alternative to the beach.  It sounds like you had a wonderful time and we are glad to have been a part of it.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County at the Airport.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Overall the room and hotel appear to be very nice, however listening to doors slam all night including the fire door that I suspect was one of the staff because right after the door slammed and woke me up I heard the receipt being slid under my door does not make for a restfull night
Manager Response: Dear Kevin I,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  Also,  please accept our sincere apologies for the noise disturbance with the doors.  We have since shared your comments with our evening team to ensure we are mindful of this moving forward.  We hope the rest of your stay was pleasant and hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose our hotel.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: I stayed here for one night rather than stay with family (who smoke). Although right next to the airport there was not too much noise. The hotel is conveniently located. $18 for parking is in line with local hotels. Cute little bar. Next to some restaurants and clubs if you want a place to park for the night and cab it. The pool and hot tub area were decent. For $100 I have no complaints. As a HH member I was given a higher floor that came with a personalized note! Now that is attention to customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Cburnsesq,  Thank you for the "lovely" comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are very pleased you found our services and amenities to your satisfaction.  Our location is ideal to explore the area given our proximity to the freeway and John Wayne Airport.  As an HH member we sincerely appreciate your continued loyalty and look forward to seeing on future visits.  Many thanks again for the kind feedback.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This was a quick overnight business trip but after a long flight and a late night I found the evening doorman very kind, pleasant and patient.  The next morning the breakfast waitstaff was equally pleasant.  And the desk clerk Migeul Saucedo went above and beyond when I had trouble with my cell phone charger.  Thank you for making business travel a little better.
Manager Response: Dear CaliVisitor87,  What a treat to read your comments regarding your quick overnight stay at our hotel.  We are pleased you found our team friendly and  accommodating.  We will definitely give Miguel kudos in assisting  you with your cell phone needs. He is a true asset to our hotel and a true service professional.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will choose our hotel again.   Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay and pet friendly
Summary: Overall this hotel is nice.  Bar and restaurant on premise and hotel has tennis courts, pool and other amenities in close proximity to enjoy.   They also allow pets for an extra fee - which is nice to know.  I haven't tried out that service yet - but probably will.
Manager Response: Dear Karen V.,  Thank you for the kind compliments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are pleased to hear you found many of our services and location to your satisfaction.  We realize many of our guests travel with their beloved pets and they are always welcome at our hotel.    If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Typical 80's Hilton that has had a thorough renovation - the rooms and public areas are all nicely updated and very comfy. Keep in mind this property is located directly across the street from the airport, so if you're looking for a place where you can sleep in and relax, keep looking. I stayed two days and was up early each day so the noise wasn't an issue. Two reasons I wanted to post a review: 1) The level of service I experienced throughout the hotel was exceptional and the staff deserves kudos for their commitment to customer service and 2) The hotel charges a punishing $18 a day for parking but there is a website that allows you to prepay and only costs eight bucks (at the time of this posting anyway) so I suggest you take advantage of it. I can't post a link here but if
Manager Response: Dear heavybuddy,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel. We are so pleased you enjoyed our location, our services and most importantly the friendliness of our staff.  We have an amazing team here and could not be more proud of their dedication to our guests.  In terms of our parking fees they are standard throughout the area and we are very competitively priced.    Overall it seems you enjoyed a wonderful time and that is ultimately our goal.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, that you will once again choose our hotel.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: A very nice, warm and welcoming hotel. The restaurant staff, especially the breakfast team, are WONDERFUL! They are why I come back. Their breakfast buffet is nice, and the ocassional dinner "special nights," namely sushi night, or taco night can be fun! A nice property, and again the BREAKFAST STAFF IS GREAT!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Brian B,  What a treat to read your note regarding your experiences at our hotel.  First and foremost a million thanks for your continued loyalty.  I can appreciate your comments regarding our restaurant team. They are Fantastic!  No matter what the day holds, they only want our valued guests to have the best one!  We will be sure to give them extra kudos.  We sincerely hope that if travels keep brining you to Irvine, CA that you will continue to frequent our hotel.  Our team is delighted to welcome you back.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This hotel does an excellent job of cushioning the logistical/ aesthetic tradeoff inherent in a property across the street from an airport. Great location combined with nicely renovated lobby/bar/restaurant & guest rooms. Nice heated outdoor pool & well - maintained fitness center.   Service was consistently very friendly, although we had one minor snag. Our room didn't have a room service menu (?), & after I called guest services to have one brought up, it never showed up. Luckily,  my kids were particularly hungry/whiny, so after waiting 20 minutes, I just called room service and asked him to tell me over the phone what they had in terms of food for sale. The room service guy was extremely helpful and we had food within 30 minutes. All is well that ends well.   Overall I will
Manager Response: Dear Troy B,  Thank you for the kind comments of your recent stay at our hotel.  We are pleased you enjoyed our location, services and above all our wonderful staff.  They truly aim to please, and I am thrilled they hit the mark.  We do sincerely apologize for the room service menu inconvenience.  Please be assured this has been communicated to the appropriate Manager so that we avoid this in the future.  We are happy to hear your order was taken and delivered timely.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA once more, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: They Get It: Great Business Customer Service
Summary: Great experience! I can't say enough about the Front Desk. I had respectful, professional and thoughtful interactions with those I met during my two-day stay. 1) Charles and Miguel at the Front desk- Wow! This is the dynamic duo for sure! I had a major deadline for my work and these two worked together to help me with some of my business needs and guest needs. Hilton has a great computer station (mac and pc) for guests with unlimited printing. Charles was considerate and proactive and I also checked-out with him and it was as easy as 1, 2, 3! 2)Donna at the Front Desk- was attentive, remembered my long name, followed-up with me about my business needs. 3) Elder the Front Desk- also helped my team with their business needs and provided quick and efficient service.  I highly
Manager Response: Dear rcristabel,  We  are so pleased to read the wonderful feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am so proud of our dynamite front desk team for ensuring you were taken care of and demonstrating how much we value our guests.  I can say with complete confidence, they are top notch!  Thank you for recommending and glad you got a good night sleep. We look forward to welcoming as a valued guest once again.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This hotel has easy access to airport and 405 freeway.  They recently upgraded the lobby and bar/restaurant.  There is also a new dinner menu.  The front desk and restaurant staff are very friendly and they provide excellent service.  The rooms are always clean and ready upon arrival.
Manager Response: Dear NC240,  Thank you for the kind feedback of your recent stay at our hotel.  We are pleased you found our location and services, in particular our restaurant and front desk team member beyond your expectations. Hopefully you were able to try one of the many delicious items on the new dinner menu.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: i recently stayed at the hotel and found the service to be excellent, the front desk & shuttle bus employees were of the highest standard  when next in the area on business this will be my number one choice  Mr A Oliver Texas
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Alan O.,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding the attention you received recently at our hotel.  We appreciate your patronage and glad to hear you found our services and team members of the highest quality. Certainly that is we strive for.  Should travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we sincerely hope you will choose our hotel once again.   We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Betty and Daniel waitress and waiter
Summary: These two are a great asset to the Hilton dining room staff. They remember you from previous stays and are so attentive to all the customers.Betty always has a smile on her face. Daniel is prompt and friendly to all.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa N.,  Please accept our sincere thanks for the wonderful comments regarding two of our most valued associates, Betty and Daniel.  As long term members of our team, they continually go out of their way to ensure everyone is cared for.  We will be sure to let them know of your recognition.  Since they remembered you, I am assuming you have stayed with us before.  Thank you kindly for your continued patronage.  We hope that if travels bring you Irvine, CA in the near future, that you will choose our hotel once again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: All in all, a good value for mid-OC.  It is a clean and comfortable place to sleep with little else to offer.  Reliable but growing a bit shopworn, too.  Central to the three freeways, so it is a good jumping-off location for anything in the southland.
Manager Response: Dear Steven P.,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are happy to hear you found our services and location to your complete satisfaction and greatly appreciate your continued loyalty.  Your observations are duly noted and please know we work diligently to ensure our hotel stays fresh and comfortable.  Should travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great for a getaway and business
Summary: I stay here everytime I have business in Santa Ana, but this time I brought my family for a weekend of sightseeing and shopping. The are conveniently located so that everything is just minutes away. Whale watching, the beach, The Irvine Spectrum and the airport. The airport stops taking flights at 11 so the noise doesn't keep you up all night. Jose and Ruben met our every need for breakfast. We chose the buffet, but the still waited on us very attentively. We had a great stay because of everyone's hospitality.
Manager Response: Dear Michael W.,  What a treat to read your note regarding your recent stay at our hotel.   We are always pleased when our guests enjoy themselves and take advantage of all our city and hotel  has to offer.  I hope you enjoyed whale watching.  We did that as a Manager outing last year and we had the best time watching whales and dolphins.  We will be certain to give Ruben and Jose and the rest of the team kudos for their exceptional hospitality.  We are very proud to state we have a wonderful guest service team.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County at the Airport.  We look forward to having welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice lobby and rooms, aging exterior, NOISY
Summary: This hotel has a great location, near plenty of offices / headquarters and the lobby is modern and welcoming.  The front desk staff are very professional. The rooms are nice inside, but look out the window and the building exterior is really showing its age.  The worst aspect of this hotel is the noise: outside noise from the parking lot and airport combined with inside hallway noise make for a crappy night's sleep .  I'm afraid this Hilton Honors member will try a nearby Hyatt or Marriott the next time she's in the area.
Manager Response: Dear COLadyRoadWarrior,  Thank you for the candid feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience of noise and the fact that our exterior could use a shiny top coat.    We are very pleased to hear that you were met with friendly faces, a nice clean room and facilities.  We also hope that you reconsider staying with us in the near future.  We have just upgraded some room types and will be putting those in inventory very soon.  Please visit our website soon for the new design.  Thank you once again. We look forward to welcoming you back!  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: When traveing to Orange County, CA
Summary: This hotel offers one of the best locations in OC.  Close to John Wayne airport, freeways, and some of the best restaurants in the area.  Be prepared to pay for parking,  most likely due to the airport is across the street.
Manager Response: Dear James G T.,   Thank you for the great feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  Our location is very ideal and hopefully you enjoyed some of our other great features too.  Parking fees are very standard in the area but we are very competitive.  Many thanks again.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA once again, we definitely look forward to welcoming you back.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Very Nice Property.! This hotel location is across the street from John Wayne airport, in Orange County California.  This one has the wow factor, and the staff from the front desk to the valet were at the top of their game.  Breakfast is great they have everything you could want and it is ready, when you need it, quick in and out.  They have both Mac and PC computers in the lobby, with a printer.  You just sit down and work, no credit cards, no room keys, no problem, sit, work, print, easy as pie.  They had everything I needed, I was in a hurry most of my trip and everything was very smooth and the staff very helpful.  I wish they were all this good.  Until next time...
Manager Response: Dear Stephen H.,  Thank you so much for the very kind feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are so pleased you were met with friendly, professional faces that you also enjoyed the many great features our hotel offers such as the business center and restaurant.  Our team really enjoys reading all the feedback, in particular the ones like yours.  Many thanks again.  We sincerely hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose our hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Comfortable. Conveniently located. Excellent price for what you get. The food is not ideally suited for a vegetarian health nut, but I didn't go hungry. Very comfortable bed. I was here for a national dance conference. The seminar rooms had good acoustics so it was easy to hear the speakers. We were provided with a very nice floating dance floor.
Manager Response: Dear Donna D.,  Thank you for the very nice comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are always pleased to hear our valued guests enjoyed the many aspects of our hotel.  It appears we hit a home run with you and our team could not be happier in that their efforts are acknowledged.  Many thanks again.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: very pleased with service that was given when checking into your facilities. This hotel has easy access from the 405 freeway. I will stay here again and recommend it to business partners. thank you for your service and continue with your business plan because it is working.
Manager Response: Dear Guillermo P.,  We are so pleased to hear about the delightful stay you enjoyed while a guest of our hotel.  It seems we hit all the marks and the team could not be happier with your feedback.    Thank you for the gesture of future recommendations to friend’s colleagues.  We realize that is the best form of flattery and definitely advertisement.    When travels bring you to the Irvine, CA in the near future, we do look forward to welcoming you back.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: This is a great location for getting to SNA airport and sites around Orange County.  It is a 5 min walk (through the car park)  to arrivals or the car rental places.  Rooms are standard Hilton Quality.  Parking is expensive, but probably average for the area.  There is not a lot to do or eat in the neighbourhood, so you will need a car to go anywhere.
Manager Response: Dear MKD_Canada,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are pleased you found our location ideal for travel in and out of John Wayne Airport. We hope the next time you visit us you have the opportunity to enjoy the many features our hotel offers and the staff has some great dining options they can recommend.  Many thanks again.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: I would not stay here again
Summary: The hotel is conveniently situated across the street from John Wayne Airport.  Amenities are only fair.  Room was clean but again, amenities and size just "fair".  They have a profoundly annoying system where you must use your room key in order to exit the property with your vehicle.  BOTH DAYS it failed and held me, and others up just trying to drive away.  And for this wonderful experience you get to pay an $18 "self parking fee" in a standard outdoor parking space.  I would not stay at this hotel again.  It definitely does not live up to Hilton standards.
Manager Response: Dear Richard C.,  We were a bit dismayed to read the experience of your recent stay at our hotel.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience you encountered with our parking lot key system.  We have since shared your comments with the Team  to ensure that if we are having problems, then we have an obligation to you, our valued guest to make it better.    We welcome the opportunity to serve you in the future, so that we may demonstrate the service you have come to expect from a member of the Hilton family.  Many thanks again for your invaluable feedback.   Kindest Regards,

Summary: As a person who stays mostly at the Hilton, it is my first time to stay at this property.  The rooms are well appointed and modern and clean.  The lobby has a modern but friendly appearance.  The restaurant which I used in the morning were excellent and the staff remember you from previous visits.  The gym is small but modern.  I do like this hotel and the staff the run it.  Well done all.
Manager Response: Dear Macire,  We really enjoyed reading your comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are so pleased you found our hotel and services on par with what you have come to expect from a member of the Hilton family.  Thank you for your feedback.  We hope that if travels bring you out to Irvine, CA in the not too distant future, you will once again choose our hotel.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: As soon as you walk into the lobby you feel good. Big, open, spacious and decorated with comfortable couches.  Don't miss the homemade roasted peppers salsa they serve with the scrambled eggs for breakfast. I'm hunting down the chef so I can get the recipe.  Rooms are nice and not overly furnished like in some hotels.   Across the street from John Wayne Airport in Orange County.  Enjoy.  Ruben Gonzalez - Olympian, Author, Speaker - OlympicMotivation com
Manager Response: Dear Theluheman,  What a terrific review of your recent stay at our hotel.  Thank you very much.  We are pleased you enjoyed our hotel and services, in particular our salsa during the breakfast hour.  Please feel free to call the hotel and ask to speak to Chef, i am certain he would provide the recipe.  But please don't quote me.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose our hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  KIndest Regards,

Summary Heading: Good for an hotel next to an airport
Summary: I did not experience any noise from the airport even though the hotel was right across the street from Orange County airport.  Unfortunately I was kept up all night by some college kids partying and the hotel did nothing to correct the issue even though I complained four times.  I'd like to think this was an isolated incident so gave it 3 stars since it's close to the airport and quiet.  Overall the place is just okay
Manager Response: Dear Marie T.,  We appreciate your comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the noise you encountered and our shortfall in addressing your concern.  Please be advised the appropriate team members have been alerted to your note so that future incidents are responded to appropriately.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the future, you will give us another opportunity to serve you so that we may demonstrate the service you have come to expect from a member of the Hilton Team.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Review of Hilton Irvine Hotel, CA
Summary: Clean fresh hotel with very helpful staff. Centrally located and very easy to get to from Orange County Airport but over-priced when compared to Marriott and Holiday Inn. The breakfast buffet was good with numerous options but not worth the $22 it cost.
Manager Response: Dear 933arthurc,  Thank you for the candid feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.   We are happy that you found our hotel and most of our services to your satisfaction.  We apologize you did not find our breakfast up to par so will certainly work with our culinary team to enhance our offerings.  Many thanks again and if travels bring you to irvine, CA in the future, we hope you will once again give us an opportunity to serve you.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Our water polo team stays at this hotel a few times a year, my son left his mac book pro in the room and "Maria " one of the cleaning team turned it in. Thank you to day manager Chris for all your help and I hope maria received her thank you card from my son
Manager Response: Dear Bob L,  I was thrilled to read your note regarding your recent experience at our hotel.  We will be sure to give Maria kudos and I am happy to report that I can always count on our associates to do the right thing.  Hopefully the rest of your stay was equally enjoyable.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back!  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Extremely convenient for the airport, nice clean rooms and great beds
Summary: We stayed here with a very large group of kids participating in a water polo tournament and there was also a fraternity gathering and a college baseball group. The hotel seemed to accommodate these groups and the airport travelers really well but it did lead to a high ambient noise level in the reception and common area. Thankfully none of the noise can be heard from the well appointed but small room, at least not until the fraternity group had their drinking games outside in the car park at 2-3am.   Aside from very slow service at the bar there was very little waiting at reception with so many people at the hotel and the staff were very pleasant and helpful.  The hotel is right across the street from the airport so it's convenient and, as expected, noisy with planes landing.
Manager Response: Dear Si45,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We do realize there can be some challenges with multiple groups however our Service Teams will make ever effort to minimize any inconveniences.  It appears this was the case this time and we are very happy to hear our associates were friendly and accommodating.  If travels bring you to the Irvine, CA once again, we hope you will reconsider staying with us and giving us another opportunity.  Many thanks again.  Warmly,

Summary: if you have more than 2 people staying with you in one room the double beds are tiny and will not sleep more than one person.  Seems that the hotel has a lot of events on the weekends leaving you no place to park and up listening to partying all night long.
Manager Response: Dear Kristen T.,  Thank you kindly for your feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We sincerely apologize you were met with the inconvenience of parking and noise.  We hope some of your other experiences were a bit more positive and that your overall stay was pleasant.  Should travels bring you to our area in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back and making your next stay better!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Nothing special but in fairness, they were undergoing renovation.  No executive lounge.  Very close to the airport.  Rooms were clean and roomy enough.  Staff was very nice.  Not sure why you would want to be there except for proximity to the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Dan B.,  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I hope the construction was not a big inconvenience.  I realize there is never a good time to do this but certainly appreciate your understanding.  We hope that if travels bring to Irvine in the near future, you will once again choose our hotel.  Our Guest Service Team will be delighted to give you ideas on the surrounding area.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Arriving from DFW after long day of travel and several flights, I was pleasantly greeted by; MR. SPENCER FIREMAN at Front Desk check-in.  he was most professional in his mannerisms, efficient, organized and most accommodating.  He swiftly checked me in and got me the room that suited my needs best and thanked me several times during the process for being a loyal HH customer.  Made me feel most Welcomed and at ease.  SPENCER is a most valued Asset to Hilton Hotels and they must feel very very fortunate to have him on their Team. Recommend This Hotel to All, Four Diamond Treatment!
Manager Response: Dear bob v,  Thank you for your kind review of your recent stay with us and positive recognition of one of our valued team members, Spencer Fireman.    We are pleased to hear you were met with a friendly face and warm welcome after what was a long day of travel for you.  You came to the right place at the right time!  However we are confident your experience would have been great at any time.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine, Orange County at the Airport.  We look forward to providing you the same welcome.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but NOISY air conditioner
Summary: This hotel is very nice and directly across the street from John Wayne airport.  I was able to step off the airplane, take the short walk to the hotel, and check-in the hotel in about 15-20 minutes.  The lobby is very nice and rooms are clean and modern looking.  The restaurant and bar area were also good with attentive service.  I always run the air conditioner when I am at a hotel as it helps to drown out background noise and keeps the room cool which I like when I sleep.  Much to my surprise, when I was drifting off to sleep, the a/c kicked on, and it sounded like a freight train!  It woke me up completely so I turned it off.  The room then got stuffy after a few minutes, so I turned it back on and was then treated to more freight trains all night long!  This was not a simple
Manager Response: Dear Scottsdale_AZ_Travel,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel. Please accept our  sincerely apologies  for the discomfort the AC caused you.  We do hope to start replacing them in the not too distant future.    We are pleased however, that your short walk to the hotel and your subsequent check in was pleasant and that you were able to enjoy the other facilities.  Our dedicated teams strive to make a positive impression and we are truly glad that was the case despite our shortcomings.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County at the Airport.   Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Good hotel across from OC Airport
Summary: Stayed here for couple of nights on business.  Lobby, restaurant, rooms are clean and comfortable.  Furniture was very nice in my room including a very comfortable bed.  Staff was very friendly.  Food and drinks were good too.  The not so good was the AC unit, one of those units mounted on wall which made a ton of noise which in turn would wake me up.  So if you are light sleeper, noise from AC will not provide a restful night sleep.  Also, elevators and hallways starting to show their age, however now I'm nit-picking.  Overall I would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear PickyTraveler748,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are so pleased you enjoyed our facilities and location.  Our team prides itself on delivering exceptional service and your feedback is invaluable to us.  Regarding the AC units, we do hope to start replacing them in the not too distant future.   If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we sincerely hope you will choose our hotel once again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Kudos at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport
Summary: My son and I enjoyed 4 nights at this facility and were beyond satisfied with the facility, amenities and staff.  Mr. Miguel Saucedo greeted us at the front desk and made sure that key info, needs and ability to satisfy those needs were met. Our room was immaculate and the housekeeping kept our room well stocked. Even the Supervisor asked if our needs were being satisfied regarding Housekeeping. Parking was secure but easy access to the roads. Cleanliness abounded throughout the grounds/facility. I would recommend without hesitation a stay at this Hilton facility.
Manager Response: Dear gregory h,  We really enjoyed reading your comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel. Thank you for the kind feedback.   It appears the Father and Son getaway was quite enjoyable and we are truly happy we were part of that experience.  We will be sure to give kudos to Miguel.  As a long-standing and very valuable member of our Team,  he truly enjoys serving our guests and we are very proud of him.  Thank you once again.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will not hesitate to choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County at the Airport.  We look forward to welcoming you once again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Fine hotel with great airport location
Summary: My wife and I stayed at this hotel on January 1 & 6, 2104, both "ends" of our trip to California.  We found this hotel nearly perfect, especially for our need to be near the Orange County (John Wayne) airport.  The hotel is literally across the street from the airport, walkable to and from the airport, if you can figure out how to navigate the airport parking garage walkways/stairways.  The hotel shuttle also leaves every 30 minutes to go to the airport and picks up at the airport on request.  As others have noted, clean, quiet rooms, friendly staff, nice bar and restaurant area.  I took advantage of the heated pool (hot tub was under construction both visits).
Manager Response: Dear ericcshafer,  Thank you for the wonderful comments regarding your recent visit(s) to our hotel.  We are pleased you enjoyed so many great aspects from our friendly associates, proximity to the airport restaurant and the pool.  We are very sorry the hot tub was out of order but it was due to some much needed maintenance and we realize there is never a good time to take it down in sunny California.  Please accept our apologies.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County at the Airport.  We are confident the hot tub will be available for your enjoyment.    Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel! Friendly staff, comfy beds, clean rooms, what more can you ask for?!
Summary: I booked this room at the last minute on Priceline. We had stayed there before but weren't looking to spend a lot this trip around as we had a lot of other things planned. We contacted them through their Facebook page to confirm our stay and got a quick friendly reply, "looking forward to our visit, etc" I was certain they just responded to everyone like that, however upon checking in we were greeted by name by Paulina, who was super friendly and we chatted for a little about our plans to go to Disneyland. We expected "A Priceline room." (You know what I mean, the one with the loud air conditioner, next to the ice machine, that is haunted haha)...instead we got a complimentary room upgrade (they remembered us from last time) and when we asked at the desk for a room where the
Manager Response: Dear SamandJC,  Thank you very much for the kind and positive feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are extremely pleased that you you enjoyed your time with us once again.  I would just like to mention that our responses whether on trip advisor, facebook, etc. are genuine and sincere and not a script.  Whenever possible, we like to make our guests visits memorable if they alert us of a special occasion.  We are pleased that we were able to make your trip that much more enjoyable and we hope you and family enjoyed a terrific time at the happiest place one earth (Disneyland).  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose  the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport hotel.  We look forward to your return visit.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: nota place for weekend geta aways
Summary: more business in and out. Not a place for weekend get away. Bathroom smelled of old sewage everytime water was turned on. A/c was very noisy....towels were scarce....    were handed two bottles of water not many amenities as the embassy suites. they go out of tghere way to accomidate. Breakfast and happy hour etc.
Manager Response: Dear Veronica N.,  We are very sorry to hear about your recent experience at our hotel.  We do realize that our services do differ between the Embassy Suites, however we strive to ensure our guests enjoy a productive and comfortable stay.  I apologize we fell short this time.   We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will give us another opportunity to demonstrate the level of service you have come to expect from a member of the Hilton family.  Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Excellent choice within walking distance of airport
Summary: We booked this hotel last minute when flying into John Wayne to avoid a storm going through Chicago. We arrived at 11 p.m. and were greeted by a friendly face at registration who quickly got us our keys and gave us the free wi-fi code. We had a glass of wine in the bar with the most friendly bartender, who was gently closing up but chatted with us and made us feel welcome. The rooms are high standard Hilton product. I've stayed in a lot of Hiltons and this is a very well maintained property. Comfy bed, clean, good shower pressure -- those are things that are important to me.  The next morning we went down for breakfast in a beautiful, open dining area off the bar. The only disappointment was the breakfast choice. There was a "full" buffet and a continental offering. While the
Manager Response: Dear Karen N.,  Thank you for the wonderful comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are so pleased that you found our services, accommodations and hotel amenities to your complete satisfaction.  It seems you were able to enjoy some great weather before returning to chilly Chicago.  We apologize for the shortcoming in our breakfast buffet and have since shared your comments with our Chef.  I know he will also be disappointed to hear this.  For a quick getaway or convenience to John Wayne Airport we are definitely a terrific choice.  We are happy you found that to be the case too. I f you find yourself in Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Our 8 days this month at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County have been an excellent hotel experience. We are in hotels on business travel more than 60 nights/year, and have very sharp sensitivities to some of the things that make a hotel stay "great," or the opposite.   In the case of Hilton Irvine, we found that management and staff orientation to customer service and quality of stay are what they should be. When you have to make a special request, for instance, you hope to hear  "Yes we can do that!," have everything handled in a positive way, and get the sense that they sincerely enjoy providing the service. We have experienced this positive orientation from the entire staff, I'll mention especially managers Miguel Soucedo, and also Donna, and Spencer. Also, we have appreciated
Manager Response: Dear Marty S.,  Wow!  What a treat it was to read your comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel. Everything we strive for was flawlessly delivered and we could not be more elated that your experience was deservedly amazing.  Eight days is a long time to spend away from home so everything from service to cleanliness and beyond becomes critical. We are so pleased that you were met with excellence along the way.  Spencer, Donna, Miguel, Jerry and Jesus are all a tremendous asset to our Team and we are truly lucky to have them.  We will be sure to give them kudos.  We certainly hope that if travels bring you to Irvine once again, you will choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County/Airport.  We look forward to your return visit.   All the Best for the New Year!

Summary: Ok, the bathtub was dirty. The bed was comfortable but looked like no bedspread on it. There was noises from the other rooms such as water running or walking on floor above.  The drinks were hire at one bar in the ballroom and cheaper at another bar.  The help was very friendly
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl B.,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I have shared your comments with the appropriate team members addressing your concerns with cleanliness and noise.  We strive to ensure our guests enjoy a clean, comfortable and productive stay and I sincerely apologize we fell short this time.    If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will give us another opportunity to demonstrate the service you have come to expect from a member of the Hilton family.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: On October 26 I reserved two adjacent rooms for December 28.  When we arrived at 2pm we were told our rooms were not ready.  Not a problem. I understand check in is always at 3pm..  My granddaughter was anxious to swim and enjoy the hot tub so they gave us a key for the pool however the hot tub was not in service.  We waited by the pool until 3 and returned to the front desk.  Rooms were still not available.  We waited.  At four we were told one room was ready but not the second room. We waited for the second room.  At 4:30 we checked again and were told it was still being cleaned and did we want a different room.  No, we want adjacent rooms.  While waiting in our first room we could hear hammering, sawing, drilling etc.  Now we know why the room wasn't available.  Too bad the
Manager Response: Dear CSBANCAK,  Please accept my sincere apologies for your inconvenience at check in during your recent stay at our hotel.  I can certainly empathize with your frustration given that check in is 3pm and we should honored our policy.  I know exactly what a long day in Disneyland is like and what it means to be able to rest after such a long day.  Please know I have since shared your feedback with the appropriate team members so that we avoid these situations in the future.    I'm please to hear you enjoyed some aspects of our hotel including the pool and some friendly team members.  We certainly hope this does not deter you from visiting us in the future and I would be more than delighted to give future reservations my personal attention.  Thank you for your feedback.   Our sincere wishes to you and yours for a bright and prosperous New Year!

Summary: That was so shocking to me that the Hilton rooms missing fridges! Plus you need to pay so much for self parking!!! In general I am not staying at the same place again when I visit the area soon...Found some other places with fridges and parking was complimentary. However staying at Hilton was not cheap
Manager Response: Dear Rafik T.,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  Just to inform you we do provide refrigerators for a nominal fee upon request.  Since it is not mandatory to offer these in every room we do try to accommodate our guests by having them available.  In terms of parking fees and hotel rates we are extremely competitive.  I am sorry to hear you will  not choose to stay with us again and hope one day you will reconsider.  Our best wishes to you and yours for a bright and prosperous New Year!

Summary: We rolled in to this hotel after a hellish flight from Michigan via Atlanta. No reservation, 10 o'clock at night. Got two rooms no problem, cheaper than on their website. Very comfortable beds, rooms and so quiet for right across from John Wayne airport.  We are super picky FYI! Had a delicious, large breakfast buffet in the morning and Jose took good care of us.  Would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Lisa S.,  How pleasant it was to read your feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are delighted we were able make a difficult situation a little better for you and that you enjoyed a restful night followed by a delightful breakfast in the morning.  We have already shared your comments with the Team and they are tremendously grateful for your acknowledgement.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Many thanks again!  Wishing you and yours a bright and prosperous Holiday Season!

Summary: I got a much needed restful night's sleep here. The attendant who checked me in was kind and caring. The hallways were beautiful with art. The other guests were warm and active. It was a great experience. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Brent R.,  Thank you for the positive comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are delighted you got a restful night sleep and that you enjoyed the many features of our beautiful property, in particular our warm and welcoming staff.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the future you will once again choose our hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back.  With warm wishes to you and yours for a Bright and Prosperous Holiday Season!

Summary: I highly recommend this Hotel!  The Staff was fabulous from the Bellhop, Front Desk, Concierge, Restaurant, Maid Service...all extremely accommodating and so very helpful!  Very clean and comfortable room, quiet and in the perfect location for air travel.
Manager Response: Dear Melanie S.,  Thank you for the kind feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are so pleased you found our staff, services and location all to your complete satisfaction and enjoyment.   Our teams work very hard to ensure our valued guests, such as yourself, have the benefit of a productive and relaxing visit. We are truly delighted by your comments.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County hotel once again.  Best Wishes to you and yours for a Bright and Prosperous Holiday Season!

Summary: Well situated nearby John Wayne Airport Only problem on automatic the HVAC is noisy and affects my sleep. Employee very friendly. Strange set-up for anybody who drop somebody at the Hotel (Taxi, car lift after work) Heated pool was perfect on nice thanks Giving sunny day...
Manager Response: Dear Christian L,  Thank you for the positive feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are delighted you found our staff friendly, that you enjoyed the convenience to the airport, as well as use of the pool.  The pool is always a treat on a warm and sunny California day.  I do apologize for the noise of the HVAC and hope that will not deter you from visiting us in the near future.   We definitley look forward to serving you again.  With sincere wishes for a warm, bright and prosperous Holiday Season!  Warmly,

Summary: Very clean, friendly staff, good breakfast, excellent location to freeway access and surrounding areas and beaches.  Free transportation to airport which is located right across the street.  Upscale shopping centers nearby.  Everything is right at your fingertips./
Manager Response: Dear KC and Chric J,  Thank you very much for the kind feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am so pleased you found our accommodations, our staff and services to your great satisfaction.  We pride ourselves on being to deliver a memorable experience and I am happy to read we did not disappoint.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope that you will once again choose our hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Best wishes for a warm, festive and prosperous Holiday Season!  Warmly,

Summary: I was truly amazed by the quality of service I received from Carlos, the front desk agent. His service and hospitality is beyond anything I had ever experienced at a Hilton. Check-in was a breeze and i felt cared for and welcomed at the hotel. Whenever I needed something, Carlos had my back. Dinner recommendations, maps, directions, transportation arrangements, even extra towels. He went above and beyond to make my experience one of the most enjoyable I have ever had.   I travel to Orange County often and I will be coming back to the Hilton over and over. This kind of service and hospitality is worth every penny. I will definitely recommend the hotel to my friends and family, all because of Carlos. THANK YOU Carlos for the awesome stay! The Hilton definitely needs more people
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Stan P.,  What a delight it was to read your comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I have since shared your comments with the Team and Carlos and I can assure you your acknowledgement means quite a bit to us.  What is equally important is the experience of your stay and I could not be happier in that Carlos and team made your stay so memorable.  We sincerely hope that if travels bring you once again to Irvine, CA you will give us the opportunity to serve you once more.  Wishing you and your a bright, joyous and prosperous Holiday Season!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: When my early morning flight was cancelled I needed a hotel close to the airport. The shuttle came and got me and after checking in, I was in my room at 8am!   I didn't spend much time in the room, but it was clean, quiet and comfortable.  I grabbed a sandwich and drink at the bar in the evening and the bartender was attentive and friendly. The shuttle got me to the airport at 5:30 am the next morning.   All in all, a great stay for a last minute call.  I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy B.,  Thank you very much  for the positive review of your recent stay at our hotel.  We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed prompt and courteous service from our team and that you also enjoyed some delights from our restaurant.    For a short stay, we are very glad you were met with comfort and found our hotel to your satisfaction and perhaps the next time you get to spend a little more time with us. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Wishing you and yours a warm, bright and prosperous Holiday Season!  Kindest Regards,

Summary: very clean and conveniently located hotel. Parking fees of 18 seem ridiculus however when you don't have a car!Good internet reception. Food is good. Conference facilties are very nice and comfortable. The staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Oscar R.,  Thank you kindly for the positive feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are pleased you found our location convenient and more importantly our staff  friendly and helpful.  I realize that our parking fee may be a bit high, but rest assured we are competitive in the market.  We hope that does not deter you from visiting us in the future.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we sincerely hope you will once again choose our hotel.     Warm wishes to you and yours for a bright, joyous and prosperous Holiday Season!  Kindest Regards,

Summary: My family arrived after a long day.  I travel every week and really appreciate an attentive front desk host.  Miguel Saucedo brought my reservation up even before I gave him my full name.  He acknowledged by Hilton Honors status and informed me that my room was upgraded.  He also called in the parking valet to make sure that my car would be taken care of while I leave i at the hotel during an out of town trip.  I was a seamless process with what I call "outrageous" service.  This is why I belong to Hilton's loyalty program.  Thank you, R. Katz
Manager Response: Dear Rick K.,  Thank you very much for the great feedback regarding your recent check in experience and subsequent stay at our hotel.  I have since shared your comments with the entire staff and also realize we have a terrific and committed team member in Miguel.  We are so pleased he made your stay that much more memorable.  We have decided that our new mantra will be to provide "outrageous" service and we can't thank you enough for the boost of inspiration.  Wishing you and yours a warm, happy and prosperous Holiday Season!  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Great location, beautiful hotel, competent staff, good restaurant and bar. Everyone I interacted with was cheerful and helpful. The hotel manager was present and constantly interacting with customers and staff. It doesn't get any better than this!
Manager Response: Dear Larry W.,  Thank you very much for the wonderful comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel. We pride ourselves on providing high levels of warm and professional service and we are very pleased with hit the mark with you.  In addition, we have a terrific culinary team and restaurant staff that enjoys making the dining "experience" just that.  We truly hope that if travels bring you once again to Irvine, CA that you will choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you again.  Enjoy a terrific Thanksgiving Holiday! Warmly,

Summary Heading: My wonderful experience at the restaurant
Summary: I decided to take my wife for breakfast to the restaurant at the Hilton Irvine by the John Wayne airport. Ruben de la Torre, our waiter, did a super job attending us. I do customer service training and I was impressed with his service. Congratulations and thank you Ruben.
Manager Response: Eduardo,  Thank you for your wonderful comments about Ruben.  He is a key member of our restaurant staff and we appreciate all of his efforts on behalf of our customers.  Yet to hear your praises and know they came from one who is involved with and recognizes excellent customer service is especially heartwarming for me, and I'm sure will mean a great deal to Ruben as well.  I'm so pleased to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your breakfast at the hotel.  I hope sometime you can return and stay overnight with us and enjoy all of the amenities we have to offer.   I'd love to hear your impressions of the property.  Best regards,

Summary: everyone and everything was excellent and would stay again.  Great location and when I had a question it got answered right away and if I needed something it was taken care of.  The rooms are very clean and the bed was wonderful.  We had our High School reunion there(47) and if we do our 50th I am sure we will be back
Manager Response: Michael,  We really enjoyed having your group in house for the reunion acitivies.  I'm really pleased to see that you had a good time and enjoyed the hotel and the staff.  Hearing that the staff was responsive to all of your needs is of course music to my ears.  We emphasize personal service to all of our guests as if they were family and our team members really take it to heart.  I'm so glad that you were pleased with their service and that it helped make your stay a pleasant one.  It's nice to hear that you liked the guest rooms and of course the Hilton Bed.  I too hope you'll be back for your 50th reunion and would love it if you could get back even before that time.  It's nearly 80 degrees here today so maybe we can entice you to leave Wyoming for our sunny coast again.  We would love to see you.  But I know it's always nice to get back home.  Hope you have a great holiday season. Best regards,

Summary: Great location just across freeway from the airport. Shuttles all day make it hassle-free. Went here for a Conspiracy Theory type of conference, LOL.  Star attraction being Graham Hancock, which was awesome! Hotel bar is nicely located between conference rooms and the hotel elevators. Couldn't say any more about the smoking floors.  YEAH!  Cali is awesome! Free-WiFi worked great.  Try Lobster rolls from the bar. BOOM!
Manager Response: Thanks for letting us know how much you enjoyed your stay with us.  It sounds like you were able to take advantage of our convenient shuttle service to the airport just across from the hotel, and I'm glad that it worked out so well for you.  It appears that you also had a chance to enjoy the lounge.  I loved your comment on the lobster rolls as they are one of my favorites also.  We do have an extremely limited number of smoking rooms available in the hotel, so I'm happy that you were able to get one of them and that they made your stay more pleasant.  We enjoyed having your group here at the hotel and hope we will see you all again sometime in the future.  Thanks again for letting us know about your visit.  Best regards,

Summary: My experience at the Hilton Hotel was very peaceful and very satisfying. The staff was excellent, the food was great, and the hotel was in a very prime location of the airport. The International House of Pancakes was in a nice part of the airport. The hotel was very convenient and accessible enough to navigate my way around the shopping district.
Manager Response: Dear Iris S.,  We sincerely appreciate you taking time to share the positive feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are pleased to hear your stay was met with incredible team members who were part of making your trip satisfying and peaceful.   We agree that our location is convenient to many attractions including IHOP and shopping and all the wonderful sites our city has to offer.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope that you once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport hotel.  We look forward to your next visit.  Enjoy a wonderful Thanksgiving Holiday! Warmly,

Summary: I had a business trip recently and stayed at the Irvine Hilton. The lobby is beautiful, there is a restaurant/bar area. Rooms are spacious and clean. I made use of room service and they were extremely fast. The lemon cake is delish! Check in and out was quick and easy. Would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Lindsey,  I'm so happy to see that you had a great stay at our hotel this month.  It seems that you found everything you need at the hotel, and hopefully had an opportunity to enjoy yourself a little as well.  I agree with you that the lemon cake is delicious.  It's one of my favorites.  We really appreciate you taking the time to comment on your stay, and are grateful for your continued loyalty to the hotel.  Looking forward to your next visit. Best regards,

Summary: This is an ideal location for a airport connection. It is so close you can walk or there is a shuttle available. The staff are pleasant and courteous. The room was large and comfortable. It also offered a balcony which is quite enjoyable. The rate was reasonable. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: James,    It's great to hear your comments on the hotel and your impressions of the property.  We are blessed with a wonderful location if you are utilizing the Orange County Airport.  Many of our guests love the brief walk to the airport in our consistently nice weather, but most take advantage of our airport shuttle service for easy pickup and drop-off.  It's especially nice to hear your kind comments regarding the service you have received from our staff.  They are the heart of our hotel.  I hope you will remain a "regular guest" for us whenever you find yourself coming to the  Orange County area.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards,

Summary: I stay here about every other week on business, and the hotel is always excellent.  Check-in is consistently simple and pleasant.  The rooms are immaculately clean and well-appointed.  There is an incredible year-round outdoor pool (30 yards long, with accompanying hot tub) surrounded by a spacious patio.  The fitness center is fully equipped with the latest Precor machines, etc...  But my highest marks go to the staff.  Having stayed here dozens upon dozens of times, I can say that every single interaction I have had with employees, including the sales/reservations representatives, check-in (shout out to Miguel), housekeepers, dining staff (especially Sergio) and valets has been positive.  For anyone considering this hotel, whether for business or pleasure, you'll be made to
Manager Response: Mike,    Thank you for taking the time to post your comments here and provide your thoughts regarding our hotel.  Thanks especially for the very nice remarks about our hotel staff members and the friendly service they provide to our guests.  I get to observe their actions and great service attitudes every day, but it means so much more to hear it from a guest who has frequented the hotel as often as yourself.  I'm also so pleased to hear how impressed you have been with our Housekeeping staff and the cleanliness of your guest room, and that you have had the chance to enjoy some of the other hotel amenities and facilities.  I will certainly let Miguel and Sergio know of your comments and I'm sure they will be pleased as well.
