We truly are appreciate of your continued loyalty to the property and the Hilton brand, and assure you we will work even harder to be worthy of your patronage in the future.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon.  Best regards,

Summary: The Restaurant/Bar/Lounge area is nice, a bit overpriced for food/drinks. Very clean and staff is extremely accommodating. Can't sleep comfortably due to 'flushing toilet' sounds from other rooms. No fan in bathrooms either. The hotel needs to be updated. Great place for air travelers, right across from John Wayne Airport.
Manager Response: Manuela,  We appreciate you taking the time to give us your comments on your stay at the hotel.  This type of candid response is invaluable to us in letting us see how our guests view our facility and services.  I am pleased to see that you found the staff very accommodating and the hotel very clean, I am sorry that you were not able to sleep comfortably during your stay.  That is not something that we normally see, and I wish we could have had the opportunity to find a quieter room for you.  Nevertheless I am pleased that our convenient location was perfect for your needs and that you enjoyed the hotel facilities.  Like all major hotels, we have annual plans for upgrading the facilities and this includes the guest rooms in the near future.  Again thank you for your feedback.  Best regards,

Summary: Typical airport hotel, over-priced full service hotel...Charges for parking but right across the street from the Orange County / John Wayne Airport.  Check in was fine.  Paid extra for an executive floor room, but this hotel apparently does not have an executive lounge.  Not worth the money unless you just need the convenience of being literally right across the street from the Orange County Airport
Manager Response: Edward,  Thanks for taking the time to comment on your stay at the hotel this month.  We appreciate your business and are sorry that you feel that our hotel as well as other full service hotel properties do not offer value.  As you noted, full service hotels all charge for parking and our fees are very similar to others in the area.  Our location across from the airport is extremely convenient and I am pleased that it worked well for you.  Our Executive floors are the highest in the hotel and include amenities not available in other guest rooms.  There has not been a lounge on these floors since 2005 but we feel they do offer value for the small additional charge.  We do thank you for your feedback and hope we will have the opportunity to see you again in the future. Best regards,

Summary: I stayed here last year and am glad I returned again.  Room was great and comfortable everything seemed new!  and the people were all outstanding.  Plenty of TV channels to choose from and loved the big HD screen to watch it on!  Checking in was simple even though I forgot all my paperwork Miguel Saveedo was extremely helpful and also took the extra time and made my son excited about the trip by caring about what he was doing too.  A perfect way to start the busy weekend.    Had breakfast at the hotel and it was great and the area was very relaxing.  It is a very well kept hotel and really makes a great impression as you enter from the front or thru the courtyard.  Thank you !
Manager Response: I am so glad you returned to the hotel again this year and had a lovely visit with us.  It's so nice to hear that you enjoyed your guest rooom and had an opportunity to eat in the restaurant and have a relaxing breakfast.  Your comments regarding the service staff and especially Miguel at the Front Desk are truly appreciated by me, and I know they will be pleased to hear them as well.  It sounds as if Miguel and your son had a great liitle visit and I'm so glad that your son was exicted about your trip.  Miguel truly enjoys his conversations with our guests, and the chance to assist them with their travel needs.  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. Best regards,

Summary: We stayed one night, flew into Orange County to fly out the next day to Cabo San Lucas Mexico. The great part is that it is right across the street from the airport & the hotel offers shuttle service. We checked in late and the man on duty (do not remember his name) was a very welcoming person to have behind the front desk, very pleasant! Thank you Hilton
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to give us your comments on your overnight visit to the hotel.  We have a great location for travelers using the Orange County Airport,and I am so glad that you were able to take advantage of our airport shuttle pickup.  We appreciate your kind comments regarding the gentleman at the Front Desk.  That entire staff is a great group and are dedicated to making all of our guests feel welcome.  I hope you had a great trip to Cabo and that we will have the opportunity to see you again at the property in the not too distant future. Best regards,

Summary Heading: Nice hotel and Carlos at the front counter was fantastic to work with!
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel several times and have always thought it was top notch in every way. Tonight after checking in, I was really tired and had a situation that I needed some help with.  I asked Carlos, who was working at the front counter, for some help with something, and his response was fantastic and solved the problem immediately ... even better than I expected. Excellent customer service goes a long way to creating a very positive impression and will keep me coming back here every time I'm in town. Thank you, Carlos!
Manager Response: Roxy,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your comments on your recent stay at our property.  It's great to hear from a returning guest that we continue to meet your expectations and that you love the hotel.  Of course your right that customer service is the key to the success of any business, and it is those exceptional staff members like Carlos that we think makes our hotel special for many of our guests.  I am very happy that in your case Carlos was able to resolve your situation and provide you the help and assistance that enabled you to enjoy your visit.  Again thanks for letting us know about Carlos so we can recognize him for his efforts as well.  We look forward to your next visit when you return to the hotel in the near future. Best regards,

Summary Heading: Moala who worked at the counter was great made me feel really welcomed
Summary: Moala at the counter is total great made me feel welcome to the hotel. Very nice place to stay clean staff is friendly breakfast is good . When ever I head back to irvine the hilton irvine /orange will be my choice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice words about Moala at the Front Desk.  She is such a nice person and it's nice to see her recognized this way.  I am so happy to see that you enjoyed the hotel and had the opportunity to enjoy the breakfast as well, and found everything to be just what you were looking for.  We are very pleased that you are going to become a regular visitor whenever you find yourself staying in the Irvine area.  Best regards,

Summary Heading: My stay at Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport
Summary: The friendliness of the clerks made me feel right at home. It was a beautiful hotel in a perfect location right across the street from the airport and right on the main boulevard. Elegant environment with great prices.
Manager Response: Holly,  I just had a chance to read the comments you wrote regarding your stay at our property last month.  It was great to see how much you enjoyed your visit and how impressed you were with the hotel.  I was very pleased to see how much you liked the newer design and decor of the hotel's interiors, and that you found the location to fit your needs so perfectly.  Of course what is most important to me is the service we provide, and I was touched by your comment that "the friendliness of the clerks made me feel right at home".  That's always our goal and I appreciate you letting us know hoe we are doing in that respect.  I know you are probably glad to be back home in Indiana, but we look forward to seeing you back on the West Coast very soon. Best regards,

Summary Heading: I rate this hotel worst in the world and I will not use this hotel forever!!
Summary: You may lose your property in the room and you can not use WI-FI in the room because of the bad quality  I lost I-PAD2 in the drawer of the room and could not use Wi-Fi in the rrom.  I stayed at this hotel for 3 days in AUG. of 2013. I put my I-PAD2 in the drawer of the room with my clothes in the morning of the 2nd day. When I returned the room at the night, I found my I-PAD lost in the drawer. Next morning I notified this situation to one manager. And the processing was being proceeded during some weeks. Finally I received the answer that nobody of the hotel and the insurance company do not recover my lost IPAD2 because I did not put my I-PAD2 in the safe of the room. I wonder if it is possible to put I-PAD2 into the safe because of the size of I-PAD2.  Everybody to stay this
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your comments on your stay and letting us know about your visit at the hotel.  I am certainly sorry that your IPAD was lost during the period you stayed at the hotel.  When you advised us the following day that it was missing, we at that time followed all procedures and investigated as did our insurance company after they were notified.  I am certainly sorry that it was not recovered and know that you must have been very disappointed.  If you would like to contact me to obtain further information or discuss this, please do so at any time.  We know that travel can at times be very trying and do appreciate your business. Best regards,

Summary Heading: Great location! Great value! Wonderful service!
Summary: We stayed at the hotel just for one night.  The rooms were comfortable and clean.  The beds were great & we all slept really well!  The front desk was wonderful & very helpful.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thanks for providing your comments on your recent stay at the hotel.  Although it was only for the single evening, it does appear that you really enjoyed the facilities while you were with us.  Of course it's very nice to hear the compliments on the Housekeeping and the comfort of the beds, but is even nicer to hear how much you appreciated the service and warmth of the Front Desk staff.  They are a great group and it's always nice to hear that their efforts are appreciated by our guests.  I do hope that you will get the opportunity to come back and see us for a longer stay in the near future, and enjoy all that the area has to offer.  Again thank you for your business and your valuable input on the hotel. Best regards,

Summary: For an older airport hotel, this is a very good choice.  The hotel appears to be renovated recently and the lobby, rooms, etc. all are in great shape.  The standard king room is slightly larger than normal and well appointed.  Bathroom is a good size and lots of counter space.  I did not hear much plane noise from the airport.  Given the building is older, the soundproofing is only average and you could hear other doors shutting in the hall and bathrooms flushing.  I was slightly annoyed by the A/C kicking on and off frequently during the night.  The morning breakfast is a good buffet and the all the staff I encountered were very friendly and professional.  There are a number of decent eating establishments down the road, which is nice.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments regarding the appearance of the hotel and your overall impressions of the property.  This type of feedback is very important to us as it gives us a much better view of how our guests enjoy our amenities and the level of service provided by our staff.  I'm very happy that you were pleased with the overall design and condition of the hotel and the guest rooms.  I think we have done a nice job and everyone seems to enjoy the look and ambiance of the hotel.  It was very nice of you to let us know how you felt.  I do hope you will be joining us again in the near future when you find yourself back in the Orange County area. Best regards,

Summary Heading: A hotel with an outstandingly helpful staff.
Summary: As a participant in the Whitaker Wellness Program, i stayed again at this hotel, as i have done about a dozen times before for the same reason. The service was cheerful, attentive, and prompt.  I want to commend particularly MIGUEL SARCEDO at the front desk.  He went beyond the call of duty by helping me check in at the airline and printing out my ticket. He did this quickly, efficiently, and with a warm kindness.
Manager Response: Thank you for getting back to us with your comments about the hotel and the service you have received at the property.  So many of our guests that participate in the Whitaker Wellness programs have been coming to the hotel for some time that they now seem like family to our staff.  We are always pleased to have you return to the hotel and so enjoy you visits to us.  It's very nice to hear your comments about the service you receive from all of the staff, and especially nice to hear how Miguel was able to assist you.  We hear that often about Miguel and feel fortunate that he is here to provide such wonderful service to our patrons.  Again thank you for you kind words of support. Best regards,

Summary Heading: Good visit, excellent room, shame about the shuttle
Summary: The start of my short visit was disappointing, having called up the hotel for the shuttle, I waited over half an hour when they had said it would turn up in a few minutes.  Turned out the driver had gone elsewhere.  Now that I know where the hotel is, I'd walk anyway! The rest of the experience was perfectly acceptable.  The decoration and standard in the hotel was very high.  Wifi was very good,  breakfast was perfectly good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay and your experience with the hotel's shuttle service.  I am very sorry for the delay in picking you up at the airport as it should not have taken that long to respond to your call.  Our standard response time to the airport is "up to 20 minutes" from the time of your call to the hotel.  Again I apologize if it appears we took longer than that.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay once you arrived at the hotel, and hope that everything went well for you from that point forward.  We look forward to seeing you back at the property again when your travels return you to the Irvine area. Best regards,

Summary: This hotel for the price was very good.  The rooms were nice and clean, no noises from other rooms or in the halls, the food was good.  The bed was very comfortable. I especially like that the fitness center was open 24 hours and that there was not extra charge.  Also, the wireless internet service was included.  It's a great play to stay.
Manager Response: Priscilla,  It was nice of you to let us know how you felt about the hotel in response to your recent stay at the property.  We always love to hear from our guests and receive their input so that we can get a better idea of how we are performing as a staff.  It certainly appears that you had a nice stay with us and were very happy with the facilities and the amenities that we offer our guests.  I'm so happy to hear that you liked your guest room and enjoyed the food at the hotel.  Those are the important  things to most of our guests and our Housekeeping and Restaurant staffs work very hard to see that everything is perfect for our guests.  Not everyone has the chance to use the Fitness Center but I am glad you were able to take advantage of it.  Again thanks so much for the feedback, and taking the time to give us your thoughts on the hotel.  We look forward to seeing you again very soon. Best regards,

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and very accommodating staff
Summary: I checked into the hotel for a work event on Saturday October 5th and stayed until Wednesday October 9th.  I was very pleased to see that the front desk clerk Miguel was able to accommodate my extended stay for an additional day.  The room was very nice and the service was excellent.  I would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Megan,  I'm so pleased that you enjoyed your visit to the hotel and that Miguel was able to extend your stay to fit your needs.  I'm glad that you wre pleased with your room and the overall service that our staff provided.  Since you were here over the weekend, I hope you also had the opportunty to enjoy some of the amenities the hotel has to offer, as well as some of the wonderful dining and shopping available in the area.  It sounds as if you had a very nice stay with us and I do hope that you will be returning for another visit in the not too distant future. Best regards,

Summary: I stayed for 4 nights in this hotel and found it comfortable and the staff very pleasant and helpful.  The room was large and well appointed.  Despite being right in front of the airport it was very quiet.  It is more of a business hotel than a tourist location although it is close to both Disneyland and the Fashion Island area of Newport Beach.  I arrived at night from LAX and I found the hotel very easily since it is close to the San Diego Freeway.  The bar and the outside garden are modern and attractive.  Parking is easy and reasonably priced.
Manager Response: It was nice to hear that your visit to the hotel went well and you found our location to be very convenient for your needs.  You are correct in that we have a lot of loyal business travelers utilizing our property on a regular basis.  However we find an increasing number of leisure travelers staying at the hotel as well.  I'm sure that is because our location is so convenient for reaching key attractions, beaches, and shopping in the Southern California region.  I am glad that you had enough time at the hotel during your 4-day visit to enjoy some of the facilities and hopefully relax a little.  We certainly appreciate your business and are very pleased that you selected our hotel property for your travels to the Orange County area. Best regards,

Summary: Overall excellent hotel; food was delicious; rooms super clean and lovely; great view; friendly staff: attentive, polite, willing to help without reservation and accommodating to our needs. Location was perfect for our needs: parking instructions were clear and reasonable cost for parking as a guest. Only challenge was a little noisy with pluming in evening (on scale of 1 to 10) probably a 3 (10 being worst). Thank you
Manager Response: Carmela,  It was so nice of you to take the time to provide your comments regarding the hotel in response to your recent stay at our property.  It sounds as if our convenient location was perfect for you, and that you had a very pleasant stay with us.  Besides enjoying your guest room and the amenities we offer, I'm so glad you also had the opportunity to dine in the restaurant as well.  It was very nice to hear how pleased you were with our staff and how much you appreciated their efforts.  I know that they will be pleased to hear that as well.  We truly love to hear from our guests that they enjoyed their visit and all that the hotel has to offer.  You made our day. Best regards,

Summary: Quality of Hilton!  Great location across the street from John Wayne/Orange county airport.  There is probably some airport noise, but we didn't notice it at all and no other noise as location is in a more commercial business location.  Consequently the view from your room is commercial buildings with nice grounds.  Beautiful pool.  Terrific location 1 block off 405.  Lovely lobby, very friendly staff.  Best of all those incredibly comfortable Hilton beds.
Manager Response: David,  It was great to hear how much you enjoyed the hotel during your stay last month.  I'm glad you found the location so convenient  for you.  As well as being so near the airport, we are also amazingly within 10 minutes of great shopping, beuatiful beaches, and an abundance of great dining choices.  It's also good to see that you enjoyed the facilities and our newer contemporary look in the lobby and lounge. Most of all it is wonderful to hear you say how friendly you found our staff to be.  They work very hard and truly take pride in the service they offer, but it's really special to both them and myself when we hear that a guest like yourself appreciates their efforts.  Thanks so much for taking the time to provide us your thoughts.  We all look forward to your next visit when you are once again in the area.   Best regards,

Summary: Close to airport with shuttle service. Excellent service and room. Easy to get to/from airport, interstate , and Disney. Contemporary, modern bar, restaurant and lobby area. Convenient hotel to Orange County Airport. Will stay again
Manager Response: John,  It was nice to read your comments about the hotel in regard to your recent stay with us.  It appears that you were able to utilize our airport shuttle service and I hope it made your travelng easier after a long day.  We are lucky in that our location is truly convenient to so many surrounding destinations in Orange County, and it appears that worked well for you also.  I'm pleased that you enjoyed our restaurant and bar, and their new look which is reflective of the lobby ambiance as well.  It was also nice to hear that you enjoyed your guest room and the service provided by our staff.  In the end, that is what counts the most for all of us.  Thanks so much for sharing your thoughts with us.  I hope we will be seeing you again in the not too distant future. Best regards,

Summary: Everyone was very helpful and particularly Jorge Mateo who works in the restaurant. I had breakfast 3 consecutive days there and he always gave outstanding service and worked very hard to make sure all my needs were met.  Keep up the good work Jorge. Sean Degen
Manager Response: Sean,  Thanks for sharing your thoughts on your recent stay.  This type of feedback is always helpful to us, and provides us a much clearer picture of how we are performing at the property.  Thanks also for the very kind words about Jorge.  The restaurant wouldn't be the same without him in the morning and I am so glad that you appreciated his caring efforts.  I'll show your comments to him and know that he will be thrilled like myself that he has made such a positive impression on one of our guests.  Do come back and visit us soon.  We'll look forward to it. Best regards,

Summary: just spent five days at this hotel... had really positive experiences with every staff member, especially Reychel (sp?), and Jerry... Jerry really stands out... promote the guy! i will happily return to this location...
Manager Response: Lolaroja,  It was great to see that you were with us 5 days in September and had a great visit.  I'm certainly pleased that you enjoyed the staff and had such a positive experience with all of them.  Thanks so much for the kind words about Reychel.  She's a great help to all of us.  Jerry gets many compliments for the service he provides and I'm sure he never gets tired of hearing them.  They just confirm how much he enjoys his job and speaking with our guests.  He's great isn't he?  Again thanks for taking the time to give us your input on your stay.  We appreciate it and look forward to your next visit to the hotel when your travel plans bring you back to the area.  Best regards,

Summary: I have gone back to this hotel many times even when they were not the cheapest price because of the great customer service in all departments. In the Restaurant & Bar area Betty & Jerry both take care of me every time I go.  They treat me like family and so personable and kind.  The service they provide is excellent! I have not had one bad experience there and I have probably spent 75-100 nights there. Amazing Property and Staff. I feel like home when I arrive there.  Oh, and the food is also excellent!
Manager Response: Tammy,  I can't thank you enough for the kind words for our staff, and especially for Betty in the restaurant  and Jerry in the lounge.  It's truly wonderful to receive such feedback from a loyal and regular guest like yourself.  It validates all of the efforts our staff put in to their jobs on a daily basis, and to hear this will encourage them to work even harder at pleasing every guest.    It is our goal to make every guest feel like family and with employees like Betty and Jerry we feel that we are succeeding in that objective.  Again thanks for taking the time to let us know that we are doing well.  We all look forward to your next visit in the near future. Best regards,

Summary: Stayed here just 1 night and was a bit disappointed in the check in service.  Hilton is generally very friendly people & super attentive but not really at this hotel.  Maybe it is the OC attitude or that we were only there one night not sure but I would still expect the same level of friendlyness regardless.  Nothing swanky or special the rooms were just average.  They were clean and beds were comfy.  Carpet is outdated & looks old but otherwise a decent hotel stay.  It had all of the normal amenities and was very close to our event location.  Parking is $18.00 per day for self parking which I find silly when there is not a parking structure just the outer parking of the hotel.  Overall just an average hotel and good for business travelers.
Manager Response: Thanks for providing your thoughts on your stay at the hotel this month.  We appreciate hearing from all of our guests so we can see how they feel about our services and facilities.  I was certainly disappointed to read your remarks about the seemingly lack of friendliness when you checked into the hotel.  As you can see from reading the variety of comments received here, our staff geneerally receives high marks for their guest oriented attitude and the friendly manner in which they serve all of our guests.  So I am sorry to see you felt that way and would like to apologize if they seemed uncaring.  I will discuss this with the department management so they can work with their staff and see that they continue to strive for great service for every guest.  I also understand your frustration with the parking fees but can assure you that our charges are similar to or less than all surrounding full service hotel properties in the Irvine and Airport area.  We do appreciate your business and hope that we will see you here again when your travel plans bring you back to Orange County.

Summary: This Hilton hotel was chosen for convenient location for 2 night stay. The complimentary shuttle bus service from and to the John Wayne Airport was excellent, despite we had a hard time calling them from the airport upon arrival. The Executive Room with two double bed on 10th floor, top floor, was decent. The room needs a serious update though. It looked quite aged. The fitness room and business center as well as California Cuisine style restaurant were plus feature of the hotel. Overall, ewe enjoyed  staying there.
Manager Response: Thanks for letting us know your thoughts on the hotel after your recent stay with us.  I am so glad that you were pleased with your guest room on the Executive Floor, and that you had the opportunity to enjoy some of the services and amenities that we offer to our guests.  It also sounds as if you had a chance to enjoy our restaurant featuring a varied choice of healthy California cuisine.  I am not sure why you had a slight difficulty contacting the hotel from the airport but I apologize if we did not answer your call as quickly as we should have.  I hope because of our proximity that is so convenient to the airport that you still were able to get to the property quickly after you arrived.    We do appreciate you choosing our hotel for your travel plans and hope that we will have the opportunity to see you back at the property in the near future. Best regards,

Summary: This is an old tired 70's hotel that the Hilton has done their best to make look nice. The rooms are small but have a modern look and are clean. The bathrooms are too small for a couple trying to get ready. The pool area is tired and sad. The hot tube was on the dirty side. The staff is nice and helpful. The fitness room is a plus. It's an airport hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing your thoughts in regards to your stay at the hotel.  I hope you enjoyed your visit and the new look of the lobby and public spaces, and found the contemporary design of the rooms to your liking as well.  I aam sorry that the pool area and spa were not up to your expectations, but will work with my staff to see how we can perhaps make the area more appealing for our guests.  I am pleased that you utilized the fitness center and hope you had the opportunity to visit some of the other facilities we offer as well.  We have a great staff here and I am glad that you appreciated the service they provide.  Feedback such as you have provided is always a great help to us as it enables us to better understand where to focus our future efforts.   Best regards,

Summary: We booked this hotel using hotwire.com and it was a great value for our dollar. Our flight was scheduled to land in Santa Ana, California which is across the street from this hotel.  They offer a free shuttle service to/from the airport to the hotel.  The only thing I would have liked to see at this location is complimentary coffee in the lobby. There was a coffee maker in the room, but only with the powdered creamer packets, etc.  The room was large and spacious, and the bathroom was enormous.
Manager Response: Dear Minaco,  Thanks for commenting on your stay and giving us your impressions of the hotel from your recent visit.  We have a wonderful location just across from John Wayne Airport and I hope you had an opportunity to use our shuttle pickup and drop-off for the airport.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the hotel and found the guest rooms to your liking.  I'm sorry we don't have complimentary coffee in the lobby but we do provide complimentary Coffee Bean coffee in all guest rooms for your convenience.  Again thanks for taking the time to give us your feedback.  We truly appreciate it for the insight it provides us.  I hope you will be staying with us again in the near future when your travels bring you back to Orange County.   Best regards,

Summary: My over all experience was very good. However, I have stayed in other Hiltons that have been remodel. This location has not been updated. In addition my breakfast was delivered cold. Nevertheless I will stay at another Hilton. I'm currently in the Burbank airport now and will be booking a Hilton in San Francisco.
Manager Response: Dear Byron,  Thanks for giving us the oppoprtunity to host you when your travel plans brought you to the Orange County Airport area.  We appreciate your patronage and loyalty to the Hilton family of hotels, and your feedback pertaining to your stay at the property.  All Hilton hotels are renovated on a continual basis and I am pleased that you notice this in your travels.  Our lobby and public areas were upgraded not long ago and our guest rooms just previous to that.  It is the input we receive from guests like yourself that will influence both the timing and the look of our next scheduled upgrade, so thanks so much for your interest in the property.  I am pleased that your experience was a very positive one, and look forward to your next visit with us when your travels bring you back into our area.  Best regards,

Summary: This hotel was selected by my High School Reunion committee. This event was our 30 year reunion. There were defined over charging of drinks, they charged us more per drink at our event bar than at the lobby bar for the same brand of wine. They charged $13.00 for breakfast downstairs buffet style that was typical of the free breakfasts that one would get in other hotels that I will not name.... (coffee should be complimentary in the lobby....!!). Bad check out service, staff was rude and unprofessional.  We will not return to this location.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to provide your comments on your stay at the hotel last month.  I am certainly sorry that your experience was not up to your expectations.   Most of our guests enjoy the breakfast that we offer in our restaurant and it is priced to be a very fair value.  Like other full service hotels, Hilton does not offer a complimentary breakfast.  However our limited service properties such as Hampton Inns and Hilton Garden Inns do offer that added convenience.  We do offer complimentary Coffee Bean coffee in all guest rooms so I do hope you were able to take advantage of that amenity during your stay.  Again thanks for the candid feedback you have given us as it does enable us to see how our services and facilities are viewed by our guests.    Best regards,

Summary: I don't stay in Hilton hotels often, but I would absolutely stay in the Hilton Irvine hotel again.  Not only was the staff amazing and courteous, the rooms were clean and comfortable, and the restaurant was better than most.  The location is close to the airport, with on-time shuttle service; it's also easy to walk or catch a cab to local restaurants and entertainment.
Manager Response: Dear Margette G.,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our hotel. We are pleased that you enjoyed the many features including our courteous and professional staff, the cleanliness of our well appointed rooms and the convenience to the airport with complimentary shuttle. We are continuously striving enhance the overall guest experience and your feedback plays a big role in our efforts.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, that you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  We look forward to your return visit.   Warmest Regards

Summary: The staff was very helpful and accommodating.  Breakfast was wonderful, rooms were clean and quiet.  Parking was plentiful and easy to access.  Wonderful location.  The cost was well worth the experience we had.
Manager Response: Dear 668J_C2013,  Thank you for the kind feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am happy to hear you found our staff courteous and accommodating, the rooms well appointed and that you enjoyed the talents of our culinary team during breakfast.  We strive to provide a warm and comfortable experience for all our guests and I am pleased with hit the mark with you.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest Regards

Summary: Great hotel, convenient to the airport with a free shuttle. Hotel lobby and restaurant are all updated with good size hotel fitness centre. Hotels were a little dated but the room was clean and the bed comfy
Manager Response: Dear Danile S.,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our hotel.  We are pleased that you enjoyed the many features including the convenience to the airport and the complimentary shuttle.  We are continuously striving enhance the overall guest experience and your feedback plays a big role in our efforts.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.    Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: A Whole Lot Better Than 10 Years Ago
Summary: I had stayed at this property about ten years ago while working in Orange County.  The place was not that great.  I was in town again and decided to give it another try.  I arrived late, around 10:00 on a Saturday but had no real trouble parking although they could improve that whole experience.  The place has been totally remodeled and updated very nicely.  My room was large and very nice, the bed was outstanding and the price was pretty good.  Overall, I thought it was a great experience.  If all Hiltons were like this one I might go back to staying at Hiltons over Marriott.
Manager Response: Dear Larry W.,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our hotel.  I am very pleased that after 10 years you found many improvements to our hotel.  We also are very pleased with the direction of our efforts having just recently upgraded our in room coffee to "The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf" brand.    Your feedback is very important to us and all reviews are shared with the management team so we may find ways to enhance the overall guest experience.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose our hotel.  Warmest Regards

Summary: I have to go to Orange County for business a lot and I have stayed in this hotel probably 10 times. It is a little older hotel and cleanliness is not top notch but it is right across from the airport and you can literally walk over.
Manager Response: Dear SFSShawn,  Thank you for the short but great feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  And thank you for your continued patronage.  We sincerely appreciate it.  In efforts to enhance our overall guest experience, we count on feedback from valued guests like yourself.  Your comments will be reviewed with our management team so we may find ways to make improvements.    We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: For Hilton- sub par. Internet did not work for my ipad or iphone. Staff forward me to ATT, they could not discover the problem. Internet was essential for work.  The hotel itself was fine, staff were very friendly and helpful. It was very loud, walls were very thin. I could hear the people next door flush their toilet... I am usually a big fan of Hilton.  If you do need to send a fax, make sure you READ the confirmation report that it sent. I was advised it was sent and confirmed, it ended up not being so.....   It's just a standard airport hotel, that is safe and clean. I'd stay again if I got a good price, it was very close to the court house and airport.
Manager Response: Dear Danielle H.,  We regret to read about your recent experience at our hotel.  We are continuously striving to enhance the overall guest experience and the feedback we receive from valued guests such as yourself assist us in indentifying  areas of opportunity.  There is never an excuse for our failure meet your needs while here in our hotel. Please accept our apologies that what you experienced did not meet your standards or our own.   Your comments will be reviewed with our management team so we may find ways to make improvements. We truly hope you will consider a future stay so that we may provide you with a stay that you deserve.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport sits directly across the street from the John Wayne Airport.  Although being an airport hotel, it is kept up rather well.  The lobby, although somewhat small is well maintained and has a “fresh” look unlike many airport hotels with drab furnishings and old fading carpeting.  As you enter the hotel, the front desk is located to the left hidden behind several pillars.  The front desk agent was friendly and quickly recognized my Hilton HHonors Gold Status, and noted that my membership number was on file.  He stated that I had been “upgraded to a high floor”, however being on the 5th floor of a 10 floor hotel is hardly a high floor.  He was presumptuous that I would take breakfast over the point amenity, which I would normally do if I hadn’t
Manager Response: Dear TheMysteryTraveler,  Thank you for the positive feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  In particular the way you described your check in experience, your Gold status recognition and the subsequent experience of your room and services.  I'm very pleased you found us to your satisfaction.  We are continuously striving to enhance our overall guest experience and your feedback is very important to us.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope that you will once again choose our hotel.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The location is convenient but there must be some place better to stay near the airport. This place is a total dog. Very disappointing. The decor is very dated, the ceilings are low, the amenities are lack-luster and the air conditioning will keep you up all night. It's very old and noisy. I was hoping to have a fun luxury experience with my daughter and we couldn't wait to leave. I would definitely not stay her again and wonder what the Hilton brand is up to if they can tolerate this low of a standard and still charge $200+ per night. Maybe Paris is running it now. It definitely feels like someone's out to lunch.
Manager Response: Dear Jean Z,  I'm very sorry to hear you did not have a very pleasant experience at our hotel.  Guest satisfaction is extremely important to us and we apologize that we did not meet with your satisfaction.   I will be sure to keep your feedback in mind as we are always working to improve our overall guest experience.  I thank you for your review and I really hope you'll give us a second chance if your travels bring you back to the area.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I booked the room directly with the hotel on it's website to avoid any problems using a third party website like Hotwire and Priceline.  However, there were 2 major events that turned my stay into a disaster.  First, I had mistakenly thought the bottom right handle of the media chest was a drawer.  Turned out to be an entire door which smacked me in the face and bruised and cut open the skin next to my nose.  When I complained to the manager, he told me they would do something about it.  No follow up happened and I just chalked it up to a failure in management and did not want pursue the issue further.  Next we requested housekeeping to clean our room at 7PM Sunday July 28, 2013.  When we returned the room at 10PM it was clean but didn't realize several items were missing.
Manager Response: Dear Keri L,  Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel.  We regret to hear about your disappointment during your stay with us.  I sincerely apologize for the challenges you encountered and I urge you to please contact me if you would like to discuss further. Our goal is to have each guest have an enjoyable stay and I am sorry we let you down.  We are continuously striving to provide the best service to our guests and to enhance the overall experience.  I hope that if travels bring you to our area in the near future, you will give us another opportunity to demonstrate the service you have come to expect from a member of the Hilton family.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Should have LISTENED to the reviews
Summary: Ill keep it short but sweet and to the point. My best friends wedding was in Newport Beach so I wanted something convenient and affordable since I would only be using the room to sleep a couple hours and leave.  When I booked it I read lots of reviews on tripadvisor about the expensive parking, certain fees etc. but I figured a cab would have cost me as much as the parking anyways. So after driving for 10 min at midnight i came to relize there was no parking!!!! so i had to park jn the valet myself. i mentioned this to the front desk receptionist and she had the nerve to tell me i would have to pay for "valet" which is $23! How is it my fault theres no where to park!  The next problem: when I booked the room I specifically asked for a non smoking room. When I arrived to check in
Manager Response: Dear LACountyGirl,  Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel.  And thank you for taking the time to write a review.  Your feedback is very important to us as we are continuously striving to provide the best service to our guests and to enhance the overall experience.  I sincerely apologize for the challenges you encountered with the parking and fees.  I realize that parking fees are inconvenient but we do maintain competitive in the market.  I have since shared your experience with checkin with the appropriate manager and will address accordingly.  Our goal is to have each guest have an enjoyable stay and I am sorry we failed you this time. We hope that if travels bring you to our area in the near future, you will give us another opportunity to better serve you.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Right on the airport - you can walk from the terminal (although very unusual in America!). Nice hotel, good gym, excellent staff. Breakfast a bit bland and average. Lunch was good if a littel expensive. Coffee was poor
Manager Response: Dear Ian H.,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our hotel.  I'm pleased that you enjoyed our location as well as our services and the friendly faces you encountered.  We recently upgraded our coffee to the "The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf" brand, a quality coffee born and brewed in SoCal since 1963.  I am sorry to hear you found it of poor quality.  We hope to gain your approval the next time.   If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.   Kindest Regards,

Summary: Hotel is very nice, good restaurant/bar area, rooms and meeting facilities.  And just across the street from John Wayne airport so it is very convenient.  Staff is very friendly and helpful.  I didn't visit the pool area personally but it looked nice and clean from my room window.
Manager Response: Dear Rhonda S.,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I'm very happy to hear you enjoyed so many wonderful things about our hotel from our friendly staff to our restaurant and meeting facilities.  While you did not get to experience our pool, I can assure you would have enjoyed it equally as much.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest regards,

Summary: Weekend getaway found us staying at Hilton Irvine & this facility is ginormous - luscious pool, tennis courts, nice patio dining as well as a bar / restaurant that looked pretty nice (we didn't indulge)  Room was large & nicely setup - bathroom was also large & the water pressure was just fine.  Could hear bathroom flushes at random times but never heard voices of our neighbors  Bed was really, really comfy & once the pillows were smooshed all up in a ball, they were comfy too.  Otherwise, they were too flat for our taste.  Our room also happened to directly overlook the Orange County Airport runway......I mean, we could literally see crew & staff prepping the planes for takeoff & when staying so close to the airport, you're going to hear planes taking off & landing so this was
Manager Response: Dear Wanderlust S.,  Thank you for the great feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.   I'm glad to hear you enjoyed the convenience to the airport and the experience of the runway.  It is a rather neat sight.  I'm also very glad you enjoyed  the many wonderful features of our hotel. Our goal is very simple, to ensure your comfort and satisfaction.  I do realize that parking fees can be an inconvenience but we are in line with competing hotels in the area. I sincerely hope this does not deter you from visiting us in the future.  Many thanks again for your comments. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Warmest regards,

Summary: I was given an ADA room - wheel chair shower. The room was hot when I walked in and it took a half hour. To cool down. There is no closest,  the armoire is tiny and it's door won't stay closed. The bathroom sink is tiny, barely room for a toothbrush. This is one of the rooms they give to the one-night guests which I'd guess a lot of business travelers are. Certainly not a room they give to someone they want to come back, which I won't.
Manager Response: Dear N3inCA,  Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel.  And thank you for taking the time give us your feedback.  It is very important to us because we are continuously striving to provide the best service to our guests and to enhance the overall experience.  I sincerely apologize for the challenge you encountered with your room.  Our goal is to have each guest have an enjoyable stay and I am sorry we failed you this time. We hope that if travels bring you to our area in the near future, you will give us another opportunity to better serve you.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Do NOT leave your room key when you check out or you won't be able to leave the parking lot you just paid $18 a night to park in.  This site is stupid and is making me type again "Do NOT leave your room key when you check out or you won't be able to leave the parking lot you just paid $18 a night to park in."
Manager Response: Dear Michael B.,  Please accept my most sincere apologies for the inconvenience of what I assume was not being able to exit our parking structure because you did not have your room key. It is a standard policy for our Service Agents to inform our guests arriving by car that a key is necessary to exit our facility.  I am truly sorry this was not conveyed to you and I can certainly appreciate your frustration.  I have since shared your comments with our Front Office team and we will work diligently to ensure this does not happen again.  We do appreciate your feedback.  I truly hope this incident does not deter you from visiting us in the near future.  If you feel inclined to give us another opportunity, please do not hesitate to contact me direct.  I will give your reservation my personal attention.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: As a diamond member, I have written some good reviews of this hotel in the past. But over the last 6 months, under its new management, the hotel just isn't the same. Prices are up, diamond member perks are down, including no paper delivery to room.  Mistakes in billing and overall condition of the hotel is not the quality expected of a hotel adjacent to a major airport. And not  having an executive lounge is questionable as the hotel is located in a major business district. While hotel management has taken away drink tickets for diamond members who stay many nights at the hotel, she offers free food/drink receptions to infrequent travelers. New breakfast set up is not convenient, with visitors backed up waiting to access the underwhelming buffet of watery scrambled eggs and
Manager Response: Dear Great2TravelCA,  Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel and your loyalty to the Hilton brand.  We regret to hear about your disappointment during your stay with us and we do extend our sincere apologies for the various challenges that you experienced.  Our goal is to have each guest have an enjoyable stay, and we appreciate you taking your time to write a review, as well as sharing with us areas that may need improvements.  We are continuously striving to provide the best service to our guests as well as making adjustments to enhance our overall guest experience.  We hope you return and provide us with another opportunity to serve you in the future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed one nite to attend a local jazz concert.  Both check-in/check-out process was easy with no issues.  Room was extremely clean.  However, we had to ask for an additional bath towel since not enough was provided in room.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am happy to hear your experience of check in and checkout was seamless and that you were pleased with your room.   I do sincerely apologize for the lack of towels and hope it was not a huge inconvenience.  Most important I hope you enjoyed a terrific time at the jazz concert.  I hope it was under the stars.  Should you find yourself in Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My reservation was supposed to be paid for with a card on file. I had to wait for 1 hr for the transaction to be processed, the staff made me feel right at home and the manager with the Concierge named Eldred, made the best effort in helping me square everything away...   Thank you,  Gabe Navarro
Manager Response: Dear Gabe,  Thank you for the great feedback regarding your recent stay our hotel.  I am delighted to hear you were met with our terrific staff at check in and that Edlred was of great assistance to you during check in.  Eldred is a wonderful member of our Team who goes to great lengths to ensure our guest satisfaction.  I will be sure to give him kudos and your note is greatly appreciated.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine in the near future, you will once again choose our hotel.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I hosted an event at this hotel in June and was very happy with the property and location. Although from the outside it looks old, the inside has been renovated and looks great.  In addition to hosting our Gala here, we also had several guest rooms. The rooms were well appointed and comfortable. Surprisingly, the nose from the airport was very minimal, which was great.  Unfortunately, since the event, the service has not been as good. In 5 weeks, not a single point has appeared on my Hilton Honors account. Even after numerous  requests to the event/catering manager, nothing has appeared and no indication has been given to tell me what happened.  Given the amount of money we spent, I would have expected much better service in regards to this matter. It seems that once payment was
Manager Response: Dear Moq44,  Thank you for the kind feedback regarding the experience of your event at our hotel.  I do sincerely apologize for the delay in getting the points added to your account and am aware of a system wide failure that has just recently been corrected.  I am truly sorry if this was not communicated to you.   If you would please contact our office and provide us your information, we will be sure to expedite this request if it has not been deposited as of this date or if you would like to share additional comments, please feel free to call me direct.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed our services and our accommodations and hope that you will consider us for future events.  We would be delighted to welcome you back and ensure that we earn your 5 stars.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Had several interactions with the front desk staff, most recent was Moala.  She assisted us in an extension of our stay at the property and was very courteous and professional in her addressing our needs.  This has been a consistent experience and certainly above what I expected. Will certainly consider this place first when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Kirk W.,  I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed such a wonderful time at our hotel and that Moala was a part of that experience.  It is very important for us to receive feedback such as yours and we strive to ensure each and every one of our guests enjoys a similar experience.  Thank you for the positive feedback and we certainly look forward to having you as a guest in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This was a very nice hotel - room was everything you would expect from a Hilton hotel (good size, comfortable, clean).  The rooms were very quiet even though the hotel is just across the street from the airport.  Check-in and check-out was very quick and efficient.  The only drawback was the $18/day parking.  Unfortunately this is becoming pretty standard for hotels in this area.
Manager Response: Dear DGK1234,  Thank you for the wonderful comments regarding your recent visit to our hotel.  I realize that parking fees can be inconvenient but are part of the business model in most hotels today and we are competitive.  I'm pleased that all other aspects of our hotel were met with your satisfaction and we definitely hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: self parking not so great, pets allowed!
Summary: At $18/day to self park I expect more parking spaces.  We came back to our rooms around 10pm a couple nights and had to park very far away because they often have events going on.  Check-in was fast.   I was told there was a fridge in my room, there was not.  The in room phone wasn't working and I had to use my personal phone to call.  Someone finally brought in a fridge several hours later.  It's a little noisy during the day but what do you expect from a hotel that's right across from the airport?  Found out they allow pets at this hotel.  We had the unpleasant experience of having a very loud dog (left unattended) in the room next to us.  It barked excessively at the slightest sound (even when we flushed our toilet!).  We called to complain and were told that the owner was
Manager Response: Dear Pearl N.,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent visit to our hotel.  I do apologize for the inconveniences you encountered during your stay.  Please note that I have shared these comments with the appropriate Department Managers for follow up.   Your comments are invaluable to us as it assists us in improving in the areas that are important to you, our valued guest.  I appreciate that you would consider our hotel once again and we certainly look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Overall, this hotel was wonderful.  Very clean and comfortable, the lobby was beautifully decorated and was very welcoming.  Our room was great, the bed was very comfortable...  Our only problem was that we could hear people being loud in the hall late at night, and in the adjoining room next door.  The sound carried so badly thru the door that it kept us awake until midnight.  I'm 5 months pregnant & definitely need my sleep!  So that was really annoying for us.  But other than that, everything else about the hotel was great.  Even tho it was right by the airport, that noise didn't bother us at all.
Manager Response: Dear Trip Advisor Member,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I sincerely apologize for the noise concerns and I have since shared these comments with our maintenance department for follow up.  I am pleased however, that you enjoyed the other wonderful features of our hotel.   Many congratulations on the newest addition to your family.  We hope that  if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose our hotel.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The check-in process was very quick, I think like 30 seconds... very impressive.  The rooms are nice as all Hilton's I've stayed at are.  The front desk staff was great, very friendly and professional.  The walls are a little thin, but what do you expect from a hotel?
Manager Response: Dear Sergio W.,  Thank you for the positive feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am pleased to hear you were met with a quick check in, smiling and warm faces and comfortable accommodations.    If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: Parking Fee ads to cost (25% more). Very clean and well maintained older Hilton. Front desk very helpful as well as the Valet service. The pool needs more shade in summer months. There were no real problems with this property. Will stay again. Surpassed the aging Fairmont down the street.
Manager Response: Dear Ed P.,  We sincerely appreciate the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  Our Team strives to provide a warm and professional experience to all our valued guests.  And of course we greatly appreciate the feedback.  We are very happy to hear you found our hotel suitable in many regards and that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA once again, you will choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmly,

Summary Heading: Lots of options in Irvine for Hotels
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights while attending an event at UC Irvine (less than 10 minutes away).  I booked this hotel through Priceline's "name your price" at a significant discount off their advertised rate.  Check-in was quick and I received 2 bottles of water from the friendly front desk representative.  My room was a king room with a view out over Irvine and I also had a bit of a view of planes landing on the runway at John Wayne Airport (which is right across the street).  Nice King Bed, flat screen TV.  I prefer liquid soap for the bathroom and shower instead of the bar soap, but it was restocked each day.  The room was very clean and the air conditioning worked well.  My room was connected to another room which made it very easy to hear every conversation, sneeze and fart that
Manager Response: Dear ushela03,  Thank you for the kind and candid comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I sincerely apologize for the noise and the knock on the door at the wee hours of the morning.  I have since shared your comments with the appropriate department personnel and will address accordingly.  I'm pleased to hear that your arrival was met with friendly faces and that your overall stay was pleasant. Our Team prides itself in ensuring our guests have a memorable experience and then to hear about it, is a terrific bonus.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA you will once again choose our hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warm Regards,

Summary: The staff at the OC Airport Hilton are exceptional in making business travelers feel wecome and taking care of the special needs of road warriors. The location is perfect, directly across the street from the airport, and close to numerous dining opportunities, and the 405 Freeway. Both rooms and public areas are extremely clean.
Manager Response: Dear Robert M,   Thank you kindly for the very positive comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  It's always such a great feeling to know we made a difference and this was clearly evident in your case.  I must agree with all of your observations from convenience of hotel to dining venues but most important our amazing staff.  We really do enjoy serving our guests warmly and professionally.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.   Kindest Regards,

Summary Heading: Not the best, not the worst
Summary: Hotel is a little dated in the rooms and corridors smelled like smoke.   Workout facility and lobby were fine but we had a problem with the key lock.  Staff were helpful in adressing this issue.  I probably would stay elsewhere next time.
Manager Response: Dear Karen B.,  Thank you for the honest feedback regarding your recent stay at your hotel.  I apologize that you did not find our hotel suitable and regret that you may not come back. I am otherwise pleased to hear our staff was accommodating to your needs.  If at any time you wish to reconsider and give us another opportunity, please do not hesitate to contact me direct and I will give your reservation my personal attention.     Warm Regards

Summary: We recently stayed at this property for one night.  The room was very nice with free wifi. Check in was a breeze and everyone was extremely friendly.  The only negative was the 18.00 per day parking charge.  I would stay again without a car.
Manager Response: Dear btworld,  We greatly appreciate the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel. I hope that parking fees do not deter you from visiting us in the future.  We realize it may be an inconvenience, but very completive in the market.  I'm pleased to hear otherwise you greatly enjoyed our staff, services and accommodations.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA once again, you will choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Many thanks again.  Warm Regards,

Summary: I was very impressed with this Hilton. It was so convenient to the airport, literally across the street. This is a relatively older hotel, but, very well maintained. It appears as if it was recently renovated. The staff was excellent. The room was very nice and comfortable. The bed was very comfortable. I look forward to another visit to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Dan S.,  Thank you kindly for the great feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  Our Team goes to great lengths to ensure our valued guest enjoy a pleasant and comfortable stay.   Additionally, we truly enjoy hearing about the different experiences, but especially when it's a terrific one such as yours.   We sincerely hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Many thanks again!  Warmest Regards.

Summary: Very nice hotel, staff is always friendly, they understand business travelers are busy so the service is very quick.  The hotel remodeled a couple of years ago and it looks great!  The beds and bedding are very comfortable.  I would definitely recommend this hotel for business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear Amy M.,  We sincerely appreciate the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am pleased to hear our warm and professional associates were met with your complete satisfaction.  Our Team prides itself on delivering top notch service so your note means a great deal to us.  We hope that if travels continue to bring you to Irvine, CA, you will choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Many thanks again!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great Hilton Near John Wayne airport with easy access to highways. The hotel looks and feels clean and modern. Parking is easy as well and across the street from John Wayne airport. Food is also pretty good and nice bar.
Manager Response: Dear Eli D.,   Thank you for the positive comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed our ample accommodations, our delicious food as well as our convenient location to John Wayne Airport.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Happy 4th of July!  Best Regards,

Summary Heading: Excessive Parking - Old Bed - Front desk needs lessons
Summary: I have stayed at this property more than many times before.   I was surprised to see their parking prices had increased to an even more ridiculous rate than previous.    I was even more surprised to hear the front desk staff tell me that I was imaging this increase.  Some things that always continue.  You can hear through the walls.   The maids are noisy and yell down the hallway.   The beds are warped from aging.    The front desk always has at least one bad apple.  The management does not answer phone calls.   The bar crowd forces you to the back of the parking lot  and even fall over in the hallway near the lifts.  The valet grunts at you when you self-park.   If you do not valet, then how dare you stop for 5 minutes to pull your bags out of the car.  If you do not let us
Manager Response: Dear BP,  I sincerely appreciate your candid feedback regarding your stay with us in February.  I'm very sorry that your stay was a myriad of challenges stemming from our parking, FD personnel and dining facilities.  I have since shared your concerns with the appropriate department heads and will move to address the concerns you shared.  It is always our hope that feedback such as yours will assist us in improving the areas that matter most to you, our valued guest.  I am confident that if you allowed us another opportunity to serve you, your experience would be one that you would come to expect from a member of the Hilton family.  Many thanks once again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We are moving to California. I wanted to have a great weekend with my wife. From the moment we arrived the staff was Awesome! We enjoyed sitting outside late talking by the flame heaters, and the breakfast was great for the price. Fresh fruit and all. The staff was just the BEST I've ever had. Thank you all for making this a great time for us!
Manager Response: Dear Milton H.,  Thank you for the wonderful comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am pleased to hear that our team members, our facilities and overall accommodations were met with your highest praise.  It certainly makes for a nice transition into our beautiful State.  I am not sure what city you will be relocating to, but you will find all of Southern California a treat to live in.  Welcome to our Golden State.   If you find that you many need our services in the near future, or before you make the final move, please do not hesitate to contact us.  We will be pleased to serve you once again.  All the best,

Summary: There was a power cut in the Hotel for more than an hour. None knew about this. Hotel staff not helpful much. Lobby was noisy due to wedding reception. AC makes hefty noise.  motel staff not much helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Anil A,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience of the power outage.  Please know that the entire block was down due to unknown causes and our Team tried very hard to ensure your safety and comfort and those who had the misfortune being at the hotel for that hour until power was restored.   I realize that despite uncontrollable forces these mishaps are highly inconvenient and for that I am truly sorry.  I hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, An in the near future, you will once again choose our hotel.  I am confident your experience will be a pleasant one.  Many thanks again.  Warmly,

Summary Heading: Nice-ish airport hotel but they tested alarms twice in one morning!
Summary: Hotel, lobby and restaurant are nice but they scheduled fire alarm testing at 9:30am!  I was jetlagged so got up very early and then was trying to nap.  At 9:30 this incessant blaring over the loudspeaker started and went on for 10 minutes!  Then at 10:30, it happened again!  Why couldn't they schedule this for the afternoon?  Seriously, it ruined my stay.
Manager Response: Dear anarcho,  Thank you for the comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I sincerely apologize for the noise associated with the testing of our fire alarms.  We realize there is never a good time to conduct such a test, however the testing is of paramount importance for several reasons - one being the equipment is tested to ensure its functionality and two so that our team members know how to respond in actual emergency.  Safety is very important to us and these tests ensure our awareness and compliance.  I hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA once again, you will choose our hotel so that you may experience our hotel and all it has to offer.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I was here for just one night - late check in and all that was left was a wheelchair accessible room which made for an awkward shower experience.   Other than that it was a standard airport hotel.  Lobby bar was nice and modern.
Manager Response: Dear erin77nyc,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay at  our hotel.  I hope that next time you will have a bit more time to fully explore and enoy the many features our hotel offers such as our Restaurant/ Bar Aura which features a terrifc and tenured team along with a pretty dynamic menu.    If travels bring you to Irvine again, we hope you will once again choose our hotel.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: If you need to stay near John Wayne airport for one night, you could do worse.
Summary: If you're staying at this hotel and want to see the sights of SoCal, you'd better have a car.  Apart from the proximity (walking distance) to the airport, the location of this hotel is suboptimal.  I found the room to be adequate.  It was clean, the beds were comfortable, and TE room service menu was adequate.  Service in general was fine.  Nothing about the hotel knocked me socks off, but I didn't have a bad experience.  A good hotel for a business trip if nothing else.
Manager Response: Dear SonofAtlanta,  Thank you kindly for the candid feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am sorry to hear we didn't knock your socks off so we will work a bit harder to enhance your experience and hopefully give them a big shake next time.   I'm glad to hear that overall your stay was pleasant and we greatly appreciate your comments.  It allows us the opportunity to improve upon areas that will make a difference to you, our valued guest. I hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will allow us another opportunity to really WOW you.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel with really good food and service
Summary: We recently attended a trade show at the Hilton Irvine/Orange Co.  Very full of people putting the staff to the test.  They performed and exceeded in all catagories of customer service.  The food in the restaurant was very good, try the burger, a must. The bar was fun and look for Sergio and Luis to serve up a great drink.  They have been with the Hilton a long time. The staff is like family.  Just the kind of place you would want to be.  The rooms are nicely appointed an they have WiFi available. Its pretty quiet for being right next to the airport.  Looking forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Ric M.  Wow!  You enjoyed a terrific time at our hotel and I would like to extend my sincere thanks for the wonderful comments. Not sure if you were here for THE Show but an event of that magnitude definitely puts us on high alert.  Long term associates like Sergio and Luis do not forget the value of impeccable service and I am happy to hear they made your stay that much more enjoyable.  Thank you once again and I hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: The Irvine Hilton really knows how to host a great event. We attended T.H.E. show last year and had such a great time that we booked a room at the last minute without so much as a toothbrush with us. This year we booked ahead -- thank goodness, since there wasn't a room available for friends that waited to the last minute. Even with extremely high expectations, the total weekend experience was awesome, truly awesome.
Manager Response: Dear Ron S.,  We sincerely appreciate the wonderful feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  THE Show was a huge success and we hope to be able to welcome all of you again next year.  In the meantime if travels bring you to Irvine on business or leisure, we hope that you will choose our hotel once again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed for one night - it was a very good choice! Good Rate, friendly Ceck-In, nice quiet room and an excellent breakfast-buffet in the morning!  (There is no lounge and so we got vouchers for the buffet) A very good staff and service everywhere!  But: Parking 18 Dollars on the other side of the street ist too expensive ! Think about, dear Hilton!
Manager Response: Dear Assan87,  Thank you kindly for the terrific feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am pleased to hear you were met with friendly, professional faces, great accommodations AND that you enjoyed your time with us.  Our Team goes to great lengths to ensure our valued guests have a warm and memorable experience.  Thank you for making our day brighter with your comments.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Trapped in the overpriced parking lot.
Summary: It isn't that they charge for parking.  Lots of hotel's do.  I find it a pain, but if it is just added to the room charge, fine.  But not here @ the Hilton in Irvine.  They give you check out instructions that guarantee that you will find yourself stuck at the payment gate.  If you are fortunate you only hold yourself up; if not the line of cars behind you share your fortune.   I only stayed here one night, and normally I just leave they key in the room and head on out.  But following the directions on my bill, I phoned the quick check out number and and then checked out, and as usual left the key in the room (just like they indicated in writing and told me on the phone).  Ok.  But when it came time to drive off I had no way to get the gate open.  And there was no part of the
Manager Response: Dear Mr. OriginalMurph,  Please accept my sincere apologies for the troubles you endured trying to exit our property.  Seemingly you did all the right things and we should have caught that upon your departure.  I have since shared your comments with the Team and will certainly work toward mitigating these incidents moving forward.  I am happy to hear that otherwise you enjoyed a pleasant stay despite the presence of the T.H.E. Show.  They do a tremendous job with set up, and as guest themselves cognizant of the atmosphere.  I hope you had an opportunity to view some of the equipment.  It is truly amazing.  Once again, thank you for your valuable feedback.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest Regards

Summary: Our company has a negotiated rate with the Hilton Irvine for our employees & customers traveling to our corporate headquarters.  The staff here is wonderful--always very friendly & welcoming, remembering our names & whether or not we like coffee or diet coke with our breakfast!  Because of the service we receive from Jorge, Ruben & Betty, we wouldn't consider choosing another hotel.  Their customer service goes above & beyond!
Manager Response: Dear Wendy C.,  Thank you very much for the wonderful comments regarding the positive experience you and your colleagues have shared at our hotel.  It means a great deal to us when our commitment to outstanding service is recognized and I can say with absolute confidence, Betty, Jorge and Ruben are role models in this value (among others).  Thank you for your continued patronage and we definitely look forward to a long and lasting partnership.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: 2nd time here, I'd go back again
Summary: I've been here twice now and was pleased again with this stay.  The staff is so nice and accommodating.  The rooms are very clean and well kept.  The only issue I had was my air conditioner in room 609.  It was VERY loud and made some rattling noises.  I ended up turning it off and had a rather hot night's sleep but the noise would have kept me up all night if I didn't turn it off. The lounge/restaurant area is so nice any time of the day.  We had lunch there and the food and service was great.  This is a nicely priced hotel right next to the airport - great convenient hotel for business travelers.
Manager Response: Dear Meghan P,  Thank you for the nice comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I know how hard our staff work to ensure you genuinely have a comfortable and memorable stay and I am delighted when we received feedback such as yours.  It brings a great big smile to all our faces.    Thanks again and if travels bring you once again to Irvine, CA we sincerely hope you will once again choose our hotel.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: The best hotel, if you ignore parking, which I could not.
Summary: The worst thing about Orange  county hotels is parking. It is an addiction almost.  My car rental was $15 a day, (exclude usual city fleecing taxes). Hotel wanted $18 for parking!
