But there are ways around that. If you stay at this Hilton, you can walk to car rental places in airport terminal in five minutes, so rent car on days that you need it.   There is an enterprise in Atrium  hotel next to Hilton, 2 minutes away. Remember they can pick you up, so seriously, consider them and save $18 a night. That atrium hotel  looked very nice too and it's parking is $12 overnight. If you have to have a car, park in lot between Atrium Hotel and Chevron, it is $12 overnight, vs $18 at Hilton. It is only 3 minutes walk back to Hilton.  Food, on southwest corner is Brueggers bagel and a
Manager Response: Dear Oh- Pooh O,  I must say your review is one of the most terrific reviews I have read in a long time.  You give our viewers a lot of great information about our area and despite the parking fee's (which are part of our operating model) you really enjoyed our hotel.  Thank you for the great feedback.  I sincerely hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose our hotel.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: The hotel was nicely furnished but no refrigerator...one was available for a daily charge of $5.00 which is not very accommodating...I should not have to pay an additional 5.00 to have a refrigerator.  But, we had cheese, yogurt and wine to keep cold so I asked for one and the staff brought it right away  It was plugged in and sounded like it went on but the next morning when i took out the yogurt, it was warm and the cheese smell was very strong.  The front desk staff took the charge off but it was inconvenient that the refrigerator did not work after all that extra work.    Why not just raise the rate $5. to cover the refrigerator?  I feel that every room should have one, it should be part of the room.  Otherwise, the room was big enough, nicely furnished and had everything
Manager Response: Dear Pat 076,  Thank you for your candid feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am very sorry you encountered an inconvenience with the refrigerator.  It is our intent to place refrigerators in all of our rooms but is definitely an expense we have to work through.  I'm  glad to hear otherwise you enjoyed the rest of our features and amenities.  As hospitality providers, naturally our objective is to ensure that you, our valued guest,  enjoys a warm and comfortable stay.  You have our pledge we will continue to improve upon this.  Many thanks again,  Warmly,

Summary: We stayed here while we were in the Whitaker Wellness Institute Program (who selected the hotel).  Room was nice  staff did a great job - always felt cared for & valued.  The location is great - literally 5 min. from the John Wayne Airport, yet the hotel is very quiet.  Although the building is older, the rooms were updated and the lobby is very nice also.  Obviously not a 5-star, but definitely surpassed our expectations.
Manager Response: Dear Apendamen,  Thank you kindly for taking time to give us such a wonderful review of your recent stay at our hotel.  It gives me great pleasure to read you were met with our warm hospitality, updated lobby and accommodations and our convenient location suited to your needs.  Our goal is to ensure our valued guests are met with kindness and comfort and your comments validate our efforts.  I hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My family and I visited this hotel and booked two rooms.  Location is very convenient to the Orange County Airport, just literally across MacArthur Boulevard, maybe a five minute drive to/from airport.  The front desk was cordial and check in was smooth.  We were assigned to two adjoining rooms, one with a king bed and one with two doubles.  Rooms were large approximately 350 square feet with dated furnishings and a noisy hvac individual unit mounted on the wall, circa 1980's.  A mild caveat is intrusion of air traffic noise for light sleepers due to proximity to airport.  Parking is $18 per day with in/out privileges, however when returning to the hotel in he evening, parking lot was extremely full due to a wedding party, so had to be patient and wait to hunt down a parking
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your informative review in response to your just completed stay with us.  This type of input is invaluable to us as we plan our property upgrades and training going forward.    I am pleased that the hotel and the services provided met the travel needs of you and your family.  We look forward to once again offering our hospitality to your family when your travels bring you back to the Orange County area.  Best wishes,

Summary: I heard every little noise in this Hotel from the toilets flushing to the lady above me tinkling. Your facility is a disgrace to the other Hotels I have stay with. You lost me as a customer for the amount I had to pay this was not worth my monry.
Manager Response: Dear Mark S.,  Please accept my sincere apologies for your recent experience at our hotel.  It is our intent to ensure our guests are met with a warm and comfortable stay and I am truly sorry  we failed you this time.  I have since shared your concerns with the appropriate team members and will certainly look into further noise concerns and address accordingly.   I hope that you may change your mind regarding patronizing our hotel again.  I am confident that given another chance, you would enjoy the stay I speak about and I would be happy to give your reservation my personal attention.    Once again, thank you.  Your feedback in very valuable to us.  Warm Regards,

Summary: Stayed here for business for a couple of days and couldn't be happier with the quality of the hotel and the great level of customer service.  Also, the hotel is right next to John Wayne airport, which is very convenient.  I will definitely be staying here again!!
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for your wonderful comments in response to your stay at the Hilton Irvine this month.  It's always a pleasure to hear that our guests have enjoyed their visit to our hotel, and that they have been pleased with the level of customer service that we try to provide to every guest.  I'm glad that you found our location to be especially convenient when flying into the John Wayne Orange County Airport.  We think that is a great advantage to our guests like yourself as it frees up so much additional time for other activities such as our nearby shopping and beaches.  Again thank you for taking the time to your offer your valuable insight on our property.  I do hope we will have the opportunity to see you at the hotel again in the near future.    Best wishes,

Summary: Stayed at the Hilton Irvine while attending meetings at UC Irvine.  The hotel is comfortable, service is good and friendly.  Breakfast buffet (free for HH Golds) is okay but pretty ordinary.  This is an older Hilton, probably from the 1960s but is well maintained and recently fairly recently.
Manager Response: Dear Mot29,  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel. I am pleased to hear you were satisfied with most of our services and while naturally, we would have liked to impress you a bit more, we will work a little harder to do so the next time.   Should travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County.  Thanks again,  Warmly,

Summary: Although quite close to the airport, the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport has good sound-proofing so you could get a quiet sleep.  The room is the usual standard fare for Hitlon in the U.S. with the E&C bath products, nice clean room.   What it lacks in charms, it made it up in comfort and price.  The staff at the front desk is hit&miss.  You can find some cold yet others particularly the younger staff friendly and helpful.  I can't put my finger on it though.  I chose this hotel because I have an early flight out on the morning of the departure day.  I am not sure if I wanted to be here if I was on vacation.  Although, getting out of the mess in Anaheim is not a bad idea.   For guests who has business around the area, it is a decent choice.
Manager Response: Dear  terravisum.  Thank you for the candid feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am happy to hear that our accommodations provided a restful sleep and that in general you were quite happy with our hotel and services.  I do regret that your impression of our front desk support staff was lacking and not consistent and for that I am truly sorry.  I can assure you our objective is to always make our guest feel welcome and valued and I apologize we failed you this time.  I do hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose our hotel so that we may demonstrate what you have come to expect from the Hilton family.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: A beautiful property, well located, good for business
Summary: I like the Irvine Hilton, I,ve stayed there before. If I,d reviewed it then I would have rated it at a five. It's an unusually attractive hotel with a great location and excellent staff, with one rather glaring exception. We had arrived, spent the first night gone to an all day meeting etc. when I arrived back at my room my key card did not work. I went down to the front desk only to be basically verbally assaulted by the extremely rude and very odd front desk manager. She was in a rather hysterical state because it seems one of her employees (a very nice young man) had wrongly allowed me to check in the day before using my credit card which had my new last name on it which didn't match my drivers license ( just married-hadn't gone to DMV yet). I was bored and annoyed by her, so
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen H.,  Please accept my sincere apologies regarding your recent experience at our hotel.  I hope that through the various communications with you we have been able to address your concerns.   I would like to add that we have also addressed your comments with the appropriate individuals to avoid future incidences.  We pride ourselves on delivering exceptional service, so I regret we failed you this instance.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we do hope that one day you will allow us another opporuntity to serve you better.  Kindest Regards,

Summary: While traveling on business to SoCal, I needed a hotel close to the Orange County Airport so I could be on time with an early a.m. departure. Right accross the street is the Hilton-Orange County Hotel. Fast, Friendly, Courteous service from the staff including providing me directions to get in a 5 mile run before turning in for the evening. After my run I grabbed a quick bite in the hotel restaurant to keep from having to leave the property. Good ambiance in the trendy restaurant which had a healthy menu for fitness types. Overall a relaxing experience and would recommend this hotel to both business and personal travel.
Manager Response: Dear Marshall,  Thanks so much for providing your insight into your recent visit at the hotel.  Feedback such as you have provided is a key element in our ongoing training and planning efforts.  I'm really pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us, and that our convenient location across from the airp[ort was just what you needed in order to allow you some extra time to relax and rejuvinate.     It was also nice to hear your comments regarding our staff and the manner in which they served you.  They are a great group and it's always wonderful to hear that from our guests.  I am glad you had a chance to enjoy the restaurant as well, and that you found the healthy items on the menu to your liking.  We are constantly looking for new menu ideas to expand those choices further.    Again thank you for your thoughts on our property.  Best wishes,

Summary Heading: Excellent comfortable stay, service was amazing!
Summary: This was a stay for business.  The young gentleman that was the valet the night my wife and I showed up was very accommodating of my pickup truck and car trailer, he found me a nice safe spot out of the way.  The front desk personnel were notably very warm, welcoming, and helpful.  I really felt assured that they would do anything necessary to make my stay more comfortable.  Our room was excellent, perfectly clean.  The bedside electrical plugs at the base of the adjustable dimness lamps were great, as traveling we had run down the batteries in all of our electronics.  First class stay, they earned ever bit of all four stars.  Definitely will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Norcalrelics,  Thank you kindly for the wonderful review of our hotel.  I am very pleased to hear your stay was made memorable by all the positive experiences and by the terrific staff who attended you.  I have a Team who work tirelessly to ensure similar experiences for all our guests and I can assure you still feel terrific when they are recognized.  So once again, thank you.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: decent for an overnight but not a place for more than 2 days
Summary: Hotel was decent for an overnight before a flight or if you were just in town for one or two days on business. Nothing special here. Just a bed and decent breakfast. One of my associates stayed at the "other" Hilton in the area which had a much more "resort" and "vacation" feel. Was not really relevant to me, but is certainly the additional amenities would be something I would like if I were choosing again.   My only real complaint is that the staff went overboard in asking for me to include them by name in my review. I understand that they receive compensation for being specifically named in a positive review, but I found it tacky for them to solicit guests to include them in our reviews. Almost seems like a waiter telling you how good his service was and asking for a big tip.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for providing your feedback in relation to your stay at the hotel.  I am glad you enjoyed your visit and hope you will return again to see us when you are back in the Irvine area.    Warmest regards,

Summary: My family and I we are so placed with Hilton Irvine hotel staff, they are so kind and so professional  Ruben the waiter of the restaurant did a great job and the food is very good out there.   We had all the time correct information and an excellent customer service.  Thanks
Manager Response: Angie,  Thanks so much for your comments in regard to your recent stay at the hotel.  It's nice to hear that you were impressed with the staff at the hotel, and had a great time with us.    I'm also so pleased that you and your family enjoyed the restaurant and the wonderful job that Ruben and the staff do there.  Again thanks for the feedback.  I hope it won't be too long until we see you back at the property.  Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Personnel at the buffett Breakfast area ROCKS
Summary: Rueben, was super fast, friendly, hard working and above all made us feel so welcome and at home that our experience was fenomenal!!! Thanks for the great selection of fresh fruit, omeletts made perfect by Maclovio, Andy and team... You guys rock... Hilton keep up hiring and mantaining guys of that caliver they definatelly will keep us coming back for more
Manager Response: Miguel,  Thank you so much for your comments regarding the hotel and particularly the restaurant facilities.  Ruben is a wonderful associate and it's always nice to see him recognized for his efforts, as well as the rest of the team.  I am so glad you enjoyed the propedrty and hope we willsee you again in the not too distant future.  Warmest regards,

Summary: I was on a business trip...I had a wonderful stay and would use the Hilton for personal use from this stay in Irvine. Very Clean, Great Front Desk, Great Spacious Rooms!!! Just a overall GREAT experience!
Manager Response: Dear Curtis June A,  Thank you kindly for the wonderful comments regarding your recent business trip to our hotel.  I am pleased to hear you were delighted with our accomodiations, our staff and our hotel overall.  I hope one day you have an opportunity to enjoy the same services while on a more leisurely trip.  Once again, thank you for the positive feedback.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: Convenient location for a quick business trip.  Situated right across the street from the Airport, no need to wait for the curtsey van it's less than a ten minute walk.  Meeting rooms and other accommodations make this an excellent place to hold small to mid size conferences.
Manager Response: Dear Bankenfin,  Thank you for the positive review regarding your recent business trip to our hotel.  Our proximity to John Wayne Airport definitely makes it very convenient for many of our guests.  Our ample meeting space, as you mention, is very ideal for all types of meetings and/or special occasions.  I am happy to hear you found our space conducive to your event.  We hope if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Just wanted to say special thanks to the staff at the Hilton Irvine, OC airport for their caring and attention to details. In particular, Reuben, Betty, and Jorge are so warm and welcoming, as they anticipate my every need during breakfast, and help to start my day off in a very positive way. It feels like family! Thank you very much.
Manager Response: Thanks so much for you comments regarding your Hilton Irvine stay this month.  I am so glad that you enjoy the hotel and the service provided by all of our staff.    It's especially nice to hear how our breakfast crew has made you feel like "family" when you begin your day in the restaurant.  They are a great group and really enjoy interacting with guests like yourself.  Betty is a joy, and Ruben and Jorge keep everything moving in the morning with a smile on their face.  It's great that you have enjoyed your mornings with them.   We greatly appreciate your loyalty and look forward to your continued visits with us.  Best wishes,

Summary: Loved our stay at the Hilton.  The price was right and the hotel was above expectations.  Will definitely stay again.  The location across from the airport and surrounded by restaurants was very convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice comments regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.  As a seasoned Hilton traveler, it means a great deal to us to know that we are meeting all of your travel requirements and exceeding your expectations.  I am pleased that you found the hotel to be convenient for your dining and travel needs, and considered the experience a great value.  Thanks so much again for your kind comments.  Best wishes,

Summary: This was by far the cleanest hotel we have ever stayed in! The room was exceptionally clean and not worn out the way some rooms become.  There were no nicks in the furniture, the carpet was clean, it smelled fresh as soon as you walked into the room. The front desk and staff was very friendly and helpful.  The hotel was very easy to get to with access to the highway and directly across the street from the airport.  There were restaurants within walking distance.  We did not have any problems with our stay.  We will definitely be staying here again, well worth the money we paid.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding the cleanliness of your guest room and the hotel.  All the team members of our Housekeeping staff work very hard to ensure that you have a pleasant stay, and that your rooms are both comfortable and have that wonderful "clean and welcoming" feel.  It's so nice to see your remarks and that you appreciated their efforts.  We feel the hotel represents an excellent value in the airport area for both business and leisure travelers, and are very pleased to hear that you concur and will be returning to visit us again.  Best wishes,

Summary: So first impressions first. We arrive at the hotel on a Saturday night around 10:00 pm. No parking to be found. The valets just let us drive around the parking lot searching for an open space without letting us know it was full until we pulled back around after ten minutes. We were told to park across the street at AB office building. Not happy we had to walk that far with all our luggage and a baby. We get checked in and find that we were given the handicap accessible room. No bath. Chipped tile. No toiletries the first night. The paint was messy around the edges if the walls. The only good thing was the bed. Extremely comfortable. Since we didn't spend too much time at the hotel the paint and bathroom didn't matter as much. Not bad if you are only using your room to sleep. Not
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment on your recent stay at the hotel.  I am so sorry for the problem you experienced with parking your car upon arrival at the property.  There are occasions where parking will fill up when we have a full occupancy and large catering activities on a Saturday night.  Parking becomes available when a few of the events have ended but I know how difficult it must have been for you.  I am not sure why we were not able to assist you in unloading the luggage so that you could wait at the lobby while the car was being parked.  I apologize that the situation was not handled well by our staff.   I also apologize for the manner in which you described the room.  As you can see from other comments online, that is certainly not the norm for our guest rooms.  Our manager would have normally upgraded you to a much nicer room, but perhaps you were tired or there were no rooms available at that point in time.    I do hope you found your overall stay to be enjoyable, and that you will return and we will have the opportunity to do a better job of making the experience special for you and your family.  Best wishes,

Summary: I travel on business 4-5 times a month and have learned quickly that those hotels that have great staff and working internet can make your day enjoyable or a nightmare.  At the top of the list for the #1 business hotel in Orange County has to be the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.   Very clean hotel and easy to navigate. Obviously the hotel has gone under some major rennovation in the last 5-6 years. Very contemporary lobby design. Bar and restaurant are amazing and the staff make you feel right at home. Breakfast is great with the cooking station for omelet or other eggs, and the dinners are exceptional.  If you are a guest on Wednesday night, you really should try the sushi for dinner.  The hotel has also figured out how to provide Internet service that is reliable and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your thoughts and impressions of the Hilton irvine during your frequent stays with us.  We are so greatful for your continued patronage, and for the very kind comments you have provided regarding our wonderful staffs in the restaurant and at the Front Desk.    It's of course also very endearing to hear that our internet service is effective and our rooms are clean  Those are essential elements for any business traveler.  But we know it is the attitude and service of the staff that truly make a difference in any hotel, and we will continue to strive to provide that "little extra" in our efforts for you and all of our guests.    Again thanks for the continued encouragement.  Everyone at the hotel will appreciate hearing it.  Best wishes,

Summary Heading: Great location & price but Not a 4 Star Hotel!!
Summary: This was our second time staying at this Hilton. Mainly because we were given it twice from Hotwire's special in which you get a very low price on a 4 star hotel in the area you are looking for but do not know the hotel until after you pay. Don't get me wrong, I stay in a lot of hotels for business and pleasure and this Hilton is nice! The staff was great, the rooms were clean, the lobby and pool was very nice. Also, the location is very convenient, right across from the airport. With that being said, this should not be classified as a 4 star hotel for one reason, the rooms!! The rooms have obviously been converted from an older style to newer style but the upgrades are obvious. There is still the old fashion air conditioning on the floor by the window but the controls have been
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your stay this month at the hotel.  It was very informative to hear your thoughts on the property and I appreciate the details you have provided in your remarks.  Feedback such as this really helps us in our planning for the future.  As a Hilton Honors member, I know you are familiar with the services provided by Hilton hotels across the country.  It's nice to hear that you have enjoyed our hotel's staff and services, and the cleanliness of the rooms and property.  Again thanks for providing your impression of the property.

Summary: Second time this hotel in a year.  Very nice layout.  The rooms are great especially the large flat screen that has a excellent picture.  The staff is very friendly and will do anything to satisfy you.  Our internet wasn't working and they kept sending staff up till the problem was fixed.  We didn't even expect that.  The food was really good to.  The few minor complaints we had was the gym needs a elliptical.  This hotel is way to nice not to be up to date with a elliptical.  Also I think $18 a night for parking is a little over the top. Its not even in a parking garage.  The $3 vending machine soda is also a little excessive.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your comments regarding your stay at the hotel this month.  We appreciate the feedback you have provided us on a number of issues, as this enables our team to have a better understanding of where to focus our future efforts on improving the facilities and services at the property.   It's also nice to hear that you enjoy the guest rooms and the service provided by our staff.  Those are vitally important to us in seeing that we meet all of your expectations and provide you a carefree stay.  Again thanks for your thoughts.  We look forward to your next visit at the property in the near future.

Summary: Great accommodations and staff, these guys have helped me in the past when stranded and restaurant staff are excellent. Thanks Jorge, Betty, Ruben and Daniel from making my morning experience that much more pleasurable. You guys are the best!
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.  I'm so pleased that you enjoy both the staff and the property.  It's very nice as well to hear your remarks about our restaurant staff.  They are a great group and we are very proud of their service efforts.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soone.  Best wishes,

Summary: This was my third stay at this hotel and my best visit to date.  The hotel seems to have increased staffing and recently provided customer service training or something....  Much better service this time than previous two stays.   Nice buffet breakfast wtih omelet station.  Lobby bar and restaurant are typical for business type hotel.   My TV did not work and within minutes maintenance arrived to fix it (was missing a cable cord).  The hotel provides regular shuttle service to the airport - although it is close enough you could walk.   Rooms are clean, nice bathroom accessories and self coffee maker. Will stay here on next CA work visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice comments in response to your recent stay with us.  It's nice to hear that about our staff, and that you feel our training efforts are aimed in the right direction.  Providing top level service is our key focus, and I think our current staff does a great job of that.  I'm glad that you enjoyed the breakfast buffet.  We think the prepared to order omelette station is a great addition to the typical hotel buffet.  Again it's terrific to hear that you like the hotel and will be staying here in the future.  We'll be sure to do our part in making those future visits enjoyable.  Best wishes,

Summary: I checked in on April 4 10:46pm and the check-in agent and subsequently his manager missed on providing any customer service.   First, it started with me being denied any HHonors Gold benefits which was explained to me due to booking with a third party rather than Hilton directly. Now I have stayed at numerous Hilton properties throughout Canada and Eastern US and never once was I denied my status benefits.  But it is not just the refusal for benefits which was an issue, but the manner in which they handled the situation. What I care about most is the complimentary WIFI as part of being Gold status. However, I was never asked what benefit would compliment my stay nor what my specific concern was. All I was told was no gold benefits, without any further details - blank stare at
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments in response to your recent stay with us.  I am sorry for any confusion regarding your Hilton Honors benefits.  However it is Hilton Hotels policy that third party reservations are not eligible for Honors benefits and we do follow their national chain policy.  I do apologize for the delay in getting you a room that suited the needs of your party of three.  The GSA may have initially thought you wanted a separate bed for each traveler, but obviously the King and rollaway were the best options that provided the most comfort for all.  We do appreciate your business and hope you will return in the future for a carefree stay.  Best wishes,

Summary Heading: Great location, clean and modern, breakfast.....
Summary: This property missed a five star from me for one reason, but more on that later. I recently stayed here with my teenage daughters for two nights for a girls weekend shopping getaway. The hotel is directly across the street from John Wayne/Orange County Airport. The area is very clean and safe and the hotel is close to South Coast Plaza and Fashion Island Shopping Centers. Our room was clean and well appointed and when we asked to switch from one king bed to two doubles after the first night our request was handled swiftly and politely. Parking is $18 for self parking which is fine for the airport area but when we came back after a late dinner on Saturday night we had to park way in the back because parking is limited when the hotel is at capacity and all the spaces in the front
Manager Response: Tricia,  Thank you for your detailed response to your recent stay with us.  It was very informative and is the type of feedback that enables us to focus our future efforts on those areas that require our attention.    I am pleased that you enjoyed the hotel and found it convenient for your weekend shopping adventures.  South Coast Plaza and Fashion Island are two of the country's premier shopping areas, but yet are both unique in their own way.  I'm glad you and your family had the chance to visit them.    I do apologize for the actions of our restaurant servers, and am sorry they were not able to help you in explaining the healthy food options available on the menu.  I will address that with the manager in that department.  Again thanks so much for providing your comments.  They are a great help.  Best wishes,

Summary: Based on location, excellent reviews, pet friendly rules and truly superior customer service provided by Ms. Andrea Anderson, our company will be moving all its guest accommodation needs to the "Hilton by the John Wayne Airport!"  When a problem arose from a reservation made through a major online service was unresolvable by that service, Ms. Anderson went above and beyond my expectations and her accountability to me to make it all right again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding Andrea and the service she provided you.  She is wonderful at working with all of our guests to ensure that their needs are provided, and that all special requests are accomodated.  I am so pleased to hear she was able to assist you and that everything was worked out to your satisfaction.  I noticed that you mentioned our pet friendly policies and I can assure you that our staff enjoys the fact that many of our guests like to bring their dogs with them on visits.  There are great places and beaches for our "little guys" to visit in the area, and it makes it so enjoyable when you can bring them along.  It's great to hear that your company will be utilizing our hotel when your travel brings you to the Irvine area.  We will work very hard to make sure that all of your staff's needs are met when staying with us, and that we contribute on our end to your business travel being both successful and worry free in the future.  Best wishes,

Summary: I stay at the Hilton across from John Wayne airport each time I stay in Orange County. I travel for business quit often and its nice to know that I can count on good service. Each day when I eat breakfast Jorge, Ruebin and Betty always greet me with a smile and before I can sit down have my favorite drink ready on the table for me. Since I am there so much they have taken it upon themselves to go the extra mile and make my stay comfortable as possible. They don't have to do this but do it because I believe they care.
Manager Response: It's so nice to hear from a frequent guest like yourself that it is our staff that makes us special to you.  We really appreciate all of our returing guests like yourself as they are what we are al about.  We recognize that there are a number of alternative properties in the area and feel very fortunate that you consistently choose to stay with us.    Our staff obviously loves to have you here and are pleased whenever you return to stay with us.  Jorge, Ruben, and Betty are prime examples of great employees who love their jobs and love serving our guests in a way that makes each day a little more pleasant for you while you are in the Irvine area.    Thanks for your kind words and your continued loyalty.  Best wishes,

Summary Heading: This is a fantastic place to stay with a remarkable staff. And a ideal location
Summary: My husband and I love to frequent this hotel. The grounds are immaculate, the staff are fantastic. They are very friendly and go above and beyond to insure that stay is the best it could be. Miguel Saucedo at the front desk, is wonderful, very professional but also very friendly and helpful for what ever you need. His laugh makes you laugh. He is an example of a perfect representative of any business. But it's not just it's all of the staff that we in counter, Jesus Aceves, Jordan Velasquez, Andrea , and Betty in the dining area. They are all wonderful and always are the reason we keep coming back. The food is fantastic including the morning breakfast. My husband travels all the time, but this is his favourite place to go.
Manager Response: Beverly,  I so enjoyed reading your comments on your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.  It's terrific hearing how much you enjoyed your visit and the service provided by our great staff.  I love that we are your husband's favorite hotel out of all of his travels.  That's really quite a compliement and a feather in our cap.  Thanks for mentioning Miguel and Andrea at our Front Desk.  Miguel is an amazing employee and everyone who meets him just reaffirms that fact.  Andrea is terrific as well, and goes out of her way time and again to help our guests with their needs.  Jesus, Jordan, and of course Betty are fantastic as well, and make the restaurant experience much more enjoyable for all of our guests.  Again I am so pleased that you and your husband love the hotel.  That means a lot to all of us.  Best wishes,

Summary: I stay at the Hilton Irvine a lot and Jerry, Ruben, Jorge and Betty have been super-friendly and attentive every single time I have breakfast. The selection is good, the service is fast and they go out of their way to make sure you get everything you need and feel well-cared for.  I can highly recommend the staff at the restaurant to any traveller, business or pleasure
Manager Response: Stefanie,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on our great breakfast staff.  We get a lot of good comments on the quality of our buffet in the morning, but I think it's our people who really make it special.  They are very experienced and efficient which is important in seeing that business travelers can get in and out in a reasonable time period.  But it is their wonderful attitude as a group, and their enjoyment at meeting and serving our guests that make every morning a little more special.    As a group, Betty, Jorge, Ruben, and Jerry never stop amazinging me.  We are very lucky to have them and I want to thank you for recognizing their efforts and service.  I hope you will continue to be a "regular' in our hotel and restaurant whenever you travel south to Orange County.  Best wishes,

Summary: I couldn't be more pleased with my stay at the Hilton. I usually stay at Marriott property's but the price on this stay was $80 cheaper than the Courtyard and the room was 2 stars above Courtyard. Don't get me wrong, I love Marriott, but now they will have a bit of competition because I will check for Hilton's in the area on my business trips before booking.I travel two weeks every month for about 10 months of the year so I want comfortable and quiet at my hotels. This Hilton was more than that and the staff was extremely helpful and friendly. I wish all my hotel experiences were as pleasant!
Manager Response: Jeff,  It's always great to hear from a guest who has enjoyed their stay but especially when they have been utilizing a different brand in the past.  I'm so pleased that you liked the hotel and found the service to be perhaps a little more special than the other properties you've visited.  Our staff really work hard to make our guests feel that way and it's nice for their efforts to be appreciated.  I do hope that you will give us the opportunity to become "your hotel" whenever you visit Irvine.  We truly look forward to your next visit with us.    Best wishes,

Summary: Jorge at the Breakfast Buffet was the best!  He remembered my name on every visit!   My room was too noisy, the A/C never stopped. The beds have down and were very comfortable.  The staff was friendly.  Plenty of room on the airport shuttle.
Manager Response: Erica,  Thanks so much for providing your comments on the hotel.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your visit with us and found the hotel and the beds very comfortable.  I do apologize if there was noise that bothered you during the night.  Normally the airport is not much of a factor, particularly because of the noise controls in the city that stop all flights at 10pm.    I am glad you enjoyed the restaurant during your stay, and the service provided by Jorge.  It was nice to hear of that.  We do hope that you'll be returning to see us soon.    Best wishes,

Summary: I work within walking distance to this hotel and come in every weekend for a great breakfast and great service. I come here strictly for the great staff in that area of the hotel. Jerry, Betty, Daniel, Ruben, Jorge and of course Virginia. What a great bunch of people. Always smiles on there faces and I am always treated like a customer wants to be. So forget about I-Hop for breakfast and give this buffet a try!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your thoughts on the great breakfast served at the hotel.  It's great to hear that you are a weekend regular and how much you enjoy the food and the staff.  Aren't they all a terriffic group.    Virginia does a great job there, and with the entire staff including Betty and Jerry being so attentive, it does make is a special place to eat in the mornings.  Again it was so nice to read your comments.    Best wishes,

Summary: I'm a road warrior. I spend a lot of nights in a lot of hotels & most are just accommodating & comfortable. The staff at the Hilton in Irvine make it a standout, however. Genuinely friendly and welcoming to the weary traveler - charming and appopriate senses of humor really made me feel like I was among friends. I happened to leave my Kindle in the bed of my room last time I stayed and Eldred at the front desk moved heaven & earth to get it back to me before my next trip. Defintely recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Leslie,  I read with interest your comments regarding your recent stay with us at the Hilton Irvine.  I especially love hearing from our frequent travelers as you represent the group who can give us the truest picture of how well our staff is performing to meet your needs.  It was wonderful to hear how well they are doing across the board.    That is great news to hear that Eldred was able to get your Kindle back to you so quickly.   He's great at going that extra mile for whatever is needed by our guests, and was the "perfect" choice to handle that situation.  I'm very pleased it worked out so well.  Again it was terrific hearing about how pleased you were with the staff and service provided.  Thanks again.  I hope you will have the opportunity to come back soon.  Best wishes,

Summary Heading: We paid a good rate due to attending a wedding reception at the hotel. Bottled water in the room was $3 dollars....
Summary: We received a great rate for SoCal because we were attending a wedding/reception in the hotel. They do put water in your room BUT it costs $3.00 per bottle! We traveled with a ice chest. The maid service/housekeepers were wonderful and very helpful. The front desk seemed to be new staff and not very knowledgeable. Pretty close to many places to visit as well as Disneyland. Rooms were clean. Eating places within walking distance, El Torito and Ihop.
Manager Response: Thank you for offerring your comments on your stay at the hotel.  I am glad that you found the location to be convenient and a good starting off point for your adventures in Orange County.    Thanks for the nice words about our Housekeeping staff.  They do a great job and are a great source of pride for us.  I do apologize if the Front Desk staff was not as helpful or as knowledgable as you would have liked.  I will let their supervisors know of your comment.    Best regards,

Summary: As a frequent traveler in the US I have come across many different hotels in the year and the various gimmicks they use to "feel" welcome when first checking in.  I was at this hotel in December of 2012 and was over whelmed by the welcome I received from Miguegreeted me as though he knew me, with outstretched hand, huge smile and gushing about how glad I had returned!  I was shocked, as I honestly did not remember being in this hotel befre (which I had) and frankly did not remeember Miguel (probably because I flew into Orange county around mid night on my previous trip and was comatose.  Nevertheless, this guy is the real deal, happy to see me (again) and happy to be of any service he could provide.  As a Hilton Diamond Member, and Marriott Silver,  I see all kinds of hotels in
Manager Response: Dear Ray,  It was great to read your comments regarding our hotel and particularly about MIguel at the Front Desk.  He is a very special person in that he so enjoys meeting people, and going out of his way to engage and help them is truly his nature.  He is a joy to work with and a greater joy to know.  I am so glad that you have had the opportunity to meet him, and have taken the time to tell others about this wonderful young man.  Again thanks so much for taking the time to comment on your stay.  I hope we will see you back at the hotel again soon.    Best wishes,

Summary: Chose to stop here as we flew in late from the East Coast, and then picked up Rental Car the next morning.  Had to phone for shuttle (but you could walk to it in 5mins).  Very convenient.  Rooms, nothing special.  Bar ok.  Chose to drive for breakfast to 'Cowgirls Cafe' 3 miles.
Manager Response: Thanks for taking the time to comment on your visit to the hotel.  Although you had but a brief time to stay with us, I hope you enjoyed yourself.  While we do have a very convenient location to not only the airport but to many attractions and beaches here in the heart of Orange County, we feel it's our hospitality that makes us stand out from other hotels around us.    I hope you'll have the opportunity to spend more time with us on your next visit to Southern California.  Regards,

Summary: I am a very picky traveler. I even feel a little bad about it because I have so many requests. I had to change rooms a few times, because I wanted a quiet location and after my 3rd room change the night time manager Andrea Anderson came up with me to inspect the next room. It was perfect. She handled all the other special requests I had for extra supplies and it was taken care of quickly for me. Eldred...(I think that was his name) was very nice to me with the first 3 switches, he seemed to just really want to make me happy. Whenever I called down it was normally Dora who answered and she was so sweet a real pleasure to speak with.  When I checked out Mijail offered me a friendly good-by and left me with a real desire to stay here again. I hated the cost for the parking, but it
Manager Response: It was wonderful to hear that our Front Desk staff was able to assist you in finding a room to your liking and ensuring that your stay was an enjoyable one.  They're a great group and really do want to make sur everyone has a memorable stay with us.  We all know that it can be demanding when you are away from home, and that travel can often have its challenges.   Our goal is to make your stay as carefree as possible and we are at your dispoal to do so.  Thanks for the encouragement.  Our staff will appreciate hearing it.    Best wishes,

Summary Heading: Smartest thing I've done in a Long Time
Summary: I had an early flight to take out of OC Airport and had a  late meeting in Long Beach. So my friend drove me to the Hilton at 9:30 p.m. I hadn't eaten, so I had a light salad and a glass of wine in their bar and conked out in a very clean, comfortable room and didn't get up until the alarm beeped. Being a Hilton Honors member, I was bumped up to the executive floor for an additional $5. They have a free airport shuttle; the airport's across the street, and I got there in under five minutes. What more could I want?
Manager Response: Thanks so much for staying with us the night prior to your flight.  I'm glad you enjoyed your late snack and had a restful night's sleep.    We greatly value our Hilton Honors members who regularly stay with us at the hotel, and hope we'll have the opportunity to see you again in the near future.  Again thanks for the kind comments.  Our staff truly appreciates them.  Best regards,

Summary Heading: Awesome great excellent beyond what I have had elsewhere anytime before
Summary: I havr been to many places but never anywhere that treated me the way I had been treated at this place. I was blown away by the service continual concern of my standings such as satisfaction goes. The front desk. Room service. The bar especially. In fact a gentleman by the name of Jerry Guzman was extra kind and its not often I like a ar tender let alone anyone. But this man made an impression. He clearly cared about his appearance from the way he did his hair to the line up of his shirt and belt. Truth be told hilton did an excellent job when they hired this man. They should be honored to have this man working for their company. He was promp, took note of everyone around him. Never skipped a step or staggered once he continuously kept his bar clean and had everyone smiling and
Manager Response: Jered,  Thank you for taking the time to provide your comments about your recent stay with us.  I'm always so pleased to hear from our guests that they enjoyed their visit and the service provided by our staff.  It's great to hear that our Front Desk and Room Service associates went out of their way for you, and to hear how Jerry exceeded your expectations.    You are correct in that we are very lucky to have Jerry Guzman on our team.  He is a joy to work with and really takes pride in everything related to his job.  Thanks for recognizing him in this way.  I'll be sure to do the same.  I hope you'll have an opportunity to come back in the near future.  Best wishes,

Summary Heading: my stay at the hilton in Irvine airport
Summary: Frome the monent I set foot on this porperty, has just been awesome, Its so refreshing today to have someone care how every thing about your trip is going,  the People at the front desk, Donna and Dora, treated me like i was royality. the hotel was booked solid the first night, so I didn.t get a king bed,  but it was ok,  I really wanted one but knew it was not going to happen,  The next day, Donna and also Dora, made sure that I got a king bed ,  it was so nice to know that they cared enough to do that,  to the people at Hilton, and the manager, I would like to say thank you for hiring a staff that really cares about people.  and yes my next stay away from home will be at a Hilton,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind comments regarding your recent stay with us at the Hilton Irvine.  It sounds as if you had a great visit and that's our top priority.    Both Donna and Dora are great associates and extremely caring as you have noted in your comments.  They never hesitate to go out of their way for our guests, and taking that extra step is second nature to both of them.  I know that hearing it from you makes their efforts more than worthwhile.  Again thanks for the nice words.  We can't wait to have you back at the property and look forward to your next visit.  Best wishes,

Summary Heading: I have nit hwd a better stay anywhere I've been in all my yesrs
Summary: He was very kind. The hospitality is amazing. I love the bartenders here, theyre all so nice.I have been to many places thorought the country and this hilton is by far the most decent one I have experienced. I have never done a review for a hotel elsewhere and I am literally honored to do so for this place with ease. There was actually one gentleman who stood out in particular by the name of jerry guzman. His service and kind smile really made my day all the better.   Sue moon
Manager Response: Sue,  Thanks so much for taking the time to comment on your stay at our hotel this month.  I'm so pleased that you enjoyed the service and hospitality that you received from the staff.  You  made all of us feel special when you said that you had never written an online review for a hotel previoulsy and were honored to do so for us.  I really think the honor is ours in that we all feel privileged to serve you and all of our guests every day.  It was of course very nice to read your remarks about Jerry Guzman in our lounge area.  It shouldn't surprise me anymore to hear of his wonderful attitude and the service he provides, as I get to see it every day.  But sometimes it is easy to forget what a joy it is to have associates like Jerry taking care of our guests.  Again thanks for your very kind comments.   Best wishes,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a combined mini-vacation and business trip.  We purchased a few of the breakfast vouchers and when the breakfast buffet didn't have pancakes one morning (they had french toast), our server Jorge went promptly to the kitchen and requested a small stack of pancakes for us.  He brought them out promptly and checked back with us that they were acceptable.  We appreciated his extra effort.  Overall, the hotel was nice and clean and we didn't have problems getting parking fairly close to the doors.  I would like to see a mini-fridge in the rooms.  Since we are vegans, we bring cereal and non-dairy milk with us as well as favorite no oil salad dressings.  These need refrigeration.  So we had to make do with bags of ice put into a small cooler.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your comments regarding your February stay with us at the Hilton Irvine.  It is input from guests like yourself that enables us to see more clearly how our services and facilities are viewed by our guests.  I'm so glad that Jorge was able to assist you in the restaurant and make your breakfast special.  He represents what we are all trying to do every day, and is certainly one of the reasons that we are able to do so.  I understand how a refrigerator would be helpful in your situation.  As part of our standard Hilton guest room furnishings and amenities, we do not provide refrigerators in our guest rooms.  However we do have a limited number available for delivery to the rooms when requested.  I am not sure if you ever requested one, but wish we had known of your needs so we could have provided it.  I do thank you for your comments and hope we will see you again soon.  Best wishes,

Summary: i have visited this hotel for business a half a dozen times over the last 3 mos and have always found it to be clean, with professional personnel who are very attentive my needs.  The bar usually have several customers who are pleasant and the service is good.
Manager Response: Brian,  Thank you for your very kind comments regarding our hotel and your stay with us this month.  It's especially nice to hear from our returning guests that they consistently enjoy and appreciate the service we provide them.    I do hope it won't too long before you will be visiting again.  We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Great staff, nice hotel, close to the airport!
Summary: I stayed here due to a business trip and was checked in by a very friendly staff member.  Not only did he take the time to answer all of my questions about the hotel and parking, but he also made some recommendations for my activities that evening.  He printed a map and gave me directions to get down to Laguna Beach, which was a wonderful experience.  I know he had a lot of things to do, but I really appreciated the fact that he took the time to give me those directions and make those recommendations.  The room was wonderful, I had a great view from the 8th floor and could see the beautiful landscape of the area.  I love the Hilton beds, and this one delivered as well - I fell asleep as soon as I sunk into it.  It's right across the street from the airport, yet not a single
Manager Response: Thanks so  much for providing your thoughts and comments in response to your stay at the Hilton Irvine this month.  I'm very pleased to hear how our Guest Service Agent at the Front Desk was able to assist you in your evening plans.  Laguna Beach is a treasure and it's great that you were able to enjoy it for the evening.    I'm sorry that our maintenance staff overlooked the lock on your balcony door.  That device should always be working and I have notified them to review the locks throughout the hotel.  I know that no one likes to pay for parking but I can assure you that our rates are similar to all other full service hotel properties in the John Wayne airport area.  Again thanks so much for your kind words and feedback on the property.  Best wishes,

Summary Heading: Good but I have had better!
Summary: This hotel is very nice. However, I do have some small complaints.  1. Parking is expensive. Good thing my work is paying for me to be here. Also, seems parking spots are always full and have to park fairly far away. 2. No refrigerator or microwave. Maybe this isn't a big deal for most but when you are traveling long term for business they are quite a convenience that is missed when you don't have it.  3. Room service. I ordered room service 2 times during my 7 day stay. One time I tried calling 2x's and no one ever answered either time so after a long day of work and wanting to relax in my room I ended up having to change out of my pajamas and going downstairs to get dinner.  4. Had to ask for free water. I am a Diamond member and had been staying at the Hilton in Anaheim for
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments in response to your stay with us this month.  The type of input you have provided is a great help to us in seeing how our service is received and where we can focus our ongoing training going forward.    I do apologize for the difficulty your had in contacting room service.  That is certainly not the norm and I will address it with the staff.  On another note, we do have a limited number of refrigerators available for our guests.  Please request it or let us know in advance before your next visit.  Our Daimond Hilton Honors members are very important to us and we will work hard to ensure that we deserve your continued patronage in the future.   Best wishes,

Summary: Just ate at the restaurant and had to write about the service we received from Jesse! He was amazing and super sweet from beginning to end!  The food was very good and Jesse made it a great experience!  Salvador was great too!   Also the two woman at check in were very nice as well.  (Dora and I wish I had gotten the other woman's name)...So far the experience has been wonderful!
Manager Response: Dear Michelle,  It was so nice to read your comments and thoughts about our hotel and its staff members.  It's always great to hear how our guests view our service here at the property, particularly when we hear from our most valued Hilton Honors members such as yourself.    I am pleased that you enjoyed dining at our restaurant, and that Jesse and Salvador took such good care of you.  It was also great to hear your comments about Dora and the Guest Service staff.  They all go our of their way to accomodate our guests, especially our HHonors members who we are fortunate to host on a regular basis.  Thanks so much for taking the time to provide your feedback.  It's invaluable to us.  Best regards,

Summary: I travel to Orange County several times each year and I always stay here because the staff is so friendly and helpful.  The front desk is welcoming and friendly, and the waitstaff, in particular, Betty my server for breakfast each day, is awesome.  They make you feel like family and make each trip feel special. The food is also very good from the excellent breakfast buffer, to the Sushi on Wed nights!
Manager Response: Dear Patrick,  It was terrific to hear that you enjoy our hotel during your visits to Orange County throughout the year.  We love hearing from our "regulars" as that is the best indication of how we are performing in terms of our service and facilities.  I appreciate your positive comments about our Front Desk and Servers.  They are great groups and isn't Betty an awesome employee.  We love the way she makes every guest feel special.    We all look forward to your next visit to Southern California.  Thanks again for your loyalty to the hotel and its staff.  Best regards,

Summary: We held a meeting of 50 from around the country with multiple meals, breakout sessions and unexpected "adjustments". At every step, the sales team, front desk, banquet captains, and staff were excellently prepared and energetically ready to do everything possible to accommodate our needs.  They even shuttled me to Staples to get nametags. Way to go Reychel, Miguel, Eldred, Abraham, and so many more! We highly recommend this location for all of this, and for the high-quality decor directly across from the airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for your nice comments regarding your recent stay and your group's meeting at our hotel.  It certainly sounds as if it was a great success, and I am very glad that we were able to do our part in accomodating the group and making the event successful.  Thanks for pointing out the efforts made by Reychel, Miguel, Eldred, and Abraham.  They will appreciate receiving such recognition from a guest like yourself.    Again I am so pleased that your event went well, and that you enjoyed the facilities and services we offer to all of our guests.  Best wishes,

Summary: I stay at his hotel and always enjoy it.  The staff at the hotel is absolutely the best.  Mijail makes you feel welcome when you check in each time and lets you know how your business is appreciated.  He follows up with you throughout the stay to make sure everything is just right.  Sergio and Jerry will make sure that you are well taken care of if you go to the bar to relax.  They are both personable and fun.  It is quite apparent how good they are as the bar is always busy and lively.  I typically east my meals in my room Jessie, Juan, and the rest of the room service team do a great job.  They always deliver the food hot and never forget a thing.  Finally, although I do not know everyone on the housekeeping staffs names, they sure do a great job.  The hotel is always
Manager Response: Dear Tad,  It was wonderful to read your nice comments regarding our service staff and your recent stay at our hotel.  It means so much to us when we hear that our return guests are so pleased with the hotel and the service we provide.  Our staff's philosophy is to treat every geust the way they would like to be treated if they were the customer.  And it's particularly rewarding to hear from you and others that they are doing so.    Thanks so much for your kind words about Mijail who is one of our service champions.  And of course Sergio and Jerry are terrific at the bar in keeping ours guests served and entertained.  Jessie and Juan are among the Room Service staff who ensure that your food is hot and brought promptly to your room, and our Housekeeping staff take a great deal of pride in the cleanliness of the rooms and overall property.  I'm very proud of them and love hearing that our guests appreciate them too.  I look forward to your next visit with us soon.  Best regards,

Summary: Overall I had a great stay. The staff was very friendly and professional, the room was clean and comfortable and the breakfast buffet was excellent. I was a little concerned about the hotel's proximity to John Wayne airport but the noise was moderate and there are no flights after 10:00 PM. My only complaint about this Hilton was the lack of an executive lounge. When I made the reservation I specifically booked an executive floor room expecting access to the executive lounge. I even paid a higher rate for the room. Miguel gave me breakfast coupons at check-in to compensate me, which was appreciated but I still felt the hotel misrepresented the establishment by posting executive floor rates.
Manager Response: Joe,  Thank you for taking the time to provide your thoughts in response to your stay with us earlier this month.  It is a great help to us to hear from our guests in regard to how they view our amenities and services.  I am pleased that you enjoyed your visit and found the staff and facilities to your liking.  I do apologize about the misunderstanding regarding the Executive Floor.  We eliminated the lounge on the floor nearly five years ago.  I am glad that Mijail was able to help you with the situation.  Again thanks for your kind comments.  Best wishes,

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel, and I would agree with previous reviews it is a bit overpriced.  However, the service was incredible.  The breakfast is fabulous and the staff is incredibly helpful and happy.  Jorge, a waiter during breakfast, was one of the best waiter's I have ever had in any establishment.  He anticipated every need and was very warm and welcoming.  This property gets an A++++ in regard to their hiring choices.  As for the facilities they are very nice.  Everything is very clean and comfortable.  The only complaint is that it can be a little noisy if you are on the side closest to the airport.  But the planes stop taking off at around 10PM, so it is not so bad.  Overall, I would definitely come back again.
Manager Response: Dear Nova,  Thank you so much for taking the time to offer your comments on your recent stay with us.  I am so glad that you were pleased with the hotel and the services we have to offer.  The great breakfast we offer has become very popular with all of our guests, and I am certainly glad that you enjoyed it so much as well.  All of our servers work very hard to please our guests, and we are very proud of Jorge and the manner in which he performs his job.  He truly enjoys helping his customers with anything they need and will be very pleased to know that his efforts are appreciated by you.    Best regards,

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel, all though way over priced the service was just on point. Checked in at the front desk was swift, the clerk Miguel was very informative about hotel amenities and surrounding entertainment, he was very upbeat overall a pleasant guy. Now lets get to the room it self, Over all it was very clean but quite outdated for the price! The hotel common areas were also very clean and staff was very hospitable. Would definitely repeat my stay if not for the over priced stay.....
Manager Response: Dear Jessie,  Thank you for your recent comments regarding your stay at the hotel.  It's very nice to hear that  you found the accomodations to your liking and were pleased with the cleanliness of the hotel and its rooms.   It was great to hear how pleased you were with Miguel's service during your visit.  He is an exceptional team member who truly represents the kind of service we try to give to every guest, and his enthusiasm is an inspiration to all of us.  We hope you will be back to see us soon.    Best regards,

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for one night and they gave gold member a free drink card as well as a free breakfast coupon.  I have breakfast pretty regularly at all of the hotels I stay at (I travel weekly for work) and this was the MOST AMAZING buffet I have ever had.  The coffee was delicious, the omelet was really tasty (I think they actually used fresh eggs), and they had the most amazing fresh tomatoes with fresh mozzarella, pesto, and smoked salmon on top of them, and the BACON pieces were actually thick cuts and fried to perfection. The breakfast staff was friendly and attentive (thanks Betty for giving me the tripadvisor card:)) I was so happy!  The room was really nice and the bathroom really clean, and the gym facility was huge with plenty of machines for everyone. Didn't
Manager Response: Dear Jamie,   Thank you for your comments about our amazing breakfast. I'm so glad you had the opportunity to enjoy it during your stay with us. We feel it is a far cry from the average hotel breakfasts you find when traveleing, and our service staff takes great pride in presenting it to our valued guests like yourself. Your kind words regarding Betty's efforts are nice to hear, and I know she will appreciate it as well.   We're very pleased that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay, and look forward to your next visit when your travel plans bring you back to the Orange County area.   Best regards,

Summary: I had a great stay.. I came from out of town for a business trip..and i felt like I was at home. The hotel was very clean and the staff there was nice..Miguel at the front desk kept me laughing ,  and very friendly. I would come stay there again since its right across the street from the airport..
Manager Response: Thanks for your comments and especially your kind words about Miguel.  He truly enjoys providing exceptional service to our guests, not only upon their arrival at the Front desk but throughout their entire stay with us.  He goes out of his way to assist our guests in so many ways, and it's very nice to hear that you appreciated his efforts and felt at home here.  I hope you have the opportunity to be with us again soon.  We look forward to your return.  Best regards,

Summary: I always stay at the Hilton Irvine in Orange County.  It is located right across from the John Wayne airport...great for early morning flights back home.  Recently I had someone ask me why stay at the airport?  Orange County has many beautiful hotels near the ocean.  I replied I stay at the Hilto Irvine because of the staff.  Gary is the valet employee who welcomes me every morning with my car ready to go.  I dont even have to call first.  Betty works every morning and provides coffee, juice, to go containers, whatever I want from the buffett.  George ad Sergio  work the bar area and are awesome as well.  I am telling you the staff here is the best!  Rooms are nice as well, workout facility great, and outdoor area around the pool is nice.  Thanks to all the great employees at
Manager Response: Dear Donna,  Thank you so much for your wonderful comments regarding your recent stay at the hotel.  It sounds like you enjoyed all of the facilities and of course the convenience of the location as well.    It was particularly heartwarming to see your comments about our staff.  Gary in valet is of course wonderful, and so attentive to our guests.  Betty is there every morning ensuring that all of our geusts get a great breakfast and start to their day.  She is amazing.  And George and Sergio make the bar a great place to unwind from the day, and are always going out of their way to make everyone comfortable.  We are truly blesses with a terriffic staff, and I am so pleased when I hear that from guest like yourself.  Thank you again.  I hope we will see you again when you visit us from KC.    Best regards,

Summary: The Hilton Orange County Airport is a nice, business class hotel. The front staff was fast, friendly and efficient.  The room was large, had a big bed with lots of pillows, good tread count on the sheets, and quite comfortable.  The room had a large flat screen TV, with lots of channels, and free WiFi.  The room is showing its age (popcorn ceiling) but otherwise is perfectly acceptable.  The bathroom had a tub/shower combination,  granite counter tops, and a full set of amenities; it was a little on the small side, but certainly adequate.  The only real criticism is that my room did not have the super-soundproofing that a hotel across from the airport should , and helicopters are too noisy.   Parking is expensive at $18 a day, but if you do not mind the inconvenience, you can
Manager Response: Thanks so much for your informative review about your recent stay with us.  It appears that you were pleased with the amenities and facilities of the hotel, and found the location to be very convenient for your needs.    It was nice to hear also that you appreciated both the service and the great attitude of our Front Desk staff.  They are a great group and a great asset to the hotel, and will greatly appreciate your comments.  I hope you will be back to see us soon as your business travel brings you again to the Irvine area.  Best regards,

Summary Heading: Great Hotel and food!  Really, really unresponsive sales staff.
Summary: I had a one night stay here for a conference and was very impressed.  The hotel is literally right across the street from the airport- you can walk there.  All the staff I interacted with were wonderful and helpful.    The room was nothing special; in fact it was a bit small.  However, it was extremely clean and well appointed.  Everything was arranged perfectly and it was quite peaceful.  The sleep was excellent- I was on a high floor facing the courtyard.  I'm guessing that the courtyard rooms are better than the outside facing rooms in terms of quiet.    The fitness room was well appointed.  Despite the hotel being sold out, it didn't feel too crowded.    The conference facilities were great.  Everything flowed well and was comfortable.    The food was amazing at the only
Manager Response: Dear TD Business, We appreciate your positive commments regarding the hotel in general and apologize for the lack of response from our sales team. That is inexcusable in our business and I am not quite sure how it could have happened as we monitor our phones throughout the day . Next time you are in town, please feel free to contact me directly ---  Pia Sanders, Director of Sales & Marketing

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel several times and have never been disappointed.  I normally stay at this location because it is so convenient to the airport; but I know I will stay here in the future due to the enthusiastic staff and great service!!  I was in town for a business meeting and received an email with a presentation I needed to print out.  Miguel at the front desk was so helpful - he printed the document for me (all 40 pages!) and was eager to help me!  THANK YOU MIGUEL!!!
Manager Response: Dear Randi H.,  Many thanks for the wonderful feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I'm thrilled to hear you enjoy our hotel, our amazing staff and our services.  I must say I am surrounded by a terrific group of team members who truly want to make your stay exceptional and Miguel does just that at every opportunity.     Thank you once again.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Excellent customer service. Jorge was wonderful. He gave a great service in the restaurant. Very quick and courteous. Sergio was awesome!! What a great bartender. He can remember his customers and their drinks. Super friendly people and very nice and clean inside the hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Cindy B.,  I would like to express my sincere appreciation for the wonderful comments regarding your recent experience at our hotel.  Many of our Team members (such as Sergio and Jorge) are tenured and greatly enjoy their jobs which often results in memorable moments for our guests.  I am happy to hear that their outstanding service made a difference and to their credit did not go unnoticed.  Many thanks again.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: 1) Nice and Good Location; however next to airport ! (B+) 2) $18 for parking per day (D+) 3) Valet Parking staffs are terrible .... (Service is worst) (F) 4) Cleaning Staff are really nice and friendly! (A++) 5) Always great Deal about price (A+)
Manager Response: Dear Terry L.,   I would like to thank you for the candid feedback regarding your experience at our hotel.  I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed some of our amenities and the service of our housekeeping team.  I do regret to hear the Valet staff was not as accommodating and I have since shared you comments with the appropriate Manager.  Please accept my sincere apologies.  Once again thank you.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will give us another opportunity to better serve you.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I always have a good stay at this Hilton hotel.  They have a very friendly staff, great service and very good food.     My favorite is their breakfasat buffet.   Today I had a fantastic lunch with Betty as my server.   Mahi Mahi was incredible.    They also have a outdoor pool, easy access to the airport, etc.  The GYM is nice, treadmills, weights,etc.   You can also get to local places via access to 405 freeway.      Overall a place that is great for business travelers like myself.
Manager Response: Dear Sean C.,  We sincerely appreciate the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am pleased to hear that as a frequent guest, you continue to find our staff and amenities to your complete satisfaction.    The Mahi Mahi is one of our signature dishes and I would be remiss if I did not recommend the Char Broiled Chicken for next time.  Betty is a true asset to our Team and I am confident she will provide the same level of service on your next visit.  Once again thank you.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Clean modern rooms, best rate., hot Asian girl front desk.
Summary: Clean modern rooms.  Lowest priced four star hotel in Orange County with prestigious Hilton brand to boot.   Ms. Donna the hot asian front desk is courteous , professional, with a million dollar smile. WOW!
Manager Response: Dear AtlanticFinancial,  Thank you for the positive feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  We are a terrific value in the market and glad to hear you enjoyed our amenities.  I do believe our greatest asset is our associates who are committed to providing you a warm, welcoming experience.  Donna is a star here in her own right and a true asset to our Team.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County at the Airport.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel, Great Staff, Great Location!
Summary: This hotel had great beds, the breakfast is good.  Every Wednesday They have a sushi bar which is fun!  The hotel is nice.  They do a good job of making you feel at home.  I needed to extend my stay and while the hotel was sold out they went the extra mile to find me a room.  The Director of housing is a class act that always welcomed you in the morning and had a smile for everyone! She is a gem!  I stay at hundreds of hotels each year.  I am at the top tier of a couple of chains including Diamond at Hilton and can recognize good service when I see it!  Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Jason7897,  I read with great pleasure of your experience at our hotel recently.  I am happy to hear you were fortunate to enjoy our Sushi Bar as I feel this is a truly unique feature of our hotel.  And they do serve great Sushi.    I have since shared your comments with the entire Team and they are very pleased to know they made a difference.  Our Director of Rooms is a wonderful woman who embodies service above everything else.  She is a true asset to our Team.  Thank you once again for your continued loyalty and if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I am a frequent traveler and stay at this particular property a great deal.   As a Diamond member, I expect the best -- and I get the best in the quality of the people who work here.   They are dedicated, friendly, and make me feel welcomed.   The food is great.. ambiance of the restaurant and bar engaging, and I have enjoyed getting to know the staff - Jorge, Ruben, Daniel et. al.  over the years.  If the property would address the noisy air conditioner units in the rooms, it would get 5 stars from me.   The people are first rate!
Manager Response: Dear Jim F,  Thank you kindly for the wonderful comments regarding your experience at our hotel during your recent visits.  It's fantastic to hear we've earned your loyalty through our efforts.  The Restaurant/Lounge Team are a pretty dynamic crew and I'm pleased to hear they make your stays that much more memorable.  In general our entire team is committed to extending our very best to every guest, every day, every stay.  I have shared your noise concerns with our Chief Engineer and will certainly be looking at ways to improve this.  Once again, thank you for the positive feedback.  The team definitley enjoys hearing they've made a difference. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The service from the staff was excellent, the rooms were very clean and the food and dining was great. There were 3 specific individuals who made our stay fantastic - Daniel Martinez, Jorge Mateo and Ruben Jovve. Thier level of service in the dining area was fantastic. I am a diamond member of the Hilton Honors programs and this hotel was a living example of why I continue to stay with Hilton!!! My expereince was fantastic. Thanks HILTON IRVINE TEAM!!!
