Manager Response: Dear Jeffry B,  Wow!  I am thrilled to read your great feedback regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed our accommodations, services and amenities.  As you may have read from recent comments, our Restaurant/Lounge staff is dynamic!  They truly want to make every guest experience a memorable one and clearly they did not disappoint.  Once again, thank you and if travels bring you to Irvine, CA again we hope you will choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: My first time at this Hilton, and I was not disappointed. Jorge and his associates on the morning restaurant staff welcomed us and made sure we were well taken care of. Our entire experience of all the hotel had to offer to us was positive.
Manager Response: Dear HiFlyer21,  Thank you kindly for the positive comments regarding your stay at our hotel.  I am pleased to hear your experience was made memorable by the service you received in our restaurant by Jorge and the entire morning team.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated and if travels bring you once again to Irvine, CA, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I have stayed at this property on a number of accsions over the past 20+ years and have never been dissapointed. The staff are some of the best and the facility is pleasant, really convenient to Santa Anna (John Wayne) Airport. There is not a better hotel in this area.
Manager Response: Dear Keith d,  Thank you very much for the wonderful feedback regarding your experience at our hotel.  I am very pleased to hear we keep exceeding your expectations time and again that we have earned your loyalty.    I do have a pretty dynamic team and I can assure you their primar focus is to ensure the comfort and complete satisfaction of our valued guests.  Thank you once again for your continued patronage.  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Jorge and his fellow servers are a very welcoming morning restaurant staff. Even at 6:00 am, they welcome every hotel guest with a smile and a greeting. And for those of us who are regular visitors, they have mastered the ability to remember guest names and any individual preferences. They are great ambassadors for the hotel. Although Irvine has many hotels to choose from, I stay at this hotel quite often due to the exceptional front desk and restaurant staff. With the John Wayne airport shutting down late at night, one can enjoy a quiet sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Great2TravelICA,  Thank you kindly for the very positive feedback regarding your stay at our hotel.  I’m happy to hear that despite the many choices in hotels, you continue to frequent our hotel.  Our Restaurant Team is very tenured and strive to make a difference.  Because I share these comments with all team members, they are pleased to know they do.  Ditto for our Front Desk Team.    Your comments are greatly appreciated and truly valued.  Thank you once again and we look forward to welcoming  you back very soon.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Even though I gave the hotel property a "very good" rating, I would rate the staff and service an "excellent" 5 star.  The property is nice and modernized as best as possible in an older building (low ceilings, small hallways) but the staff and service certainly compensated for the structure.  The morning and lunch breakfast servers were friendly and respectful and accommodated special requests.  One server, Jerry, especially took time and effort to make guests feel welcomed and appreciated.  Thank you for a great vacation experience.
Manager Response: Dear Carolbb07  Thank you kindly for the very positive feedback regarding your stay at our hotel.  I have shared your comments with the Team and they are very pleased they were able to make your experience a memorable one.  Our entire Team is certainly committed to ensuring the comfort and satisfaction of our valued guests.    Incidentally, Jerry was selected as our employee of the year so It’s not surprising the level of service you received from him.  I will be sure to give him Kudos.    Thank you once again, and if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, either on business or vacation, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County  Airport  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Mid-Level, Airport Hotel - Not Your Typical Hilton
Summary: My 3-star rating is based on comparing this hotel to others in the Hilton chain.  In comparison with other airport hotels, this hotel would rate 4 stars.  Checking in, we asked about airport noise, because the hotel is a few hundred yards from the runways.  The reception clerk said, "All our rooms are quiet.  We wouldn't be in business if our rooms weren't quiet, now would we?"  Ah.  Now we understood why there was nobody in the forecourt when we arrived - no parking valets, no bell staff, nobody.  The policy of the management of this Hilton must be "if you can't ignore the guests, be rude to them."  The rooms are adequate, with comfortable bed and lounge chair, good-size desk, and floor-to-ceiling windows and sliding glass door.  (High-rise building, so no balconies.)  Airport
Manager Response: Dear RThyme,  Thank you for the candid feedback regarding your experience at our hotel.   Please accept my sincere apologies that your experience was less than desirable.  I would like to assure you that your comments are very important to me and I have since shared them with the Team.  Our goal is always to provide Hilton world class service and I am truly sorry we fell short this time.  While highly regretful of your perception, we hope that you will allow us the opportunity to serve you once again in the near future so that we may demonstrate our commitment to providing exceptional guest service, every day, every stay.  I was happy to read that you enjoyed our accommodations and convenience to the airport. Maybe the next time you will have an opportunity to explore the many wonderful sights and attractions available in the area.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: This is an excellent hotel.  Nice fresh rooms with a  great bed.  Extremely convenient across from John Wayne Orange county airport.   Check in staff was very efficient.   Breakfast was terrific and the dining room staff was one of the best.   Very attentive and pleasant.  Jorge was our waiter both mornings we were there and he went way out of his way to make our meals special.   We really liked the location as it was one block off the 405, two minutes from the 55,57 and 22 so you can get pretty much anywhere with ease.    This will be our new California stay from here out.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah H.,  I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed a wonderful time during your stay at our hotel.  Your positive comments are greatly and sincerely appreciated.  I have since shared your feedback with the Team (including Jorge) and I am delighted we lived up to our goal - Your comfort and complete satisfaction.    The convenience of our hotel is unparalleled and our Team here is also quite special.  Thank you once again.  We hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, that you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  We look forward to seeing you.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I've stayed here for work several times - including working nights and sleeping during the day - and the beds are exceptionally comfortable, the hotel's quiet, and the blackout curtains are great.  All of the staff are very helpful, friendly and personable; there's a great selection of food for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, and the bar has a good atmosphere.  The parking is expensive, but you're 5 minutes walk from an international airport - what do you expect?  Sometimes they do deals which package together room, parking, breakfast, and wi-fi - well worth having a look on their website to see what offers are on.
Manager Response: Dear Stuart J.,  Thank you kindly for the wonderful comments regarding your stay at our hotel.  I never tire of hearing when guests have a great experience and then tell about it.  We do have a pretty awesome team here at the Hilton Irvine and we always look forward to providing a positive experience for all of our guests.  I have to agree with you that our location is ideal not only to John Wayne Orange County Airport but to so many local attractions.  I do hope you got to enjoy some of our lovely sights.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope that you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed there twice. Clean rooms. Good service. Very nice breakfast -- great omelet chefs -- and great food service staff. Recommend very highly. Jorge is an excellent waiter btw. The bar team is very good as well.
Manager Response: Dear Funnydood,  Thank you for the great comments regarding your stay at our hotel.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed our friendly service and omelet station which is very popular among many of our guests.  I have conveyed your kind comments to the Team (and Jorge) and hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: It was clean and felt safe but expensive and nothing special.
Summary: I recently stayed two nights for work. Parking was almost $20 per night. When I checked in, they had me in a 2double room when I had reserved a king. After a call down and a bit of a wait on hold, they brought up another room key and were able to get me the king I paid for. The room was clean and comfortable. Room service was friendly and tasted great. The bar area was nice as well. Internet cost almost $13 and the rooms were $$$ to begin with. I book rooms for groups for work and will look elsewhere next time.
Manager Response: Dear Amie S.,  We greatly appreciate your feedback regarding your stay at our hotel.  I am truly sorry that you had less than a memorable experience due in part to parking and internet fees but please know our commitment to service excellence remains firm.    You mention you book groups for your company and we would love to assist you.  Please feel free to call me direct.  Once again, many thanks for your candid comments.  I do hope you allow us an opportunity to better serve you in the future.  I am confident that we can make a difference.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Spent 2 nights here for a conference we held on-site.  Valet staff were very courteous (price is not cheap, but comparable for being this close to airport).  Check in staff were more than helpful - gave me a free upgrade to their Executive Level which includes free wifi and nicer appointments.  Not much noise from the airport - convenient to many restaurants and they offer free shuttle service.  Overall I would definitely stay at this Hilton whenever I'm in the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Dear Calsur,  Thank you kindly for the very positive feedback regarding your stay at our hotel.  I am pleased to hear you were met with amazing hospitality from our Valet Team  to our Guest Services including our shuttle service.  Our location is ideally situated and central to many attractions, restaurants, etc. so I'm also happy that you enjoyed this benefit too.  I'm sure the upgrade was a nice treat.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine Orange County Airport.  Warmest regards,

Summary: I stayed at this property on 1-10-13.   Upon check in Miguel at the front desk told me he could not honor AAA discount since they are close to capacity!!!!  I thought that was a strange policy so I asked for the manager and found out that there is no truth to what Miguel said.  Overall both Miguel and Andrea Anderson were rude.   The property is dated and not up to standard of its competitors.   Within a 2 mile radius there is Fairmont, Marriott, and a Hyatt that are much, much better in terms of the property and service, for essentially the same money.  I live local and have stayed at all these properties dozens of times.  Go to Marriott on von Karmen or Fairmont a mile down the street for a much better hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Keyvank1,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your experience at our hotel.  I sincerely apologize for our shortcoming in the service department and will certainly address your concern.  As for availability of rates, many times they are predicated on supply and demand and we do adhere to a daily yielding process to ensure we maintain rate integrity.  Our associates are entrusted to carry out these responsibilities, but it appears our delivery was not consistent with our service standard, and for that I am truly sorry.   I hope that if travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, that you would allow us another opportunity to better serve you.    Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: A bit dated feel but decent value and close to JW Airport
Summary: Provided nice hhonors greeting and waters/vouchers at check in.  Hhonors floor 7 was high enough to be quiet which was great being so close to airport.  The floor was also undergoing renovation in elevator area during my stay.  Lobby area and cafe was nice and updated.  Pool area and patio felt old.  I think the interior upgrades will improve overall feel of the property.  Why the average rating?  Hotel still had a work in progress feel to it.  Double beds were surprisingly uncomfortable and small.  Self parking charge of $19 seemed a bit high.  Internet access was spoty.
Manager Response: Dear Spi-kids_LA,  Thank you for the candid review of our hotel. I am very happy to hear you enjoyed many aspects of it during your stay and certainly respect the areas you felt we need improvement.  I would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced as a result of any repairs being made while you were here but I can assure you all improvements are made with you, our valued, guest in mind.  I have shared your comments with the Team and will address the areas of concern indicated. Once again, thank you for your feedback and if travels bring you once again to Irvine, CA we hope that you will once again chose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  Warm Regards,

Summary Heading: I think they are running on a dial-up modem. No joke.
Summary: Very stylish lobby, I thought i was in for a treat. But that was pretty much the high note. Rooms are average, nothing to brag about. I do want to mention that they have huge flatscreen TVs, maybe even 50". Hotel is located across from the John Wayne airport. It is convenient for overnight stays.  Now the bad. The in-room wireless internet constantly cuts in and out. Even when it is in, the internet is slow. I think i just went back to the 90s because it feels like i am running on a choppy dial-up modem that loses connection every 3 minutes. With the advancement of wireless routers coupled with their rapid drop in price, there is no excuse for a hilton brand hotel in the city to have this level of internet access.  I will NOT return to this hotel on business. With everything
Manager Response: Dear Jason T,  Thank you very much for your feedback regarding your stay at our hotel.  Please accept my sincerer apologies for the inconvenience of a spotty internet  and lack of service you experienced.  It is our intent to ensure the comfort and satisfaction of every guest  and certainly acknowledge valued Diamond members such as yourself.  I have shared your comments with the Team and will address all the concerns indicated in continued efforts to improve our product and services.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA again, we hope you will give us another opportunity to demonstrate our commitment.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel and it's staff is amazing!! They took care of all my needs for the night. If I checked their prices online prior to making other reservations elsewhere, I would have stayed there every night rather than stay elsewhere. They had an incredible room that was spacious and had excellent water pressure. Other hotels did not compare to the Hilton in Irvine, California.  I was able to use the Internet in the lobby without a cost. The breakfast buffet was delectable as it came with an omelet station, which allowed the diner to choose various toppings to add to the entree. The server Betty took care of all my needs during the meal as did the hotel staff. I would highly recommend the Hilton chain for your stays in southern california!
Manager Response: Dear N W,  Thank you very much for your positive review of our hotel.  I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed the many aspects of our facility from our warm and professional guest services, well appointed accommodations and our highly acclaimed omelet station.  I must say that feature is a real treat to many and glad you had the opportunity to enjoy it.   Should  travels bring you once again to Irvine, CA, we hope that you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County.  We look forward to welcoming you back.  Best wishes for a bright and prosperous New Year!

Summary Heading: Very Nice and Close to AIrport
Summary: This hotel is located across form the John Wayne Airport. Great location for business travel. Food and service were good. Would stay here again. On-site parking is expensive however but they have a free shuttle to/from the airport.
Manager Response: Dear InterntlTraveler10,  Thank you kindly for the great review of our hotel.  I am happy to hear you truly enjoyed our location and our services.    If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope that you will once again choose the Hiton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  Wishing you and yours a Bright, Healthy and Prosperous New Year!

Summary Heading: Didn't live up to the Hilton brand and noisy
Summary: I stayed at this property on the recommendation of a co-worker. Upon checking and requesting a quiet room, I was able to get access to my room around noon which was a nice accommodation. Upon entering my room I noticed that there was a lot of hair on the floor of the bathroom and in the tub. I called down to the front desk to inform them and they stated they would send housekeeping up. That worked for me as I was leaving the property for a work meeting. I returned at 10:00 pm to find that housekeeping never came to my room. The next morning at 8:30 there was banging and pounding around my room which I initially thought was housekeeping in a room around me. I looked out my window to find construction workers removing part of the siding of the building right below my room. I had
Manager Response: Dear Travelseeker1125,  First and foremost please accept my sincere apologies for your less than memorable stay at our hotel.  I read with dismay the many areas we failed you and for that I am truly sorry. I have shared your comments with the Team and with the appropriate department heads to ensure similar incidents are avoided and we are consistently providing quality service to you, our valued guest, every day, every stay.   Your feedback is invaluable to us in our continuing efforts to ensure we are adhering to the Hilton principles and more importantly that we are meeting your standard and your satisfaction.  I hope that if travels bring  you to Irvine, CA again, you will give us another opportunity and if you contact me direct, I am happy to give your reservation my personal attention.  Warmest Regards and all the best to you and yours for a Bright, Healthy and Prosperous New Year!

Summary: You can walk from the airport ( across the street ) or they will come and pick you up. Close to South Coast Plaza and easy freeway access.  Room was large and the bed warm and comfy. Another nice Hilton hotel.
Manager Response: Dear ChrisandHolli,  Thank you kindly for your great review of our hotel and services.  I do agree that we are ideally situated not only to John Wayne Airport but to so many attractions and much more.   I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We hope that if travels bring you to  Irvine, CA again you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  All the best for a bright and prosperous New Year!

Summary Heading: Great Hilton very convenient to Orange County Airport!
Summary: This Hilton was perfect.  I flew into orange County Airport for a 2 day meeting at another hotel in the vicinity.  Once I landed, I was able to easily walk to this Hilton from the airport within 5 minutes.  I checked in early (thank you!) and was provided with water, my bonus Hilton points as a Diamond member, and a free drink coupon.  The concierge was very friendly and offered me directions to the other Hotel where my meeting was (Marriott Hotel).  The walk was quick, and safe, and I appreciated the exercise, although the Hilton also has a complimentary shuttle.  It is much safer to walk around here than at LAX hotel locations, and there are plenty of sidewalks which make it safe for pedestrians.  There are also many local restaurants around the Hilton Hotel Area.  After my
Manager Response: Dear ckckckckckck,  Thank you very much for the kind comments regarding your recent stay at out hotel.  I am extremely pleased to hear that our many features starting with our warm hospitality, amenities, location all met with your complete satisfaction.  I know our staff will be delighted to know they were part of your memorable experience.  Should travels bring you to the Irvine, CA area again, we sincerely hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport. Many thanks again!  Wishing you and yours a very Warm and Happy Holiday Season!

Summary: I have stayed in the Hilton by John Wayne airport in Irvine now 4 times, and each time I have been impressed by the down home and friendly service.  The rooms are nice size with modern electronics, the bar is very casual, and breakfast buffett excellent; either full cooked to  order or buffett with lighter fruit and yogart option.  Plus, close to 405, resturants, gas, and shopping.
Manager Response: Dear Jerry P.,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am very happy to hear our friendly service and outstanding amenities are key reasons for your return visits.  I must agree that our location and proximity to the airport, attractions and shopping venues are a big plus.  Should travels continue to bring you to this area, we sincerely hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.       Wishing you and yours a Warm and Happy Holiday Season!

Summary: Just a had a quick business trip to Orange County. This property is as convenient as it gets for Airport and Freeway Access to everything in central Orange County. Rooms were, spacious, appeared to have been recently renovated.Staff was professional and friendly. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Ted R,  Thank you kindly for the positive comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel.  I am extremely pleased our services, staff and our location met with your complete satisfaction.  It was certainly our pleasure to serve you.  Should  travels bring you to the Orange County area again, I sincerely hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County at the Airport.  Wishing you and yours a very Warm and Happy Holiday Season!!

Summary: We got a good price for two nights. We were taking our daughter to Disneyland and didn't have a problem driving to the hotel each night--it is not that far.  The great things about this hotel are the price we got, the overall cleanliness, and the friendly staff. The beds and pillows were very comfortable. The couple of things I did dislike were that we were charged $16.00 per night to park our car (I thought they would not charge there--I always try to avoid hotels that do charge) I really think that it is not right for a motel/hotel to charge to park as you are already paying quite a bit to stay there in the first place.  The other things are the night we checked in our bathtub had not been cleaned--it had dirt and a hair in it, and lastly, we should have been given clean
Manager Response: Dear Dieterbean,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your stay at our hotel.  Please accept my sincere apologies for the lack of cleanlines of the bathroom in  your room.  I have shared your comments with the appropriate department team members and will work to avoid similar occurences.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed our services overall and that our location was ideal for your needs.  I do hope that if travels bring you the the Irvine, CA in the near future, you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County at the Airport.  Wishing you and yours a very Warm and Happy Holiday Season!

Summary: You can literally walk to it from airport. Quick airport shuttle service. Most reasonably priced Hilton I've ever stayed in, with -- can you believe it -- free wifi? The room was quiet and sizable. Breakfast was fine, the usual $20 buffet. The gift shop items were more overpriced than in the airport shops. Parking is $16 a day so it's actually cheaper to either pick up your car the next day, or drop it off the night before--even if you have to drive for another day! The airport is small enough that all of this can be done pretty quickly.
Manager Response: Dear Matvox,  Thank you for the kind comments regarding your stay at our hotel.  I am pleased to hear  that our location, rooms and services met with your complete satisfaction.    Should travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, I sincerely hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.    Wishing you and yours a Warm and Happy Holiday Season!

Summary: After driving in from Vegas, could not wait to check in, got to front desk, gave my name, the young person looked at me and said you  do not have a room booked. I gave him a copy of my booking ,  he said ok , i will find you a room, but he would not honor  Arrp discount as he said all those rooms were taken.  I felt like my wife and I were treated as second class customers, it will be a long time before I go back to a Hilton, hello Hampton Inns.
Manager Response: Dear Joe S,  I am sorry to hear that your stay with us was made less than memorable by your experience at checkin.  Please accept my sincere apologies.  I have shared your concerns with the appropriate team members in order to avoid similar occurences.  As a new member to this Team,  I have been impressed by the level of service and commitment of our associates.  If travels do bring you to the Irvine, CA area again, I encourage you to please give us another opportunity to serve you.  I will be sure to give your reservation my personal attention.  Thank you once again for your candid feedback.  Warmest Regards and Happy Holidays!

Summary: The Hilton in Orange County, Irvine is extremely enjoyable. The food is great at the breakfast and the staff are amazing. It was made more enjoyable with my dog being allowed to be with me. It made my business trip AWESOME!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Bcoolbaugh,  Thank you kindly for the nice compliment regarding your stay at our hotel. I am happy to hear it was made that much more enjoyable having your beloved dog with you.    It certainly is our sincere desire to ensure our guests are met with a warm welcome,  bright smiles, and genuine hospitality throughout.    If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County at the Airport.    Warmest Regards and Happy Holidays!

Summary: This hotel is perfectly situated within easy walking distance from the airport. So instead of waiting for a courtesy shuttle you can take a refreshing walk to the hotel. Nice, quiet room with a good bed.  Efficient check in and out.
Manager Response: You are correct, the Hilton Irvine Airport has the best location of all the hotels at John Wayne Airport. I am so glad you had the chance to experience our outstanding property and were able to walk from the airport!!!   Our team here does a simply outstanding job making all guests feel at home! Please make sure you visit us again soon for a relaxing, enjoyable night!!!  Kind Regards,  Ed Burke' General Manager

Summary: My husband and I needed a good rest from a long wonderful week visiting family and friends and we got just that at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport Hotel.  The outside was not overwhelming, but the room more than made up for it. The bed was very comfortable. The chair in the room was awesome. Great internet connection. The only problem we had with the room was the coffeemaker, it did not work to good, it made a mess all over the tray they had thankfuly had placed under it. The lobby was not really my taste, but I was not going to really spend anytime in it, so that was fine by me.  The first staff person who checked us into our room was very matter of fact, doing her job and no more. We had problems with our key trying to get out of the parking so had to have one of the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your outstanding review of the Hilton Hotel Irvine Airport, I am so glad you were able to enjoy your stay with us. Thank you also for your recommedations, i will have my team look into each one. Feedback is a gift, we pride ourselves on listening to all of our guests. Please join us again the next time you are in the area. If you did not get a chance to eat in our restaurant, I highly recommend our Sushi on Wednesday nights...simply outstanding.  Kind Regards,  Ed Burke General Manager

Summary Heading: excellent hotel by John Wayne Airport
Summary: On first glance at the exterior, this looks like a ubiquitous Hilton in Southern California.  But I spent two great days/nights there while working on a project nearby.  After a long flight, I walked 10 minutes at most from the airport to the hotel (shuttle also available) and I walked back for my return flight.  The hotel is very comfortable, nicely updated, and has accommodating staff throughout.  My room was pleasant and very modern.  No airplane noise although they are very close. Coffee and tea in room.  A few restaurants in walking distance and nearby with shuttle.  But I decided to try the hotel's Aura Restaurant my first night, loved it, and ate there the next night as well.  If convenience to the airport is important, I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your outstanding review of the Hilton Hotel Irvine Airport, and of our top notch restaurant!!! I am so glad you were able to enjoy your stay with us. Please join us again the next time you are in the area. The food, I agree, is excellent in our restaurant. I highly recommend our Sushi on Wednesday nights...simply outstanding. Thank you again!  Kind Regards,  Ed Burke General Manager

Summary Heading: Another airport that has totally figured it out
Summary: Walking distance, good fitness center, comfortable rooms, and great beds.  Extremely convenient and customer service oriented.  Restaurant/bar is comfortable and reasonable.  Perfect hotel for ease of travel anywhere in Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your outstanding review of the Hilton Hotel Irvine Airport, I am so glad you were able to enjoy your stay with us. I am so thrilled you enjoyed the restaurant, I highly recommend our Sushi on Wednesday nights...simply outstanding.  Come visit again soon!  Kind Regards,  Ed Burke General Manager

Summary: I stayed overnight at this Hilton in order to catch a morning flight out of John Wayne airport, which is literally across the street.  The hotel provides free shuttle pickup from, but you have to call them first.  Shuttles to the airport run on the half hour.  The trip is really quick due to the proximity.  The room is a typical business-class Hilton.  I was upgraded to one of the upper Executive floors where there was a nice view.  HHonors members take note - unlike many Hiltons, there is no Executive lounge at this property. The bed was quite comfortable.  There is a large TV with some 70-ish channels of which quite a few were actually in high-def.  There is wireless internet offered and the speed was pretty good on the night I was there.  I was going to print my boarding pass
Manager Response: Dear 4959keeton,  Thank you for your  feedback regarding your stay at our hotel. As a new member of this Team, I am quite impressed by the level of service and commitment our associates have towards our guests and I am pleased to hear you enjoyed a good stay overall.  Our location is ideal when traveling in and out of John Wayne airport, as was your case, and I’m glad our shuttle service made your trip seamless.  I am truly sorry that you were under the impression that we charge for boarding passes.  That service is complimentary to all of our guests, as is standard most anywhere now. You are correct, we do not offer HHonors Executive Lounge,  however, we do provide Gold and Diamond HHonors reception the first Wednesday and the third Tuesday of every month.  Please consider this an invitation, if you are a guest of our hotel, during these times.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, we hope that you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County at the Airport.    Wishing you and yours a warm and happy Holiday Season!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Spent 1 night here.  It was nice and quiet. Beds were very comfortable and room was very clean.  The hotel is located close to the 405 and it was very convenient and affordable.  I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear lilizmom,  Thank you kindly for the nice comments regarding your stay at our hotel.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed our warm hospitality, our services and our location which is quite convenient.  As a new member to this team, your feedback is genuinely appreciated.  If travels bring you to Irvine, CA again, we sincerely hope you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  I am confident you will be met with the same hospitality.  Wishing you and and yours a Happy Holiday Season!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Clean room, some wear on the fixtures. Vent in the shower was filthy inside and at eye level as you shower. Rooms with 2 beds have double beds. Double beds? Is this camping? Pool area was clean, area is conveinient. Charging for parking for guests is rude-this is not a city . Our single king bed was comfy. Did not eat here, staff was great.
Manager Response: Dear the5neumanns,  Thank you for the candid feedback regarding your stay at our hotel.  Despite falling short in some areas, I am happy to hear you enjoyed  good stay overall.  I share these comments with our Team in order to improve upon our services.  As a new member to this Team I am highly impressed by the level of commitment of our associates towards our guests.    Should travels bring you to Irvine, CA again, I hope that you will once again choose the Hilton Irvine/Orange County at the Airport as your hotel of choice.  Wishing you and yours a Happy Holiday Season!  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: BEST hotel experience EVER for group function and overnight stay
Summary: I was the sole organizer for my 45th high school reunion for 110 people. I initially chose this hotel to hold the reunion and house my classmates for its location - the proximity to the John Wayne/Orange County Airport, and freeway accessibility, for my classmates' convenience.   However, the experience I had at this hotel FAR exceeded any of my expectations! From the outset, dealing with Elberta Segraves, head of catering, was a pleasure. She was responsive, patient and very helpful to this greenhorn trying to put on her first large function, and professional in every way. Questions were answered, requests granted and she was hugely instrumental in the smoothness of our reunion experience at the hotel. Christina Ruaux, the account manager for catering, flawlessly and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such an OUTSTANDING review of our property, the HIlton Irvine Airport Hotel. We are so glad your reunion was such a success.  A hotel is only as excellent as the staff they bring to help make your memories, I am very proud of the team here, they are true hoteliers!!! Thank you for recognizing them!  I will see you at your next reunion!!!!  Kind Regards,  Ed Burke General Manager

Summary: We only stayed for one night (14 hours to be exact from the time we checked in till w checked out). Friends were getting married in the area and we didn't feel like spending over $100, so Priceline was able to get us the room for $75 after tax and fees plus the $16 overnight parking.   The goods: - Location is perfect for easy access to John Wayne Airport, or just to hop on freeways. Not to mention it's close enough to Diamond Jamboree and Tustin Jamboree Plaza for dining, entertainment, etc etc.   - Beds are extremely comfy. We got two beds, so the Mr and I got our own beds for the night, which was awesome.   - Room is pretty spacious  - Modern and updated decor.   - Check-in and check out process was a breeze.   The Could-Be-Improved: - Customer Service was a hit or miss. We
Manager Response: Dear ZaiZaiLv,  Thank you kindly for the candid feedback regarding the short time spent at our hotel. I'm truly sorry to hear about the misfortunes you encountered - please accept my sincere apologies.   It is through feedback such as yours that we are able to improve upon our services.    As a new member to this Team, I am pleasantly suprised by the level of service and commitment of our associates towards our guests so I will be sure to share your comments.  If travels should bring you to Irvine, CA in the near future, I would like to invite you to once again give the Hilton Irvine/Orange County another opportunity.  I am confident you will find a much improved hospitality experience.  Warmest Regards and Happy Holidays!

Summary: Didnt stay long.  Stayed here on the way to San Diego for one night.  Hotel is nice, rooms are nice.  Staff is very friendly and courteous.  The breakfast was absolutely delicious.  After being a HHonors member for some time now I have never been dissapointed.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Hilton Irvine with Trip Advisor.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your brief overnight stay.   As we do with all Trip Advisor comments, we will be sure to share your positive comments with our entire staff so they know their efforts have been recognized.  The Hilton Irvine's staff takes great pride and care to provide a personalized guest experience in a clean, safe, and friendly environment.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: The Hilton is known for their exceptional service and pristine rooms and this did just that! Friendly staff and up to date decor. Very comfy beds, spacious room, and inviting lobby. We booked this hotel through priceline so we got a killer deal, the only problem was the parking ($16/day). Other than that it was a great trip. They have a restaurant inside the hotel that is a lil pricey but has very tasty dinner and brunch. Also very close to Huntington and Newport beach, where we spent most of our time :)
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Hilton Irvine with Trip Advisor.   The Hilton Irvine is located in the heart of Orange County just across the street from John Wayne Airport.  The hotel is close to shopping, beaches, and just a few miles from UCI.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our comfortable beds, modern lobby, and friendly staff.  We look forward to your next visit to the Hilton Irvine.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: I was pleasantly surprised that this was a great hilton hotel because it is right across the street from the airport. (Generally these types of hotels are very limited)  We stayed here for a wedding and the rooms/staff we very friendly! Amenities were nice and new!  I would definitely stay here again :)  The bartender makes great mojitos! thanks Luis!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post about your recent stay on Trip Advisor.   As you mention, the Hilton Irvine is not your typical airport property.  The Hilton Irvine offers a unique, modern feel that is highlighted by its inviting lobby, friendly staff, and clean rooms.    We are glad to hear you enjoyed your wedding weekend.    Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel because of the staff!
Summary: I stayed in 2 rooms (one wheelchair accessible) with my family for a four day weekend recently and had an amazing time. The hotel itself is typical of a better than average airport hotel, but the staff was awesome. Jordan at the front desk, Jesus the shuttle driver, and really all of the hotel staff that we encountered went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. The front desk staff was extremely helpful with directions, places to go, arranging shuttle service and getting good rooms. I asked Jordan if there were any rooms with a nice view and he changed the rooms that were originally reserved for us without another word. We had courtyard views and an awesome skyline. I had a great long weekend because of the service at this hotel. I would definitely stay again in the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize the staff of the Hilton Irvine on Trip Advisor.  In particular, we will be sure to thank both Jordan and Jesus for their efforts.  Our front desk staff spends considerable to time and effort to ensure all of our guests are well cared for.  I am extremely happy to hear Jordan and our entire team at the front desk made a positive impact on your stay.  As you mention, the Hilton Irvine is centrally located in the heart of Orange County, just across the street from John Wayne Airport.   We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Overall the staff was very pleasant. Front desk staff was outstanding. You need to watch out for the bartender as his drink prices change as the night goes on. The Saturday breakfast was good but communication was lacking. One lady chased down a patron to pay for his meals when he had already paid, not even an appology to him. They placed a hold on my card for incidentals, 10 days later not released and the accounting department will not return calls.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience on Trip Advisor with our hotel.  We appreciate you bringing these items to our attention and will be sure to investigate what occurred during your visit.  These are definitely not typical issues for our hotel.  We apologize our accounting staff did not get back to you as they should have.  As a note, credit card companies normal release the hold within 24-48 hours of the card being charged.  However, if the card was a debit card, the hold from the bank can take 7-10 days.  Feel free to contact me directly at (949) 812-3737 to discuss your stay further.   Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Exceptional front desk personnel and service team members in restaurant and lounge who remember and acknowledge repeat guests; great breakfast; great rooms; great hilton honors receptions and very attentative management. Beds are comfortable and rooms are very clean and spacious. Overall wonderful hotel. Hotel is directly across the street from the John Wayne airport in Orange County, CA and in close proximity to many businesses and amenities. I stay at this hotel many nights throughout the year and it is one my favorite Hiltons in the US.
Manager Response: Thank you for feedback regarding your experiences at the Hilton Irvine.   We are happy to hear our staff has made such a positive impression on you during your visits to the property.  Our team takes great pride and care in providing a memorable experience.  We are also glad you had an opportunity to enjoy one of our many Hilton HHonors receptions.    We thank you for being our guest and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The sound insulation in this hotel is so bad that you hear every one of your neighbors flushing their toilets, and it's LOUD.  A neighbor's phone rang with a wake up call, and it woke me up.  It was so loud, I would have sworn it was the phone in my room ringing!  Even after putting in earplugs (after being woken at 6:30am by flushing toilets), I had one of the worst night's sleep in a hotel I've ever had.  I expected much better from a Hilton.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding the noise issues during your stay.  Noise is definitely not a typical issue, considering our hotel is very close to an airport.  As well, it is also unusual to have issues with neighboring room noise.   We offer our sincerest apologies that you did not receive the comfortable sleep you would expect from a Hilton.  Please feel free to call me directly at (949) 812-3737 so I can work to make amends for this sleepless evening.  We will do our best to have you as a guest again in the future.

Summary: Great location to airport. Clean typical Hilton quality. Quiet area perfect for the business traveler. Bar was clean quiet. Would certainly stay here again.  Highly recommended. Only problem is parking costs but pretty typical I think of near to airport parking for most hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your  positive experience at the Hilton Irvine.  The Hilton Irvine is conveniently located in the heart of Orange County close to John Wayne Airport, Beaches, Theme Parks, and Everything else Southern California has to offer.   We are glad our staff was able to create a lasting memory for you.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: We just spent one night at this hotel.  Came into the area for a family wedding.  Hotel set up a group rate for wedding guests.  Very nice to save the extra$$.  They hotel also offered a discount on the parking.  Still a little irked at cost for hotel parking anyway. Kind of like the resort fee thing in Las Vegas.  Just another way to get extra $$ out of a traveler.  But that being said, the hotel is very nice.  Staff were very welcoming and the rooms are very nice.  These are older hotel rooms so they are small but seem to have been redone recently. We stayed in an accessible room which was nice with comfortable beds.  Small space made things a little harder to manage with a wheelchair guest but nothing that couldn't be handled.  Bathroom was fairly large so that was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with Trip Advisor about your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine. We are pleased to hear your experience at the Hilton Irvine was a positive one.  As you mention, the hotel does charge for parking.   This charge has become necessary due to the scarcity of parking in the Irvine Airport Area and the need to protect parking availability for our guests.    The staff of the Hilton Irvine prides itself on providing a memorable experience in a unique hotel environment. Our location is perfect for anyone visiting the Orange County area for a wedding weekend.    We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel from August 8th - August 11 this year (2012) and every encounter with front desk staff was not of normal "Hilton quality". The first night, we got in really late so I don't know if the staff member who checked us in was tired or what... but he was mumbly and not friendly and didn't make eye contact or smile at all. The 2nd night, I went to get a bottle of soda from the little shop at the front and asked if I could bill it to my room. The woman said yes and asked the room number and i told her what it was to which she didn't respond. So I waited a second and asked her again if that was okay and she shrugged her shoulders and said to me "Do you need something...or?" like I was annoying for wanting clarification. Check out was fine and quick on our final
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel with Trip Advisor.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay, but also wanted to offer our sincerest apologies for our staff who may have missed the can do attitude you would expect from our Hotel.  We will be sure to share your review with our late evening staff so we can work to improve upon any less than stellar service efforts.  Again, we thank you for your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Recently stayed at this hotel as well as the Atrium hotel next door. Rooms at the Hilton are 100% nicer. They are nice, clean, and more spacious than several of the rooms in the same class of hotel that I've stayed in lately. Staff were very attentive and welcoming. Bell Hop kept our bags for several hours since we arrived from the airport at 9:00 a.m. He graciously allowed me access to our luggage several times. On one day, we chose not to have housekeeping (I like to rest in peace sometimes) and the staff only asked once, took note, and did not bother us for the rest of the day. Event we attended seemed well managed. We received free parking in the self-park area. This was a huge customer service bonus to us. The outdoor pool doesn't have a lot of ambience. Look and feel of an
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Hilton Irvine with Trip Advisor.  Our staff will be pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and have recognized their efforts on Trip Advisor.  The Hilton Irvine offers a premier location just across the street from the newly expanded John Wayne Airport.  We thank you for your comments and look forward to your next visit.  Thank you for being our guests.

Summary: Hotel overbooked and under staffed. Bartender avoided eye contact when we were at the bar and we were the only ones there.  Not worth the $8 beer. When I called room service at 8 pm on Friday night to ask if they had soy milk for my daughter with food allergy  they never picked up the phone. Called front desk but took three tries to get through the endless hold, hang ups, and endless ringing. Rude attendant finally picked up and dismissed me with a curt "no". Turns out they had some. She just didn't wanna go look.
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience with Trip Advisor.  Your experience is definitely not typical of the type of experience our hotel is known for.  We will be certain to share your experience with our staff to ensure similar incidents don't occur for our other guests.  Our team works very hard to provide a positive experience for all of our guests.  I am truly sorry in your case, this did not occur.   On a side note, our prices are comparable to other hotels, but we are not yet up to $8/beer pricing.  Please feel free to contact me directly at (949) 812-3737 so I can attempt to make amends for any mistakes we may have made during your stay.  We hope you would give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary: We stay at a lot of Hilton properties, generally love them, this was not one of them. First, they wouldn't allow me to use a luggage cart, said there is a rule against it. I'm sure it's called the tip protection rule. Then the bartender was rude and confrontational over our "complimentary" drinks. Way to treat your Diamond level patrons Hilton Irvine!
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with Trip Advisor.  Without knowing all the details, I offer my sincerest apologies for any sense of indifference with our staff not providing the best possible service for your stay, especially as a Diamond Member.  In regards to the luggage carts, our bell staff is more than willing to assist with or without gratuity.  They are generally reluctant to allow our guests to take the luggage carts to the rooms as the carts are most often left in  the room or in the hallway for an inordinate amount of time leaving the bellman without a means to assist other guests with their luggage.  We apologize this "rule" seemed to take away from your experience.   As well, we have spoken to our Bartending staff on how to handle Diamond beverage certificates in a kind, courteous manner.  We apologize this was not your typical Hilton experience.  Please feel free to contact me directly should you wish to discuss your stay in more detail at (949) 812-3737.  We hope you would give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice room - expensive - comfy beds - better than some Hilton's - not as nice as others....
Summary: For those of you that don't know - Hilton hotels charge you for everything. And they charge more than most other hotels - $16 for self parking, $3 for water in your room, $12 for a breakfast sandwich, etc. As for this hotel - the room was nice and clean - bed and linens were soft and comfortable. We stayed here for 1 night while at Disneyland (got an ok deal on priceline) - it is about a 20 minute drive from Disneyland on freeways. On the plus side - the tv had most of the popular channels I like and you get a free USA today in the morning. Would I stay here again? Sure, if I got a room for $60 or less on priceline, because after parking and taxes it would be $80 - and I've gotten nicer rooms closer to Disney for less (Hyatt, Hilton Convention, Holiday Inn).
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with Trip Advisor.  We are happy to hear you were able to find a great deal on Priceline.  As a note, there are packages on the Hilton.com website that provide complimentary breakfast and include internet which provides a great value to our guests.  We also thank you for recognizing our comfortable beds, clean rooms, and state of the art HD programming.   We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Nice clean property, good staff, good breakfast
Summary: Stayed here one night to be close to John Wayne Airport for an early flight with my family.  The room we had looked new, nice big flatscreen TV, and very clean.  Beds were comfier than most.  The hotel is right across the street from the airport, but the airport has a curfew (!), and flights stopped around 11 so we had a nice quiet night's sleep.  The staff was very pleasant, and we somehow ended up on an executive level floor (I believe it's the top three floors, 8-10) and got 2 complimentary buffet breakfast tickets (about a forty dollar value).  Our boys, 7 and 10, loved the pool and the jacuzzi.  We would all definitely stay here again.  And PS I highly recommend John Wayne airport.  Flights are cheaper than LAX, people are nicer, and it's much less crowded.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience at the Hilton Irvine with Trip Advisor.  Our staff will be very happy to hear about your positive comments and your recognition of their efforts.   In particular, our houskeeping staff takes great pride and care in the service they provide for our guests.   As well, we thank you for recognizing the Hilton Irvine's premier location just across from the street from John Wayne Airport.   John Wayne Airport has just finished a multi-million dollar expansion, which makes flying in or out of Orange County even easier.   Whether for business or pleasure, our comfortable and clean rooms are highlighted by our unique and modern lobby.    We look forward to once again having the opportunity to welcome you back to the Hilton Irvine.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: The Hilton Irvine features plenty of self parking that only costs $16 per day. You can identify a quality establishment by finding out how much it charges it's guests to park their own vehicles directly next to the building where they've just paid more than $100 per night to sleep. It would be far less insulting for them to blanket the $16 into the cost of the room and boast about their "free self parking". Beyond that, just plain old horrible customer service at every opportunity. Everyone, including the hotel manager, makes you feel as though you're wasting their time by asking them a question, with the exception of the bell hop. Perhaps they should consider moving the entire staff to minimum wage and making them earn the rest of their salary through guest gratuity.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with Trip Advisor.  While, I am not sure if I spoke to you directly or if it was one of our other managers, I apologize for any sense of indifference you may felt during your stay.  In regards to the parking charges, our hotel is just across the street from John Wayne Airport and parking is very limited in the area.  In order to protect parking space availability for our guests, it has become necessary to charge for parking and have an outside parking company to manage this process.  The hotel's parking costs are consistent with other full service hotels in Irvine.     We thank you for being our guest.  Should you wish to contact me directly regarding your stay, I can be reached directly at (949) 812-3737.

Summary Heading: Okay for the price, good location.
Summary: We got a great price on this hotel, I would have given it a lower rating if I had paid as much as some of the rates I saw this hotel going for.    This hotel has a great location, across the street from this gem of an airport.  The outdoor courtyard is nice and the breakfast was good (included with price of room).  The beds were classic Hitlon comfort.  Staff was friendly.  The downside, the pool is a classic motel kidney bean.  To our surprise parking is $16 a day.  Overall the hotel has a warm and stuffy feeling, it's like they need to open all the windows and run some fans.  One of the pillows in our bed smelled and we could not tell if the pillow was dirty or if it was just sort of musty from the overall hotel scent  The breakfast was good for the cost, we paid an extra $15
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your experience with Trip Advisor.  The Hilton Irvine offers a premier location in Irvine just across from John Wayne Airport.   Due to this unique location and the lack of parking in the immediate area, it has become necessary to charge for parking in order to protect space availability for our guests.  The $16 nightly charge is consistent with what all other full service hotels charge in the airport area.     As well, we will be sure to check to see if there were some hallway air conditioning issues that may have created the musty feel during your visit.  This is not a common issue.  We thank you for your visit and hope to once again have the opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: OK but not quite a Hilton
Summary: Hotel was ok, it is an older building that has been redone. I stay at a lot of Hiltons and in My opinion it is not quite there. It has nothing to do with the staff, they were very very nice and the place was clean. That facility has some limitations and it shows. I did not eat at the hotel so i have no comments on that. Just a good airport hotel nothing special.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  The Hotel is an older property that underwent an extensive 23 Million Dollar renovation on the interior of the property in the last few years which added a modern, friendly atmosphere to the lobby and meeting space.  Still on the list to be done, are some cosmetic upgrades to the exterior of the property as well as the parking areas.   We thank you for sharing your experience and recognizing our kind staff and the cleanliness of the property.  We hope to have you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: When I checked in I asked if the hotel had Internet access and the person at registration said yes, you just ....blah, blah, blah...and rattled off verbal instructions on how to get online. I got nothing in writing. Later in my room I tried to "remember" what he said but I couldn't get online. So I took my laptop down to Jordan at the registration desk and he took the time to get me online--instead of rattling off instructions like the other employee did. You should have a little card at registration with the log-in instructions.   Later, when I checked out, Jordan also helped me store my luggage until I left because I was in  meetings all day.   You have a good employee in Jordan who is helpful, friendly and professional.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience at the Hilton Irvine and for recognizing Jordan's stellar efforts at the front desk.   We will be sure to share your review with Jordan and our entire team.  The Hilton Irvine offers a premier location in Irvine close to several Fortune 500 companies and just minutes from beaches and world class shopping.  Our staff takes great pride and care in the service they provide.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport in the future.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Great location obviously, great for the business traveler, I came in from FL early in the day PT and they graciously gave me an early check-in. It's not really walkable to the airport, given the restricted access but the shuttles run on the half hour.  I would stay here again though there are some other Hilton properties in the vicinity, Double Tree and Double Tree Club that may be a little shinier and new with a bit of a better value.
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing your recent experience at the Hilton Irvine with Trip Advisor.  As you mention, the Hilton Irvine has a great location in the heart of Orange County and is just across the street from the newly expanded John Wayne Airport.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed your brief stay.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: My family needed to attend a birthday party at The Hanford Hotel at Costa Mesa, CA and needed a place to stay for the night for we are going to Disneyland the next day and do not want to drive over for the night. I don't want to spend a fortune either for a very quick stay. So I decided to use Priceline for $50 (plus taxes around $70) on a Friday Weekend was a DEAL!  (first time though to use the site and to bid for a hotel) which I find cool and exciting plus the savings can't be beat!We arrived at the hotel around 6 PM. We checked in (a breeze), change oufits and head to Costa Mesa. We came back around 11 PM and parking was a bit thight (if you opt for self parking which cost $16/night/car./Valet is $21).The room is huge, big flat screen TV, 2 double beds (they are very
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Hilton Irvine with Trip Advisor.  We are glad you enjoyed your quick visit and enjoyed the convenience our property offers.  Our staff will be happy to hear your check-in was a breeze and your room was clean and comfortable.  We thank you for being our guest and look forward to your next visit to the Hilton Irvin/Orange County Airport.

Summary: Let me first say that this hotel had a High End Stereo show during the 3 days I stayed here and they had several thousand visiters. This was the reason I was here and they were very busy and much busier than normal. Check in was very fast and no line at all. I was extremely impressed by the professionalism and courtesy of the front desk people. They always bent over backwards to try and accomodate me and they deserve a pat on the back.   I was upgraded to a room on the executive level (Gold VIP Member) although it just looked like a standard room to me. The bed was very comfortable and the room was clean. The air conditioner worked very well. This hotel was across the street from the airport but I really never noticed the noise. My only real complaint about this hotel was with
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with Trip Advisor.  "The Show" home audio conference was definitely not an ordinary weekend for the hotel.  There were as many as 5000 attendees which definitely made it a little more difficult in the restaurant to keep up.  That being said, we are very happy to hear you enjoyed your overall stay.    We thank you for being our guest and look forward to having join us for next year's event.

Summary: The two of us were attending T.H.E. Show and hadn't realized that the live entertainment on the patio afterward was one of my favorite vocalists. We decided to make an evening of it and were extremely fortunate that Mary McKinney was the one to help us book a room. It's funny how one person can so well-represent the word hospitality that a weekend spent less than a couple of hours from home can truly feel like a getaway. Our room was perfect: the temperature, the linens, the decor, the room service. Life is short, but we're making the most of it!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at the Hilton Irvine with Trip Advisor.  This past weekend was definitely a great time to stay at the Hilton Irvine and visit Irvine.  We were fortunate enough to host "The SHOW", which is definitely one of the Best Home Audio Visual shows of the year.  We are happy to hear Mary McKinney, our Director of Rooms, was able to find you the perfect room for the perfect event.  We are glad you enjoyed your weekend and "The SHOW".  We look forward to your next visit to the Hilton Irvine.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Hotel is very nice and in a great location
Summary: This hotel was very close to the airport and within a short drive to the beach.  Our room was large clean and comfortable .  The only complaint I would have was that there are constant planes flying over head during the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your positive experience at the Hilton Irvine.  Just across from the newly expanded John Wayne Airport, the Hilton Irvine offers the best location when visiting the Irvine area for either business or pleasure.   We are happy to hear our staff provided a memorable guest experience.   As you mention, our convenient location to John Wayne Airport does bring along with it some airport noise.  Fortunately, this is mostly just an issue during the day or early evening as John Wayne Airport does close nightly at 10pm.  Thank you being our guest.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary Heading: Great stay overall, just one concern...
Summary: Booked with Priceline for Memorial Day weekend. Check in was a breeze, thanks to Miguel, who not only provided us with excellent service at the desk, but great follow up as well. Beds and pillows are amazing, widescreen was great. But those noisy toilets...didn't notice them until about 3 a.m. when someone above us flushed...why are they so noisy? Other than the loud plumbing, the hotel is great!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine. The Hilton Irvine offers a great location, great rooms, and personalized service. We thank you for recognizing our staff's efforts.  As a note, we are working on ways to improve the noise caused by our water savings initiatives in our restrooms.    We look forward to serving you again in the future.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: This is only my opinion, but it is the correct one!
Summary: Another hilton one that need some refreshing to do, overall an OK hotell. A big plus for the outdoor pool in the back. The breakfast are ok as a business guest 20 Dollar, but not maybe for a private visit. Like the shuttle that goes to the shopping mall "Fashion Island", i was ther in business and my wife went shopping during the day. The surroundings to have some pretty ok restaruants. Very safe and clean area.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.  Our staff will be happy to hear you enjoyed our spacious pool and our complimentary shuttle service.   We look forward to once again having the opportunity to welcome you back to Irvine in the future.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: I had an occasion requiring me to stay nearly a month at the Hilton Hotel in Irvine. With heated pool and tennis court, I could have stayed another month. The staff are overly nice and professional. Breakfasts come with home-made omelet’s too! Due to my length of stay, I was thinking of switching to another hotel just for variety… no way as the hotel was simply too nice to leave.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your positive experience at the Hilton Irvine. Our staff takes great pride in providing a memorable experience for our guests in a clean, safe, and friendly environment. Our team will be happy to hear you enjoyed the guest room and the amenities offered at the property.  We are especially glad you enjoyed our cooked to order omelets.  Thank you for being our guest and we look forward to once again welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine.

Summary: Over priced and charged extra for EVERYTHING !!   $14.00 for self park.  $20.00 per person for breakfast bar !  Walls are paper thin and you can hear people talking (not yelling) in the other rooms. Might be a good 2 star but a LONG way from a 4 star !!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay.  We are sorry to hear your experience was not a positive one.  As is the case with other hotels near John Wayne Airport, our hotel does charge a fee for parking due to the scarcity of parking in the area and the need to protect parking availability for our guests.  As well, we do charge for our daily buffet breakfast which is also consistent with other Full Service hotels in Irvine.  As a note, packages are available on our website that do include breakfast and provide a great value.    We thank you for your comments and would welcome an opportunity to speak to you directly about your stay.  You can reach me directly at (949) 812-3737.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: I have stayed in this hotel in March for business and when I had to come back to the area, I chose this property again.  I have found that everyone is nice and friendly,  The rooms are clean and the temperature can be set to your desired level.   A great place to stay!
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine. The Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport offers the most convenient location to John Wayne Airport which is definitely ideal for business. As well, our staff takes great pride in providing great service in a clean,safe, and friendly environment.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: OK Hotel But Not Your Average Hilton
Summary: The rooms are clean, comfortable and spacious.  The bathrooms are clean and nice.  However, the toilet flush is loud in all rooms and you can hear flushes from all the surrounding occupied rooms.  I stayed in rooms on both the sides of the hotel.  The aircraft noise from SNA aiport is there on both sides of the hotel but not as much of a disturbance and there are no flights at night.  The rooms have a small balcony which makes the rooms bright and airy.    The lobby and common areas are pathetic.  The carpet in the common areas is old and so are the elevators. The hotel is pet friendly which is not really my preference.  The hotel offers complimentary shuttle to the SNA airport and to some restaurants nearby by.  The airport shuttle runs every 30 minutes.  The shuttle takes
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor.  We take great pride and care to ensure we are providing the best possible service to our guests in a clean, safe, and friendly environment.  We have shared both your positive and negative comments with our staff so that we may improve for our future guests.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: I booked this room for 1 night for my family and me.  I found that the hotel staff were very professional and helpful.  The room was comfortable and I loved the water pressure in the shower.  It is right across the street from John Wayne Airport, but we didn't hear any airplane noise when we were in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with Trip Advisor about your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine. We are pleased to hear your experience at the Hilton Irvine was a positive one. The staff of the Hilton Irvine prides itself on providing a memorable experience in a unique hotel environment. Our location is perfect for anyone visiting the Orange County area for business or pleasure.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Worst hotel I have ever stayed in. Checked into another hotel after one night even though I lost the money I had paid in advance. Found hard dry chunks of meat on the floor of the room upon arrival. No room safe. Took the front desk 30 minutes to find a do not disturb sign. Other than one front desk staff who was pleasant, the others seemed clueless on how to take care of a customer. My dog nearly cut herself while walking in the parking lot on broken glass from a picture frame. The hotel is old and run down. I have seen nicer nursing homes. I learned that this hotel is a franchised Hilton Hotel, so anyone expecting a nice Hilton experience will be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience regarding your recent stay.  Your experience is definitely not typical of the type of service that is provided to our guests. We aplogize you felt you had to leave the hotel early.    Please feel free to contact me directly at 949-812-3737 to discuss your experience.

Summary: I stayed here before flying out of SNA, which is right across the street. It's just far enough away that you'll need to take the shuttle, and just close enough to be tempted to walk. Stick with the shuttle.   I had a great check in experience, though it seems some people have stuggled with this. The hotel has recently gotten a facelift, and it now looks fresh. The requesite flat panel TVs are in place, and all the usual Hilton room features. The hotel design is modern and updated, almost trendy, but it's obvious to anyone who stays in a lot of older hotels that this is an older property that got a major redo. But, it wasn't a complete gut and start new project. With that said, most won't notice this. It's waaaaaay better than it used to be.   The parking situation is still a
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the Hilton Irvine as the preferred hotel in Irvine known for our modern elegance and personalized service. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our staff was able to provide a memorable experience for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary: Came in late checkin for next day flight through priceline bid...and as a HHonors member i thought the front desk person would be more helpful with more respect...she was short rude and not helpful and was disappointed with level of service. When I raised this comments to the front desk the next am they stated they were unapologetic ...only stayed here as close to airport but wont stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor.  Your experience is definitely not typical of our hotel nor for the personalized service we strive to provide for our guests.  We apologize your experience was not a pleasant one.  We will take your comments as an opportunity to train our evening staff so similar service experiences can be avoided in the future.  Should you care to discuss your experience with me directly, I may be reached at 949-833-9999.   Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: The pool is enormous, and heated.  The hotel is just over the road from the airport, but oddly enough we didn't notice any aircraft noise at all.  Breakfast was a treat.  The staff were tremendously helpful and pleasant.  We walked back from the airport after dropping off a hire car, and if you don't have a lot of luggage, you could easily walk to the terminal to catch a flight (just follow someone who looks as if they know where they're going - saw lots of air crew on foot): it really is just across the road.  If not, get the shuttle.  Room was vast.  But why does this hotel charge its customers to park a car?? Best Western would never do that ...
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine. The Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport offers the most convenient location to John Wayne Airport makes our location second to none when visiting Irvine or the surrounding areas.  Our professional staff takes pride in providing great service in a clean,safe, and friendly environment.   As a note, due to the Hilton Irvine's unique location across from John Wayne Airport, it is necessary to charge for parking in order to protect parking availability for our hotel guests.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Directly across from the Orange County Airport, this Hilton is extremely convenient for business travelers.  Originally the Registry Hotel, then a Radisson Hotel, this facility has been recently renovated as a Hilton and it's age does show a bit (wall a/c units).  The beds were comfortable, the water hot when needed and the amenities appropriate.  There was lots of noise transfer from the room above (Godzilla was up at 8am) and some transfer from the room next door as well.  The bar and dining options were okay but limited as was the selection of items available on the menu.  Room service was prompt and the food enjoyable (steak flatbread!!!)  Parking is typically expensive; as are all others hotels options in the area.  The staff was warm in their attitude and professional.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your positive experience at the Hilton Irvine. Our staff takes great pride in providing a memorable experience for our guests in a clean, safe, and friendly environment. We are very glad to hear you enjoyed the guest room and the amenities offered at the property.  We are continually working on our menu options in the restaurant in order to keep up with the latest culinary trends.    Thank you for being our guest and we look forward to once again welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine.

Summary Heading: What good is an Airport hotel with no morning shuttle?
Summary: Picked this hotel due to proximity to the airport and availability of a shuttle, as I had luggage.  Had a 7:40 am flight, and asked the day before about the shuttle.  I was informed that the shuttle ran every 30 minutes, starting at 5:30 am.  At 5:45 I went downstairs to get the 6am shuttle.  I was informed that the shuttle would not run until 7am.  I had no choice but to walk, dragging my luggage with me.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing with Trip Advisor your experience with our shuttle service.  We apologize for the severe glitch you experienced with our shuttle service.  Normally, our schedule operates very efficiently to provide guests easy access to John Wayne Airport.  Unfortunately, on the day of your departure, our early driver had a family emergency and could not fulfill his schedule.  We did make accommodations with local taxi services.  However, for you, we failed to communicate our alternate plans with our taxi services.   We thank you for being our guest and hope you would give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary: I have worked in the hotel industry for nearly 10 yeras now.
