The Hilton name has an amazing reputation, which is why I chose to stay at this property while in Orange County for my brother's wedding. I arrived late in the evening and the front desk team all seemed to be a little tired and didn't move to quickly. After a day of work and travel, the guest really just wants to get to their room and go to bed. Once arriving in my room it was uncomfortably hot. I decided to go and get some ice from the machine down the hall. Once there, I noticed that there was a 'out of order' sign on the soda machine, and that the ice machine was empty. I called down to guest services and asked the young lady to bring some ice up to my room since the machine wasn't working. Her response was 'No, but
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with Trip Advisor.  Your experience is definitely not typical of the service and experience for which the hotel is known for.  We have reviewed your review with both our Front Office Staff and our Engineering team to ensure similar situations do not occur in the future.  In regards to Room Service, we do operate Room Service throughout the day but through the lunch menu in the restaurant due to the popularity of our Aura restaurant lunch menu.  We apologize this was not communicated properly.  Please feel free to contact me directly at (949) 812-3737, so we can work to make amends for this less than stellar experience.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Not a 5-star hotel, but nice and clean for its age.
Summary: Exceptionally located, directly across from Santa Ana Airport, (John Wayne), one cannot help to see that this is a nice hotel to stay at, if one is looking for convenience.  The room we stayed in was very clean and the beds were comfortable.  The hotel staff was friendly and the rooms were quiet, even though right next to a busy airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine. The Hilton Irvine offers a great location, great rooms, and personalized service. We thank you for recognizing the hotel's clean rooms and its convenient location across from the Newly Expanded John Wayne Airport.  We look forward to serving you again in the future.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Exceptional service just moments away from the airport
Summary: This is an ordinary building made special by exceptional service throughout the property...!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine. The Hilton Irvine offers a great location, great rooms, and personalized service. We thank you for recognizing our staff's efforts.  We look forward to serving you again in the future.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: This Hilton was extremely convenient being right across the street from the John Wayne Airport in Orange County,Calif.  Lobby was very inviting, the staff was friendly.   Gullivers Restaurant is just down the street which was convenient for our late night check in.  Very nice.....  I will stay there again when I go to Calif in March.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent visit to the Hilton Irvine.  Thank you for recognizing the hotel's exceptional location and caring staff.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  As a note, The Hilton Irvine is also a great value on weekends for those looking to be in the heart of Orange County activities.  Again, thank you for sharing your experience. We hope to welcome you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it is close to the airport for an early departure the next morning. The rooms are clean and comfortable. They now have a 42 inch LG HD television in the rooms which is very nice. My room faced the runway and the airplane noise is constant between 7am and 10pm. These are the operating hours of the airport. If you are trying to sleep in, forget it. The bar/lounge area is very nice, good selection of food from the bar menu. Parking is kind of a pain, you come and go using your room key, it failed to open the morning of our departure, I rang the buzzer twice and no one answered, I had to back up and go in for assistance. Pretty good selection of restaurants in the area, but they were all closed on Sunday.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  The Hilton Irvine offers a great option if you need to arrive late or catch an early flight out of the newly expanded John Wayne Airport.  As well, the hotel boasts a modern lobby, clean rooms, and exceptional service.   As you mention, the hotel's newly installed automated parking system is still going through some minor technical upgrades which will be corrected soon.  Thank you for being our guest.  We look forward to once again having the opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: We enjoyed out stay and would come back
Summary: Traveling for business. Check in was prompt and were quickly sent on our way. Minimal wait time through this process. Front desk associates were polite and always greeted by name.  Comfortable and well designed room. Good view as well. The bed provided a good nights sleep, so no complaints here. Bath was well stocked and immediate hot water. Nice desk work area as well. Elevators quickly move you from floor to floor.  Lots of restaurants in walking distance. Parking was a bit interesting as the self park lot was full. We got luck and found a spot fairly close, so the walk wasn't too bad. On-site eating facilities, but did not utilize them.  Good price for a good night stay. If in the area again I would stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience at the Hilton Irvine with Trip Advisor.  Our staff takes great pride in providing a memorable experience to all of our guests.  The Hilton Irvine offers a premier location located just across from the Newly Expanded John Wayne Airport.     We look forward to once again having you as our guests at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  Thank you for being our guests.

Summary Heading: Very Clean, Comfortable Room, and a Solid Property
Summary: This property was clean, comfortable, quiet (aside from the airport - but that is not the hotel's fault), and welcoming. If you need a hotel next to the airport, you can't beat this location. It is literally across the street. The property does have a shuttle, but it would take you just under 15 minutes to walk from your room to the ticket counter. Valet parking was excellent and the front desk was friendly and polite.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience from the Hilton Irvine on Trip Advisor.  We take great pride and expend considerable effort to ensure we are providing the best possible experience for our guests.  As well, thank you for recognizing the hotel's great location across from John Wayne Airport and our clean, comfortable rooms.   Our housekeeping staff does a great job!  We thank you for being our guest and look forward to welcoming you once again to the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.

Summary Heading: Comfortable but not remarkable (wouldn't stay again)
Summary: Stayed here while in town for a wedding and found the stay overall satisfactory.  Despite the great deal I got on Hotwire ($60-something/night), given the other options in town, wouldn't stay here again because of the little add-on fees(pay-wifi, parking fees).  I stayed recently at the Residence Inn nearby, much preferred that, and kept comparing the Hilton to it!   The Hilton came up as a 4-star hotel in Hotwire but I would call it more a 3 to 3.5 star establishment.  PROS: - efficient, friendly staff, quick check-in - large, nice pool with whirlpool (didn't get to use it, unfortunately) - free boarding pass printing at the business center - comfy-looking bar area.  Folks were sitting enjoying evening wine/cocktails, and it looked like a nice spot to unwind. - comfortable beds
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your most recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.    The Hilton Irvine prides itself on providing a memorable experience for our guests.  We are sorry to hear the extra fees we charge were not a highlight of your stay.  The Hilton Irvine has a unique location directly across from John Wayne Airport, which has made it necessary to charge for parking due to the high demand for parking in the area.  As well, we do offer complimentary internet for our esteemed Hilton HHonors Gold & Diamond guests.  On a positive note, we are happy to hear the service you received from our staff was exceptional and you were able to take advantage of a spectacular deal on Hotwire which provided a great rate.    Thank you for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor and for being our guest.  We hope to once again welcome you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary: Here for a short stay on a business trip to the area and found the hotel to be very conveniently located to both the airport and the business I was visiting.  I'm also a Hilton Honors member so Hilton hotels are usually my first choice.  This one was very nice with a spacious comfortable suite and an excellent bar and restaurant downstairs.  My only gripe at all was with the $16/day parking fee which I understand is common in this area but not typical of most Hilton Hotels around the country.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the Hilton Irvine for its ideal location which showcases its close proximity to John Wayne Airport in Orange County. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  As you mention, most hotels in the airport area do charge for parking due to the high demand for parking.    We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.   Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Checked in around 11:30pm and check in was fast and efficient. The man working the desk was great. Hopefully management reads this and knows how well of a job he's doing. He was an older black man, maybe mid to late 30's. Talked to him and found out he was working the overnight shift. With no one around -- he did everything by the book. Very accommodating and professional. All this with no upper management around -- was a pleasure meeting him.  The room was clean and quiet. The A/C was a little noisy, but we were tired and passed right out.  The restaurant looked good, but did not have a chance to try it out.  This was our second time here and we're looking at a third in the near future. Great place for an airport hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine. The Hilton Irvine offers a great location, great rooms, and personalized service. We thank you for recognizing our staff's efforts and our comfortable beds.  We look forward to serving you again in the future.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: The Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport is a very nice business hotel, extremely convenient to John Wayne Airport (right across the street). As an HHonors Diamond member, I got a room on the executive floor. It was a small room, but very nicely furnished with a very comfortable bed, large flat screen TV, a chair and a desk. There is a tiny balcony, however the patio style window/door only opens 4" "for my safety" - since there is a railing about 4' high (the same height as the one at the Embassy Suites in Santa Ana where you can actually open the door) I think I could manage to stay safe even if it opened all the way. The room also had a small refrigerator which was a nice touch. As a diamond, I was offered a drink coupon (a little stingy!) and 1 breakfast (per night) or 1,000
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  The Hilton Irvine's location is second to none when looking to fly in or out of John Wayne Airport.  As a note, we are working on a new balcony solution which will be less obtrusive.  Again, thank you for your important comments.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Good bar and breakfast, clean, convenient
Summary: I travel to Irvine regularly and always try to stay here.  It's proximity to the airport can't be beat.  It has been renovated recently so the rooms are excellent as are the bar and dining area.   The service is usually good.  All of the amenities you need are available.  I recommend this for business.  If you are in town for personal reasons, I would recommend a place with a bit more character (of course, this is the OC, so character is hard to come by).
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the Hilton Irvine for its ideal location which showcases its close proximity to John Wayne Airport in Orange County. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and are proud of our staff for providing a positive service experience during your visit.  Our housekeeping staff does an exceptional job and take great pride and care in their work.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.   Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Nice, clean place for a couple of nights.
Summary: We stayed at the Orange County Airport/Irvine Hilton in early October for 2 nights to celebrate our anniversary.  We got a great deal on Hotwire for less than half the cost of the normal $135/night rate, so honestly, I can't complain too much!  Pros:  The rooms are very spacious and clean, newly renovated/updated, with flatscreen TVs etc. The staff is friendly and courteous, the maids do a great job.  It's a Hilton, so don't expect a lot of free perks. (Parking, Wi-Fi, and breakfast NOT included...all of these are extra charges, and parking you can't really get around...this is not a street-parking friendly area because of the proximity to the airport. Also, no bathrobes...kinda bummed about that one)  The location of the hotel is nice, in proximity to a lot of OC attractions,
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent visit to the Hilton Irvine.  Thank you for recognizing the hotel's exceptional location and caring staff.  We are sorry to hear there were some noise issues in your guest room.  This is an ongoing project which is being corrected with improved door seals.  As well, we are proud to provide both robes and refrigerators in all of our upgraded Executive Floor rooms.  The Hilton Irvine is also a great value on weekends for those looking to be in the heart of Orange County activities.  Again, thank you for sharing your experience. We hope to welcome you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed at this hotel for my cousins wedding.  Most of my family stayed in the hotel as well, as the reception took place downstairs.  When we arrived, we went through a huge hassle to check in.  They kept messing up our reservation and having to create new ones.  They told us that we would have a room right next to my parents on the "quiet" side of the hotel.  But during the 30 minutes or so it took for us to check in, a lot of other people successfully checked in and got rooms before us.  So, by the time they got the reservation figured out, there was only one king room left.  And of course, it was on the airport side (the loud side) and no where near my parents.  Next thing that happened is that they kept trying to charge both my parents and I for
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay at the Hilton Irvine.  We offer our sincerest apologies for the apparent reservation issues as well as the Front Desk mix up.  This is not typical of both our Reservations Department nor our Front Desk staff.  We are happy to hear our Manager did offer a refund, although we would have rather had you as a satisfied guest.   We thank you for sharing your experience and hope you would give us another opportunity to serve you in the future.

Summary Heading: A good nights sleep but won't be back.
Summary: Stayed here for 1 night before I left California. Arrived at about 9pm and greeted with a $16 parking fee. YAY. I didn’t care anymore since I was somewhat tired from a long day of driving around SoCal. Get in and the lobby is pretty busy and happening. Not something I’m used to seeing. Must be business travelers unwinding for the night. I went to the front desk and was checked in immediately. Room 1017 was mine.   Walking to my room I noticed everything looked well worn. The carpets look old. The trim looks like it has been repainted more than a few times. I started to worry. The door to my room looks just as dated. I open the door and was surprised to see a pretty decent room. Looks new or newly remodeled. Everything was clean. The rest room was pretty good too although it was
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience and for taking the time to post your review on Trip Advisor. We are truly sorry you had issues with our air conditioning in room 1017.  Your comments will help us to ensure other guests do not have a similar issue.   We have shared your review with our engineering staff as they do take great pride to ensure all of our guests have a rewarding stay.  As a note, Hilton does offer complimentary internet access to our prestigious Hilton HHonors Gold & Diamond members.   And, due to the Hilton Irvine's unique location across from John Wayne Airport, it is necessary to charge for parking in order to protect parking availability for our hotel guests.    We thank you again for your feedback and we hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: a great location and comfortable room for stay!
Summary: I stayed three nights at this Hilton. It's close to the airport, shopping mall and everything else! The staff was willing to work out some issues with me. I was so glad! The beds were so comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.  The Hilton Irvine offers a great location, great rooms, and personalized service.  We thank you for recognizing our staff's efforts and our comfortable beds.  We look forward to serving you again in the future.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: We only stayed one night at this hotel but we were very pleased.  We don't generally stay in airport hotels and weren't very excited at the prospect but we actually had a nice time.  You need to call the hotel to send the shuttle to the airport to pick you up so be sure to have the phone number with you.  The rooms are a little old fashioned as far as decor is concerned, but there was a nice flat-screen hotel with lots of on demand channels, and the bedding was very comfortable.  We had lunch and drinks in the hotel restaurant and thought everything was very good and the menu selection was excellent.  The workout room is more than adequate, although it was quite dark the day we were there for some reason.  Check-in and restaurant staff were very nice.  We would definitely stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport. We are happy to hear your guest room was comfortable and clean. As well, we our proud of our new 42" Flat Screen Televisions which have 74 HD channels including 7 HBO options.  The Hilton Irvine is conveniently located across from John Wayne Airport and provides easy freeway access to all of Southern California.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Love the location for business in OC
Summary: Great hotel for business travel in the Orange County area if you're traveling through John Wayne International Airport (SNA).  The commute from airport to hotel is a one minute drive.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.  The Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport offers the most convenient location to John Wayne Airport which is definitely ideal for business.  As well, our staff takes great pride in providing great service in a clean,safe, and friendly environment.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: I recently stayed at this Hotel for 2 nights. 1 at the beginning at 1 at the end of a 2 week stay in Long Beach.  I chose this hotel for 2 reasons. 1 as my flight's were in and out of John Wayne and 2 as I am a Hilton Honors Gold Member.  As titled this hotel was ideal for what I wanted. I arrived 8pm after travelling from the UK so wanted to get some food and straight to bed. As HH Gold I was give a voucher for a free drink (either house wine or beer) and free breakfast. The drink was much appreciated after the journey.  I was upgraded ro a executive room on both occasions which was very comfortable if a little dated. The staff were excellent throughout my stay and the club sandwich was great.   I would definately stay here again when flying through SNA, mainly due to the
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.  We pride ourselves in providing a great value to our guests in a clean, safe, and friendly environment. Thank you for recognizing our friendly staff and for being an esteemed Hilton HHonors Gold Member . As you mentioned, our unique location across from John Wayne Airport provides the perfect option for our HHonors members who need to catch an early morning flight or who arrive late.  Thank you for your patronage and for being our guest. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary: WE recently stayed at the Hilton for 5 nights.  It was a nice hotel - not super fancy, not bad though.  right across from the airport which is nice - and they have a shuttle too.  no free internet and no free parking were both minuses.  other than that - just a good place to rest and clean up.  15 min drive to disneyland or beaches.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport hotel. Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and giving us a positive review.   We thank you for being our guest and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: A pretty decent hotel, but don't think it's good for families, especially with kids.  They got official meetings most of the time at the conference center, and you will need to walk through the middle of the restaurant and by the conference rooms to go to the swimming pool.  Felt very awkward.  Also, they charge around $16 d day for parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience regarding your recent stay.  We pride ourselves on providing a great value to our guests in a clean, safe, and friendly environment. Unfortunately, due to our close proximity to the John Wayne Airport, it has become necessary to charge for parking services as there is very high demand for parking in the area and we only have limited spaces available for our guests.  These charges, as expensive as they may see, are consistent with all other full service hotels in the Irvine Airport area.    We appreciate your feedback and thank you for being our guest at the Hilton Irvine.

Summary: Stayed here one night on business. Had a very comfortable king bed, immaculate room, friendly and responsive staff, and even though it's next to John Wayne airport, I never heard any airplane noise. The property had a huge swimming pool and tennis court, and the made-to-order omelettes at breakfast are incredible! Will definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the Hilton Irvine as the preferred hotel in Irvine known for our modern elegance and personalized service. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our staff was able to provide a memorable experience for you.    We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but a few problems
Summary: This is my second stay here.  The room is a nice size, and well equipped, however, there were quite a few issues during our stay.  Overall, the service was great.  When we had an issue, they responded well.  But the issues were not always address to our satisfaction.  Read on...  Our room was missing a hairdryer, which the front desk quickly replaced.  Good service.  However, when I tried to call the front desk, the phone didn't work.  Fortunately the second phone in the room did.  The TV would not turn on, and the drain in the bathroom sink was all backed up.  It took a couple of minutes to drain.    After our first night, I reported all of the above issues to the front desk.  They apologized, and gave us a voucher for breakfast which was nice.  Again, the service was very
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent visit to the Hilton Irvine.  We are sorry to hear there were some issues in your guest room which should not have occurred.  Normally, our rooms are properly equipped with all of the necessary items and are in working order.  More importantly, we thank you for reporting these items to Trip Advisor so similar issues do not occur for other guests.  As well, we have spoken to our outside cleaning company about where to park their vehicle as you noted.   These items are definitely atypical for our hotel.  Again, thank you for sharing your experience.  We hope to welcome you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary Heading: Good location to airport, clean, nice room
Summary: This property is close to the Orange County Airport.  It has nice rooms that are updated and clean.  Not far from a major hwy.   $16.00 per night for parking.  Make sure to ask for an in-out pass.  Another large hotel right next door but not sure of their rates.  Internet is available at a price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give your feedback of your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  We are happy to hear your guest room was comfortable and clean. Our hotel provides a convenient location to John Wayne Airport as well as easy freeway access to all of Southern California.  Thank you for being our guest and we hope to have you stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Loved the room. It was huge and clean. The king bed was amazing. I would totally stay here again. For the price I paid on hotwire this was an awesome deal.  The gym is nice as well.   Only downside is the parking fee.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to let us know about your positive experience at the Hilton Irvine.  Our staff takes great pride in providing a memorable experience for our guests in a clean, safe, and friendly environment.  We are very glad to hear you enjoyed the guest room and the amenities offered at the property.  Thank you for being our guest and we look forward to once again welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine.

Summary Heading: Great hotel--especially if you have an early morning flight!
Summary: Spent two nights here at the tail end of a 10 day trip to CA. At this point in my trip I just wanted to be comfortable and get a good's night sleep. This Hilton exceeded my expecations. It doesn't look like much from the outside, but the interior is lovely and the rooms are great! Very helpful staff too--from the front desk to the breakfast chef--everyone seemed eager to please.   Some reviewers have commented about the high cost of parking. It makes sense to me given the proximity to the airport. I actually returned my rental car a day early and took the hotel shuttle to the airport for my return trip. That saved both a day of rental and a day of parking.   I would definitely stay here again if I find myself in the OC.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.  We pride ourselves in providing a great value to our guests in a clean, safe, and friendly environment.  Thank you for recognizing our friendly staff and recognizing our comfortable and modern lobby.  As you mentioned, due to our close proximity to the John Wayne Airport, it has become necessary to charge for parking services as there is very high demand for parking in the area and we only have limited spaces available for our guests.    Thank you for your patronage and for being our guest.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary Heading: Good airport hotel but flaws hard to fix
Summary: I have stayed at this property four times, the latest time for two nights in mid-August 2011. It is a good airport hotel with reasonable rooms, a nice outdoor pool and jacuzzi and friendly and helpful staff. It is also right across the street from the airport and has a reliable shuttle service. The frustrations with the property are several: the dining area is small and almost an extension of a small bar (and it is in the way of going to the swimming pool so to go swimming you need to first walk through the bar area), the airport might be across the street but because of the design of the airport it is frustratingly hard to actually walk to the airport and the elevators are normally slow. As long as your eyes are wide open to these issues (which reasonably appear difficult to
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good place right by the SNA airport
Summary: I was in town to visit some friends and attend the U2 concert.  I had stayed here before and was glad to return.  The staff was very friendly, the location was perfect with airport and freeway access and the room was confortable.  The bed was nice, the reading chair had plenty of natural light and the work desk was large.  I will certainly stay again when I am in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time for a great review.  We appreciate you staying with us at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport. Glad to hear the staff was friendly and the guest room was comfortable and to your satisfaction. The location truly is convenient to the airport and the freeway access does make it great to get to where you need to go easy. We hope you will return soon and stay with us again.

Summary: REception and room were nice.  Parking was expensive and a real problem--not enough spaces for the two large grops that were there and no room to turn around and get out!! Also anly food available was an expensive buffet.  Expected more from a Hilton!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback on your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport. I was glad to hear that you enjoyed the reception and that your room was to your satisfaction. The parking charges, while expensive are consistent with other hotels in Irvine. And I am sorry for the inconvenience with the parking we try and provide ample parking for our overnight guest however there are times when it is maximized to its full capacity. I appreciate your comments it helps us to make sure we are consistently providing the best experience for our guest. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Your standard business hotel with professional service, a clean and tidy rooms, but a small property overall
Summary: The service and the clean and tidy rooms are the best features of this property.  We had a room with two queen beds, and I slept really well which is unusual for me in a hotel so that's saying something.  The bathroom, though, is really small.  I mean, if you are sitting on the loo and someone needs to come in (we are a family, so that happens a lot!), your knees get banged by the door.  The shower, though is really nice.  I liked the curtain, believe it or not, which allows you to see out a bit while showering.   There are really nice flat screen TVs in the room, though we were not in the room much to watch ours.  The lobby area, while clean, is pretty small so don't think of this hotel or its lobby on a grand scale.  This isn't the type of hotel you'd necessarily have a
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  The Hilton Irvine is a popular hotel in Orange County due to the quality of our staff and our unique location across from John Wayne Airport.  While the hotel does have a cozy feel, it does provide all of the necessary amenities in a sleek, clean, and modern environment.  We are happy you enjoyed your experience and look forward to your return visit.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: I only stayed one night as I was attending my high school reunion and not only did they charge a fortune for parking, but the food at the catered event was the worse that I have ever had and I have attended more events than I can count.  Very dissapointing!
Manager Response: Thank you for feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.  I am truly sorry to hear that the food at your reunion was not acceptable.   Our Banquet Culinary team prides itself on providing a quality dining experience for our guests, regardless of the budget or occasion.  This is definitely not a typical experience for catered events at the property.   In regards to your parking charges, the Hilton Irvine has a unique location across from John Wayne Airport.  The parking charges, while expensive in some markets, are necessary to maintain enough parking for hotel guests and are consistent with other hotels in Irvine.    We thank you for sharing your experience and for being our guest.

Summary Heading: They gave us a room with NO BED!
Summary: I planned a special surprise birthday party for my wife and flew my sister-in-law and 4 year old niece in from New Jersey.  I booked a room through Priceline for about 25% less than the posted rates at this hotel.  My sister-in-law arrived at the front desk Saturday night at 8pm and they told her that "The hotel is over-booked tonight, however, we have given you a much bigger room that has a lot of space, a small kitchen area, a sofa bed, and more since we did not have your room type available."  They kept emphasizing the size of the room over and over.  She proceeded to her room and noticed that the room was bigger than a normal hotel room- because there was NO BED!  The desk agent did not say that there was JUST A SOFA-BED AND NOT A REAL BED.  In addition, there was not a
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very nice property! My #1 choice in the area
Summary: This was my second stay here at the Hilton Irvine Airport location. This visit was just like my first. Very clean and quiet rooms. I had an adjoining room with family and it was still private and quiet. Staff was friendly and helpful. Breakfast was very good and the pool was perfect. I only had one very minor issue. The two dollar bag of chips that cost 25 cents in a store. Not a big deal, but every other hotel I visit at least has normal retail size bags.  There was one other thing that isn't a complaint but worth mentioning. Stepping into the shower is actually a 3-5 inch step up. When you exit the shower, you need to be aware of the height difference. Possible fall hazard...  Overall, a very nice place to stay that is convenient to everything and across from the airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the Hilton Irvine as the preferred hotel in Irvine known for our modern elegance and personalized service. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our staff was able to provide a memorable experience for you.  We will take a look at our Gift Shop pricing to see what other options there may be to purchase different size snack bags.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.   Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: I would not recomment this hotel for any family vacationer. The rooms are tiny. When we got there our requests were not honored even with our credit card authorized. It  took forever to get a room-not to mention even trying get on adjoining or at least on the same floor.  We were given  a handicapped bathroom and every totally flooded the floor making it scary to go in the bathroom for any reason after that.  With a family, spend your money elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response regarding your recent stay at the beautiful Hilton Irvine. Our staff takes great pride in providing a personalized guest experience at an exceptional value. We are sorry we were not able to meet your value needs during your recent stay.  While we work hard to assign connecting rooms in advance.  However, due to availability, we are sometimes unable to accomodate these requests.  I am truly sorry, as well, that we had a bathroom mishap which caused the room you were given to have a problem.  We continuously strive to meet all of our guests' needs whether it be for business or pleasure. Unfortunately, while many of our guests are children, we don't always have the "kid friendly" options some guests may be looking for. However, the HIlton Irvine does offer specialized children's menus, a spectacular pool area, and a wide variety of children's channels available through our in-room entertainment system. We continue to search for ways to improve; with our ultimate goal being to please all of our guests. Again, thank you for staying at the Hilton Irvine and for your important feedback.   Should you care to discuss your experience, I can be reached directly at 949-812-3737

Summary: Stayed at this hotel after a very busy week of business. My wife and I stayed they weekend to relax and spend time with our grandson. The front desk was very cordial and welcoming. Always willing to help. Our plan was to have our three year old grandson spend the day with us at the pool. Saturday morning was a great day to do this and the pool was nice. The problem was there is no service at the pool. Drinks and food need to be purchased inside the hotel, which is really difficult when you are dripping wet and need to walk toplace your order and then wait fir it to be prepared. The fact that I got a good rate on line was the reason I was not to upset.
Manager Response: Thank for being our guest at the Hilton Irvine.   Our location and our staff make the Hilton Irvine a great hotel for business or pleasure.  We are happy our Front Desk staff provided a warm & friendly welcome, but we are truly sorry our bar & restaurant staff failed to monitor the pool area as they normally do.  The Hilton Irvine offers a unique modern feel which we hope you enjoyed during your stay and is definitely not the typical airport hotel.  We look forward to once again having the opportunity to welcome you to the Hilton Irvine.

Summary Heading: Solid hotel for a quick trip.
Summary: A friend was getting married at the Hilton Waterfront in Huntington Beach.  This place was cheaper.  I flew into LAX, but if you are flying into John Wayne, it's literally across the street.  A solid hotel with good staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the Hilton Irvine for its ideal location which showcases its close proximity to John Wayne Airport in Orange County.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and are proud of our staff  for providing a positive service experience during your visit.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.   Thank you for being our guest.    P.S.  The Hilton Irvine now features 42 inch flat screen panel televisions with 74 HD Channels including 7 HBO options

Summary: I have been a HHonors gold member for about five years. I stayed at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport last week. On Monday at 8:00 AM, I left for a meeting with some clients and returned at 4:30 PM and the room was not made up. No problem I thought as I was going out to dinner and would not be back until at least 10:00 PM. At 5:15 PM, as I was leaving I stopped at the front desk and mentioned this to one of the reception people. He apologized and called over the manager on duty and I explained the situation to him and said it was not an issue as I would not be back in for five hours and if he could have housekeeping make up the bed and empty the trash. He apologized and said it would be taken care of immediately. I then return to the room at 10:30 PM and nothing is done.
Manager Response: The Hilton Irvine prides itself on providing a clean and comfortable experience in a safe and friendly environment. We apologize that you did not get the attention you deserved as a prestigious Gold HHonors Member.  Unfortunately, your feedback was not communicated as it should have been.  If you have an opportunity, please contact me directly so we can discuss your unfortunate situation.  This is definitely not typical of the type of service The Hilton Irvine is known for.  Direct line: 949-812-3737  We thank for being our guest at the Hilton Irvine and look forward to your feedback.

Summary Heading: extra charges that should be rolled in
Summary: We were staying one night in Irvine and booked this hotel through Hotwire.  We got a reasonable price but this was before the extras.  The price for this hotel was about $72 with fees from Hotwire.  It was a weekend night and I suspect it would be more during the week.  Other hotels in the area had comparable rates with some being a bit lower, but we chose this one without knowing what hotel it was.  Things we did not consider was the parking fee which was an additional $16 (and it seemed that no alternative parking was available even if you were willing to do some walking), fees if you wanted to have internet service, a very expensive breakfast option.  Many of these things are included free with the other hotels.  We were not planning on using the amenities so this really was
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  The Hilton Irvine does partner with Hotwire for last minute bookings which allows for Hugely Discounted rates.  As such, there are some costs that are "not included" in the Hotwire price for amenities and services which are consistent with similar Full Service Hotels in Irvine.  We pride ourselves on providing a great value to our guests in a clean, safe, and friendly environment. Unfortunately, due to our close proximity to the John Wayne Airport, it has become necessary to charge for parking services as there is very high demand for parking in the area and we only have limited spaces available for our guests. As well, as an added benefit to our most frequent guests, the Hilton Irvine offers Complimentary Internet as an option for our prestigious Hilton HHonors Gold and Diamond members.   As a note, the Hilton Irvine does offer internet pricing as low as $7.95/day for non-HHonors Gold and Diamond Members.  The Hilton Irvine is continually working on ways to improve the value options we provide for our guests which includes mitigating the costs of parking and internet.  Thank you for your patronage and for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Great hotel if you get it at a discount, expensive otherwise.  Clean, great staff
Summary: I've stayed here a couple times through priceline.  It's the most common hotel to win of the 3  hotels (Hilton, Hyatt, Westin) if you bid on 4* in costa mesa.    Free Parking Tip: So the parking is $21/day (in out priviledges incl.), but all the hotels in the area seem to open the gates at 10pm or 11pm. There's also free parking on Enterprise a block down Paularino. There's no other parking anywhere within 5 blocks. It's only a 2 minute walk to save $21/night.  Hotel Review: The hotel is nice. I'd say it's a fair 3 star maybe 3.5.  A four star really has to be one of the nicest hotels you've ever stayed in and there are some pretty stellar 4* out there.  It has a starbucks in the lobby and a nice looking restaurant.  It has a free shuttle to John Wayne (SNA) and if you're nice
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the Hilton Irvine as a preferred hotel in Irvine known for our modern elegance and personalized service.  We recognize Priceline as an important partner for the Hilton Irvine when last minute rooms are available at a steep discount.  Due to the hotel's unique proxmity to John Wayne Airport and the subsequent high demand for parking in the area, it has become necessary to charge for parking to protect available space for hotel guests. These parking charges are consistent with All full service hotels in Irvine.  The Hilton Irvine offers complimentary internet service for our valued Hilton Gold and Diamond HHonors members.  In addition, for non-HHonors members, internet service is available for $7.95/day.    The Hilton Irvine is continually searching for ways to improve the hotel's value added features for our guests.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.   Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: not a very celebratory New Year's Eve
Summary: We were invited to a New Year's Eve Party and needed a Hotel close to the house. Since I'm a Hilton Honor's member, I immediately booked with the Hilton; not the best decision I've made.   First, I was a little surprised that Breakfast was so expensive, and that there were no discounts or vouchers for HH members; but, that's not the reason for the review. When we finally checked in we arrive to a room that was clean on the surface-minus the "bodily" (ahem) hairs on the floor of the bathroom that weren't ours. When you see something like that it really makes you doubt how clean the rest of the room is.   Also, the shower head was coming off the wall and the water pressure was iffy at best; and, if you're a sensitive sleeper, better pile on some extra blankets because the heater
Manager Response: none

Summary: Standard Hilton offering. Nice breakfast which was complementary because of Hilton Honors status. Paid parking only.   This hotel allows animals. There was a dog barking in a room very close to me from the early hours. I told the reception as I was checking out - they didn't seem too bothered.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  We are continually working on ways to improve our "Standard" offerings, especially for our valued Hilton HHonors guests.   As an example, the Hilton Irvine now offers complimentary internet for both Diamond and Gold HHonors Members.   We apologize that our staff did not recognize your displeasure a barking dog may cause.  As the Hilton Irvine is a pet friendly hotel, it is sometimes difficult to police such situations.  We thank you for your important feedback and for being a guest at the Hilton Irvine.

Summary: Stayed three nights and found the rooms clean and well laid out.  Our one issue with the room was met immediately by management and corrected to our satisfaction.  The beds were comfortable and once I figured out the air controls, provided a good nights sleep.  The breakfast was excellent and we never had an employee who didn't greet us and make us feel welcome.  Would I stay again?  Sure, we have to visit the area regularly and this hotel meets our needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay.   It is rewarding to hear how one of Service Professionals was able to have a positive impact on your stay at the Hilton Irvine.  The Hilton Irvine offers a superb location, whether for business or pleasure and the hotel's proximity to John Wayne Airport is second to none.  We thank you for recognizing our staff's efforts, especially when things didn't quite go as planned at first.  We look forward to once again having the opportunity to welcome you to the Hilton Irvine.   Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Good location, great staff and comfortable rooms. No complaints. I'll go back if I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the Hilton Irvine as the preferred hotel in Irvine known for our modern elegance and personalized service. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our staff was able to provide a memorable experience for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary: I just got a great deal on this hotel via priceline - should have read the reviews first. I am coming with my family and the reason I named my own price via priceline was because our budget is extremely tight. I had no idea thy charge for parking and a mini-fridge. If I knew, I would have just found a cheaper place with free-parking and a fridge. It's my own fault though - should have read the reviews before randomly getting a hotel.  I am hoping to speak to the Manager once I get there with the hope that he/she will understand my situation. $16 is a lot for parking, and I don't want to mess this trip up for my family, so I guess I'll have to pay it, but the fridge should be complimentary for families with young kids.
Manager Response: Don't be afraid!  Please feel free to contact me directly prior to your stay and we will do everything possible to make you and your family feel comfortable at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  Parking is difficult when you have a unique location in Irvine which is adjacent to John Wayne Airport.  Our outside parking company is faced with the task of policing our limited amount of parking spaces which is anything but easy.  We look forward to your visit.   Please feel free to contact me directly at (949) 812-3737.

Summary: My stay at the Hilton Irvine was mostly fine. It has a friendly staff, clean rooms, and a very good restaurant. Nice clean gym with four high-quality treadmills, too. Lots of salesmen-types  milling about, but that's the kind of place it is. If you're staying here though, you should know that there is some kind of worker strike going on. And the tactic used by the strikers is to chant VERY LOUDLY outside the hotel from 6 am to 8 am. Clearly, these strikers know the right time to strike.  Being rudely awakened at 6 am totally sucked. But what sucked more was the response I got at the front desk when I asked about the situation. Clearly, the woman behind the desk was not authorized to answer questions about it. I thought I could actually see her squirming.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.   It is never an easy situation during such turbulent economic times.  Thankfully, with economic discussions ending, there will be no such demonstrations for a very very long time and our employees will focus entirely on ensuring our guests are sleeping comfortably in a clean, safe and friendly environment.    We thank you for being our guest at the Hilton Irvine and apologize that the economy has caused such a distubance.  If you should like to speak further about your unfortunate wake-up call, I would be happy to speak to you directly.  I am available at (949) 812-3737.    Regards...Dan McDermott

Summary: Close to John Wayne airport, comfortable hotel with great breakfast buffet.  It is not as well appointed as other Hilton's and is showing its age a bit, but the service and staff were wonderful and if you need a hotel close to the airport, can't be beat.
Manager Response: Thank for being our guest at the Hilton Irvine.   Our location and our staff make the Hilton Irvine a great hotel for business or pleasure. The hotel offers a unique modern feel which we hope you enjoyed during your stay.  We look forward to once again having the opportunity to welcome you to the Hilton Irvine.

Summary Heading: A crummy second rate hotel that definately is a rip-off.
Summary: The Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport is dirty, has small outdated rooms and charges you extra for everything, parking, internet, you name it.  The staff is horrible and obvously does not care about making their guest feel welcomed.  Our stay was a disaster from the moment we entered the hotel until we left.  When I tried to air my complaints through Hilton's Customer Service, I was referred to Mary McKinney, Director of Rooms, who obviously has no idea of how guest should be treated.  She told me "this hotel does not cater to leisure guests, this hotel market is corporate customers."  Do not waste your time or money on this hotel.  Corporate customer or not, you get a crummy room, dirty hotel, rude staff and extra charges out the kazoo, all for an over-inflated price.
Manager Response: The Hilton Irvine prides itself on providing a clean and comfortable experience in a safe and friendly environment.  We thank you for your feedback and apologize that your experience was not what you expected.   Please contact me directly if you would like to discuss your experience as this is not indicative of the majority of guests experiences at the Hilton Irvine.  Direct line: 949-812-3737  We thank for being our guest at the Hilton Irvine and look forward to your feedback.

Summary Heading: Not what you would expect for a Hilton
Summary: We stayed at the Hilton Irvine because we found a great deal on Hotwire.  Unfortunately it is difficult to say if it was worth the $69 we paid.  Upon check in the staff was rude and incompetent-literally asked me if we had a car four times.  Each time I said yes and still had to remind the staff member to give me a parking permit when I was leaving the desk.  The beds are doubles so not the most comfortable of sleeping situations.  I found hairs that did not belong to me all over the bathroom.  The furniture in the room was worn and needed to be replaced.  The pictures of the lobby make the hotel seem upscale but as you are walking to your room and can reach up and touch the popcorn ceiling and then walk in to a run down room your expectations are completely smashed.  The
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good Place, Good Location to SNA
Summary: If you are flying out of SNA the Hilton is a decent choice for an overnight.  it's a decent business hotel.  If you are staying a week in the area, go somewhere else.  The lobby and restaurant area is spacious, clean, modern.  Good stuff.  Nothing special on a Wednesday night, but did'nt expect a lot.  A spacious workout area! Three functioning treadmills and a couple of elliptical trainers, lots of free space for dumbbells.  Rooms are average but clean.  TV's are nothing special (tube, not flat) bed is comfortable, and shuttle is quick and efficient every half hour.  I don't stay by SNA much, so not sure what the competitive set is, but the Hilton seems a good (not great) option.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place if you like to pay for EVERYTHING.
Summary: Really nice Hotel. But the charge for everything. So if you get a good rate on a room, say only $180 for the night simply add $21 for parking $13 for Internet $12 per movie etc etc
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine/Orange County Airport.  We pride ourselves in providing a great value to our guests in a clean, safe, and friendly environment.  Unfortunately, due to our close proximity to the John Wayne Airport, it has become necessary to charge for parking services as there is very high demand for parking in the area and we only have limited spaces available for our guests.  As well, as an added benefit to our most frequent guests, the Hilton Irvine offers Complimentary Internet as an option for our prestigious Hilton HHonors Gold and Diamond members.     The Hilton Irvine is continually working on ways to improve the value options we provide for our guests which includes mitigating the costs of parking and internet.  Thank you for your patronage and for being our guest.

Summary: The valet and front desk staff were very attentive and quick to help with requests.  The hotel was extremely crowded and sold out due to many events being held there and in the area, but I was pleasantly surprised at the ease and pace of check-in as well as the fact that there was little to no noise in our room due to the swarm of people hanging out in the lobby/bar area.  We were even able to get an elevator within second of pushing the button, which cannot be said for most sold-out hotels.    I am giving this hotel a 3 mostly because the room we had was not very clean and a bit run-down.  We happened to get a handicapped accessible room on the third floor and even the carpeting in the hallways looked as though they could use a good cleaning.  However, the major issue was the
Manager Response: none

Summary: The main quality of this Hilton is that it doesn't feel like an airport hotel.  Rooms, bedding, crabtree toiletries, common areas, gym, decor are fresh, modern, clean.  Helpful service, good food, stiff drinks, clean pool and ample indoor/outdoor lounging areas.  Wifi is availble throughout but not included in room rates.  Parking should be free for guests but is not.  Very good shopping a 10 min drive away.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the uniqueness of the Hilton Irvine.  The hotel is definitely not a typical nor ordinary airport property.   More imporantaly, our staff takes great pride in providing a quality service experience in a clean, safe, and friendly environment.      We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine and thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Stayed overnight to get to airport quickly.  Good hotel stay, good front desk service.  Although close to airport, almost across the street, didn't hear any planes.  Comfortable bed and room.  Shuttle to airport available.
Manager Response: Thank for being our guest at the Hilton Irvine.   Our location and our staff make the Hilton Irvine a great hotel for business or pleasure.  The hotel offers a unique modern feel which we hope you enjoyed during your stay and is definitely not the typical airport hotel.  We look forward to once again having the opportunity to welcome you to the Hilton Irvine.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel, Excellent Service, Great Location
Summary: The Hilton Irvine pleasantly surprised me!   Hiltons are always usually pretty nice, but the Hilton Irvine has an awesome lobby, great rooms, and a fantastic restaurant & bar.  It's modern, trendy, & sexy! My room was comfortable, clean, & quiet.   Since the hotel is located near the airport, you'd think you'd hear airplanes & airport noise - but that was not the case.   I didn't hear a thing & had a quiet nights rest. The breakfast buffet was excellent and the service was very good.   This is a great location, excellent hotel, and the staff know how to provide good service.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the Hilton Irvine as the preferred hotel in Irvine known for our modern elegance and personalized service.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and that our staff was able to provide a memorable experience for you.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.

Summary Heading: great place to stay at a great price
Summary: We stayed here for two nights recently and had a great experience. I've been to many hiltons on the east coast and this one blew them out of the water. The lobby area was very modern and new and the room was spacious and clean. The location is near SNA and also close to the freeway which made travel very easy. We also got a great price which made the stay even better.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback in regards to your recent stay at the Hilton Irvine.  We pride ourselves on providing a memorable experience for our guests.  We are very happy you enjoyed your brief stay at our hotel and look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine in the future.   Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: A nice hotel near the airport
Summary: This hotel is very close (across the street) to the airport and especially if you have a rental car to return (walking distance). Shuttle to the airport at each 30 minutes. Staff is courteous. Check-in was fast. The room was nice, clean, large, modern, and comfortable. The king size bed was very comfortable too. The lobby was awesome. Food was ok and affordable. Close to 3-4 restaurants.   Don’t pay for the in-room Internet (too expensive – 16$) but use the 2 workstations  at the end of the lobby (near the restaurant).
Manager Response: Thank you for your Trip Advisor comments about the Hilton Irvine.  We are pleased to hear that your experience at the Hilton Irvine was a positive one.  The staff of the Hilton Irvine prides itself on providing a memorable experience in a unique hotel environment.  Our location is perfect for anyone visiting the Orange County area for business or pleasure.  Thank you for being our guest at the Hilton Irvine.

Summary: I was excited to get the Hilton through Travelocity for a price just 15 dollars more than the Quality Inn. Great Deal-----well not exactly. The parking is $16/day, the Quality Inn was free. The internet is $13/day, the Quality Inn was free. I wanted to grab a coffee in the lobby but was told I would have to sit down at the restaurant.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but they need to read up on HHonors benefits
Summary: I stayed here on an HHonors reward certificate as a gold member.  This is a pretty nice hotel.  The room I had was nice, clean, modern, and comfortable.  Definitely up to Hilton standards.  It was a quick stay and served its purpose really well.  Much better than the Holiday Inn I was stuck with when I was closer to Disneyland.  I had a really great shuttle driver from SNA to the hotel.  He made good small talk and seemed like a really nice guy.  I tipped him well as a result :).  I do take issue, however, with the front desk clerk that I checked in with, who really tried his best to be unhelpful and pompous.  I was told that I would only get one breakfast coupon as an HHonors Gold member (my friend that was travelling with me has no status).  This contradicts the HHonors
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for being our guest at the Hilton Irvine.  Your feedback was very helpful in assisting us to ensure our staff has been fully trained in all of the many benefits that our HHonors Guests receive.  Since your review, we have been able to focus on ensuring our staff is issuing the correct number of Breakfast Certificates to our Gold Members.  Thank you very much for your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hilton Irvine.  Please contact me directly if you are in the area again so I can make special arrangements for your stay.

Summary: Good side:  contemporary lobby (but you don't sleep there), comfortable bed, clean  Bad side:  PAPER THIN wall.  You can hear every toilet flush next door, you can hear your neighbor every time they move or put their glass on the table in the bathroom!   You can hear housekeepers changing the plastic bags for the trash cans in the hall way.  Airport noise happens in the morning, but not as annoy as hearing your neighbor's business for their tiny little move in their bathroom.  NOTHING, no stores nearby.  Guess it's just a place for people to spend a night before they fly out.   BATHROOM, on the small side, very cramped if two people are in the bathroom at the same time   PARKING, $16, be aware. TV, old tube TV
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   I wanted to thank you for your feedback listed on TripAdvisor outlining your less than stellar experience.  Since your review, we have taken steps to ensure our Housekeeping staff and others are working to keep noise down in the hallways to ensure a quieter atmosphere for our guests.  In regards to our parking charges, we are in close proximity to the airport and charge for this service in order to ensure there is sufficient availability for our guests and not competing with airport parking patrons.  Thank you for your feedback.  We hope you would give us another opportunity to allow us to have you as our guest in the future.

Summary: Was not impressed with this Hilton at all.  Definately not more than a 3 star property and their meeting and catering staff need work.  I sing the praises of properties I really enjoy and I will leave this at not a great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to tell us of your concerns and we appreciate your understanding. The client previous to your event went beyond their contracted time limit and therefore impacted your event. We strive to give every client the perfect event and appreciate that you will allow us the opportunity to serve you again.

Summary Heading: I stayed here by John Wayne Airport
Summary: I stayed here the night before I flew out on a business trip and I am so glad that I did. The room was comfortable and the hotel is right by the airport. I took the airport shuttle at 6:00am in the morning, which made my trip easy and convenient. I had dinner in the restaurant and the food and service was perfect. Everyone was very nice. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We appreciate your patronage and look forward to having you back with us.

Summary Heading: Standard Upgraded Hilton Property but with Great Service
Summary: Check In:  Extremely quick but very thorough.  As a Hilton Gold member was given breakfast coupons and drink coupons for the bar.   Very nice touch.  Room:  The room is the basic new HIlton room.  Nothing that is going to blow you away but a very comfortable and clean room.  I think they should have the TV's updated to LCD/plasma as the rooms appear somewhat dated with the older CRT style tv's but overall the room was fine.  Location:  Great location for the airport and I walked betwen the airport and the hotel.   I would say it is about a 15 minute walk.  If you are leaving the airport, just walk through the parking structure and there will be a spot where you can exit the parking structure to get to the other side and then follow the sidewalk on the other side of the parking
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. The entire staff welcomes you to the Irvine area and thank you for being part of our Hilton family.

Summary: conveniently located, good facilities for business, comfortable rooms, clean and good service
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we appreciate your comments.

Summary: Simplistic and problem free as well as a comfortable bed made this a pleasant visit!
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and are delighted that you enjoyed your stay at the Hilton. Our guests are important to us.

Summary: Stayed here one night for a conference at UC Irvine.  Got a discount rate due to state business travel - $104 for Executive King included breakfast.  Parking cost $16 for self park - seems expensive.  Room was mid level hilton.  Had the checked rug common to the hilton chain.  Marble entryway and bath, but showing a bit of wear.  Floor was hot when I got to the room but the AC worked fine.  AC was one of those individual units in the room - they are noisier and the blow right on the desk so if you don't like that then stay somewhere else.  Breakfast was fine - I only ate the cold stuff but it was fine.  Coffee was foul but OJ was excellent.  Fitness center had precor equipment showing some wear but usable.  Room was quiet.  Room service closes by 10pm - seems early to me.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler; Welcome UCI traveler. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay while attending your conference at UCI. We are a great promoter of the school. We appreciate your comments and have expanded the hot and cold breakfast items even more. The Fitness center is newly renovated with new equipment installed in December 2009. We hope that you stay with us again on your next visit to Irvine and UCI.

Summary: The room was very nice, clean, updated, comfortable and enjoyable.  Parking is extra and can get expensive.  The room was quite but we faced away from the airport.  The front desk helped me find a nail salon, mapped directions and answered all my questions.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response and we are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us in Irvine, CA. We appreciate your patronage and look forward to having you return to stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Pleasant enough for a night or two
Summary: This hotel was actually a bit of a pleasant surprise and I had no option but to stay here for an event. Lobby was very welcoming and the staff was too. A quick call once at the airport meant that 15 mins later the shuttle bus picked me up. I had a room right at the end of a corridor and so that did minimize a lot of the noise. The noise that I was disrupted by was not of planes flying furniture scraping on the floor, footsteps up above and doors slamming. But once everyone was settled in for the for the night a relatively full night's sleep was had.   Bathroom was basic but towels and bed linens were clean - that's all that I require! I did order room service and the quality of the food was very nice but the quantity wasn't! It was a vey nice piece of fish and about 4 baby
Manager Response: Thank you for writing your review and we are glad that you found the room comfortable and welcoming. We also appreciate your comments regarding your room service order and have shared your suggestions with our Chef. We value your critique and have changed our portions per your recommendations. We hope that you will be returning to Irvine and hope that you select the Hilton Irvine at that time.

Summary: When I made my reservation, I requested a "quiet room".  I was concerned about airport noise.   When I checked in, I asked if I had a room with little noise.  I was assured I did.  My room was 262.  There was no airport noise.  However, I could hear every toilet in the hotel when it was flushed, the business call of guy next door (I advise you not to sign that big deal - the terms are too steep) and everyone in the hallway.  In short, this hotel has little airport noise, but the internal noise levels are awful.  Management seems very concerned about the local reputation of its lobby bar.  They should be striving to provide a quiet environment for overnight guests.   Finally, skip the breakfast buffet - very weak.  But it may have been my mood since I hadn't slept.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and are looking into solutions for the internal noise complaints. Our valuable guests give us excellent feedback and we continually look for ways to improve their stays. With that goal in mind, we are striving to provide a quiet environment for our overnight guests and thank you for sharing your comments.

Summary: We stayed at the Hilton Irvine for 4 nights for a family reunion at this hotel.  The rooms were really clean and the checkin/out staff were really friendly.  We totally missed the part about turning left for closer parking and we followed the sign turn right and ended up parking at the far end near the tennis courts.  We liked the pool since it was heated and the pool was large enough based on the size of the hotel.  The food at the banquet was not that great but the breakfast buffet was good each morning.  We usually camp with a tent to save money and yes if we had to return to the Irvine area we would stay again at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review from your latest stay with us. We are always striving to assure that our guest have a great experience and we are glad that you enjoyed the Irvine area. We appreciate your comments and look forward to having you back with us.

Summary: We stay at this hotel when we are visiting Disneyland. It is a very quick drive to the park, and you get the feeling of being "away from it all" by not staying in Anaheim. This hotel is in a safe, quiet and comfortable location. As a female, I would not hesitate to stay here alone - it is a very safe property.   The Orange County airport is literally directly across the street, but I have never been bothered by noise here. There are also many business parks nearby and restaurants too. This hotel seems to welcome lots of business travelers and as such, the rooms have ample desk workspace. Internet access is available for a fee, of course.  The rooms are beautiful and have been recently renovated. Some of the rooms face an interior courtyard that is very relaxing to look at - lots
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and we are glad that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. We hope that you will be returning to experience other venues in Orange County. You are correct, it is nice to be a little distance away from Disneyland sometimes and the cool ocean breezes reach up to the Irvine area. Please look at our package pricing next time you come back to Irvine, for some of the packages include complimentary parking. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Good value for the price - Noise not a factor for us
Summary: Others noted this hotel's proximity to the airport. For some, the noise of the airplanes taking off will be a problem. For others, like my son who is five and fascinated with flight, the chance to see light planes, private jets, and jumbos up close and noisy is fun. The airport grounds flights from 10P-7A weekdays. Another reviewer described the lobby and restaurant area as "modernista," and although I giggle at the term, it is apropos. The entire area is open, almost like a really big great room, broken into "rooms" by furniture and lighting. It is geometric and inviting, and more than a little European influenced. The pool was large - about 25 meters long - and well kept. The pool area lacked umbrellas, which is bothersome in the Southern California July sun. Perhaps the
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments. Our "modernista" lobby and restaurant is the design of the world reknowned Leo Daly. We have since put up more umbrellas too, per your suggestion. We are always looking of opportunities to please our guests. And look to our packages, where we have since designed some packages that include internet as a value added item. We appreciate your comments.

Summary: We just got back from a 2 night stay at the Hilton Irvine-I am shocked that this hotel is part of the Hilton chain.  It is certainly not the 4 stars that hotwire gave it!!  Rooms were fine-clean.  There is no soundproofing at all in this hotel so not only do you hear ALL the airport noise but you also hear people in their rooms and in the hall!  We were hoping for a nice pool-not so.  Apartment complexes have nicer pools!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I am staying at the Irvine Hilton/John Wayne Airport right now as I write this.   Everything is as you would expect for its price category and class.  Linens are above par.  Room is clean.  Bed is quality.   The lobby is really quite nice/modernista.  Work out room is small but sufficient. They need to get flat panel TV's.  Old TV's waste so much space and the picture quality is awful, but that is minor.   Staff has been pleasant.   I'd stay here again as long as the location was convenient for what I was doing in town.  The other Hilton about 3 miles up the 405 was $50 more a night.   I've stayed at that one and its basically the same as this.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed with this hotel on several occasions for business and find it quite pleasant.  The desk remembers my name and I have even been picked as a guest of the day (I love free stuff).  Food in the restaurant is good, the bar is great, and you hardly notice it’s an Airport property.  Its one of the better hotels in my travels.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your business and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I recently was sent to Irvine for business and was booked into the Hilton across the street from the airport.  I'm a real lobby snob and I really liked the decor they have up.  The staff was very friendly and I was quickly checked into my room which was comfy and clean.  Their breakfast the next morning in the restaurant was pretty good.  Overall I had a great stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on Trip Advisor. We were recently remodeled and are pleased that you like the decor as much as we do. It is truly exceptional and won the ASID Legacy Design Award in 2008. We hope that you will join us again in the future and are glad that you enjoyed your stay in Irvine.

Summary: Had a one night stay at this hotel, which is opposite Orange County Airport. It appears to have been upgraded recently and the room was very nice with a comfortable bed. I would highly recommend it, but bring some ear plugs as the runway is not that far away and the noise of the aircraft taking off was a little noisy. But then this is an airport hotel and very close to the airport. I agree with the previous reviewer about the parking charge and parking, but I discovered that when entering the car park, that even though the sign tells you to turn right for self parking, you could in-fact turn left and there was self parking spots in front of the Hotel main entrance with the Valet parking spots between them and the hotel entrance.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our room was very basic but nice enough.  I kind of think that this place would be fine if I needed something close to the airport, but that would be the only real reason I'd want to stay there again. Parking was $16.  I wasn't a huge fan of paying that to park in a surface lot.  But then when we had to hike really far to the hotel door from our car I was even less happy about the charge.  Look at a google map satellite image of the hotel.  Follow the lot back behind the tennis courts, that's where we parked.  Not a great walk if you need to make multiple trips with luggage.   I just don't want to pay that much to hike forever with my luggage.  Enterprise Rent-A-Car had some primo spots though...  Not cool.  I'll give you, they don't have a ton of spots, but still.  If I'm
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Hilton Irvine and leaving your comments on Trip Advisor. We value our guests, appreciate your candor and noted your suggestion for relocating the assigned parking places for Enterprise rental cars. We have now made those spots available for our hotel guests. We are always open for suggestions on improvements or changes to make your stay more comfortable and convenient and look forward to having you back in the future.

Summary: My fiance was attending a 3-day conference, and I joined him at the hotel.  We booked on Hotwire and paid $64 per night.  (Look for 3.5 star hotel in Irvine/John Wayne Airport.)    Positives: Convenient location Well-trained, friendly staff Spacious, clean rooms with comfy beds Huge pool with jacuzzi Nice fitness center (small and limited weights, but 8 cardio machines to choose from)  Negatives:  NOISE:  This hotel badly needs to add insulation.  We heard every door slam in the hallway and entire conversations of the guests next door to us.  When a toilet flushed overhead it sounded like a rocket blasting into outer space.    -We called for a room-service breakfast menu and never received one. -We expected a Hilton to offer mini-fridges in the room. -Room-service oatmeal was
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good Airport Location and Close to UCI
Summary: The best part about our stay was the great AAA price I got of $104 a night, but then I had to pay $16 for parking and then more for internet access.  The location was good for our needs which was attending events at UCI only a few minutes away.  The beds were very comfortable but I was very disappointed with the old, skimpy towels provided.  The hallways seemed a little shabby also, carpet needed to be cleaned and lots of dishes left out side of rooms which never seemed to be picked up.
